links_reviews_text: Medium was big on me but still made it work!
Loved the material! It's thick and formfitting. However, it is stretchy, so I would in the future go with a smaller size.

links_reviews_title: Loved the dress should have gotten a small
links_reviews_text: This is a gorgeous very nice quality dress. I thought I’d get a medium since I was worried that it would be too form fitting but no fear, I should have gotten the small, Loved It! I’ll rent it again, nothing but compliments all day long!
This dress looks small on the hanger but it does stretch, the fit was true to size. Comfy and cute!
Runs a little big so I fitted it with a belt to keep the shape. Heavy luxurious fabric, great for the winter.
Fit was great, material was nice and form fitting but not too tight. Looked great with tights!
Warm, perfect for a cold day. Folds over on itself on the sleeves because they're a little too long. Def runs big, size down!
This dress was thick, stretchy and warm without being too hot. Nice for work. Ran a little on the large side, especially in the waist, but overall very comfortable!
Great dress for fall / winter. Looks great on my butt too!
fits nicely. not too snug...mermaidish.
This dress was good quality, and I really liked the feel but was embarrassed to wear it because it tucked under my butt in the back. Maybe size up if you are self-conscious about your size.

links_reviews_title: Lots of compliments at board meeting.
links_reviews_text: Very heavy fabric. definitely a winter dress!

links_reviews_title: A nice dress, but overall long.
links_reviews_text: The dress is cute and well made. I didn't love the fit--form fitting which was nice, but it was just too long for me, all around. Long arms, long torso, hit about knee length for me. Sending back without wearing.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress and fit. Highly recommend.
links_reviews_text: Loved everything about this dress. I'm 6ft tall and the length was perfect. Will definitely rent again.

I like knit dresses because the fit is easy on me. So, this dress met my expectation. I liked the thickness of the fabric, but did not scratch or feel tight. Kept the shape well. Also liked the small ruffle at bottom. Some interest without being too much. Was the right length and dress hit me in the right places.

links_reviews_title: I didn't wear this due to fit.
links_reviews_text: I love the concept of this dress, but it was too large on my frame. The sleeves were about 4- 5 inches too long on me. Loved the material though!
This is a great everyday sweater dress. The material is thick which makes it more forgiving. Great for work or a day out when you want to be comfy but look put together

I love a sweater dress and this dress is pretty cute. I think that for me, thought, it was a bit too long and added thickness to my waist that was not flattering. It will look best, in my opinion, on someone a bit taller (I am 5'5") and with a more straight build, rather than an hourglass figure.

This dress will probably be more flattering if you have a flat tummy OR if you're in your second trimester of pregnancy. It didn't really flatter my post-part I'm body, but looked fine with some spans underneath. Warm material and good length for work.

The dress is somewhat stretchy but heavy fabric enough were it conceals problem areas! Left me feeling sexy and confident! Very classy, stylish, forgiving, excellent quality! I will rent this again. So many compliments!

links_reviews_title: Cute and cozy. Thick, warm, high-quality material with sweet flair at the bottom.
links_reviews_text: Cute and cozy. Thick, warm, high-quality material with sweet flair at the bottom. Perfect dress to wear to work comfortable with my little bump (2nd trimester). Highly recommended. Falls right below my knees, unlike many other dresses which my 5'2'' frame seems to swim in. Will definitely rent again.

links_reviews_title: This dress is gorgeous but it is way too big
links_reviews_text: This dress is gorgeous but it is way too big… I rented a small and it fits like a medium/large with extra folds of fabric flopping on me. I really loved the design but I couldn't wear it. I have worn Parker many times and never had this problem. Maybe stretched out....

links_reviews_title: will rent again. comfortable and flattering
links_reviews_text: great for hourglass figure

The weight of the fabric is heavy and thick. Dress looks good with black booties. The skirt part of the dress came apart from the body so I had to send it back. Not sure if it tore bc of the weight of the dress or it caught on something when I was wearing it but I think I'd notice or remember if I caused it to come off somehow. I appreciated the customer service at RTR for replacing it and enjoyed wearing it before that happened. The weight is nice as long as the dress stays in once piece!
I really liked this dress! Very flattering fit. Perfect for work.
Fit was a bit loose for me but the length was perfect. Probably the best fitting item I have ordered on RTR, most business casual items have been too big for me.

links_reviews_title: I love this dress. Comfortable and flattering.
links_reviews_text: This is the cutest dress ever! The fit flattered my figure and was appropriate for work and date night. I wore heels to work with it and knee high navy leather boots for date night. The dress is super comfortable, and great for the cold weather.

I rented this as a maternity work dress. I am normally and XS (pre-pregnancy) so I sized up to a small. It was still WAY too big. I'd say size down at least a size if you aren't pregnant and if you are pregnant go with your pre-pregnancy size (it's very stretchy!).
Got tons of compliments on this super cute dress! It is super fitted, though, so be aware you will need good undergarments!!

The quality of the dress is amazing! It's heavier quality which makes it perfect for the winter season! I am a size 12 and ordered a Large. I'll probably order again one of these days but will definitely get a medium.
This is a cute dress for winter but it runs a bit large. There is so much material at the elbows that it creates a weird bulge when you bend your arm.
This was so comfortable I felt like I was in my pajamas. It's perfect for a brisk fall day or cold winter day. It does run big. I may rent this one again and size down.

links_reviews_title: Provides you with a good hourglass shape
links_reviews_text: I did like the dress but unfortunately it was just a little large on me so it didn't give me the perfect hourglass shape. It was a little too loose under my chest so there was extra fabric. I would rent again but would side down.

Cute dress but did not fit well. I am 5'3 and 110lbs and the dress was very baggy and loose in areas especially around the middle and on arms. I think the dress would be a better fit for someone who is a bit curvier.

links_reviews_title: Nice, heavy sweater dress but long sleeves
links_reviews_text: I have such a hard time with Parker sizing! Given the other reviews, I ordered my normal size L even though I'm 8 months pregnant. The body of the dress fit pretty well; it was only a little big. But the sleeves felt massive, both in size and length. I'd definitely recommend sizing down for this, and maybe avoiding all together if you're really petite. The weight of the dress is comfortable and very flattering, I just wish the rest of the fit had been spot on.
Amazing material but VERY big. If between sizes size down. Very stretchy

links_reviews_title: Cute but sizing ran a little big.
links_reviews_text: It was easy to fold the sleeves up. Cute style with the pleated bottom but just a little to big to look cute. I wore it to work anyway.
Absolutely loved this dress! Perfect dress for a business causal office. I will say it was VERY stretchy so I could've sized smaller (even down to an XS). Highly recommend!
The fabric was soft and colors beautiful
I can't do crop tops and just added a black tank underneath. Revived a ton of compliments. Perfect for a ZOOM meeting :)

links_reviews_title: Felt like a hi-liter...in the best way!
links_reviews_text: This top is so much fun! Sized up because it's pretty cropped.
Super cropped! Had to wear with high waisted leggings for a work from home day.
Loved wearing this! Cute bright crop to brighten winter month and dreary (quarantine) days.

I wore these with high-waisted RTR Grey jeans. My husband asked me if I was going for an 80s look today. I don't think I would have liked the sweater had I not been wearing high waisted jeans and my tummy would have showed. But it worked out perfectly. A nice bright sweater to brighten up the winter day!
Cute! Got lots of compliments. Definitely cropped. Had to wear it with my highest waisted jeans.
Sweater fits true to size, material is soft to the touch and the pops of color make this sweater a must. I loved wearing it and received many compliments.
This does have a slight crop top type fit. Just enough to let your belly button stick out occasionally. Super soft, fun, cute top. Wore it for a concert with high waisted jeans and black booties.
Great fit. Works well with high-waisted jeans or over a dress. Such a fun sweater to wear!

links_reviews_title: Perfect sweater to wear with anything!! Fun bright colors!!
links_reviews_text: I wore this several times in many ways-for work with with black pants, with the denim mini skirt and with black leggings and a vest! I ordered a size up to help with the length (it hits at the waist) and to layer it. It's very soft and the colors are bright and fun to wear! Great everyday sweater!

links_reviews_title: Very bright and retro. @VeganRoyalty for more RTR looks.
links_reviews_text: I wore this to an art opening. The colors are vibrant, the fit is loose and comfortable.
Colors pop and I really enjoyed this piece. It is cropped which i wasnt expecting but that may be my own fault. regardless. It is fun and pretty and made me happy!

It's definitely a cropped cut, best over white collared shirts or black dresses. Maybe paired with very high waisted jeans, or a rockin' set of abs. I loved the color and it was so soft. Would have bought it if it were like 2 inches longer. Had to keep pulling it down all day.
Very short and tight in shoulders, and I usually like sweaters that show the top of a high rise jean. I couldn't wear this out of the house. RtR had rec'd the small, but I should have sized up.

links_reviews_title: I ended up not wearing this.
links_reviews_text: This was SO short! I didn't expect it to be as cropped as it was. The large was cropped too short to even wear high-waisted pants without showing skin.
It's a great casual piece. Looks great with high waisted leggings. It's a bit pilled, might need to be replaced.
I'm sending this back. Love the stripes and bold colors, but this is very cropped. I am showing inches of midsection even with high waisted jeans.
Fun sweater! It was shorter than I was expecting but I'm short so it worked well for me

My husband said I looked like a Rubik cube, but a cute one. Very 80s retro throwback. A little more of a crop than I was expecting, belly button shows a bit when you raise your hands up so wear with high waisted jeans.

Got for update, wore probably 6-8 times in the month. Got multiple compliments every time I wore it. It is the best sweater and one of my favorite rentals! Seriously considering buying. Its cropped length was just right on me (and I have a long torso). It hits just at the waist line of a medium waisted jean. The cut was so flattering and the material was really soft and high quality, didn't pill at all. If I don't buy it, I'll at least rent again before the end of SoCal winter.

links_reviews_title: If this was $$ I would buy in a heartbeat.
links_reviews_text: I absolutely love this sweater. I've rented it twice and gotten showered with compliments each time. It is a nice cropped fit and hits right at my pants line with 9 in rise jeans. The neon colors are very fun and the fabric has a nice forgiving stretch while hanging perfectly. If this was any cheaper I'd probably own it by now.

links_reviews_title: Compliments every time I wear this
links_reviews_text: There are no cons for this sweater. I've worn this top a couple of times to run errands and every time I wear it I get compliments from strangers. In fact, I have received so many compliments I have seriously considered buying this piece. I have kept it around much longer than any of my other rentals. It fits true to size and cropped so it sits at the natural waist line. Its also very comfortable and the material is somewhat stretchy and not itchy as some sweaters tend to be.
Perfect!

links_reviews_title: Such fun colors but SHORT especially if you are large chested
links_reviews_text: The headline says it all. Size up if you have a big chest, not because it's tight or constricting but it makes the sweater kind of cropped.
My favorite jacket rental this far
Casual enough to wear in the daytime but nice enough that it feels dressed up at night!

links_reviews_title: Love this coat for wearing over holiday dresses or work
links_reviews_text: This dress has a high-end formal look with the collar and the faux breast pocket... looked great over my special occasion/holiday dress but also looked great over a turtleneck sweater, jeans, and knee-high boots! The sleeves are a bit wide all the way down to the cuff, which is nice for layering over sweaters.
Nice light coat. Long as expected, the color is definitely more blue than grey.

links_reviews_title: Expensive looking chic coat for fall / early winter
links_reviews_text: This is a gorgeous piece of clothing. The material is warm but since it's quite open slip for the can only work for fall. Got many compliments and I felt very chic'
Runs very small overall (especially sleeves and length) yet somehow still felt baggy and shapeless.
Not the cutest thing I've ever rented but comfortable and did the trick
Great, cozy sweater. Good quality, super cozy. Wore 3x in a week.

Classic cream and interesting linen front and silky back make for a great work piece. Warning the size listed is UK 8 size but US 4. It's a little wider around the shoulders but gave it that power move look.

Pretty unfitted blazer. It came with a spot, which I kind of spot clean and let rent the runway know. They were absolutely on top of their Customer service game and opened a new slot up...Not sure if I would try renting it again as it felt long and boxy at the same time.

links_reviews_title: weird fit. front button is too high. I did a UK size 10 but should have done UK size 8. Normally US6
links_reviews_text: weird fit

Had to cuff sleeves to make work. Looked good - lightweight. Fine and a contrast back panel that is satin or silk and rest feels almost linen like. Cool piece, out of season nw but who cares about norms?!!

I wore this over a dress with heels one day, and with jeans and flip flops another day. It is versatile and elevated my outfits. I would rent it in a size 6 next time. My only disappointment was that it wrinkled easily and the directions say not to iron.

links_reviews_title: Nothing special - a nice linen cream colored boyfriend blazer
links_reviews_text: When you see "Slim-Fit" my thought is that it would not be as boxy as it is. I ordered larger just in case (my mistake completely). While it was a little big in the shoulders, it was very large in the waist which is not what I was expecting. The linen is nice - but as linen does it will wrinkle. It is not as bad as other linen pieces I have worn, it is a little thicker and nicer than that. The silk lining is lovely. But I don't know if it is actually worth the $600 it was retail value.
Got a ton of compliments on this blazer. It's a boxy fit and I should have done a size smaller, but it unfortunately wasn't available. The back is satin and front is linen, which added a nice detail.

links_reviews_title: Love this especially for Spring/Summer. Looks chic and makes any outfit more polished.
links_reviews_text: Fit is oversized on purpose. Very comfortable.

links_reviews_title: Love it, made me feel like a real donna alla moda Milanesi: effortlessly elegant always chic.
links_reviews_text: Victoria Beckham runs true to US size, Rental was a 6 and a 4 would have been much better for me.

links_reviews_title: Lovely cream color with soft pink back
links_reviews_text: I'm usually a size 4 in tops/jackets but the size 8 fit well for a nice oversized look with rolled-up sleeves. It's not clear from the RTR pictures but the back panel of the blazer is actually a very soft pink rather than the cream color of the front of the blazer. Would definitely rent again.
Had to size up a bit for my chest but it was great material, linen and a beautiful off white for the spring!
Loved this blazer! Was hard for me to give it up. Will definitely be renting again. I got a size up and loved the oversized look
I ordered a UK 10 and it looked really big on me. The shoulders fit well but the jacket has a very straight cut so the waist looked too big. My husband called it a "zoot suit" so back it went.
I usually wear somewhere between an XS and S and I ended up with an XS with this dress. It was so cute for a bridesmaid dress and looks incredible in pictures!
This dress is super cute and cozy! The longer short sleeves are nice for winter. Loved how flowy it was without being baggy.
Very cute and easy to wear. Great color. Many compliments.

links_reviews_title: I love every about this dress!
links_reviews_text: This dress was fun to wear, so flattering, and very comfy! I'd borrow it again!
Cute dress! Casual enough to wear in everyday setting. However, slightly short on me. (I'm 6 foot tall)

I rented this for a wedding at a brewery, and it was perfect! Light, airy, and not form fitting at all, yet still flattering. It's the perfect dress for when you want to indulge in food and drinks, yet still look great at the same time. I also got a ton of compliments from other guests! I would rent this dress again!
I'm always in between sizes but this dress was a refreshing fit as it was flattering and comfortable. I am about 155lbs, 36C bra and 5'2 if that helps anyone with a reference point.

links_reviews_title: I wish I could keep it!
links_reviews_text: I love this dress so much! I wish I could keep it and buy it in every color! It looked great and was so easy to dance in. Also easy to dress up with some heels or down with some flats. It was also a great color. I was worried it would wash me out but it actually looked great. This dress fit me as expected but I ordered a size up too just in case and the belting helps to get the fit just right. I saw some comments about the underlay right at the bust. I have a small bust so it wasn't too noticeable for me, but keep that in mind.

Loved this dress! It was perfect for the elegant night on the cruise ship. The color looked great with my tan and it was so easy to accessorize! I would have bought this gem , had it not been so expensive.

I sized up because I was worried about the dress being too tight. I normally wear a 14-16 and the 1X fit nicely. The 2X was too big! I received so many compliments on this dress at the wedding, and even through social media in the posts following the event! I am very happy with this dress!

links_reviews_title: Wore this dress to a bridal brunch and got so many compliments!
links_reviews_text: I’m 5’7, size 6/medium in most things. It’s true to size and such a comfortable dress. The color is so pretty and the dress is perfect for any event. Can dress it up or down. The color is so pretty too! Loved it.

This dress runs a bit big but only because it is a flowy dress. SUPER comfortable and breathable which is a plus for me as I get hot easily. Also received many compliments at the wedding I wore it to which is always a bonus! I wish I could keep it! I will say that the first one I ordered came without the built in belt but, thankfully, I was able to get a replacement in time with the belt. This dress needs a belt (preferably the one that comes with the dress) or it will be way too baggy. Still, 5/5 with this one!
The small size fit perfect for me. Style was extremely flattering & I loved the color. Received many compliments as well!

links_reviews_title: Hubby and I had an amazing dinner at a new steakhouse in town.
links_reviews_text: Rented this for date night and it was perfect. It did a great job of camouflaging my 2 months postpartum challenges without being frumpy. I received so many compliments - I would definitely rent this dress again.
The fit was loose but I wouldn't have wanted it smaller really. It was so flattering and I got so many compliments!!!

I loved this dress and wish I could keep it forever. It was such a flattering color. Perfect for a spring/summer party! My only complaint was that it wrinkled super easily! I ended up editing this picture so it wasn't so wrinkled online but I was self conscious about it all night! Would definitely order this dress again and recommend for anyone! I'm usually a size medium in dresses, but the small was perfect. Super flattering, got compliments all night.

Very comfortable and flattering (I'm 5'1 so wasn't too long). As other reviews mention, it does have an extra piece of fabric in the chest area that got kind of annoying and I felt it only looked good if I kept pulling down the dress so the extra piece of fabric wasn't obvious. Besides that I got so many compliments!

links_reviews_title: The dress looked wonderful on my growing belly!
links_reviews_text: I rented this for my gender reveal! I ordered a small and a medium. The small was more than enough size wise. It was actually pretty lose but using the belt fixed that! Got plenty of compliments! I am 21 weeks along and have gained around 9 pounds. It's a comfortable dress for a growing mom!
Super comfy and baggy. High quality and very pretty!

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress- runs a little large
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress for my athletic conference banquet. I loved this dress! With that being said, it does run a little large in the top. The length is good, hits just above the knees and covers knees while sitting. Overall, great dress!

This dress was perfect for those days where you try on everything and don't even want to go to the event anymore cause feeling so blah! You know? I put this on, it was amazing. Felt like a pretty T-shirt dress! Perfect for beer drinking :-) I'm taller and I didn't feel like it was too short. I got so many compliments all night. The only downside is I didn't feel like there was much breathability in the fabric, it was a hot day and i was a little sweaty.

This dress was a nice change from my usual style, but not a slam dunk. It was comfy, a pretty color, and didn't wrinkle. Honestly, it kind of reminded me of something my grandma would pick for me to wear to a wedding...
Great dress and color!

links_reviews_title: Awkward piece of fabric, should've read the reviews
links_reviews_text: Like other girls are saying, there was a small piece of fabric that awkwardly ends right at the bust line. Very prominent for me, being busty. The dress was beautiful, but it is very easy to see in photos and in person. The fabric and quality was very nice, but the fabric line across the chest really ruins the look. Wouldn't recommend if you have big boobs.
Great dress! I wore it for a full day of showing homes and received multiple compliments on the blush color. The dress was a tad short for bending down to open lockboxes on the ground.
Liked this dress but had to adjust the tie occasionally and felt it didn't photograph the best. Very flowy and comfortable though!
This dress felt luxurious and fancy without being overdressed. Appropriate for both work and a baby shower!
Great flattering dress. A little short and I am short. Wore it for Easter Sunday, dress is great for work too.
A little baggy perfect for new mamas.
This dress was perfect. I purchased it - it's classic - I can wear for dinner, work, daytime.
A bit baggy and there is a weird under layer but the colour is lovely
Perfect length if you are short. The dress has this weird flap in the chest that is visible if you are full busted. Overall cute but wouldn't rerent.
This was a gorgeous day dress in a lovely shade of pink. The only problem was that it didn't come with its belt so I didn't end up wearing and sent it back
Great fit, so easy to dress up or down I wore it for a baby shower

links_reviews_title: Just didn't sit well on my body
links_reviews_text: The dress doesn't have any shape without the sash. However, when I put the sash on, the dress bunched oddly. Overall, I didn't like it enough to wear.

links_reviews_title: Did not wear this dress for the event.
links_reviews_text: Runs very large, would have been comfortable in a S or M if I wanted it baggy. Cute dress, though, perfect for a spring soirée.

This dress was perfect everywhere except in the chest area. It's made for a flat chested person and pressed my breasts down. There was also a weird flap of material that was made to cover the breast area as the dress is a bit see through, but it just pressed my chest down and made me look disfigured.

The length and color are good and it's not to boxy. My only complaint is that there is an extra layer of fabric in the chest area and it just makes the dress look odd when you have your bra on. The fabric doesn't fully cover the chest, it stops a little bit below halfway but it could be because I have 32DD. Overall, not bad but I wouldn't rent again

Loved the dress! Very comfortable and great for out of shape arms! Would have been perfect if it had pockets like I kept thinking it did LOL... gave it a 4 instead of 5 bc it came veryyyy wrinkled at the bottom and I couldn't get the wrinkles all the way out. Luckily it was flowy so (hopefully) no one really noticed!
Love this dress, perfect for hourglass, plenty of room for curves/large bust and flattering. Will definitely rent again (if not buy!)

Definitely nervous to wear cropped pants since I'm already so short, but these were a fun color that was different from the black that I'm always wearing. The pants run pretty true to size so if you've ever worn jeans from Madewell I'd say the sizing is the same.
Received so many compliments on these pants and how cute they were! Was able to eat to work and for the weekend. Fits TTS but does stretch out a bit after wearing a few times.
These were great, but they loosen over the course of the day and wrinkle easily
Previous reviews said these pants run big so I sized down from a 28 to 27 and they fit perfectly! Wore these pants a few times, the material was super comfortable.

Wore to an event that required a lot of standing and walking, but these were still super comfortable. I think they run a little large in the waist, definitely stretch out after wearing for long than an hour.

These are awesome! Can wear with anything. The size around the waist is definitely a size larger than my real waist, HOWEVER I like how the pant legs are wider and really do not hug my leg. Depends on the preference.

Normally don't wear pants like these (color or style) but I figured I'd try something new and I absolutely loved them! I wore them at least 3x with this top, a black floral top and a blue floral top. Fit true to size and were a great length for me even though I'm only 5'3". Would recommend!

links_reviews_title: I liked these! They definitely run big, so size down by at least one size.

links_reviews_text: I LOVED these pants. I would have bought them except the 28 was a size too big for me. Not even too long on my 5"3 -ish frame just too wide in the waist/legs. Loved them so much I am considering renting them in red (in my size) on my next order.
Awesome pants! Great quality and so flattering

These pants were pretty comfy and true to fit but they came wrinkled, and re-wrinkled after I steam pressed them. It's Madewell's colored denim and I have experienced this with other colors except the white...overall, they were cute for a casual day but I wouldn't try to dress them up.
I loved this on the model, and it looked okay, but it has no give. It was tighter than any other Madewell pants in this size, so that was a bummer. Maybe size up?

links_reviews_title: Not a hit, not a miss
links_reviews_text: Wore them a few times, but they're super thick with no stretch.
Comfortable and pretty basic. Mine felt large so if you want a tighter fit, maybe size down?
I am short so was worried about the crop, wide leg but these were adorable
Very flattering. Good for dress down/slight dress up.

I liked these pants for work or the weekend! They were loose at the waist, but also weirdly unflattering/bulging at my mid-section, which I was able to just cover with a longer shirt. They're kinda stiff, but really high quality. Probably could have sized down, but liked the comfort.

links_reviews_title: Nice heavy fabric and cool shape. But ran big (especially in the waist) for me. I would size down.
links_reviews_text: Nice heavy fabric and cool shape. But ran big (especially in the waist) for me. I would size down.
Loved these! Probably could have gone with the 28, but the 29 wasn't too too big. Comfy and fun but still professional enough to wear to work.
These are clearly made for taller, lankier ladies. They just looked bad on my 5'1" frame.
Fit everywhere except the waist. Needed to size down.
Loved these and easy to wear with many things/ dress up or down. They do run small for Madwell so I'd suggest sizing up.

links_reviews_title: So flattering especially if you're tall- comfy, stretchy, perfection.

links_reviews_text: Madewell jeans typically fit like a glove, and while these kind of did, they just didn't look as good as I had hoped. If you're overweight like me, maybe stay away from these right now or order one size up.

links_reviews_title: They were a little work but easy to wear and cute

links_reviews_text: I typically wear a 26R at Madewell, but got the 25 per RTR's recommendation. They were a bit snug in the hips, but loved these pants so much! Lots of compliments :)

The shade of pink was very pretty, and I normally love Madewell, but these were very stiff and blocky. On my 5'5" frame, they were just a little too long to look chic as cropped culottes, more like dorky highwaters. I ordered a 29 because the fabric had no stretch to speak of and it's a loose style, (I usually wear a 28 comfortably, 27 tight) but they were too big to wear. These went back, right on the hanger.
Very heavy gorg denim. Very flattering and cinching because of the weight of the material but too small to actually wear out of house. Would still recommend if u can get a proper fit!
didn't like the fabric. too casual, almost like jeans

At first I thought these pants were to heavy and way too wide. The color is amazing though. I tried them on and ended up liking them. I think I had a size too big because throughout the day they grew. Nice denim wide leg trend.

links_reviews_title: I loved the length and fit of these. They go with a variety of different tops to dress up or down.
links_reviews_text: My one piece of feedback about these is that the fabric is very thick. These do not wrinkle easy which is nice but the weight of the fabric took some getting used to in warmer weather temps. They just feel sort of heavy. But I love the color and the wide leg, plus the length of the pant.
So obsessed with these pants! Happy to have been able to try these using RTR.
The day I wore these pants I saw at least two other women with them in different colors, definitely very on trend. Really cute, and I liked the blush color.
Very heavy canvas material not suitable for summer.

These are super comfortable to wear and look great. They are high waisted which I typically don't wear and there are no pockets. The material is thicker which is nice. The high waist was actually flattering on these. I am usually more of a 29 but the 28 fit fine. I'm not sure how these would look on someone shorter as the length was perfect for me. I would definitely rent these again.

links_reviews_title: Really cute, but runs super big
links_reviews_text: This was cute but I wish I got a smaller size. Kinda seemed like I was swimming in them!
they do fit large and stretch out a ton by the end of the day. Nice pants though!
Super cute!! ran a size large

These are cute and high quality material. I am a 0 in pants and ordered the size 24, which was a bit too snug. I will order the 25 and I expect they will be perfect. Note the material is thick but breathable.

links_reviews_title: loved the cut and the wide leg
links_reviews_text: slightly big in the waist
Loved this piece so much! Very warm and stylish. Received many compliments. It is QUITE puffy so if you're not into that then maybe look for something more slim.
I did not have high expectations for this puffs. However, I really love it! Kinda short but perfect for car, super soft and warm (goose down). I just want to wear it 24/7.
The color is beautiful and the fit is unique and totally flattering. The jacket is lightweight yet warm. I absolutely would have purchased if it were even $100 less!

This coat is wonderful and luxurious and I think I might buy it. Love this cot by Bacon. The color is beautiful. The design and fit are elegant and can be dressed up or down. I absolutely love this coat! It's so comfortable it's like you never left your bed. 🥰

links_reviews_title: This puffer is very hip! You have to be a bit into the oversize look, which I am.
links_reviews_text: The jacket is very comfortable and stylish

First off - this is a super puffy coat with a giant collar. If you're expecting to put this on and have a slim fit then this isn't the coat for you. I loved it and thought it was super comfy and trendy. Surprisingly go more compliments from dudes and women didn't seem to understand it. Disclaimer: I wore this 28 weeks pregnant so didn't wear it buttoned, but loved it anyway and will rent again post-baby.

links_reviews_title: So soft and warm and super cute!
links_reviews_text: Pros: snuggly warm and soft, true to size, no cons.

I love this coat. It is lightweight, super warm and pretty stylish for a short winter coat. I would totally purchase this if I was going to be living in a cold weather state next year. Sleeves are long, with enough space to wear a sweater underneath. #perfectwintercoat

links_reviews_title: Has a weird structure to it
links_reviews_text: its not that tight and probably wouldn't be warm & it's a lot puffier than expected to the point where it looks weird to wear it open
Fit very strange
Good colors and lightweight, perfect for spring. Liked it but didn't love it so I knocked off a star.
Great top for work with jeans! Fun pattern and textures detail of the top. I've worn it a couple times and get ton of compliments. Great for spring!
Ran small but it worked
Very cute shirt, but I went one size up and if you have a chest larger than a B cup, I'd go 2 sizes up.

The colors/pattern on this top are absolutely beautiful. Very feminine. I received many compliments when wearing this top. The fit is loose and flowy, resulting in a comfortable fit. This top could be dressed up with slacks or dressed down with jeans. One thing to note about the fit... While the top generally fit true to size, the sleeves were a bit short on me.

links_reviews_title: I wore this blouse to work several times, alone or with a blazer and cropped jacket. Super fun!
links_reviews_text: I am in love! What a lovely blouse...beautiful, light material, a fresh cut, flattering, wearable. It's everything I dreamed! Now, a few notes on fit. I am 5'9" and 165 pounds, a G/H cup, and early in my first trimester. I've already had a baby, so my "problem areas" tend to be my midsection and my upper arms. I have a long torso and long arms, narrow rib cage. I thought the blouse (I rented the 42) fit my bust and waist beautifully, and while it's cut relatively short, it hit me just right at the hips and I had plenty of room in the arms. As a gal who's 5'9" and looks it, my only complaint is the length of the sleeves. You can see they hit me above the wrist and I have found that to be a touch irritating. When I rented this top I was looking for something charming, but wearable. Easy to throw on and go. I've worn it primarily to work (I work at a major university) and have found it absolutely perfect for this use. I may just buy this one!
Loved this shirt! Super light material but very well made. I paired it with jorts and high tips for an outdoor music festival. Tempted to buy this beauty
Beautiful print and ruched detail. The shoulder and arm holes are a touch on the small side but the whole shirt fits beautifully. Love how flattering it is on a small chest.
Cute shirt flattering fit perfect for a causal work day!

links_reviews_title: Great top for weekend or work
Bands at wrists were the worst
links_reviews_text: I had high hopes for this one. Loved the fit and very different pattern but had to take off a few hours into my work day because the bands at the wrists were too tight and driving me nuts.

links_reviews_title: Super flattering but doesn't quite lay right
links_reviews_text: Loved almost everything about this! The collar flopped over rather than making the nice mock collar, which made it look a bit sloppy. The stretchy fabric and peplum shape really compliments your shape without being overtly sexy.
Cute top, ran a bit short but I have a short torso so it worked for me. Thin material so better layered or on a warmish day.

links_reviews_title: It looked frumpy on me. Accentuated my belly :(
links_reviews_text: Comfortable but did not find it flattering on me. The stretchy parts hugs all areas, negative and positive.
I sized down and it was a little tight in the arms and short on the sleeves. The material and pattern are great! It's a very easy shirt.
Ridiculous small. I sized up two sizes still too small. Made for a 12 year old body
Nice feminine fit, pretty pattern, could be worn with black skinnies or black culottes with pointed flats. Cute for work or dinner!
Loved the idea of this blouse, it was just too small. I wanted it to be an inch longer.
Fun Top. True to size with a little give
Attractive top, form fitting with pretty colors. Constructed well.
This blouse is more flattering than I had anticipated! Great print, super light and comfortable, and easy to dress up or down for day/night. Would highly recommend this!

links_reviews_title: Cute boho vibe, flattering fit , can dress up or down
links_reviews_text: Very flattering boho piece. Fit is a bit short; wore to work

links_reviews_title: Fun pattern, light and airy fabric!
links_reviews_text: I really wanted to love this top, but it was just okay. It's shorter than the picture, especially with a larger chest. The ruffles make it flare out a bit which isn't the most flattering, but overall it's a gorgeous and well made top. Perfect for work in the summer as it's a thin fabric with the ruffles that hide wrinkles. I would definitely order again if I had a smaller chest.
The blouse has beautiful colors and pattern. It was short and tight. Combined with the ruffly style, it felt like a little girl shirt. I'm probably not going to wear this.

Lovely blouse, well made, fit is a little small if you have big boobs. I could've sized up to 44 (I'm normally a 10 and I wore a 42). I would've kept it longer, but in summer the long sleeves are a bit hot, even in the office.
Deceptively gorgeous in its simplicity. The high neck, in light weight material is great for summer. Very flattering cut, with a subtle feminine print.

This item runs small. I'm usually a size 38 and ordered a 40 for a comfortable fit but the top still felt a little tight rather than loose and flowy. I also found the top a little short. You can feel the sewing / elastic bands that make the structure of the shirt on the reverse side. It makes for an uncomfortable fit. That being said I might have actually worn the piece if I got it another size up but I didn't like it enough to try.
This top felt sophisticated & fun. Fabric is light - perfect for a Spring day. Received a ton of compliments when wearing this. Fit is true to size. I will likely reorder in a few weeks.

links_reviews_title: It did the job. Lightweight and easy to move around.
links_reviews_text: I was able to wear this all day in 70 degree weather and chase a toddler around.
Loved this dress!! Cinched at the waist, so super flattering. I am usually an xs/s and ordered the S and it fit perfectly. Lightweight and travels well
So cute, wore it twice. Makes you feel so sweet, definitely turned me into the nicest person both times wearing it
I love this dress!!! Will rent again. Back is open but with 2 clasps

Fits true to size. It does run a bit short, but if worn with sandals or sneakers it should be fine. The lace detailing is really beautiful and the elastic waist makes it super comfortable. Would rent again.
This dress was lightweight, beautiful fabric, and great quality! Such an affordable way to wear an expensive line. Only wish RTR would add more to their collection!
This is such a fun, light and breezy summer dress! It's a little on the short side but so so cute!

Really wanted to love the dress; I think LoveShackFancy is so cute! This item, however, was way too short. The dress fit me fine in a size M (I'm normally a M/6) but I could never wear it out of the house because of how short it is. I'd say definitely size up.
Love everything about this dress! However it runs small and short. If I rent again I will size up to a Large just to get additional length.

links_reviews_title: loved this dress, rented for my babyshower, great material
links_reviews_text: fits true to size, i sized up for my bump, it was a little short then but that is expected and I am short so it wasn't to shocking

I was unsure of this dress when I selected it, however I am so glad I did because it is one of my favorite RTR pieces. I am not kidding- I was out for a few hours on a Saturday afternoon and random people would come up to me complimenting the dress, I counted 7 people! It is really beautiful in person. I am contemplating purchasing this dress. Perfect summer-fall transitional dress. The dress is perfect for the day time though, I would not wear this out at night. Looks really cute paired with sneakers. However, it would be cute with low heels for a bridal/baby shower.
I wore this dress during a trip to Sonoma. It was very light and comfortable, perfect for the hot California weather.
fits true to size

Loose but still flattering without being sack-like, and easy to dress up or down. One note: it is very see through and I had to wear a slip underneath. Could be good on its own as a cover up, or work with a slip for everyday or a date night.
This was adorable. I'm 5'3" so it was the perfect length. I can see if you're tall it may be more of a tunic/shirt. Felt like it could be a year round rental too!
This dress fit well and looked cute, but the polyester/nylon material was not my jam.
I really like this dress but the color kept flipping under.

This is the perfect tunic for running errands when you want to be comfortable but don't want to wear athleisure. I had hoped to wear it as a dress, but it was way too short. It's very casual and I probably wouldn't wear it for anything besides day-to-day activities. Great color- super vibrant and pretty!

links_reviews_title: Festive, fun tunic for tall ladies
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress as a tunic top to wear at a family birthday party for my daughter. I wanted something festive, bright, casual and comfortable. This item delivered! My only regret is that I ordered a large. I've recently lost 6-7 pounds, and I'm still readjusting my sizing. A medium would have been a better fit for me as a relatively small chested person.
The stitching was completely undone in front. So annoying, but cute style.

links_reviews_title: Wore this to a cubs game with work colleagues
links_reviews_text: Nice and flowy! Sometimes a bit short if the wind blew a certain way, but easy to catch! Very comfortable and the colors are beautiful and vibrant! True to size, taller ladies may want to go up a size to help with length!

links_reviews_title: So nice I wore it twice
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress! Fit perfectly even for my shape. Length was great to wear to work, but also appropriate for a Sunday afternoon birthday brunch. The red color was really striking and I got a lot of compliments. Two things to note, when this gets wet - the color almost looks as if it has faded. The front can also be fairly low cut. That didn't bother me, but it might bother other people.

Comfortable and cool when you twirl. Had to use tape to keep from showing bra and gapping Open. Also very thin material, so I had to wear a slip. Very baggy and nice length too. Would have given more stars if it had been lined

Absolutely LOVE this dress. Wore it to an Uber casual wedding celebration. Rich, red color, very comfy. If it was less expensive I'd buy it. I'm a 4/6 and the small was perfect. Would've paired with cowboy boots but celebration was outdoors and it was way too hot.
It was a great fit! The arms were more fitted but that helped the dress be flattering. I wore a cami underneath because the slit is long. Cute on a petite curvy girl like me!

links_reviews_title: Super cute tunic or dress even for tall girls!
links_reviews_text: Adorable, dress up or down, leggings, jeans, bare legs, this works with everything.
Loose, flowy, a little see-through but great for a summery-vibe

Had to wear leggings and high boots with this dress as it was too short for work otherwise. Got lots of complements on the bright red color. Material wrinkles easily, which was annoying. Wouldn't rent again but still liked it.
Comfy fit & super cute detail.
The M was too short unless you are wearing tights; more a tunic than dress. A larger size would be too large overall.

This dress fit true to size because it's meant to be baggy. It's very light weight and easy to wear. It is a little see through, so be ware. If you raise your arms up, you'll see your butt cheeks too....so keep your arms down. Very pretty dress and perfect for a hot summer evening.

links_reviews_title: I thought it was cute, he thought it was kimono!
links_reviews_text: Too short for school without leggings, but otherwise work appropriate. Vivid color, wrinkled easily but fine for a random work day.
I loved this dress but didn't wear it because you can see through it

links_reviews_title: Easy to wear, but lots of compliments too. BIG fan of BA&SH that i discovered via RTR.
links_reviews_text: Perfect fit! Works as a cover-up and a dress to impress.
Was so excited for this rental but it was so short it was unwearable. Barely covered my butt. I'm 5'10 and curvy

links_reviews_title: Wore this dress for a handful of different events, and received compliants for all! LOVE this dress!
links_reviews_text: Flowy, not fitted. Typically I would have gone with a S, but the XS fit great. I'm 5'6" and found the length the good.
I wore this for a pirate themed party, but it's a cute everyday dress to pair with sneakers.
Great with jeans (I'm very tall) or with shorts underneath. Would be great dress for a shorter fashionista!
So cute. Can be dressed up or down. Color is beautiful and it's well made.
Great fit. Pretty and comfortable
Very cute and true to size but seethrough! I didnt have a slip so back it goes.

Very cute dress but it fit my like a mini skirt. It looked more like a tunic than a dress. Too bad because otherwise I would have loved it, but it was too short to be an appropriate dress for anywhere but the beach.
I'm only 5'5 and this was SUPER short. Such a bummer because the red is so vibrant and the detail on the fabric are beautiful. I just don't know how anyone over 5ft could wear this. :(

Fit true to size, looks just like the picture. However, the material is actually quite sheer in the sunlight. I didn't care but some might. I loved this dress but the weather wasn't cooperating with me so I couldn't wear it as much as I wanted. Would rent again!
Such a fun and bright dress. Comfortable and well made
Wore this on a date and it was breezy and comfy. It was long enough to feel modest but without looking boxy and huge. I really liked wearing this dress.
Casual fit and great color

I actually really liked this jumpsuit, despite reading some reviews that it was itchy and big. You'll definitely want to size down if you're looking for a more fitted outfit, but I felt super comfortable and trendy in this! I didn't find it to be too itchy either.
So comfy like wearing a soft blanket! It runs pretty big so I would size down.

Didn't wear as I wasn't expecting this to be fully knitted and too warm for early fall/ late summer. It fits well but looked like a comfy Pj. Material felt a bit itchy... don't think I'll survive without wearing anything underneath . Sad
Ughh wanted to love. The pockets were so bulky they added 2 inches to my thighs. It was a tad scratchy and then a bit too short or not short enough. Hit weird.
I didn't wear this item because it was very large. I rented a size M based on RTR's size suggestion but I was swimming in it. Definitely order a size down.

First off, I should've looked at the description better. I thought I was getting a denim jumpsuit, but this is far from denim. Think of it as a sweater jumpsuit. PROS: comfortable material, feels like you're walking around in a blanket, warm. CONS: least flattering think I've ever had on my body, the pockets did not lay flat so it looked sloppy and bunchy on the legs.
Not the softest fabric in the world but it gets the job done. Very comfy and can be adjusted to fit your waist. Wore this for a long spa weekend and basically didn't take it off!
This was the perfect splash of color for a WFH conference call day and so comfortable. Even my kids commented on how great it looked.
great travel piece. warm and cozy. perfect for a trip to ireland !
Great fit! Perfect for chilly nights & very comfy. Might buy!

links_reviews_title: Cute but frumpy when not buttoned
links_reviews_text: Very cozy, soft material. Sleeves felt snug which is why I said runs small, definitely roomy everywhere else. When buttoned, super cute. I didn't like the way it hung when open which I have pictured.
Beautiful color and oversized fit. I sized up and happy I did. Sadly mine arrived pulled so I sent it back. But may reorder as it's really a beautiful sweater coat

Wore this many times over two weeks, it was very functional but it started to look a little pilled after a while. This is more for casual occasions than work. I wore it over sweaters in lieu of a jacket in 45 degrees and was comfortable. It is long on me at 5'3" but it gave my legs extra warmth so I didn't mind. The slots also help it not feel super long!

I love the oversized, heavy hood on this sweater. The button details are perfect. It's a little itchy for me, but I'm pretty sensitive to wool. I found that when I moved around a bit, it would start to hang in a less flattering way; so I kept adjusting it throughout.

This sweater coat was soft and cozy, and it looked great over my dress. I wore it on a 60-degree day and was comfy. I believe it was also pretty true to size if not a bit big (I generally wear a small or medium, and this fit in a small). Recommend!
I ended up not wearing this. Even the small seemed too oversized for me. Pretty green color though.
I only wore this once because we were all confined to home. I'm on the fence about it. If I sized down I may like it more but as usual it wasn't available in my size.
This looked exactly as I expected, I forgot to get a picture. My husband liked it too!

links_reviews_title: a noticeable staple in cold weather
links_reviews_text: This is a dramatic sweater. It is warm and goes over another sweater. The material is soft and the color is just right. I have gotten so many compliments.
Like the color and fit, very warm. Only negative is the one I got was starting to pill a little. Didn't bother me because I wore it for a casual weekend.

links_reviews_title: perfect sweater coat for DC during a mild December
links_reviews_text: nice fit and color
Fun to throw on over t-shirt and jeans, just like the picture shows. I got a lot of compliments. Fun and different color.

links_reviews_title: Great deep green transitional season cardigan/jacket
links_reviews_text: This was nice to have for a week or two. It is oversized and, by design, not super flattering but it is a quality knit with nice details and styling. The shade of green is terrific.

Unusual I need a medium but it worked. Husband referred to it as my Jedi robe. Took it on a work trip to CO and it was perfect! Cozy and warm but lots of compliments. Oh -- and great to take on a flight, too, as your personal blanket!

links_reviews_title: The best sweater for both indoors and outdoors!
links_reviews_text: I'm petite so don't usually like long but the side slit helped. Material is perfect, color is phenomenal, comfort level was perfection. Tons of compliments, wore it constantly for a few weeks. Even the medium felt grossly oversized for my pear-shaped size 8 frame
The color of this sweater is so good, but it's huge. I wore it more than once, but I never felt great in it. I was warm, but frumpy...
Great weekend sweater. Great for wearing in the office too!
This sweater was perfect for fall days. Wish I could own but will probably just keep renting! It has a nice stretch and no itch.

links_reviews_title: Cozy chic to the extreme, with an autumn-perfect color!
links_reviews_text: I rented the XL to be sure I'd get the comfy, "oversized" look, and boy did it achieve that. I definitely would order my true size (L) next time, and even then I have a feeling I'd still have material to spare to achieve the "grandma sweater" style. That said, this is the most comfortable material EVER! It is SO cozy, and I've been able to wear it both inside as a layering piece and outside instead of a jacket. I got tons of compliments on the color, and the toggle closures are adorable! This has been a dream to wear again and again as autumn kicks into gear. Although it's hardly glamorous, it's certainly the Update piece I've been loving/ wearing most often (even with the too-big size)!

Fit was wonderful - so easy to wear and loved having pockets while on vacation. I had to wear a backless bra, but if you have a larger (or perkier) chest the dress would probably work without anything!
So easy to wear - I'm pretty busty and felt comfortable without a bra. Felt supported and cute and relaxed all at the same time. Great for a week in Hawaii!
This is beautiful easy perfect. Lovely fabric, awesome open back. Gonna hold onto this baby til summer ends.

Very comfortable flowy maxi and the open back makes it stand out. Loved the pockets and it's super flattering. Would have given it five stars but it ran a bit big. If I would have rented the medium I can guarantee I'd be keeping it.
Perfect maxi dress that balances sexy and comfort. Also adjustable so worn without a bra. Rent!
This is a dream dress. Comfortable and flowy, but fitted just right at the waist with a gorgeous open back.

I loved this dress! It hugged in all the right places and had a really slimming waistline. The chest was surprisingly more supportive than expected given it was backless and I didn't have wear a bra. Not floor legth though, but a comfortable ankle height.

I was apprehensive about wearing a backless dress. I wear a 32D and have nursed two babies so I never go braless! This dress has changed that. It was so comfortable on a hot, humid day and the straps are adjustable so getting the support just right is easy. I used one of those backless sticky bras and ended up wearing the dress more than once. For reference I'm 5'8" and generally a size 6. I wore this in a medium.

links_reviews_title: The best maxi with an awesome open back!
links_reviews_text: Tight in the waist - a little short for a maxi dress but worked with sandals
Love this dress. I have a very large bust but was feeling bold to wear this backless dress without a bra. So glad I tried it! Work to a day party, lots of compliments. Try it!

links_reviews_title: I loved the back of this dress and the fact that it could be adjusted.
links_reviews_text: I was nervous about the bust area but because the straps can be adjusted, it was not a problem.

I looked fine in this dress. The dress was flowy at the bottom but SNATCHED you at the waist. The straps provide great support. It has pockets and the material is very breathable. It wasn't too long considering I'm only 5" but I believe it would have been longer if i didn't have a little bit of a booty. Would honestly consider buying the dress.
Super comfy. Loved this dress comfy and cute. I will definitely rent this dress again.

links_reviews_title: very comfortable and stylish for a trip to Austin.
links_reviews_text: easy dress to wear. I wore it with a sporty Adidas cropped jacket since it got cold in the evening. very easy to dress up or down.

links_reviews_title: Love this dress but between sizes
links_reviews_text: This dress is amazing. 3 kids in, I did not think I'd be able to pull off the backless, but somehow it works. I would buy it but the medium is a tiny too big and the small a tiny too small.

links_reviews_title: The most amazing dress! Almost wanted to buy it!
links_reviews_text: I don't know how I came across this dress. It is everything I want in a dress. Very limited cleavage, yet the back is subtle and open! Got many compliments and would get it again...unless I buy it!

Fit was perfect for my small bust, especially with adjustable straps. Exposed back gave a touch of sexy to the otherwise standard flowy maxi dress. The material is so soft and light and the large scale print works well with a variety of scarf or cardigan colors. Love it and may rent again!

Feels insanely comfortable- as a maxi dress with pockets tends to do- but the low back and shape of the top made this feel sexy and stylish. I couldn't resist keeping. Ive work with a gray suede moto and booties when the temperature dropped all the sudden, and I've worn with sandals on a hot summer afternoon. So excited about this one! I'm more often a medium, and the large fit perfectly, so runs a little bit on the smaller size. I'm also 5.9" and this is just above floor length in flats.

I loved everything about the dress. The print, the material, the cut, the back! I loved it all. I'd definitely rent it again. No zippers or annoying pieces - easy pull over your head and go. The back band is elastic, so very comfortable and did not worry at all about any back fat. :)
Great dress! Awesome comfortable summertime material. The open back is a nice accent. Wasn't quite what I wanted for the party we had but I will definitely keep it in mind for the future.

Easy to pack and throw on! Wore it for a night out on vacation. I am 5"10 and it was more of an ankle length than a maxi on my but with sandals it doesn't really matter. The back is very low so you can't wear a bra and there is very little support in the front so wouldn't recommend if you have a larger chest.

Cute dress, a little on the long side. I am 5'6" and wore it with 3 inch platform sneakers and the dress grazed the ground. I have a large bust and surprisingly the dress fit really well in the chest. Large in the waist however, will size down next time. Would rent again.

I am five foot three and threw this on with flat sandals and called it a day. Great dress for evening or day (not work due to back being open). But great for a Saturday or a date night. Comfortable, pockets (magical), lovely.
This was just a little mumu on me
Perfect in every way! Somehow I didn't even need a bra.

links_reviews_title: I Want to Live in This Dress
links_reviews_text: Entirely lightweight, airy, and open, this dress is perfect for sweltering, sweaty summer days. I am regretting sending it back after only a week. If I can snatch this up again, I will.
Voluptuous summer stunner!

links_reviews_title: Perfect days one dress with a kick
links_reviews_text: This dress is comfy and cool. At first, I thought it wouldn't be easy to wear or flattering, I was very wrong...it's perfect! I may keep it for the summer!its very forgiving and if you are between sizes you may consider going down. If that not available it should be ok since the straps are adjustable. I'm a 35dd and lately have been between a 10-12. Normally I am a between a 6-8 and I would order the m if I were still that size. It's light and comfy received so many compliments that I hadn't expected. The back is everything!
I’m 5’2” and wore this with flats and heels. Easy, adjustable, and so many compliments. Great weight for a summer dress, not too revealing (just enough).
This dress gave me the vibe of SEXY with a touch of good girl. I wish I would have gone a size down though it was big in the back and chest

links_reviews_title: Lovely for a warm day in Spain
links_reviews_text: Good fit, not sure if maxis are my best look. Liked the pattern. Will likely rent once more.
Love, love, love! Great for the summer. Adjustable straps to fit your chest size. Long maxi with pockets!! Would wear or rent again and again!

Loved this dress -- wore it to dinner and also to the beach as a cover up. Tried both the 2 and the 4 and ended up wearing the 4... found I liked it better a bit loose and oversized than well fitted. The fabric was nice but light enough for warm weather. Nice material that didn't wrinkle easily. A great rental.

links_reviews_title: Such a fun and unique dress!
links_reviews_text: Great for fall though definitely size down. I liked it so much that I wore it twice. Could be "bag" like though somehow it was flattering anyway. The zebra print was so cute!

Liked this a lot but could see it fitting others weird. The sleeves were large and the neckline very open. The weirdest thing to me was the placement of the pockets - very low, kangaroo style. It would be cute with a jacket and boots in the fall but I could see the sleeves not cooperating with layers which is a shame!
Fit was looser than I expected but love how it hangs and is super comfy! Def want to wear for a night out next time!

links_reviews_title: I wore this to the post office and felt like a celebrity
links_reviews_text: Since I leave my house twice a month anymore, I really had to make the most of my RTR! A little snug in the bicep area, but I'm really buff, so...yeah!
I rented this for a party but didn't go because of the COVID 19 crisis. I can't say how it wore but I tried it on and it fit perfectly and was super cute. Wish I could have worn it.
So fun, has pockets great for day to night look
Loved the cut of the dress! Very comfortable, yet unique and different. Definetly would size down.
The dress is cut to wear loose and baggy, so I should have sized down I was concerned it may be too short but it wasn't. It is a linen material so it kept me cool in the heat. Cool dress!

This dress is adorable and very comfortable but it runs super large. It cinches in a bit at the waist so it does provide some shape, but overall, it's just big. I loved the style, though. Will likely rent again in a smaller size.
It does run a little large but I liked that I had some room. Great for day to night but also work. Might buy it!
This dress is cute, and the fabric is nice, but it runs large and I needed a smaller size
Loved it! Fit lose so I will size down next time. Has a bit of shape it it which is nice.
love the pockets!

links_reviews_title: Great transition to fall trends! Linen + Animal Print
links_reviews_text: This dress runs almost 2 sizes too large, but really 1.5 sizes large. I have seen it for sale on line, and it's shown with a thick belt in matching fabric, so belting helps it seem more slimming.
The material is like a burlap sac only softer. Runs very large. Not flattering at all.
i ordered the size 8 but it was so big i couldn't wear it. i plan to try in smaller size
The dress is great, but runs big, size down for a perfect fit.
Came new with tags but was too big to wear. Still have it 5 stars b/c it was super stylish and I will rent again in a smaller size

links_reviews_title: Chic tuxedo vest style. Unique, beautiful buttons. Runs large.
links_reviews_text: Love the style of this chic tuxedo vest. It made a jeans and white tee look way cooler. I wear a 4/6 and the small was too roomy. I wouldn't have sized down as it fit around my hips, but just a lot of fabric around my midsection and arm holes. Since it didn't fit me totally right (and I'm impatient to order more!) I only wore it once. It could def be dressed up with statement earrings and high heels or boots... maybe velvet or leather leggings! Tough to find a jacket that worked.

This fit beautifully. The material is light enough to wear on its own during the warmer months, and it looks great layered on top of a basic tee. Despite the expression in my face, I really loved wearing it!

links_reviews_title: Cute add to a casual outfit!
links_reviews_text: One of the buttons was almost falling off when I received. Loved adding this over jeans and a long sleeve for a cute fall look!
I wanted to wear with biker shorts but felt it was just slightly too short. Super cute for mixing things up at work and for client meetings! Size down- runs crazy big!
Loved the idea of this, but fit was a little awkward. Wore it anyway and couldn’t really make up my mind if I liked it or not.
Fit great with a white button up and black slacks. Would rent again.

I loved this piece. I usually wear a 6-8 and got the medium, but I think next time I rent it I will try the size small. The medium fit fine, but definitely gave it a more oversized look. So sad this piece doesn't have pockets though! Great for giving a little bit of flair to an everyday more casual work look.
If you are looking for a subtle change from a black blazer, this is it. It's quite roomy so don't size up, next time I'll learn

links_reviews_title: Haven’t worn it yet - just tried it on
links_reviews_text: Good quality. Fit is a bit big. Works well with pants and skirts. Material is lightweight
i'm chesty so I selected a L, but really needed a M. Would have worn more if the right size
I'm glad I read the reviews and sized down. Could have gone another size down for more fitted look. It's a nice tailored look without wearing a blazer. The buttons on mine though were very loose.

I was new to RTR and did not follow golden rule to read reviews before selecting. I am normally a medium and ordered large and it was so big. I should have ordered a small as this ran big anyway. Fabric was nice cut was a bit boxy.
No cons. Looks polished and flattering.
Loved this piece would rent again
if you are a size 4, be sure to get the XS or S

links_reviews_title: Great office piece. Buttons make it extra fun.
links_reviews_text: Fits well, even though I'm bottom heavy.
Too large to wear, size down by 2+ sizes

links_reviews_title: Every day at work is unforgettable.
links_reviews_text: Couldn’t wear it. It was too big and bulky and didn’t fit well. The buttons hung down and didn’t lie flat.

links_reviews_title: Great piece to dress up or down!
links_reviews_text: Large fit, as is the style. I wore this sleeveless with skinny black pants and heels- great outfit. Highly recommend!

links_reviews_title: Never got to wear it. It was too big.
links_reviews_text: I'm a pretty standard 6 to 8 and a medium in most brands, but this medium was just huge. It had no shape at all. I'm returning it without wearing it, and I'll try again for a small. I still gave it 4 because it's a nice material and I like the buttons. You can tell it's been worn a lot though, since the inside button is coming loose.
Super cute, can be dressed up or down. I wore it with a turtleneck and jeans and want to rent again to wear with a dress in warmer months. Definitely roomy, but not too large.

Ordered a Size Small based on the reviews that this runs large (usually wear a M/6-8). The size small fit perfectly! Fabric is nice and thick quality. Paired this with black ponte pants and black heels for work. Also, planning to wear it this weekend with a pair of multi-colored tights and black flats. So chic! Staple wardrobe piece.
It is oversized but also flattering
I wanted to like this but it's oversized in the wrong way
Loved the fit and buttons

Beautiful piece and very well made! So many compliments! But was extremely large. I'm always a medium but this was just hanging on me. Wore a tight tee under to make it work but planned to wear it for work and on the weekend but with size it wasn't weekend appropriate.

This is a gorgeous vest -- I wear a 6 and the small was still huge on me. I wore in anyway with white trousers and felt like I was a little kid wearing my dad's clothes. It was big in the shoulders and very long.

links_reviews_title: It was on the large side but still looked good
links_reviews_text: This is a big on the large side but it was roomy and still looked great for work

links_reviews_title: Wore it to a play in NYC.
links_reviews_text: Cute vest, looks great on, but a bit itchy for me.
nice, tailored
The fit on this is huge! I am usually a 2-4 so I got a small and I was swimming in it. I don't think an XS would have made a difference.
Wayyy too big. I felt like I was swimming in it.
Ordered a larger size than usual. Way too big! It was pretty. Might try to rent again in smaller size.
It was too big. Couldn’t wear it

links_reviews_title: I rented this to wear to work, but.....
links_reviews_text: It was wayyyy to big. And it is long enough to wear as a dress. And the material is kind of disappointing given the price. It seems like it would wrinkle.
The sizing on this is totally off and I was very disappointed. I ordered the large as it said it was a 6-8. I'm a pretty solid 8 so went with that. Definitely should have gone with the medium.

Amazing dress that fits like a glove. Looks and feels like a high quality item. I added a belt, but only because I tend to add a belt to everything. I didn't think I would like this dress as much as I did.
This dress is super unique and definitely works in a professional, business B dress code environment. Highly recommend - you'll feel so good cruising around in this number.
I absolutely love this dress. The bold print and cut are so unique. I've gotten so many compliments every time I've worn it. Holding onto it for awhile as I may purchase it.
I wasn't sure about the color at first but once I put this on, I realized it was one of those special pieces. So many compliments and so comfortable.

Might be my favorite rental of all time!!!! Absolutely in love with this beautiful dress. I wore it to a party in December and got head turning compliments all night. It is essentially a huge caftan with a tie in the back of the neck for a cute detail. Paired with high black boots.
slinky fit is the perfect combo of modest and sexy. sleeves with drama and unique neckline. surprisingly comfortable and easy to wear.

I wore this to an evening work event and received a lot of compliments. It hangs beautifully and is comfortable. The fabric is thicker than expected and it was a little difficult to get my hands through the sleeves but it looked amazing. The eye hook had broken off on one side so I had to pin it together.

links_reviews_title: Safari meets The Boardroom in this wild frock.
links_reviews_text: The fit is loose but sexy. The high neck (which I NEVER ORDINARILY WEAR) gives off a very glamorous vibe. Can't recommend this dress enough...Might rent again the next time I have to play with the big cats at work.

links_reviews_title: Stunner for any occasion with forgiving fabric
links_reviews_text: The elegant neckline. The slinky sleeves. The well-aligned stripes in a bold print balanced by the neutral tones. I can't choose a favorite thing about this dress. It's very comfortable (wore it 16 hours through board rooms and airports) and gets noticed. I was worried it would be clingy and accentuate the wrong lady lumps (my hips) but I floated over them nicely. I am a pear shape, medium up top and a 14 in shorts; the 12 fit very well.

This dress is literal perfection. I think it's one of the best pieces I've ever rented! The material is so comfortable and this dress is gravity defying flattering. It somehow gave me a flat tummy and no bra required. I got so many compliments and was photographed on the streets. Just so much love for this dress!

This dress is beautiful. The draping at the neckline is pretty, the sleeves are full and the print is great. I think it needs a belt and wore it with a wide black one. I received lots of compliments. The dress makes a statement. I am considering buying it!

links_reviews_title: A balloon sleeve + a statement print!
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress! I never would've thought to wear it, it's not my typical style, but with a chunky belt to break up the pattern and the shape it became one of my favorite rentals.
runs small

links_reviews_title: Tiger Stripes are the new Leopard!
links_reviews_text: Stunning dress from the shape to the material. Feels so luxurious on and makes a statement! It's a little fitted over the hips but still manages to drape the body beautifully.
Nice dress. Sleeves very large.
I thought it was maybe a little too dressy for work but everyone loved it! Lots of compliments.
I'm too skinny got lost in the dress, but the material was nice, no need for a slip.
What a dress! Stylish and cool
While true to size, the sleeves are really large balloon sleeves so if you are petite like me, it was a lot of fabric. That said, I still wore it and received lots of compliments.

links_reviews_title: Comfortable, received a lot of compliments, fabric is sparkly

links_reviews_text: I didn't expect I'd like this as much as I did, especially because I don't usually love sparkly clothes. It was super cute though and I ended up wearing it a few times--on a date, to work, and to a party. Got compliments every time! It's thin so it tucks in well to high-waisted pants too. It's is a bit scratchy but that's the only downside. I strongly considered buying it.

links_reviews_title: Love the sparkle, rides up too much
links_reviews_text: This was difficult to wear because the waist rides up so much. I wish I had rented a Medium, but then it would have been oversized in the arms so much. I was hoping wearing with a skirt or over a dress would be ok, but I didn't love the look that I ended up with. The sparkle was fun and I got a compliment since it's such a retro, unique piece, but overall I would have to get higher waist pants in order to rent again (and my jeans are pretty dang high waisted!)

Not a lot of things with vertical stripes on it so had to give it a try. It has a metallic finish to the fabric but was not itchy in my opinion. Light weight with a mock turtleneck. I paired it with a wide leg corduroy for a 70s throwback look. Runs true to size, more crop fit than shown on website model, needed to pair it with high-waisted pants.

links_reviews_title: Loved it so much I had to buy it!
links_reviews_text: Love the sweater!! I've gotten so much wear out of it I wanted to own it. A little Shimmery which I was pleasantly Surprised with

I wore this for the 29th birthday photoshoot. I actually have it on backgrounds in all of my photos - not on purpose but it looks the same either way LOL. I love the neck part and the sleeves. A great selection for a relaxed look!
Fits true to size and flattering - love the style and colors! It was perfect for a casual date night, but is more glittery than I anticipated.

I loved this sweater, it is more cropped than I expected so I wore it with high-waisted jeans or skirts. It's actually sparkly in person which I didn't expect but loved. It was not itchy, would 100% recommend.

links_reviews_title: Out of My Usual Range but Fun for the Day
links_reviews_text: This aesthetic is a little out of my typical range but -hey- that's the beauty of RTR - trying something new, being bold, taking chances! I loved the flare sleeves with tapered wrist and the fun material. The colors are definitely in a mid-70s theme and that's atypical for me but for a day, this was a lot of fun. I got compliments from strangers all day, noting they liked the unique style.

links_reviews_title: Wore countless times, tons of compliments
links_reviews_text: I wore this a ton. Light but still a little warm. Great colors and fit. Tons of compliments.
This was so small/ short. Not at all how it was pictured.

Wore this to work with some black pants and it worked great! You can't necessarily tell but it is sparkly though no sparkles fell off and it wasn't itchy. Only complaint is that the bottom can ride up as you walk so be mindful. Not a huge issue but just a result of the more cinched bottom.

links_reviews_title: Fits and looks great for everyday
links_reviews_text: Love the color something different and has a little sparkle. Great for day or night look with jeans or a skirt.

links_reviews_title: Just the right touch of glittery-ness
links_reviews_text: I loved the fit of this shirt and it added that little extra bit of pizazz to any outfit. One thing that was quite bothersome were the multiple, SUPER LONG tags on the bottom inside of the shirt. Those need to be cut off or sewed down or something as they are super annoying and scratchy!
Great fit! Layered it over a Black fitted Midi dress and viola...perfect date night outfit!
Perfect to wear to the office and then on a date. It was thinner than I expected.

links_reviews_title: Pretty and slightly sparkly but ITCHY
links_reviews_text: Beautiful top with a slight sparkle to the colors but it was a bit itchy. When I was working and focusing on other things I didn't mind, but def would think twice about renting again. Small fit great (I'm 5'3, 32C)
Tight in the neck because of the mock neck - somewhat of a short torso sweater
Great for a festive holiday brunch. Is a little cropped so best with high waisted jeans.
I couldn't sit in these pants (they slid down exposing my rear) and the pockets were on the front which made zero sense. Never wore.
These pants were super light and comfortable and I loved wearing them. However, I wish the waist would have been a little bigger because they we a little too tight for sweatpants.

links_reviews_title: Flattering and keeps you dry, but size UP!
links_reviews_text: Wore these to six flags in 85 degree weather. Although I didn't feel "cool" since a breeze wasn't able to move through them, I didn't get hot or sweaty in them either. Was actually the coolest part of my body. Ended up being the perfect choice for me. I did size up per another review, since I have wide hips and very glad I did! Were just a bit snug across hips. These are regular rise pants. Would love to own these, as the piping made them flattering, but $400 for a pair of swishy pants is way too excessive.
The most comfortable, stylish swishy pants ever. Want to live in them forever. Need them in every color.

links_reviews_title: Comfy just wish they ran true to size.
links_reviews_text: The fabric is very noisy!

links_reviews_title: Stiff nylon material was not very comfortable to wear
links_reviews_text: These pants run small and are stiff and uncomfortable. I thought they would be baggy cozy sweats that I could wear around the house and neighborhood but they were not. So disappointed.
