I rented these expecting a comfortable lounge pant. However, the material is more like a windbreaker and the pants are unlined, proving cold in the winter. They'd probably be fine as pants to wear to/from the gym, but not just laying around. tl;dr: rent if you want windbreaker pants
Comfortable, warm, jogger pants used on long airplane trip. Fit well, easy to pair with any tee-shirt.
The style's just not for me. They were a little tight across the hips but not tight enough to keep me from wearing them.

So I really liked these! Super comfortable and flattering, but they are kind of loud when you walk. I would totally keep them but I can't imagine walking down halls and not annoying folks. They do run a bit large, but I ordered a size up because i wanted a baggy fit. I would reorder a size down!
Piping is neon orange, not as pictured. Very cool pants -- crinkly joggers with cool pockets and piping, but didn't wear bc they were tight in the waist. Will size up for sure and try again!

I rented the other Rails shirt with the cactus pattern and it fit well, so I decided to try the flamingo pattern. The sizing is way off- this was a very oversized shirt with a very low cut. The fabric is also much more see through than I expected.

links_reviews_title: Cute shirt, runs a little large
links_reviews_text: Cute shirt but was a little large. Probably wouldn't rent again.

This shirt was really comfortable and fun to wear. It does run a bit large so I think I could have worn a medium, but have a long torso and liked the length of the large. The shirt got lots of compliments, and I almost kept it.
Fit loosely and comfy for a hot late summer day. Wore it with khaki shorts and sandals and again with mom jeans and flip flops. Super fun top!
Cute and comfortable but a tad low cut and a bit sheer. Not deal breakers for me, but this wasn't a wow
I've always found that Rails shirts run on the smaller side - so i'd recommend sizing down. This was a great casual top for the weekend.
I was literally stopped in the grocery store and complemented on this top! So light weight, comfortable and cute. I wish I had 100 of them

This is a light, linen-blend shirt that was delightful to wear in very hot weather. It is a little sheer, but with a white sports bra underneath that was fine by me. Be aware that the slits on the sides come up to bellybutton level. This was fine with high-waisted shorts, but with a low or mid-rise short you will be showing off your love handles or granny panties. So...just keep that in mind when thinking about what you're planning to pair this with.
Light weight summer shirt
It has a loose fit, it is perfect for the summer.

links_reviews_title: Loved for work and every day!
links_reviews_text: Breathable and lovely!
Liked print but fit unremarkable
Very cute and comfortable. The flamingos are super cute.
Very cute, lightweight and fun.
I got so many compliments on this top. It's a little low cut and slightly sheer but the cute flamingos and boxier cut are a nice counterweight to that.

links_reviews_title: The flamingos are wearing an Asian rice hat...
links_reviews_text: Shirt fit well and was cute from far away, until I realized the flamingos are wearing Asian rice hats. The print is a little strange for me to feel comfortable wearing it to work.
Went to a casual lunch w friends and their kids - the four year old told me it was silly that the birds were wearing hats. That's a win for me! I felt cute and comfortable, too.

Really love the flamingos and the shirt is kind of linen which would be nice in hot weather but it wrinkles easily and is low cut enough that I had to keep pulling it back to keep my bra from showing.
Wore this for a comfy workday and absolutely loved it. So flattering. Gonna hold onto this one for a bit!

I got this to wear to work / play. Ended up wearing it for a day of errands. Pros Soft Comfortable Thick fabric High quality Fit my large bust Cons The length of the legs may be tricky. I'm short and it did look ok with a pair of wellies, but not sure I could have gone with a tennis shoe

links_reviews_title: LOVED THIS... felt badass & wanted to buy!
links_reviews_text: I LOVED this jumpsuit, it was so cozy and seemed so trendy and cool!The color was gorgeous and the thickness was perfect for fall. I was a little nervous about the length,but it was fine! It was a tiny bit fitted on my wide-ish hips (so I had to shimmy it down every time I visited the bathroom)and somehow moved up to my knees when I sat down, but it fit perfect when I was standing up! If you're thinking about renting this jumpsuit, do it! You might fall in love like I did!Just order a size up :)
Loved this jumpsuit! It was so effortless and comfortable. Easy to throw on with sneakers for an everyday look of dress it up a bit with mules for work. Would rent again!

Absolutely love this jumpsuit. It's a thicker material so it's perfect for early fall. I usually steer clear away from jumpsuits since I have a long torso. This fit perfectly, and I'm so glad I took a chance with it. It runs large so be sure to size down. <3

links_reviews_title: I work in a casual office and this was a perfect pick for a day at the desk.
links_reviews_text: Fabric is more of a thicker sweatshirt material. I wouldn't wear this on a hot day. The top was a bit large for a shorter torso but it worked. It wasn't tight at all around my hips which is always tricky when jumpsuit shopping.
Sweatshirt material made this perfect for travel. So comfy. Only downside is the length was a bit too long for my 5'3 legs. Still would rent again

I really liked this jumpsuit for casual weekend wear. I have a long torso and short legs, and this worked out for me without riding up. It did start to feel a bit bulky when I wore it all day, and it was hard to know how many buttons looked good snapped. Over all, great rental!
This fit so perfectly, the material is a sweat shirt material so it's the perfect casual yet put together piece! It was so comfortable you could take a nap in it! Loved it will rent again
This was a bit big on me. A medium would have been better but it was wearable and I really loved it.
I could've sized down, but wore this jumpsuit multiple times. It is cute and comfortable. Perfect for the transition from spring to summer.

links_reviews_title: Odd Fit and Heavy Material, Would be Cute on some
links_reviews_text: I rented this for something comfy but cute to wear on a flight to Florida. The sweatshirt type material was very heavy, it would be too warm for Florida. The fit was tight in the hips but loose up top - better for straight up and down figures than pears. I wore it doing errands, got one compliment.
In fact, really cute! The top was a bit ahhh on me. Otherwise I would have purchased

links_reviews_title: So comfy! You'll want to wear it over and over again.
links_reviews_text: Stylish and fun to wear.

links_reviews_title: Got tons of compliments every time I wore this jumper!
links_reviews_text: Fit well - super comfortable and lots of compliments.
The buttons need resowing, they are falling off, but other than that this comfortable, loose outfit is totally for every occasion.
I wanted to keep this for every day wear but couldn't justify the price, however this jumpsuit looks chic without trying too hard. Effortless and so cute!

Pros. - very comfy material...easy to wear - and to dress up or down. Cons - material can be a little heavy/thick and come off looking sloppy if you don't get the right size (I got XL and typically wear a 12-14...could've PROBABLY gotten a L) This may have been a better fall rental, once weather changed. I paired with flat loafers but would be really cute with boots.
This was super comfortable. I wore it multiple times and it was sooo comfy. Loved this rental.

links_reviews_title: It's like wearing a classy towel, which isn't a bad thing!
links_reviews_text: When I felt this piece I thought, hmmm it's like a terry towel in the inside and a sweatshirt on the outside, how will this look? It actually looks quite cute in the casual sense on. It is VERY comfortable. I wore it wine tasting out in Oregon for the day. It runs cropped so tall ladies this probably isn't the best pick for you because it will be in between a capri and a summer length.
The fit on this was so cute, but I rented it for summer and the heavy cotton fabric was unbearable for hot weather. Very dissapponted.

links_reviews_title: This was just an ordinary wear for work.
links_reviews_text: Overall it was a super cozy outfit to wear! That said, it was way too big. Ha!
I missed that this was made of sweatshirt fabric. That makes it super comfy, but it was also too casual for work.
Fabric too heavy. Big on top and smaller in bottom - so didn't work for pear shape.
I ordered a size medium, when I probably should have ordered a small. The material was a little too thick for me.
This was very comfortable and received loads of compliments. The fabric is very heavy, so it was a good choice for a mild Seattle spring day.

links_reviews_title: Thick sweatshirt like material, runs big on top
links_reviews_text: Got the jumpsuit for work during the summer. Was disappointed by the very thick fabric (like a sweatshirt). It also ran quite large on the top (I'm a 34C and it just looked baggy)

links_reviews_title: The best thing I've ever worn
links_reviews_text: So comfortable and very flattering. I typically wear a 4-6 and got the small and its perfect. Feels like you're in sweats but looks put together and trendy. Also comes in blue and 100% gonna rent that one next :)
n/a

links_reviews_title: Nice material, but too large for me
links_reviews_text: I have zero complaints about the print, color, and quality. It just ran too large for particularly in the chest and upper arms. Ending up returning without wearing out.
Loved this shirt. Structured perfection. The print is amazing. Would love to own this.
I was excited for this top, and liked it even more when I received it. It has smart seaming details and slight dolman style sleeves. Very cute and a compliment magnet!

This top exudes elegance. It's perfect for those days with a number of important meetings where you want to dress to impress but not overdo it. The zip back and peplum hem give this great structure that's super flattering — highly recommend!

links_reviews_title: One of my favorite items so far!
links_reviews_text: Perfect for cold weather. Super professional. Felt classy and polished. Received many compliments!
This looked great with slim tall pants and heels. The waist and peplum are super flattering. So many compliments!

links_reviews_title: Did not end up wearing. High neck bothered me.
links_reviews_text: I did not end up wearing this top. My husband thought it was terrible. I think the combination of the bold pattern, thick material and high neck did not work for me.
Brought this on vacation for PFW and will prob wear to a Broadway show next week. Beautifully made, slimming, very fashionable.

This is a high quality top, for sure! A little bit heavy and stiff for early fall but the fabric is gorgeous. Fit is pretty decent but runs a bit big, especially through the shoulders and in the sleeves. Worth a rent!
Felt very high quality but was just not my style when I tried it on.
This sweater is so well made and stunning that it just steps it up 10 notches. I loved it!

I loved this top and I'm bummed that it was too big through my chest and shoulders. The houndstooth print is very flattering, as is the flared silhouette. The extra fabric up top added bulk and weight to me where I am thinnest. I will try this again in a smaller size if it ever comes available.

links_reviews_title: Too small on the bust. Peplum not long enough.
links_reviews_text: Cute pattern and colors but material very thick and peplum too short on the body - and I have a short torso. Was very tight on the chest (I'm 34C and ordered 42 as per RTRs suggestion). Sending back without wearing.
Pros: well made and comfortable. Cons: very boxy, has some pink in the design that was not visible from the picture online, not very flattering
Absolutely loved this - it is just stunning. Fit is perfect and hugs the right curves. It is a little "loud" but I wore a black jacket/cardigan over it for work. Really a stand out top.

links_reviews_title: I did like the polished look and color combo.
links_reviews_text: This fit like a glove, but after wearing for area hours it felt very constrictive on my neck. The material was also the slightest bit scratchy.

links_reviews_title: Packs great, flattering cut, fun print. Great for work travel!
links_reviews_text: I like to wear all black with a pop of color + wrinkle-free items when I travel for work & this fit the bill. Plus you can re-wear it as the material doesn't get dirty easily.
It was a perfect fit in all the right places! I will definitely rent this again!
Big in the arms and waist but overall super cute. Very warm.

I wore this to work. It was comfortable and was a different in a good way. It's pretty thick so if you are still experiencing high temperatures like out here, you may be a bit sweaty in this but it will be perfect for fall! I wore this with highwaisted black jeans and it was great.
This top is beautifully form-fitting, but magically not too tight. This top looks and feels high quality and was worth a million compliments.

links_reviews_title: Amazing top! I would buy it if I could afford it!

links_reviews_text: X
Loved this casual fit sweatshirt
It's so comfortable, cute and light for spring. I don't want to take it off.
Last time I rented Monrow raglan, I needed to size down. This time I pulled a XS and it was much more fitted. Especially that the sleeves were now perfect and not too long.
This is a cute and casual light weave sweatshirt. Super cute and cozy.

Fit is oversized but somewhere between cropped and long enough to cover your behind. (Good to know if you’re planning to wear with leggings). Material is a great medium thickness, which makes it perfect for transitioning from Winter to Spring. Cozy and comfortable. Thinking about keeping this for another month of being “Safer at Home”.

links_reviews_title: I wore this on the weekend and dressed it up for work with a button-down underneath.
links_reviews_text: This sweatshirt is adorable. I wish I had ordered a size down.

This sweatshirt was perfect for plane travel paired with black leggings! I only gave it 4 stars because it was definitely loved a lot before (seemed worn out). That being said....it was stylish and cute!
Great comfy top to pair with leggings. Could wear all the time. Will definitely rent again.

links_reviews_title: Soft, stylish sweatshirt - its a keeper!
links_reviews_text: Runs large/loose. I normally wear a small or medium in long-sleeved shirts or sweatshirts but wore a small. It fit loosely but not boxy. The material was so soft I never wanted to take it off. I wore this on vacation on flights and also touring around. It was easy to throw on and look more put together than a traditional sweatshirt. I loved the Love graphic on the chest of the logo and received many compliments wearing it. The material is thin and soft and perfect for a cool summer night or spring day but not warm enough for winter. I plan on buying this!
a lot larger than I thought it would be
Super cozy sweatshirt great for jeans and hanging out. Would rent again.

I rented an XS and it fit. I normally wear a small or medium for length. The XS was good in not being too tight but length was a little short so I put a tank underneath for not showing midriff. Good with high waisted jeans too.
Mushy sweatshirt
Comfy! Fits as you would expect.

links_reviews_title: Comfortable and cute for everyday wear
links_reviews_text: oversized fit which looked great with skinny jeans and a leather jacket
I LOVED this sweatshirt. It is so soft and comfy, while still being stylish!
So soft & comfortable! Def runs large and borderline too baggy. Undecided if I rent again if I'll go with my usual size M or go down to a S.
This shirt is super soft and comfortable. It is the perfect top for a casual day out. I wore it many times with a denim skirt and jeans.

I put this on and didn't want to take it off. I actually wore it on a day I was alone in the office and questioned why I was "wasting" my rental on a day no one would see me. But if you felt how comfortable this shirt was, you would wear it all day too! My son told me I looked like a teenager! I paired it with jeans and red shoes. Loved it!

Typically lightweight sweatshirt / pullover. It was a soft fabric, laid nice, and cute- just nothing to write home about or rent again. I could have worn a small and maybe that would have made it cuter.
Super cute to throw on with jeans. Very soft fabric. Was happy with the length because it was longer than a crop top but more fitted than a sweatshirt.
Nice weekend piece. I could've sized down, but decided to go with it. If fit was better, would've tried to wear a few times before sending back.
So comfortable! Perfect for everyday errands!
Very soft and comfortable. Has a little room in it but still flattering.

Rented for winter biz travel and it was perfect for casual client meetings. Loved the teeny white trim on the scalloped edge of the turtleneck! The color was different than I expected. It's a strange smoky brown with flecks (sort of?) of black that I wasn't expecting. I liked it fine, but didn't love it!
Very cute and chic sweater with a little flair, easy to style.
Runs short and ride up on me a lot. Felt like I was continuously pulling it down. But otherwise, cute neck detailing and nice heavy feel to it.

This is a beautiful sweater and the quality is great. It is nicely cropped which I prefer. The material is not itchy at all and feels very sturdy. I ordered this in XL even though I should be a Medium, but I don't mind the extra room at all and I think it looks very cute. It is TTS tho so if you want a more tailored look go for your regular size!
Lovely details and material, very flattering fit. I sized up to medium for comfort and I'm glad I did. It is cropped to the natural waist, so best with high waisted bottom. Love!!

links_reviews_title: Such cute detailing! So perfect and true to size
links_reviews_text: So cute! Loved this... perfect for date night and not too hot!

This sweater is super soft and has great details. My issue was the length - it felt a few inches too short for my long torso. I would have preferred it falling around the zipper of my high waist jeans not at the top.
It looked vintage and old-fashioned, but since it was cropped it also felt modern. The puffy sleeves make it super cosy and comfortable. I wouldn't buy, but it was a nice item to rent.
Completely lackluster in person and runs SMALL

links_reviews_title: Way too short for a longer torso
links_reviews_text: I don't like short tops, and this was cut even shorter. Might look cute with a high waist skirt, but it looked bad on me with high waist jeans.

Really love the neutral tone of this sweater. It was so comfy - turtleneck wasn't too tight and the length was great. It's easy to tuck into things because it's tight at the bottom. Wore twice to work, with different bottoms. Would 100% rent again. Love this brand!

This sweater is beautifully made and has intricate details that make it stand out. I have a somewhat long torso so I sized up to the XL and it was still short when I raised my arms. Paired with high-wasted jeans it was no problem, but with normal dress pants for work, a little short so I wore a camisole underneath.

Beautiful quality top. Nice fabric and not itchy at all. The sleeves are a unique design and the white piping is a nice touch. Got many compliments. Sweater runs short and I had to pull it down a lot but still loved it.
Comfortable and cozy. It was short. But great quality.

links_reviews_title: Feels and looks so casual luxe
links_reviews_text: Absolutely love this sweater, it has an understated luxe look to it, where people can just tell it's super nice even though it isnt flashy. Got many compliments, and am planning on purchasing the next time I order it. As others have said it is short - it's not really cropped, more like there's an elastic band section at the bottom that tends to ride up as you move around, so would def wear with high waisted pants if you don't want tummy exposure.
A little short but great with high waisted jeans

links_reviews_title: Really soft and luxurious for wool Great feminine white scallop detail
links_reviews_text: Relaxed fit but still neat. Has a beautiful softness that looks luxurious. Great piece.
I love the sweater, but it runs small, and kept rising up.
Loved the cut, color, and fit of this sweater. However, it did get itchy on my neck after wearing it for the day.

I love the quality and fit of his Tibi turtleneck. The sleeve and neck detailing are sweet and the shape of the arms is very fun. Be warned that it's quite short, even showing some skin with high waisted jeans. Otherwise, perfect!

links_reviews_title: Very warm and versatile sweater, wore it during the day for brunch and straight into evening.
links_reviews_text: Sweater is fitted around wrists, waist and neck with a little white scallop detail.
Made well

links_reviews_title: Great quality and loved the style just too short for me.
links_reviews_text: I loved this but it was way to short for me. I'm 5'8 and it showed my stomach even with high waist jeans. Did not wear.
Very cute but very cropped.
Great details at neck and sleeves. Thin but warm. Slightly short - on verge of cropped.

links_reviews_title: Great everyday sweater! It's cropped so good with high-waisted pants.
links_reviews_text: I was looking for something slightly baggy, and it's not oversized.

Super cute sweater, but it is a lot more cropped than it appears in the photo. I am really short and if I lifted my arms even half way up - with the cropping and the way the sleeves attach to the body of the sweater it showed my belly to the world.
I was looking for a conservative sweater to wear on vacation in a Muslim country, and this was just blah. Nothing terribly wrong with it, just boring and not all that flattering.

links_reviews_title: Great detailing on this turtleneck sweater.
links_reviews_text: I loved this sweater. The arms are loose and the neck scalloped detail is beautiful. It was a shortlisted for me, and it wore best when I tucked it in my jeans.
Nice neutral color, can be dressed up or down, pretty detail around neck and sleeves, elevates it from being a boring polo neck sweater
Pretty sweater, loved the scallop detail. Best worn with high waisted bottom since it's definitely on the short side

I loved the quality of this sweater and loved the sleeves but it was too short for me. Even with high-wasted jeans, it left a gap if I moved around or raised my arms at all. You have to be comfortable showing your stomach with this one and I prefer not to. Otherwise, it was great.
Maybe a little short
Beautiful and comfy

links_reviews_title: i didnt wear anything just for an event
links_reviews_text: i loved this beautiful sweater. It fit beautifully and the color was delicious. I received many complements. I wore it to our holiday party and everybody loved it.
The cut of this sweater is truly what makes it a statement - the blouse-y sleeves and tapered wrists are so 70's luxe. Compliments came in plenty while wearing this!
Stylish without being flashy. The sleeve length and puff was perfect; my only surprise was that it was a bit shorter- I will pair with high waisted jeans to ensure full coverage. Such a nice sweater!
really flattering.
Liked the sweater - great detail at the neck. Found the torso very short, but I am tall. I had to wear high-wasted jeans both times I wore this or it would have shown my belly when I lifted my arms.

links_reviews_title: Super cute but more cropped than I expected.
links_reviews_text: Super cute but more cropped than I expected.

Talk about a GOOD quality, well made cardigan.... this is it! Great weight. Feels comfortable. Nice length. Usable pockets. Vibrant colors. Runs a lil large but NO complaints. Wore to an 80's party with leather fitted sweats.
Loved this but runs a bit big. If between sizes, go down. Good length for a dress honestly, as you can see in the pic. Wore over biker shorts and a tank and after work, left the sweater unbuttoned.
Sweater was super warm and loved the fit!
Walked around the city in 45 degrees without a jacket :) the medium was plenty big..if you are an in between size, size down

Great sweater for a cooler damp day. It felt cozy without looking like a schlub. The medium was a little bit large on me, I had to cuff the sleeves and kept pushing them up out of the way. A small probably would have looked sharper. Would rent again!

I can't say enough good things about this sweater- it was warm, cute, comfy, stylish! I got so many compliments! Temp dropped into the 30's and I was able to wear this out without a coat and was WARM! I can't believe it! Rent it, live in it, love it!
Nice long length. It's super heavy material. Ordered a size down assuming it was going to run big-happy I did bc the Med was perfect for me. Not too oversized or tight.
Unique and cozy

High quality fabric- it is not itchy! A little heavy, but great for cooler weather. Love how unique the pattern is. Rented in size S because I knew it ran large and it was perfect. I'm short so the sweater his at the knees, but I did not mind. Would rent again!

Overall this is a great sweater, oversized and comfy. I knocked a star off for two reasons - the first being because I thought a cardigan like this should have pockets and it does not, and the second being that every time I buttoned it up, it would come unbuttoned again

This is a very versatile sweater - I wore with spanx leggings and a tank & made it a sweater dress for work. But, you can easily dress down. I will say - even though I am in the middle of a Chicago winter, it was SO warm. I was sweating. The wool was a bit itchy. This can probably be avoided by wearing long sleeves underneath.

links_reviews_title: LOVE and may buy later down the road
links_reviews_text: Everyone loved this oversized sweater. It, by definition, is oversized and I purposely sized up because a lot of sweaters do not fit me across the shoulders. However, a small would have been perfectly fine. Still, I loved the feeling of this sweater, almost like a big hug all day. The material is soft and not itchy. I styled this with an all-black outfit, as it can definitely stand on its own because of the stunning print.

links_reviews_title: I loved it, perfect to dress up or down
links_reviews_text: It's a bit oversized so you could size down if you are more on the petit size but I love it
Quality sweater. Wore with a black casual dress and booties with tights. Super cute!
Fall comfort at its finest. It's great for walking outside in Boston in the fall and so comfortable in offices that blast the AC. Highly recommend it!
Heavy, as pictured.
These jeans were so comfortable! A little baggy, but overall great! I loved the high waist!

These jeans were outside my comfort zone and a trend I wanted to try. The beautiful gross grain ribbon along the side is burgundy and navy and fit well with the tops in my wardrobe. These jeans are relaxed fit, great for the weekend but not for work. The rise on these jeans is very high(11.5"). I am used to 10", so they were a bit high for my short body. It wasn't the most flattering look but I am happy I tried it.
Usually a 28 but the 27 fit great. The denim is so stretchy and was comfortable enough for a full restaurant week dinner!
These jeans fit so well! Mid rise waist, and they run a little big (I'm usually a 26/27 in madewell and I wore a 25). The ribbon stripe down the side adds a super cool touch.

links_reviews_title: Likes the Sassy Stripe; Otherwise So-So
links_reviews_text: Loved the stripe -- it's super-cute. Otherwise I thought the jeans were just ok. Honestly, the waist was a bit high for my taste. It made the jeans very comfortable but not particularly flattering on me, given my gut.

These are some of the best fitting jeans I've ever had. I would say they run true to size, maybe a little big. I've heard great things about Madewell jeans so wanted to give them a try before buying a pair and they are amazing. I would buy these but feel with the stripe they would be a little limiting, but they are a great rental and I would definitely rent them again.
Nice color blue, fun for casual evenings
Definitely go up a size! I listened to other reviews and went up from my usual size and they fit pretty well. The detail on the side is super cute. I would definitely consider renting again

links_reviews_title: A cute upgrade on regular jeans
links_reviews_text: I love Madewell jeans. These have good stretch and are high-waisted. The detail on the sides elevates the standard jean look.
HUGE. Way too oversized.
I am curvy size 6 and these jeans were the most comfortable and flattering ever. Even my husband was like what do you have on?!
These jeans were incredibly comfortable, stretchy, and stylish. I loved the side detail of the stripe and would absolutely rent these again.
Super comfortable, everyday jeans. Flattering fit and one could easily dress them up or dow.

I rented these because Madewell denim is my favorite and I wanted to try a new fit before buying. I am typically a 29R in Madewell but these fit slightly large, I think I could have worn the 28R. Otherwise they're comfortable, cute, and easily dressed up or down!

I am on the shorter side and the straight leg on these jeans along with the larger fit was a little unflattering. I Usually wear 26 in jeans but got a 25 in these and definitely could've gone with the 24
A bit tight in the arms so I went up a size. Stunning!

Waited the whole summer for this and did not disappoint. Rather heavy linen, longer length, and half-sleeve length actually make it great for cooler or transitioning temperatures. Size is tts for an American deaigner.

I felt great in this dress. The fit was just right. I get nervous with button down style dresses as I'm larger in the chest area, but this gave full coverage (no gaps between the buttons). The white fabric was also solid, so didnt have to worry about sheerness. Would rent again.

Lovely white, linen dress. Heavier than I expected (lots of layers) but in a good way. It was cooler than I expected when I ordered it so paired with a leather jacket and flats. Fit perfectly, I normally wear a 0 / have a small chest!
Wore for my engagement photos. Not too tight on the arms like most sleeves are for me! Lay beautifully.
This dress was super comfortable and flattering. Wore it to work but would be great for travel!
I'm short so it is definitely a maxi dress on me. It's very comfortable and soft and the bottoms part of dress is lined.

Rented this for a summer vacation in the south of France and felt like it fit that vibe! You can tell from the fabric that this dress was beautifully made, but it definitely wrinkles easily. Has a liner under the skirt (makes the dress a bit warm) but nothing on top so can be a bit sheer without a cami or something underneath. Might work better for women with smaller busts.

links_reviews_title: I picked my wedding dress in this dress.
links_reviews_text: It was absolutely beautiful, comfortable and I'll never forget it because I said yes to the dress in it! And some people thought THIS was my dress which is hilarious.

Perfect dress for Spring Engagement photos. The material was flowing and fun to move in and the dress was well made. The waist was a little bigger than I would have liked so I would have sized down had it been available. But it's a great dress.

links_reviews_title: So easy to wear and classy!
links_reviews_text: Wore this during a Spring trip to Milan and it went the distance for 12 hours sightseeing. The swing in the skirt was so pretty, and easy to commute on foot with. Skirt is lined, which is nice, but the bodice of the dress is not so wear a nude bra. It's so pretty on and provides the right coverage when you're visiting churches which require knees and shoulders covered. My only complaint is the waist is not fitted and it doesn't work with a belt. But I'm splitting hairs here...def rent it!

The dress is made of thick linen, the top part is a tiny bit transparent while the bottom isn't. I'm between size 6 and 8, the 8 is roomy but glad I got it. With all the dry cleaning the fabric is starting to be slightly yellowish and tired, it's subtle but it's not as white as the picture. For my height the length was prefect, and it has pockets, which I like
Wore this dress for a photo shoot. Perfect spring/summer classic look. I'm normally a 4 but rented the 2 after reading other reviews. Was glad I did. Even with a larger bust it fit great.

So this dress is a bit more textured than I thought it was going to be, not a bad thing just was not expecting that. The fit is perfect, very true to size and comfortable. It hits me right above my ankle. It's a really cute dress for summer. Just note is came pretty wrinkled which makes me think it easily wrinkled (hard to pack for vacations)

I LOVED this dress! I got so many compliments on the crisp linen fabric and how beautiful the white was! I ordered one size up because it was the only size available and I had to have it. It was a bit big and I should've ordered my regular size. But still fit perfectly in the bust and flattering in the belly.

Loved the fit of this dress and got so many compliments from strangers. I have a wide ribcage and some of the buttons were already a bit stretched. I had to doctor two button holes with safety pins but otherwise great.

Really regretting not buying this- I'm always on the hunt for a good white summer dress. Everyone in my family complimented me during our winter vacation. Paired with a bandana and sneakers for shopping and made for a chic beach coverup with some black sandals. Wasn't see through and unlike some shirt dresses I've rented the buttons did not pop open (two winning details in my book).
Loved this dress! Might buy it. Fit perfectly. Can add a belt too.

My friend said "You look like a countess on incognito holiday," and that's exactly the vibe. It's rich but understated, floaty but not flimsy and super flattering. Wore it around Key West with a big hat and huaraches and felt awesome.
Comfortable, true to size fit. Perfect for a fall wedding.
This dress was perfect for the summer and work. Super comfortable!
easy breezy dress for every day. highly recommend

links_reviews_title: Great dress. Received with missing button.

links_reviews_text: This dress is really well made. It's a relaxed style but also fitted in the waist. I received so many compliments!

links_reviews_title: Love love love this dress! Easy style to wear and super sophisticated.
links_reviews_text: Super comfortable and flattering.

I absolutely love this dress. It's comfortable, high quality and the perfect amount of sheer. The silhouette is amazing for my six week post partum body--it's snug around the top of the waist and has a nice flown A-line that gives me shape in the right places. I wore it for my first date night out after the baby with my husband. Easy to dress up or wear casually.

links_reviews_title: Loved this classic linen shirt dress. Wore it with fun earrings and espadrille heelsb
links_reviews_text: Easy to wear. Relaxed but well-cut - not slouchy!
Not a true size, much smaller than a normal 20. Wish I could've worn it. The dress is beautiful.

I love this dress so much. Its extremely flattering and perfect for the summer. Also it has pockets! I fit into the 0 easily and I'm still not at my pre-pregnancy weight so I would imagine that this dress usually runs large.
True fit.
Just fits great, very nice crisp white shirt dress. There's a textured feel to it which helps because linen can get super wrinkly, but this doesn't.

links_reviews_title: Perfect blend of casual and dressy for my cocktail hour...
links_reviews_text: before a business casual dinner. I dressed it up with heels but can totally be dressed down with sneakers. I will probably where a size down next time but the 12 was nice and roomy. I am curvy with hips on hips. Pretty easy to iron the bottom after being in my suitcase during flight. Bonus! It has pockets!

links_reviews_title: Loved the way the dress lays.
links_reviews_text: The fit of dress is very nice. The pockets a nice touch and and I received many compliments. I would buy it but it is too white for my complexion.
Not very form fitting. Kinda drapey and dull AF. I would have maybe paired it with a wide belt for contrast and for shape. Just not what I was hoping for.
I have had so many compliments on this dress. It is extremely versatile and so comfortable. I will probably buy it, I'm a big fan!

Loved this! Overall it was light enough for warm Miami spring day, but the skirt had some nice swishy weight to it. I probably could have worn the 14, but I liked how loose the 16 was - great for the heat.
I liked the fabric and could even handle the long length, but the high waist cut close to my chest and was quite unflattering. If you are tall with a small chest, this might work for you.

links_reviews_title: Classy, comfortable, and it has pockets
links_reviews_text: Dress was amazing - made me really feel like I was on vacation. I can imagine wearing it for so many occasions too! The top is slightly sheer, while the skirt is double layered and has a weight to it that makes it fun to move/keeps the fabric looking awesome. It's cinched in the waist a bit, making it very flattering proportion-wise.

links_reviews_title: Love this so much. Fits so well!
links_reviews_text: Fits true to size and is very flattering!

I rented it to try on for a future vacation, I sized up because I'm curvy and it fit so perfectly. It's very long, I'm short and had to wear tall platform wedges to make it work, no flat sandals. Added a summery belt to break up the white and will add some fun jewelry. It's so well made.
Loved this print! Lots of compliments. This runs big, and is very sheer and lightweight. Must rent!
This dress was everything and more!!

links_reviews_title: Tons of complements! The dress was a real fashion risk for me and I’m so glad I did!
links_reviews_text: Definitely need a slip. Mock neck dress with a beautiful print. Tons of complements throughout the night. Would wear it again in a heartbeat!

This dress was perfect for a fashion and art party! It's blousy around the middle so I belted it to give me shape. Very thin fabric but because of the print, you can't see through it. Paired it with high boots and a hat! Loved!
Such a unique print and the fabric felt very lux. Definitely needed to belt to give some shape, but otherwise a great fit.

links_reviews_title: I felt like one of the exhibits at MOMA!
links_reviews_text: A little snug in the shoulders, but fit well otherwise. Length was good with flats and the pattern is whimsical and artsy. Wore with tights and a full slip.
This dress is so fun. I got so many compliments! I am usually a small and I found this ran TTS. It has a very loose fit, but is still very flattering.

This dress is one of the best things that ever happened to me. Thank you, dress! I saw Hamilton while wearing this and felt like all my little friends and I were attending the theatah togethah. I looked very wealthy indeed.
Wore this to meet a client, to a baby shower, and to an office Christmas party! Love love love this dress!

Love the print on this fabric and wanted to love the shape of the dress but it was just too large to be flattering. Added a belt which helped a lot. NOTE: This fabric is quite sheer and requires a slip or cami dress underneath. I wore it with tights and boots.

links_reviews_title: 34 separate people on the streets of NYC came up to me about this dress (literally, it was wild)
links_reviews_text: Absolutely perfect for Lincoln Center / NY Ballet performance. The dress is pretty see-through so you'll need a slip. Also runs big.. but the pattern is INCREDIBLE
Blousy, not cute. Very thin fabric (would be better for summer) and a high neck. Super fun but one of those dresses you're never going to feel sexy in.

This dress is very sheer, had to wear a slip which I can count the number of times I have resorted to a slip as an adult. Otherwise imo wore this three days to wildly different events. I got a ton of compliments and felt comfortable through hours of sitting and work

Fit ran a little large so added a few layers to winterize it and make more sense to wear (really wide in the shoulders?) It's a very fun and beautiful pattern, lovely fabric, but not an overall flattering or shape-showing fit.
a corona casualty...once stuck indoors, it felt silly to wear it. but it's cute, well cut. it is definitely warm. and that pattern is just adorable. i'll rent again in the fall!

Very fun and artsy dress. I am a 38C and needed the extra large in the bust. I usually wear a 12. It does wrinkle easy but the black background hides it. Super comfy and fun dress. You will want to wear something under it. Would absolutely rent again.

links_reviews_title: A fun dress (may need slip) - lots of compliments!
links_reviews_text: The perfect dress for a party where you want to be noticed (and eat with abandon)! This was so fun to wear. I think it's actually a bit sheer so some may want to wear a slip. I wore it on a cooler night at an indoor/outdoor event so I just wore a shirt and leggings underneath (and colored mules - the shoe options would be plentiful)

links_reviews_title: Very fun. Very modern. Very fashionable.
links_reviews_text: Size doesn't matter too much since this is a tunic.

links_reviews_title: Luxurious silk & a playful pattern made this dress stand out. Light & airy but perfect for fall.
links_reviews_text: The body is voluminous but does not over power a small frame. The back/underarm area is a bit snug but did not bother in the least. 56% Viscose, this dress is a bit wrinkle prone.

I felt like a million bucks and turned heads everywhere I went. I paired with black strappy heels and big gold earrings. This dress seriously made me feel WEALTHY. It stands out in the best way possible. True to size, but if you're between sizes, definitely size down. Might be hard for anyone below 5'5 to wear since it is so long.

I rented this for a work trip. Travels well. Doesn't wrinkle easily. Great quality. Fits true to size. The only reason for not giving 5 stars is because there isn't a slit in the skirt. So, it's pretty tight, with no movement. Makes sitting a bit uncomfortable.
This has a Jackie O feel to it, simple and professional. Great for a work conference!
So soft and comfortable for a work dress. Usually a 2 so glad I sized up to a 4- fit perfectly. Only complaint was the flaps in the back don't stay hooked when you walk.

links_reviews_title: Very cute but hard to walk
links_reviews_text: Very cute and flattering work dress although no slit in the skirt made it a bit difficult to walk. I paired it w a blazer and booties for a networking reception and felt fab.
This dress is one of my favorites.
Subtle but careful detailing makes this so flattering. Fabric is weighty and high quality. Runs narrrow in hips and fabric has no give. I ordered up a size.

links_reviews_title: Nice work dress but cannot wear if have any hips
links_reviews_text: The overall fit was great. Unfortunately it was unwearable because the bottom of the skirt has zero give and no vents. I could walk in it but it was impossible to go to the bathroom without unzipping the dress. Bad design.
Very nice quality fabric but did not wear because I could not get it zipped up my back.
Loved this dress for a work event, it was a little long for me as I'm only 5'1" but since it was for work I'd prefer it to be longer than shorter!

links_reviews_title: Very sliming! Everyone loved my outfit at my work event!
links_reviews_text: It was tight but very sliming! :)
Nice pattern, but heavy fabric. Didn't end up wearing because it wasn't flattering on me and very boxy.
if you have big hips and big butt, go up a size! No stretch at all!

links_reviews_title: Great dress but tight on hips with no stretch
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress and it looked great, but was tight on hips so didn't wear. Really cute and great material though
Great fit. Very slimming.

I am a pretty solid 4, but am glad I sized up to a 6 in this! The bottom half is pretty narrow and there is no slit in the back, so it makes you feel a little restricted. Great dress overall, though! It feels very tailored and looks professional! I would rent this one again!
Didn't wear. Tried it on. Heavy material for a sleeveless dress.
True to size, flattering belt, hits right above the knee. Beautiful fabric. Great dress for work.
Perfect dress for work travel. Comfortable and classy. Travels well. Lots of compliments from business partners.

The dress was uncomfortable and I did. It wear it. It was too tight at the neck and hips but fit at the chest area. There is also no back slit in the skirt which makes it feel tighter. Cute design but not for my body.

links_reviews_title: This is one of the most unflattering dresses I have ever tried on!
links_reviews_text: I'm normally between a 4 and an 8 in dresses. I usually tend to do a 6. The 6 was out and I did and 8 and it was tight on me! The bottom of the dress is soooooo clingy and not flattering- and the top really flares out a lot. It was just the oddest fitting / most unflattering dress ever.

links_reviews_title: Back flap kept coming undone but other than that it was great!
links_reviews_text: I felt it ran a bit small - I usually can squeeze into a 2 but this one I had to squeeze into the 4. It looks GREAT, but the second hook on the back cape part kept coming unhooked. Great work look though - I got a lot of compliments and even with the flap unhooked it still looked professional.
Loved the design and the dress was very comfortable. I am usually a hard 6 but was recommended to size up and I'm glad I did. A 6 would have been a bit of a squeeze .
Great dress - got tons of compliments at work and the overlay is very flattering on many body types.

It fit great and got a lot of compliments for it at work. Because I'm so short, the dress ended around my knees so it was hard to walk up stairs and I had to take smaller strides. Other than that it was adorable!
Great fit, flattering & unique.

links_reviews_title: GREAT FOR WORK! Runs small in the hips and thighs
links_reviews_text: This dress is great for work! The length is good and the fabric is heavy. If you have big hips and/or thighs, be sure to size up. I was able to squeeze into a size 4, which I normally wear; however, I could not pull the dress over my thighs and hips.
Rented for work. I would definitely size up. The dress was very much slim fitting in general with little give especially around the legs. Made it a snug when getting into the car or up the stairs.

links_reviews_title: Cute, until you have to move
links_reviews_text: Nice print and thick fabric make this perfect for fall. Fits true to size, however, there's no slit in the skirt which makes movement impossible. Walking requires baby steps and don't even get me started on trying to shimmy this over your hips during trips to the bathroom.

links_reviews_title: Solid quality and material, runs very small
links_reviews_text: The material was great and design is beautiful--I was very excited to wear it. However, I tried the 4 (usually between a 4 and a 6, 4 was only size available), and I couldn't get it past my hips. When I tried it on from the top, it was fine on the chest/shoulders/waist, but again, got stuck at the hips. I'm a little curvy, but no Kardashian ;) May work well for very straight-figured women, but for those with a little hips, I'd suggest going up 1-2 sizes.

links_reviews_title: Impossibly small by at least one size
links_reviews_text: I would have loved to wear this to the office, but sent the size 4 back and the 6 was still impossible to wear. I'm usually a small 34A, size 4, but the 6 fit up top just fine; butt the skirt tapers in at the bottom and does not have a slit. There was NO way I could have pulled it up over my hips to go to the ladies room! Bummer. If you have a small butt, you might be able to pull it up. Maybe the 8 would have fit, but didn't bother. Beautiful, non stretch fabric and I loved the popover part.

I didn't wear this because it was too big so size down. It also is shapely, meaning if you don't have any hips like me, maybe best to avoid. That said, the dress is GREAT for a conservative work situation. The material is super thick and structured and the length is perfect.

links_reviews_title: This dress wasn't suited for my hour glass figure.
links_reviews_text: It was too tight for my hips and too loose up top.

Great pair of jeans. While normally a crop Jean on average height people, for my 5'0" height they came right to my ankle (which was a weird hit on me). But I have heard great things about madewell jeans and they definitely did not let me done. I love the style and look forward to trying out more.

I loved these pants even though they ran a little big. Great color and goes well with different colors/prints. High waist was flattering and I didn't feel like I had to suck it in. Perfect jeans to dress up with boots/heels or dress down with sneakers. I wore them for weekend outings and paired with work wear. I recommend sizing down slightly since they stretched with each wear.
So comfortable and stretchy, and wayyyy flattering. I'd have kept these for longer but I need to size down to 26
They're good jeans, but not great. I really liked the comfort, but they weren't the most flattering in the midsection. Not bad!

These jeans were extremely comfortable and easy to wear. I have curves and these had a nice stretch that they fit bit my hips and didn't gape at my waist. I am short and the length wasn't too crazy long.

Great light-ish weight summer denim plus adorable cropped baby flare. Waist is really nice, neither too high nor too low. I tried on 26 (only pair in Georgetown RTR Store) & they were tight, so I suspected my usual 27 would fit, but RTR app recommended ordering 28. I did & like so many elastic-blend jeans, they started to loosen after a couple hours from body warmth. A 27 will be perfect, and I will likely purchase.
Love the high waist with the crop look. They were a bit tight for the first 10 mins then loosened up nicely. Cute with blouses and heels/booties, sneakers, what ever.
I forgot to take a picture in them but they fit like a glove. I wore them a couple times and they are also very comfortable. I would rent again!!
Loved these. They fit perfectly at the waist, hips and through the legs. They have a bit of stretch to make them flattering and comfortable. Will be seeking out Madewell again on RTR
These are great! Higher waist without looking like mom jeans. I loved them. They are a heavier denim with a little give so very forgiving with a nice structure.
So worth it! These are great jeans that stretch and are true to size.

These jeans live up to the hype. Several friends have recommended Madewell to me and I'm just now trying them. These jeans are crazy comfortable. The cropped flare bottoms feel fun. I wore these all weekend!
These were so comfy! I definitely think I'll buy my jeans from madewell moving forward! Fit me like a glove and I felt like I could dress up or down :)

RTR said the 30 was an 8-10, but the 30 was a little big. I think the 29 would have fit perfectly. They were really cute and comfortable. I loved the flare at the bottom crop. May rent again in true size.
N/A

links_reviews_title: I love Madewell and I LOVE these jeans!!!
links_reviews_text: I love these. They fit great but I could've sized down. It depends on how snug you light your pants. These have stretch so I could've sized down. I love Madewell and own a few of their jeans but never the cropped boot jeans. They are so cuteeee!! I'm going to buy a new pair at Madewell since they actually retail for cheaper than here.
These are super comfortable but the actual sizing is 29/8, 30/10, etc... Not the way RTR has it. I'm consistently a 29 in madewell jeans and an 8/10 elsewhere and the 29 was perfect. so DONT size up

I was looking for versatile sweaters with a bit of a twist, and this fit the bill! The design is super unique, and it has a double layered ribbed neck, which is a nice added detail that feels luxe. Wore this with both a slip skirt and pants, it kind of goes with anything!

Such a cute retro piece. The shoulder pads were even a nice touch but for some reason the position of them is off. They literally sit on your biceps instead of your shoulders. That is my biggest complaint. But the color combo and style is nice. I ordered my preferred size M as usual but I felt the turtleneck was too lose. Maybe if I try a S I'll get better results.

This sweater is perfect. It did unexpectedly have huge shoulder pads (that fall slightly off shoulder), and I already have fairly large shoulders for my build. They made me look awkward and geeky, which I actually loved. And I got tons of compliments. But definitely not for everyone.
Amazing colors, so so cute! Runs true to size and is soft and cozy. Perfect for fall and winter seasons!

links_reviews_title: Loved this design & super warm too
links_reviews_text: Fits well, I like that it is cropped as most of my sweaters are a bit longer and bulkier. I LOVED this design and the colors - I would have definitely worn this more but the weather got warmer and it was too warm for this sweater.

The padding on the shoulder pads was a little intense for me, so I didn't wear the sweater out. It was super soft and had lovely colors, but I couldn't get over looking like a cross between a ski-bunny and a linebacker.

links_reviews_title: This sweater was adorable and I got tons of compliments.
links_reviews_text: The fit was cropped, so I got it a bit larger than my usual size. The only odd thing was that it came with huge shoulder pads. It was very awkward when my boyfriend touched my arms with lots of extra padding.

If you rent this, size down. The shoulder pads hang on the edge of my shoulders, making me look line a linebacker. They're also a little warped from previous wear, and altogether too large. The knit is fairly loose, so the weight of the shoulder pads drags the sleeves down. I think it (*maybe*) would have worked if I would have rented the smallest size instead of my regular. I would not recommend this, it looks way cuter than it is.
The bottom of the sweater cinched which at times can create a crop top! Slightly itchy also.
loved this sweater so much - want to buy but it looked a little "worn" not sure if that's the style or not but I absolutely loved it. thick and warm, slightly cropped but flattering

links_reviews_title: Beware this sweater has shoulder pads
links_reviews_text: I wanted to love this sweater but the shoulder pads didn't fall on my shoulders and instead on my arms which made me look like I had huge upper body, also a little itchy but that's expected from this material
Adorable sweater, but the low hanging extremely large shoulder pads made it unwearable
Runs really small, and the shoulder pads were way larger than expected.

PROS: This cover is made of a very heavy fabric which is very comfortable and will keep you quite warm. CONS: The length of this was just too long. It was more like a dress. Perhaps if I went down a size it would have fit better? Not sure. But I would have bought it if it were not so long.
It was a little long and frumpy for me. I felt like I was drowning in it. It was also a little itchy. Didn't end up wearing it out.

links_reviews_title: It's still cold where I live. Was looking for something cozy to wear while I work from home.
links_reviews_text: This is cozy. Wore it with leggings. However, it swallows me up. Would not wear out in public. Looks like you're wearing a blanket. Maybe someone very tall and thin could pull this off.
very very long. I'm 5'8" and thought it was long. Felt I looked too much like Jesus to wear out

links_reviews_title: So comfy! Dress up or down!
links_reviews_text: Great quality material--love this!
Loved it.

No compliments, but I felt cozy and cute. It's oversized. I paired with leggings. Usually my RTR clothes receive some sort of compliment.... which is positive reinforcement for me to keep renting! I wore this twice.

links_reviews_title: Wore to a casual Super Bowl viewing party with friends!
links_reviews_text: Super comfy but is definitely long since I'm on the shorter side.
ok

links_reviews_title: I really wanted to like this...it's just so big!!
links_reviews_text: I rented a size Small because I was worried based off the pictures that this poncho would be long, but even the small was soooo long. It's a very pretty cream color, but the poncho is super heavy and literally went to my knees. And I'm 5'8"! I can't imagine how long this would be on a shorter girl, probably almost like a dress!
Get your normal size or one size down but this is a cozy poncho. I styled it with leather leggings to wear to work
Runs way big. It looked it I was swimming in this poncho. Might try again in a smaller size later.

links_reviews_title: Runs huge. Not great for petite girls.
links_reviews_text: I ended up wearing this as a dress with leggings instead of a poncho because it was huge. Wouldn't recommend for petite girls and won't rent again.
The neck is really itchy, so you'd definitely want to wear something under it. I have on a tank (large armholes), but that doesn't do the job. Otherwise, it's a forgiving, comfy piece.
Fantastic piece. I wore a camisole underneath.
Loved the stitching in the sleeves. The V was a little low and required a cami. The color was rich and I felt luxurious.

Wore to work then out to a work event. Effortless style. My only thing was that the snap around the boobs popped open quite a few times throughout the day if I bent over or something. So maybe not great for a bigger chest :/

My size can vary from 16-20, depending on the designer. This is a nice top, but I have a little too much bust & belly to pull it off. Too snug in chest area; snap closure on the front kept popping open. Pretty pattern though! True to size unless & comfortable, unless you're busty or trying to cover a thick midsection. #keepingitreal

links_reviews_title: Wore this to work and wore it out on a weekend.
links_reviews_text: There is a clip in the front to hold the shirt together that easily comes undone. Otherwise, it's great!

links_reviews_title: Cute pattern, for weekend or everyday
links_reviews_text: Was a little loose in the top
Beautiful material. Snap at breast pops when I move my arms. I am broad shouldered. Everything else about it is great.

It's a really pretty top and the sizing was accurate, but the bust snap was useless. I didn't end up wearing it out of the house since the snap popped open immediately as soon I made the tiniest move. I wish it had been designed better since I think it could have been really great.

Really cute.. I wore for a casual work day it's jeans and for a more formal client meeting with black pants and heels. Love the look - it worked well for me because I'm smaller chested, might be revealing for some.

links_reviews_title: romantic blouse for a date night, my boyfriend wanted me to keep this one.
links_reviews_text: the fabric on this blouse is beautiful - in addition to the floral print there is a textural element. The sleeves are semi sheer.

links_reviews_title: Cute Shirt, but front button isn't ideal
links_reviews_text: The shirt was so cute! I wore it twice but you definitely need to get a clasp for the front, since it doesn't work at all.
Such a cute top! Was a little tight on the shoulders but super flattering and flirty fit
pretty
Fits good, very well made item

I wish I had sized down for the XS, but the small worked well enough. The V cut is pretty deep and there is a snap, but if you're not careful you can show more than intended. It's seriously a beautiful dark purplish red color, not red like the model photo makes it look. The arms are sheer but not too much. The details really make this a gorgeous blouse- slightly raised decals, and it shines in some places when the light hits it right.
Loved this shirt. Wore the larger size for extra room because the clasp in the front came undone easily. Easy way to dress up jeans.
Love this top! Very comfortable and flowy without being bulky. True to size, would rent again!

I wore this for a dinner and I loved how it looked and fit. Small button in the front does pop open if you move a certain way, so beware of that! But other than that, I felt amazing in this and would definitely rent again.
Need a camisole to wear underneath. Fits perfectly if shoulders but very low cut, probably not appropriate for an office. Also the sleeves are sheer and see through which is not clear from the photo

links_reviews_title: Easy work outfit with western flair
links_reviews_text: Everything about this, the sleeve, embroidery, the buttons... is fabulous. Easy to look nice paired with jeans and boots. It runs a little large so maybe size down? I got a medium which was huge but I tucked the excess fabric into my jeans.
Super cute, fit well, goes with anything!
Loved it. looks vintage in a great way. tons of compliments even from the guys!! Cowgirl Chic!!
voluminous sleeves and western details make this piece unique and fun to wear. tuck into a skirt or throw on over jeans, pairs with almost anything. light, linen-like fabric with structured piping.

links_reviews_title: OBSESSED with this shirt. I'm not sure if I want to return it!
links_reviews_text: Very flattering and you can dress it up or down with some jeans!
I'm obsessed with this shirt! Loved it and received so many compliments. Wore it to a concert and rocked it out with a hat and tight jeans and boots. Giddy up!
This top was cute but slightly itchy and ran slightly large.

links_reviews_title: Loved it! very stylish and got many compliments
links_reviews_text: looks best buttoned to the top.

This is a super cute shirt. I would like it much better if I had ordered the small. The sleeves are super puffy, so just be aware of that. I like the over-sized shoulders, but it may be too much for some. I will most likely order another size in the future. If it was the right size, I would have purchased it.
Cute sleeves and details make this shirt fun for everyday. Would be easy for it to feel costume-y though
Such a fun top! It was a great fit for me!
I wore this to a Western attire honky tonk party and got so many compliments! The fabric is very comfortable and soft. It runs a touch small but pretty much true to size.

I typically find C/MEO to run a little small, but this shirt was large, definitely could've sized down, plus the sleeves were VERY exaggerated. I felt they overwhelmed my petite frame. Despite my dissatisfaction with the fit, I received several compliments from strangers.
This was such a fun look both for every day and work! Super flattering and the sleeves are so fun. I'm pretty busty and sometimes button ups don't work on my, but this fit great.
Looks good with everything from jeans to nicer skirts for work...warm but a little scratchy. The boxy fit makes it look casual. Like the side slit and angled hem.

I had To go a size up in the sweater due to availability. I was a little bit nervous about getting a large because I usually wear a medium in these types of sweaters. This oversize look totally worked for the cut of the sweater. The sleeves were a little bit long but otherwise it fit great! This was super warm and cozy. The only complaint I have is that it looked a little bit worn when I received it.
the fabric was a bit too heavy - late fall or winter sweater for sure

Not the most gorgeous sweater in the world - but the comfiest! Wore this probably the most - over yoga pants running to a class - with jeans and booties on casual date nights - snuggled up on the couch. really versatile - warm and cute.

links_reviews_title: COZY sweater that fit's the body well
links_reviews_text: Fits comfortably and not too hot. The side slit gives the sweater some vibrancy rather than looking like a blanket
Casual fit
A great cozy everyday sweater!
Soft and comfy sweater, however ran v small, even for my petite frame. I'd rent again but would size up

links_reviews_title: Really cute, but tighter than I expected!
links_reviews_text: Really cute, but tighter than I expected!
It was a carefree look that was really well put together.
Nothing special about this chunky knit. Didn't love it - kind of bland
Comfortable, cute pink sweater.

links_reviews_title: This fit perfectly and the shape was very flattering.
links_reviews_text: I unfortunately didn't wear this - the material was heavier than expected and it just didn't mesh with current weather.

links_reviews_title: Cute but not the most flattering on me
links_reviews_text: Wasn't the most flattering on me (if you look from the side due to the slit -- fluffed out a bit). Also, maybe it's meant for someone with smaller chest but I felt the neck was choking me and I kept having to pull it back down. Very soft and a nice color though.
Love this sweater. It's so comfy and gives the oversized look. I wore it to work and out!
This sweater was very warm and I love the asymmetric sides.

I liked the material and the color but did not love the cut/shape. The uneven hemline looks better online than on the body (at least mine). If you like the color and are looking for a different cut sweater, then give this one a try. I think this may look better on someone who is taller than 5'4.

links_reviews_title: I wore it on the plane
links_reviews_text: It's a heavy sweater so it's a bit chunky but it's really cute and so comfortable
This was alright and nothing to write home about. The cut is not flattering if your busty because it tents out like a pregnancy top. Glad I only rented !

links_reviews_title: Cozy and bulky for a cool day!
links_reviews_text: I loved the slit in the side to show off my curves, but this ran a bit big.
Loved this sweater, very soft and the split on the side is cute! Runs a little big.
Thanks to the reviews, I knew there was a pretty deep slit in the slide so I wore a cami underneath instead of baring skin :) Loved the design.
I wore this twice. Fit it easy and the side slit makes it a bit more interesting. Color is beautiful and fabric is soft. Highly recommend!

links_reviews_title: Shapeless, and more of a dull pink than pictured.
links_reviews_text: It is hard to go wrong with a Vince sweater, and I wore this multiple times - its comfortable and easy. However, it is even more shapeless than I expected and I did not find it to be flattering at all. Also, the pink is more of a dusty rose - not as bright as pictured. Still a nice sweater but I won't rent again.

links_reviews_title: I wore this casually and for work.
links_reviews_text: It's a slouchy fit and runs true to size. I was able to layer a tank underneath and the sweater was warm and cozy.

links_reviews_title: Loved this sweater, wore it 4 days in a row.
links_reviews_text: Very comfortable and oversized, wore it dressed up for work with leggings and boots, wore it on the weekend with ripped up denim. Has a little distinction with the deep side slit and asymmetrical hem. Thought it was a great fall sweater. Could have sized down, but liked it big.

This fit as expected. There is a slit on the side that shows a little bit of skin, but I didn't feel like it was inappropriate in any way. It only shows when you're at a certain angle. This sweater is super soft and not itchy at all. Would love to rent again.
Perfect fall/winter sweater, I usually get XL in sweaters, but large was still roomy, great side slit, perfect with jeans
Loved this sweater. The color is perfect and the slit up the side gives it something interesting. Wish a had ordered a size down as it is meant to be oversized. Felt a bit frumpy but cozy!

Guys and gals complimented me on these pants. They're eye catching and fun! I think they fit super true to size - I'm an 8, ordered a 40 and they were a little tight. I have a 33 in inseam and these came to my ankles.
Definitely runs large. I decided to just wear them to work but ended up loving them by the end of the day. Great for fall but I think they could be cute in spring/summer, too!
These pants were very comfortable. Go up a size! Wore it lounging all day at home.

links_reviews_title: Super cute and comfortable everyday jumper
links_reviews_text: Versatile jumper with a zipper on the left side and adjustable drawstring waist and adjustable top straps for height adjustment. Nice thick material that looks great while keeping the look modest. For a size 0, it runs large but the size was perfectly recommended based on my height and weight. Thank you#rtr !
Wore this in South Beach. Perfect for a bike ride on the boardwalk and a fun lunch as well.
really cute pattern and nice material. the pockets are freaking amazing and its easy to go to the bathroom in. fits true to size and the straps are adjustable.

Fit was good and I appreciated that the waist was adjustable once it was one.. Like another reviewer said you MUST safety pin the straps in or they will pull out and your front will fall down. Material was comfy, pockets were great. I didnt end up wearing because i have larger thighs.. mostly hangy skin on the inside of my legs from weight loss and this outfit wasn't flattering to that. Otherwise was a good fit.

Absolutely loved this! Fit like glove. Thankful it had the drawstring to cinch at waist. Only con was that if moved the wrong way the strap at top could potentially pull out of hole. For reference I'm 5'2, 34C, 138lbs.

links_reviews_title: Love it, got tons of compliments
links_reviews_text: This jumper is so cool. As a tall person, trying a romper or jumper is always a risk (cameltoe anyone?). This one was right on the edge. It was also a little snug in the bust. I did not have the problem of the straps coming loose as some reviewers did (and that was after carrying a toddler around on my hip for hours), but I can see how over time the knots might come through the holes in the straps. Overall though, this is a great rental.
Flattering and fun to wear
After reading reviews, I sized up and ordered the large. Fit great, adorable, lots of complements '

Borrowed a piece from my mom's shipment of RTR, so body info is 5'0", 22 y/o, 32B, petite, 110 lbs. This jumpsuit looked so cute online, but obviously it was not cropped on me, which is totally fine. The straps are knotted and pulled through the top of the jumpsuit and so anytime you're sitting the strap is in danger of falling out of the hole and flashing your boob to everyone at your work party, so make sure you safety pin it if you rent! The zipper down the side is smooth and easy. The tie around the waist adds shape, but leave extra time to go to the bathroom to get this contraption off and on.

I was disappointed because this jumpsuit looked so cute in reviews of others who are a similar size as me, but was too tight around the midsection for me. I'm fairly tall but also have a short torso and wide hips which seems difficult for this jumpsuits which ended up being too short in the torso and too tight where the jumpsuit waist hit my stomach instead of at my natural waist. This jumpsuit is not adjustable as far as where the waist hits you.
This was so tiny across my hips, it looked terrible. Maybe it would look ok on someone with a straighter body shape but it was not flattering on my hour glass figure.

links_reviews_title: This was a great, comfortable piece to wear around the neighborhood for errands.
links_reviews_text: The fit was perfect and the material sturdy but breezy enough for early summer. The straps are a little weird - you have to knot them big enough to not pop back through the hole while in use.

I loved this jumpsuit. I wore it for my daughters birthday dinner. It is a little short waisted but was still comfortable. The side zipper made it easy to get in and out of when wearing, I got lots of compliments and would totally rent it again.

Super easy & effortless one-piece. Material is thick enough that no bra is needed. The drawstring ensures that fit at the waist is perfect. Overall very stylish and easy to wear. Also the pockets are enormous - wore this the entire weekend when I was moving, so comfy and convenient.

links_reviews_title: Comfortable and cute jumpsuit for summer days
links_reviews_text: Loved the blue and white fabric and the fit of this easy to wear jumpsuit. The waist drawstring is a bit strange in that you can't even it out very easily - the lengths are mismatched. But that was a minor issue. I wore this to several parties and out to lunch. Recommend!
Runs a little on the large side.

I wish I could have worn this but it was a bit small/tight for me. I loved the look of it and all the other reviews but it was not for me. felt too tight in the middle area and I did not feel comfortable wearing it out. the fabric is really cute though!

links_reviews_title: Wore this to a book club with my friends!
links_reviews_text: I thought the pattern was super slimming and was fun for a hot Summer day. I read some complaints about the straps but I didn't really find them annoying.

links_reviews_title: Everyone said I looked great. The outfit was perfect
links_reviews_text: I needed a great outfit for a birthday party. This jumpsuit was perfect. Also loved that it was 100% cotton, not only looked good, was very comfortable

links_reviews_title: Cute and casual, but runs large
links_reviews_text: This piece worked well for a summer weekend, but there is a lot of fabric, it's wide in the waist, and the straps were long.
Perfect jumpsuit, so cute, can tie straps to adjust for your comfort, got compliments all day.

First long romper that wasn't too long for my short height. The waste tie looks kind of like a shoelace so makes it informal/not dressy but when you tie makes waste small (always nice). Easy to pop on as a cute day outfit. Loved the easy fit

links_reviews_title: Easy and comfortable piece for summer!
links_reviews_text: Straps were slightly difficulty to adjust, and I opted not to wear a bra with this due to straps being visible.
Cute fabric and texture. Lots of compliments.
Loved how comfortable this was and the adjustable straps and waistband could make this look good on so many body types!

links_reviews_title: Easy & unique. Paired w/ sneakers on the weekend & espadrilles for work - got a ton of compliments
links_reviews_text: Difficult to go to the bathroom but that is to be expected with a jumpsuit. Had to untie and zip each time.

links_reviews_title: Super cute and comfotable. I wore with wedge heels and I received lots of compliments.
links_reviews_text: The straps are adjustable so it creates a great fit. I wore with a strapless bra. The jumpsuit is super comfortable.

Wore this twice in a weekend I loved it so much. Super cute and surprisingly flattering cut. Only critique was the knitted straps kept coming loose - had to keep tying bigger knots. But the top stays up even when they come loose (no surprise boobs, thankfully)

links_reviews_title: Fun piece for weekend at the beach!
links_reviews_text: Comfy and a great fabric weight- my only complaint would be the adjustable shoulder straps, but they can be fitted by knotting the ties so they don't slip through the holes. Usually expect to see buttons here, but not on this garment

links_reviews_title: Cute - but not easy to wear.
links_reviews_text: This piece is so unique and flattering (if you size up!). But the tied front and straps make it hard to put on and, once you're in, a pain to take off if need you need use the restroom. :)
Did not wear, looked super cute just not for me.

I wanted to love this jumpsuit, it fit so cute except the top was huge & I ordered a size 1R, but not even sure if the 0 would be small enough. It would be perfect for someone with a really large chest, but not anyone who has a tiny frame, unless you don't mind a super baggy fit.
Would have been cute if it were a few sizes bigger! This also seems like something that should fit more loosely so I thought it would run bigger, definitely order a size up.
loved this jumpsuit! every time I wore it I got so many compliments. It's really to either dress up or dress down. Perfect for any casual occasion!
Amazing piece, comfortable, flattering, just like the pic, won't disappoint
Well made and looked nice on, but it could have been a little looser. If I loose the extra 6 pounds I've gained I may try it again.

links_reviews_title: Large in the bust otherwise wanted to buy!!
links_reviews_text: Wore this all over town it was so perfect. The bust and straps are large though! I wanted to buy...but it was only 10% off lol. Offer more than a coupon code could RTR
My daughter ended up wearing it on our trip.

Fit was laughably small. It's always a risk to go with a romper when you're tall, but this was like, the worst/smallest romper I've ever tried on. Soooo short in the torso and also just tight in general. Fabric does not have give (but may stretch like linen does throughout the day). It looked like I squeezed myself into a juniors small. The photos show this to be somewhat relaxed so the fit was surprising. I actually laughed trying this on. Also, the straps have knots that push through a buttonhole...not sure how that would actually work when wearing all day. Would think sitting down in it may tug the straps free. NOT for tall girls. Probably not even for anyone with any type of curvy figure, either. I have a thin-curvy body type and it didn't work. Sent back immediately.
I know it was supposed to be a little oversized look, but this was HUGE and looked like I had shoulder pads on.

This came up on my profile as a good option for women in their 3rd trimester . While the size was right (I ordered a large) and the length was good, I felt like the print looked very weird on my body. I felt like I looked more like a dirty cow than I did cute/casual tye dye.
Loved it! Worn on a long drive. Very comfortable
Runs a little big, I like that it's longer in length just thought it was a little more fitted. Warm and cozy
Cute and one of a kind hoodie. Great style and fit, feminine.
Loved how comfortable this was.
Super soft, cozy, and comfortable
This is a fun and unique skirt that got so many compliments! It can be dressed up or down, which is great. It is VERY short if you're tall, so beware of that if you like more coverage.
So cute! Worked well with most outfits. Organically bought in light blue and love the black even more now!!
This skirt was awesome. It was a little big for me but so fun and I wore it a lot. Considering purchasing as well. Super grungy and funky and fun. Also not too short
Runs TTS, could probably have gotten away with a 26. Size down if unsure/have a small waist. Considering buying, such a cute staple piece that can be paired with so much!

This skirt definitely runs true to size, but a bit on the larger end. I made the mistake of sizing up and I was fixing the skirt moving around all night. I would not recommend this skirt if you plan to sit for long amounts of time as it rides up when you sit down. The material is a stretchy, soft denim. Other than sizing issues, it's a unique, fun denim skirt.
