This was a fun piece to play with. It's a true wrap skirt, one piece of denim that wraps around and secured by an inner and outer button. It's pretty short, i would recommend wearing shorts under it for some added protection, especially if wearing heels.
I love how unique this skirt is. I got so many compliments on it and wore it multiple ways. I sized up but I'd say to stick to your original size!

Ordered 27, but should have gotten 25. It wasn't available and I liked the way the baggier fit felt, but it wasn't flattering and made my mid section look larger than it is. Also the cut is just odd looking. Must make sure the pockets in the back are in the correct spot otherwise looks strange. Think it's best worn with a short shirt or tucked in otherwise too bulky.

I rented this thinking it'd be cute for a picture, but ended up LOVING how easy this was to wear and dress up or down for the weekends! I got a lot of compliments, especially loved the asymmetry and how different it was from other denim skirts/shorts. Kept for two weeks, which I never do! Almost bought but wanted to try the light denim wash one and may come back to this one. I'm typically a 25 and didn't have issues but honestly could've sized down for a higher fit.
I got so many compliments on this skirt! It fit perfectly around my waist and the length was just right. Highly recommend!

Skirt itself was super cute but unfortunately too short. Had to return it but definitely would've kept if It wasn't short. I'm 5'9.5 but am usually ok with a 28 size so I think someone would have to be closer to 5'5 to wear it
Too big. Stretched out and short. Not high waisted
Runs small and is very short. I have a larger bottom and thicker legs, didn't work for my body
Runs large but I think it's better looser. Super cute and unique skirt!
Cute material but my butt hips made it very short
Very short and runs small overall. If worn at my natural waist, the skirt showed my bum!

I can't upload my picture for some reason -- anyways, the skirt looks cute, but it is a bit short on the shorter side of it. As well, I recommend sizing down. I'm usually a 24/25, but i ordered a 25. I wish I had a 24 for a better waist fit. The wrap part is awkwardly high on the belly button too. Reference: 5'4'', 110 lbs
I tried it on but it was wayyyyyy too short to wear even to my hallway
Great for a fun casual day option. Was short but still long enough to wear mindfully.

I rented this for a concert and I was super excited to get it in. I'm usually a 28 in Madewell, but I ordered the 29 in this skirt. Unfortunately, it was wayyy too short. It buttoned fine, but the back rode up quite a bit. I ended up returning without wearing. If the 30 is available before the concert, I'll rent it again.
I'm 5'8" and I was worried about showing everything to everyone whenever I wore it. So short, when I sat, there was no fabric covering my booty!

links_reviews_title: Super cute for a casual weekend outfit, definitely short!
links_reviews_text: Ran a bit big, I would go a size down next time
short but cute

I thought this ran a little large in the waist but luckily it can simply sit lower on someone with a small waist (24"). Deep pockets were nice too. Only thing that I didn't love was that some of the strings from the distressing were pretty long.
Fit great
Didn't fit over my hips
n . l
When I walked in this skirt at my brisk NYC pace, the middle hem would rise up and made it slightly annoying (pulling down etc) but overall I loved the look and the way I felt in this skirt.
Good spring staple.
Fit in the waist, could've even sized down. I'm not super tall and my bottom was literally hanging out of this skirt. Cute idea, but not ideal for "taller" gals.
TTS but if between sizes, size up. Very cute faded black skirt. Would be perfect with a T-shirt on weekends. Really liked it! Length wasn't too short either.
The skirt was big in the waist. Should've sized down. Didn't get to wear
Love the back. Way soft and enjoyed wearing this casual piece.
Very soft and cozy! It is cut out in the back so may not be entirely appropriate for work but I wore it with a cami and it was fine.
Enjoyed wearing this while working from home. Wore it with high waisted black leggings. The back is scalloped and is a cute touch. Rent this if you need another cozy staple for your WFH closet!

links_reviews_title: So soft and cozy, but the open back made it so fun!
links_reviews_text: Loved wearing this to kick off a girls road trip with leggings! Super soft and comfortable and the open back added a fun detail!

links_reviews_title: Weird fit and fabric was not best quality
links_reviews_text: Arms were very tight and high neck which was uncomfortable however back was cute design

I rented this for a trip to Disneyland and wound up only wearing around the house as PJs. It was way too thin to provide any sort of warmth outside. The material is basically just a light felt and feels really cheap. The neck opening is really small and the hood pulls the already small opening tightly against your throat. It was cute and I wanted to love it, but was just a really cheap piece of material.
Cute and loved the print. Back opens so it's more of leggings kind of shirt.

links_reviews_title: Cute and casual for daytime errands
links_reviews_text: The open back was a cute touch. I didn't wear a tank underneath but if I rent again I probably will.
this is a super soft and cozy material. It is a slight crop but not to short. Keep in mind the back is open so you may need something underneath liek I do

I ended up buying this. The material is thin and the outside is fleecy. The opening in the back is fun but not overly revealing, perfect for a casual day out. It's a little cropped so I wore it with high waisted jeans.

links_reviews_title: Love it. Super comfy and soft.
links_reviews_text: True to the picture.

Definitely form fitting. Size one up. It's a beautiful dress; lined, cotton like but a little warm. Very professional, although tight. You can easily move in it and sit comfortably. The details are pretty. It's sweet but I probably won't rent it again.
Definitely thinking of buying this..its a great twist on a classic and is conservative yet stylish and flattering

links_reviews_title: Polished look with a flattering fit
links_reviews_text: The thickness of the fabric and the lining make all the difference. I felt so confident in this dress and got compliments all day. I loved how it fit. The cut is very flattering.
Got so many compliments on this dress. So flattering, side zip, thick material. Absolutely loved this for a work meeting. Will rent again.

It's a fun little something different, but not one I'd own. There was a little too much extra room into lower back area, so it didn't fit quite flush. Overall though, it was fun, warm, and I got several compliments throughout the day.

I am always a zero sometimes smaller and the 2 fit perfect maybe even slight snug I am 5'6 came a little below the knee Love the tie neck Very comfortable stretchy cotton feel fabric Pretty thick but not too hot Appropriate Slit in the back not too high There's also a silky lining underneath

links_reviews_title: So comfortable and loved the length.
links_reviews_text: I could have worn the 14 or 16 but decided on larger size for comfort. Very flattering and comfortable.
One of my favorite rents ever! Still considering purchase (since it's so new anyway) of this sweet piece for my own closet.
I wore this to a charity fashion show at NM in November and it was perfect. Would be great for a work event too.
Perfect fit, professional with a little flair. My new favorite work dress -- I bought it!
I really love the style and look of this dress. Unfortunately it was very tight. I was able to wear it but I should have sized up. Runs small and is tight!

I keep procrastinating wearing this. I ordered it for work but every time I put it in I just feel like it's too firm-fitting and I don't want to sit all day in a dress that might show the tiniest bit of bloat.

links_reviews_title: The sizing ran too small for me to wear it comfortably.
links_reviews_text: It was a different cut than what I needed.
Adorable-nice fabric, nice fit, true to size, cute style. All around winner.
Very professional attire
Loved this dress. Planning on buying it. Great fit and comfy jersey fabric. Lining would bunch when I would walk as it stuck to my stockings a bit.

links_reviews_title: Might wear it once, but won’t keep it..
links_reviews_text: Great material, great fit. Too much going on in the front for my taste.
Fit thru bust and arms but the waist was very large so it made me look like a column. Not a lot of stretch so unless you are the right shape this dress will look like a potato sack on you.
Love the fit and shape of the dress.

links_reviews_title: Wore this dress to church. fit like a dream. Very classy with sexy shape.
links_reviews_text: It ran a tad small. But RTR sent the perfect size. Cant remember if it was an 8 or a 10. Very classy dress. Very appropriate for church or a professional setting.
This dress fit perfectly. It was very complementary to my figure and I got tons of compliments! I wore 4 to 5 times. I'm considering purchasing it.
I can't bear to send this back! So I am keeping it. :D
Cute but went With the size bit bigger than I normally would and it was a bit big on me

This blazer hits just at the top of the hip and is best on a short-waist. I think it may be too cropped if you're at all long-waisted. The fabric was nice and thick and I was able to wear it without a heavy coat in 40 degree weather. The plaid is quite pretty! Would rent this again. 💛

This is a really flattering little blazer. Although it is beautifully constructed, I found that the weight and thickness of the fabric made it a bit uncomfortable for all day wear. It would be great to wear as a jacket outdoors in cool weather, and I'd definitely rent it again for that purpose.
Perfect for a day in wine country. Great fit. Classic cut. Stunning jacket

Gorgeous details, thick, warm, flattering. Can be dressed up or down, looks great with a black jumpsuit or light wash jeans. This blazer is thick like a wool coat so can double as an outdoor jacket depending on your climate.
Super cute and flattering, loved this blazer so much and received so many compliments. Would size up, but also meant to have a fitted look
Preppy or punk, this jacket is super cute! Loved the length And flattering cut.
Nice fit. Looks good for work. It's cropped fit.

Loved this for a classic winter update. The timeless plaid with an on trend cut was perfect for January. I wore this casually with jeans and suede booties for everyday and with black crop slacks and heels for church. It's a super versatile piece.

links_reviews_title: I did not end up wearing this jacket.
links_reviews_text: It is cute and every bit a Ralph Lauren piece with nice material, well-cut lines, and adorable plaid pattern. It just didn't fit my torso quite right. It is a touch cropped in style, as well as has a bracelet-length sleeve; neither of these things worked with my proportions.

links_reviews_title: Perfect blazer to pep up a winter work wardrobe
links_reviews_text: I wore this for a job interview because I wanted to look professional and conservative with a bit of style. This is an extremely well-constructed wool blazer that is lined, so it is very warm.... almost too warm to wear indoors when the heat is running all day. I loved the classic plaid. It has black and navy among the colors so you can pair it with most any basic pant you already have in your closet. I wore a 10 to be sure it would fit over my chest (36D) and it was perfect.
I wore to a work holiday party and it was perfect. It is nice thick wool blazer and really nice cut.

This fits a bit snug if you have a large bust but is very flattering. The wool is thick and clearly high quality. Pair with high waisted pants since the jacket is very short. Everyone at work loved it!
This was a great RTR unlimited rental because I really liked the blazer but it's too holiday-ish (i.e. limited wears) for me to buy it. The blazer material is very thick and you may get hot.

I loved everything about this blazer: the subtle plaid; button detailing; rich, woolen fabric; and the perfect, tailored fit. I often have issues with blazer sleeves being too long - not the case with this one. If you have longer arms, this jacket might not be for you. When the price comes down, I plan to buy this piece, and will rent it frequently in the meantime.
it was too short and did not look good on me.
I wasn't expecting the shoulder pads. It didn't look terrible but I couldn't get used to it. Probably for more fashion forward folks than myself.

links_reviews_title: Not as oversized as I would have liked
links_reviews_text: Slightly more dramatic shoulder pads than the photo shows

links_reviews_title: Love this print! wore with black pants and a tank - wish the fit was a bit better but overall a fan
links_reviews_text: I love animal prints!!! The fit on this jacket was a bit weird - I would say it fits large but if I went a size smaller I feel like it would have been too tight? Overall love the print and the concept of the blazer so I was content but just wish fit was a bit better. Felt a tad bit boxy

links_reviews_title: Cute blazer that helped me stand out at a conference
links_reviews_text: Glad I read the previous reviews: this blazer doesn't do much in terms of flattering one's figure. It runs large and boxy so wearing it buttoned up made me look shapeless. I also wasn't crazy about the shoulder pads. BUT... it does have a super fun pattern and stands out in a sea of black and navy jackets. Happy I wore it once. Not a love thing though.
Awesome print on this boyfriend style blazer but it's too boxy for large bust. Fun wearing it with distressed jeans and a soft blush silk top. Extremely versatile and good in any season.

links_reviews_title: Wore this for an interview. Great piece.
links_reviews_text: This blazer is gorgeous and unique. It's heavy and I wore it in triple digit weather. That was my only issue. It is a great cut.

I liked the pattern right away but the boxy cut and thick material made this blazer not one of my favorites from RTR. It was shoulder pads to help give it shape. The fabric might be better for cooler months.
Wore this for a big presentation for work and it was perfect! Dressy enough without giving up style. Only complaint is the fabric really doesn't breathe.
I've rented this a couple of times. I'm not a huge fan of leopard print but I love it on this blazer.

This blazer was a bit boxy and slightly too big to work. I ended up wearing it for this photo and taking it off. The lining was the best part but the material was strained and the leopard pattern was... just meh. Not a bad pick, just not the greatest
Jacket goes so well with variety of outfits. It can be a little tight across the back.
This jacket is amazing! I absolutely loved the fit, shoulder pads and print. I will definitely rent again!

I really enjoyed this blazer. It's a little oversized to get that menswear look but still looks very feminine thanks to the pattern. I wore it to work and it was comfortable for the whole day. I will definitely rent this again!
Just loved it. I wore it both with stark white and black and I think I like it better with stark white.

links_reviews_title: Brought it with me to NYC for a work trip and it was a great staple.
links_reviews_text: fits great. beautiful material and easy to throw on with all black.

I loved this jacket so much that I bought it! It accommodates my broad shoulders without being overly large through the body. I've worn it with a black shift dress, black pants and a black pencil skirt; booties, pumps and flats. More versatile than I expected.

links_reviews_title: Great blazer for work or casual!
links_reviews_text: I like this a lot! It's not quite as luxurious as I expected it to be given the brand, but it is super cute and the pattern is gorgeous. It's definitely not as oversized as it seems to be - I wore an 8 and would have rented a 10 or 12 to get the more menswear-inspired look. But it's definitely cute enough to go from office to bar!

I got my usual size (an 8) and it was WAY too big and boxy. Also the sleeves are a weird length - I can't decide if they are supposed to be 3/4 or bracelet sleeves or are just really short on me. Also not loving the shoulder pads.

links_reviews_title: Lovely fabric and pattern, boxy cut
links_reviews_text: I love animal print and I was excited to try this leopard blazer! The print and fabric is quality, but the boxy cut made me look about 3 times wider than I really am. I'm tall and the bottom of the blazer hit me at the widest part of my hips, furthering the unflattering effect. Wore once and returned.

Lol. I rented this for work. It looks SO CUTE on the model in the RTR promo pics. (We all got that email!) On me? Not so much. I just don't have the body to pull off these shoulders! The fabric is thick and stiff like brocade, heavy drapes. It is a little boxy. I definitely expected it to have more shape and movement. Ultimately it wasn't worth trying for me.
Adorable blazer. I wore it with a red shirt underneath for a pop of color. I got so many compliments. Sleeves a tad shorter than expected but didn't bother me.
I may have shed a tear when I put this in the garment bag to return it I loved it so much. Sassy and easy to pair with so many options. Will definitely rent this again.

I read reviews that this jacket is "boxy", and it is. The shoulder pads are legit - but too much for me. I couldn't do the pattern plus style, so returned it without wearing it. I had planned to wear it to work.

links_reviews_title: Fits like a boyfriend blazer - shoulder pads are a little larger than expected
links_reviews_text: Cute for work, but shoulder pads were a bit larger than expected. Might have needed to go down a size.

Absolutely loved this. Rented for attending a conference and I got tons of compliments. Oddly loved the shoulder pads. This was a size up than my usual but I liked the fit of it. I think I will buy to wear to work and also potentially as outerwear for fall
Great idea for a jacket but it was wide on the shoulders and very baggy. Would have been cuter if it was more sleek/fitted.
Great piece, got lots of compliments. Ran a little big and FYI - has shoulder pads!
I really wanted to love this blazer, but couldn't get over how loose it was in the stomach and small in the arms. The fabric was heavy and would keep you pretty warm in the fall.
The shoulder pads on these were sooooo strong. I ended up not even wearing it because the shoulder pads were so 80s and not in a good way. I felt like an 80s anchor woman.
The shoulders/shoulder pads were huge and it was too boxy. Didn't end up wearing.
Perfect for a work event, but i was not expecting the shoulder pads to be so intense. There are also pockets in the front that are difficult to notice in the photo.
Runs very large. Arms were baggy, huge through body. Not flattering at all. Wore once and that was probably one time too many.
Very Chic! Love it with jeans and heels.

I love a good animal print, and the jacket was well-made, just not a great fit. It was “relaxed” and so felt very 1980s (think oversized jacket with a large shoulder pad). Because it wasn’t form fitting, my body got lost in it.

Worse this for work with black pants and a black tank, loved it! I have to be careful about boxy items since I have such a short torso, but this didn't feel too boxy. I kept it buttoned throughout the day and was still comfortable.
sleeves short, material heavy

This blazer has absolutely become one of my go-to Unlimited rentals in the past few months after I picked in on a whim. While I'm not a formal dresser for the office or someone who even likes blazers very much, this piece totally changed my mind. The fit of this baby is super flattering on and not boxy in the slightest. I love the exaggerated shoulder paired with the rounded hemline - it looks super cool in person!

links_reviews_title: Why can't I buy this jacket??? It is perfection. A fun way to spice up any look!
links_reviews_text: Jacket fit true to size. I was able to comfortably button it, though I never wore it that way. I've worn this jacket 5 or 6 times since I rented it. Office. Meetings. Drinks with the girls. It's great for anywhere / any time!
Couldn't wear it, I looked like I was in a costume. Not a good costume
Slouchy fit through torso but sleeves are short

I hated to send this back bc it is SO warm! It is two separate pieces, a down puffer that snaps in to a waterproof shell. The body and sleeve length were awesome! My only beef, and the reason I docked this one star, is that the liner would unsnap easily, like when getting into the car or stretching for something. The snaps seem cheap for the cost of the jacket. Overall, loved this rental and would love to rent it again!
I mainly just wore the down part. The shell was a bit big and bulky

This fit true to size. It was comfortable through the shoulder and arm length area. I paired it with my cape blazer (no photo taken) and thought it was the perfect top for it. The material was soft as well. You could wear this for work or casual weekend wear.
Nice, casual shirt to wear with jeans or leggings. I am usually an 8 or 10 and should've ordered an M.

links_reviews_title: Cozy work shirt and great for lounging.
links_reviews_text: Got it oversized and it was perfectly frumpy.

More gorgeous than the pictures… Very soft fabric and pretty plaid pattern...came with the tags on. You could easily dress this up with pants. I plan to wear it with high waisted black jeans for business casual or date night!

links_reviews_title: Slightly shifty but such a cute skirt
links_reviews_text: Dare. i. say. one of the cutest skirts of all time and the first piece from my shipment that i wore out the second i got it. such a lovely length for the fall and the quality is amazing and heavy and keeps the most swift of winds away from flying up under my legs. i will say that because this is a wrap dress that the waist will get loose and untie throughout the day but nothing a quick bathroom trip can't fix!!
Love that it is reversible!! Love the blue side more as it has pockets. Skirt is a little faded.
This is a true wrap skirt with pockets! It is also reversible. I love the fit and length. True to size and the perfect length for my 5'6" frame.
I'm really tall so on most girls this would be a super long skirt. It was okay... nothing special

So fun that this skirt is reversible. And the blue side has pockets! Drapes really nicely and the fabric is heavier than expected, which was nice in an Arctic office environment. Beautiful quality, super comfy, and so versatile. At 5'3 this definitely hit me well below where it hits on the model - just about ankle length.
The wrap part is great but slips a bit- love the pockets

This skirt is reversible and the material is really great. I wore the blue side to work with a shirt tucked in and I wore the pink side to a brunch with my friends . The blue side even has pockets ! I'm 5'3 so it came to almost ankles as opposed to midi length but it still looked cute with heels and I could also wear it with flats and wouldn't drag. I'll probably rent again.

links_reviews_title: Real wrap skirt but not adjustable
links_reviews_text: In general it's a great skirt and true to size, but a warning that because there are pockets (love a pocket!) you can't adjust the skirt to size or to move the slit. The pockets put the front slit right in the center which is difficult to maneuver when sitting. Also I'm 5'8 and it skirt is way above my normal waist for skirts like this but still almost hits the ground

links_reviews_title: True wrap skirt with two great color options
links_reviews_text: Lovely fabric and colors and is reversible. Sadly the wrap aspect tended to sag a bit and show the wrap string separate so I couldn't wear it much.

Super pretty in person - I'm 24 weeks pregnant and the 10 juuust fit over the top of my bump. Love the pockets. It's a true wrap skirt, so I do wish there was a little button or something to protect when the wind catches it.
Lots of fabric and heavy for hot Texas. But pretty and lots of options to pair with it.
Wrap skirt, great pattern. Fits true to size. Colorful. Wore for a fun summer day.
The material is so comfortable, thick yet breathable and very cool to wear in hot weather. Love the floral patterns and the pockets!
Great, soft fabric! Perfect fit! Looked great with nude kitten-heeled pumps and a nude tshirt. Absolutely great for work or a casual date night!
I LOVE this dress, I am not usually a shift style dress gal but this dress fit perfectly and was extremely flattering. Can be dressed up or down.
Loved this dress so much. Very comfortable and nice thick fabric. Print is so gorgeous in person - the dress looks very expensive. Would rent over and over again!
Fit perfect and received so many compliments! Would rent again.
I'm short and it's hard to find dresses that hit at the right length. It would be super short on someone above 5'6"ish, but for me it was perfect and surprisingly well constructed

links_reviews_title: Love this look! Conservative but fashionable!!
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress for a parent meeting. It felt dressed up without trying too hard and the pattern is so cute. Just short enough to be fun but appropriate

This dress fits unlike any other DVF dress I've ever worn - much more structured yet also not quite as forgiving. Beware bending over or sitting down! Very short. It had thicker material than I anticipated and the collar/neckline was a little tighter than I'd prefer, but overall it was a nice dress and I'd likely rent again.
I didn't expect the fabric to be denim but I enjoyed the print.
This is printed stretch denim fabric. Very comfortable and adorable! I kept it so I can wear it again

links_reviews_title: A little snug, but so cute!
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress for work! The print is awesome and I loved the stretchy comfortable material. Although the cut is A-line, the overall fit is snug. I'll likely size up next time. I'm also 5'8" and this felt a little borderline short for me. The next size up would likely be just right!

A little bit on the short side for me, but I thought this was a fun great summer dress. Also bonus that the fabric was sturdy (aka didn't have to worry the skirt would fly up on the subway platform) and it's totally opaque.
Comfortable material, but a bit short for me, especially when seated. Also the bottom of the dress wrinkles when you sit. Size up!

links_reviews_title: Pretty dress but a little short
links_reviews_text: I wore this to work on a day I didn't see any clients. It was cute and fit well, but at my height (5'10) I found it to be just a *tad* short for a professional setting and I hate that self conscious feeling. It was too dressy to wear to anything else I had that week, so I sent it back after wearing it once. Cute and serviceable but for me, not worth keeping around.

The 4 fit great and I'm in between 4 and 6. The print and fabric are divine. It's a little short on my 5'6 frame but not too, especially since it flares just a twitch. The only thing not amazing for me is the seam in the middle of the boob area- is kind of squishes everything together and creates uniboob. But minor- such a great dressy
Neat dress, like the detailing but it's hard to see against the pattern. Enjoyed wearing this !
This dress was much more comfortable than I thought it would be. The fabric has a good amount of stretch and is think enough to be completely opaque, which is a big plus. The print was really nice.

I wore this for a full day in NYC, from work meetings to shopping to dinner. I dressed it up with heels and down with sneakers. I got a ton of compliments all day long. It's also super comfortable and easy to wear. 10/10
This is a bit thicker for spring/summer so was good to wear while still a bit chilly. Loved the pattern and cut.
I could have sized down.

Wore this dress for engagement photos taken on a lovely spring day and loved it. It was the perfect pop of color. It's a very structured material so not much give but it fit like a glove and was a good length for my short frame. Would definitely rent again!

links_reviews_title: Graduate school interview- very professional and cute
links_reviews_text: Overall fit was true to size but a little longer than seen on the model- but things always are if you're petite like me! However, the length ended up being appropriate as I think any shorter wouldn't work for a professional occasion. The pattern is incredible and not overwhelming- not too girly- and the fit is conservative with cap sleeves and a high neckline. Great dress!
Great print. Great length for work

Wore this to work - fabric is high quality and sort of like a stretchy denim - really flattering. May be a little short for taller people for work, as I'm 5'3 and need to pull it down somewhat frequently. True to size but size up if you want more modest fit.
Great for pear shape. I don't normally feel comfortable in white but the colors were beautiful and flattering. Will rent again!
The fit of this dress was perfect! Loved the print. Fabric was thick but not hot and had a good stretch to it. Received a ton of compliments. I'm excited to rent the pants in this same print!
Fantastic fit! Might be too tight at the chest for a fuller bust but was perfect for me. Incredible pattern and high quality material. Looked and felt brand new
I made the mistake of sizing up for length, and the dress is huge. I recommend sizing down one size.
Beautiful print! It a denim type of material. It just didn't look good on me so I sent it back without wearing it.

I adored this dress. It was close fitting, yet flattering. The material is weighty, yet soft, and the shape was incredibly forgiving of my pear shape. If the dress I received hadn't had a couple of stains, I probably would have purchased it.

links_reviews_title: great print.. good work to evening dress.
links_reviews_text: fits really well on top. the bottom is a bit shorter than i would like.
Great dress, didn't wrinkle.

I loved the fit of this dress overall! It hugged in the right places. The material is thick, so it didn't wrinkle throughout the day. The arms were a little bit on the tight side, but comfortable enough to wear the full day. I will definitely be renting this again!
The material is almost like a jean. It didn't wrinkle and looked super fitted. Good if you have to move around a lot throughout the day. I loved the pattern too.
Loved this dress! Wish I could wear it every day! It fit perfectly, and was easy to wear. The material is a little structured, which was also a plus. Would absolutely rent again.
Thick material which hung well. Not too short but I'm 5'3". Received lots of complements!

links_reviews_title: Amazing dress, wore it 3 times in the week I had it. I got compliments each time I wore it!
links_reviews_text: RTR told me to size up so I did. Really comfortable fit, and it didn't look too big on. Was long enough to wear to work, and I am 5'10''. I wore it as a nice dress on doing family things on Sunday and out to eat. Would probably rent again!! a bit pricey for me to buy to own. Love it.

I paired this dress with nude pumps and a navy blazer. It is the perfect level of formal for a conservative office. I got tons of compliments on the print and fit! Fit was true to size, maybe a hair on the small side. Slim fit on chest, arms, and waist. Highly recommend!
Fabric feels like leisure-wear but the look is more fun and polished. Loved it

links_reviews_title: Amazing dress. Wore it to a work function.
links_reviews_text: Very comfortable and has good structure for a polished and professional look.

links_reviews_title: Loved it, thick material but comfy. Runs short!!
links_reviews_text: Loved it, thick material but comfy. Runs short!!

This dress is very flattering on and would be perfect for a summer night casual event. I rented it for work, and it was too flowery to project the image I need to project: one of power. Gave it 5 stars because it really is a super great dress, just not for what I need.

links_reviews_title: Date night on a scorching hot day
links_reviews_text: Finally, a mini for a shortie like me! So light and cool for a hot summer day. Love the flirty print and the off the shoulder sleeves!

Loved this girly, cotton dress for every day casual wear. There was already a second layer of material built in the dress, so I didn't have to worry about it being see-through. So even though it shows a lot of skin, I didn't feel exposed! The print was adorable; however, I was nervous to raise my arms in fear of breaking off those tiny dainty sleeves.
I wore this dress several times! I wore it to the beach at night and it was so cute and comfortable. Follow on IG @saidbymelissa for more RTR looks
True to size and super comfy

Obsessed with this dress! It is super comfortable and easy to just throw on. My only complaint is that I didn't wear a bra with it (I don't have a good strapless) and I had to pull it up at times, but other than that it was perfect.
Very light and great for summer! Got tons of compliments and an easy fit!
Super cute dress for the summer! I was worried it'd be far too short for me since I'm 5'11 but it actually wasn't totally inappropriate!
It can fall a little low on chest but otherwise great!

I rented this dress for lunch and wine tasting. It is strapless and I did pull it up a few times but all together it was comfortable enough. The bottom is not fitted but angles outward so it was very flattering. It is lined so I didn't need to worry about undergarments showing. I got several compliments! I would recommend for a summer event!

It's kind of like a glorified nightie but it works when you put on some heels. Not seethrough which is normally an issue I have with white dresses. The sleeves are slightly detached so movement isn't a problem. I am a large C cup and I was on the verge of spillage so beware.

links_reviews_title: Lovely pattern and very fun dress
links_reviews_text: Sexy dress for a date! I got so many complements.
Perfect casual summer dress for any occasion!
Arm bands are a little annoying (they are attached). The sweetheart neckline can pull down pretty easily for those who have larger boobs. Otherwise, very cute, fun summer mini.

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress, it was very flattering
links_reviews_text: It was a bit big on me, however I wore it for a birthday outing that required some physical activity since it was an Escape Room prior to dinner. It was comfortable and the neckline was beautiful. Will def rent again.
The dress is really long and I'm 5'4". Otherwise fit well.
Fit perfectly, but the bust area kept slipping down even though it was snug. I think its part of the design.
This was not flattering and felt very cheap
Very cute dress, but if you are full chested it can be hard to keep it up.

links_reviews_title: Top of the dress is cute, bottom is not flattering
links_reviews_text: I gave this star 3 stars because the pattern is really cute and summery and the top part fits well. However, the bottom is not flattering. It was not form fitting and just hung awkwardly.

This dress was really cute! Fun pattern, great ruffled sleeves, and a comfortable, loose fit. I probably should have sized down to the medium, though. The chest area was just slightly too loose for me to feel comfortable while wearing this as a strapless dress, so I ended up taking the ties that normally form a bow in the center, and turned them into a halter style so that they tied around my neck. That way I felt super secure, and it still looked really cute (though it did mean sacrificing the sweetheart neckline and ruched front, just fyi). I wore it to a wine tasting and to a birthday party but totally forgot to take photos!

I will add a photo later but I wanted to review this so people would rent it because OH my god it might just be my favorite thing. I am VERY pear shaped and this was perfect because it was adjustable in the boobs. Such a sexy but sweet summer dress!

links_reviews_title: The sleeves were not what I was expecting.
links_reviews_text: Fits as expected
Loved this dress! I may rent again but in a small and consider buying it.
Looked cheap and too juvenile.

I wore this jacket to stay on brand for my company as I pitched it during a business plan competition. I felt professional, competent, confident, and stylish. My favorite thing about this jacket is the way it looks so amazing when you leave it open. I think that's how it's meant to be worn because when I buttoned it shut it totally gaped - but I am busty. maybe size up if you want to close it?

links_reviews_title: Sweet pink blazer to welcome spring
links_reviews_text: Fits true to size, though somewhat restrictive for movement (not atypical for blazers though).

Pretty pink color. It was perfect to pair with a burgundy velvet RTR blouse. Thinking of buying it but that really defeats the entire purpose of renting clothes now doesn't it? Rent this it's versatile and perfect with dress pants or jeans

The sleeves were a bit tight. The size I got fit my shoulders, but the mid section was tight if I tried to button it. The inside button was hard to get buttoned. But overall, a very cute jacket for work.

links_reviews_title: Cute take on a blazer but nothing too special
links_reviews_text: The color is what makes this blazer. No stretch and a little tight in the shoulders. Cute but won't rent again.

This tailored, yet soft, blazer looked great for the office. The rosy pink color is flattering, and the buttons on front and cuffs dress it up. I'm a little broader in the shoulders, and large was good for me.
It was too small but the length was good
Way too big, like other reviews said it was boxy and looked like i was wearing a coat if a man many sizes larger than me

Lovely color despite being darker than it appears in the stock photo (more of a salmon, rather than a blush). High quality, which is why I'm rating it four stars. However, as other reviewers have mentioned, the cut is quite odd. I'm pear shaped, which means I'm smaller in my upper body. Even though the jacket was the correct size, I found it to be strangely tight across my back and shoulders (which is usually not an issue for me with blazers). The fact that the fabric has absolutely no stretch only exacerbated the problem. I wore this to work, but had to take it off because it was uncomfortable to sit at my desk and type while wearing it.

I don't know how to describe the fit for this. It was tight in my shoulders (I have somewhat broad shoulders), perfect around my waist and waaaaaay too big in the bust. Busty girls, this is your blazer. As you can see in the picture, I have nothing up there to shape the top. I wore it unbuttoned instead, which still looked nice, but not as professional.

links_reviews_title: It looks better on in person than in the RTR profile pic. Great color and fit.
links_reviews_text: I would totally rent this again. Cute blazer for work or after work.

I absolutely love the color, that's what sold me. However, with all the buttons it was very snug around my waist and chest. For that reason I am deducting several stars. It does not run true to size--please size up ladies!
Too tight around the arms and did not wear it
I was really disappointed by this blazer. It's very big and boxy. I looked like a little girl playing with my mom's 80's blazers. Nice color but weird fit.

links_reviews_title: Great - but for 65 degrees or less
links_reviews_text: I'm so sad that I could not wear this gorgeous jacket. It's like a coat so definitely for cooler temps.
Great color! I found the fit to be normal, not boxy or awkward like some of the other reviews.
I paired this with white, black and denim bottoms and it went so well with tortoise/leopard shoes. Would rent again for work/play.

Definitely size up if you want this. This blazer runs small so I'd suggest you size up. My arms are pretty normal but I felt like the hulk in these. It was so tight. I feel as if it's slightly smaller/tighter than an average arm size. The material was a bit on the satin mixed with cotton side. I didn't really like the finish of it.
It fit me really big. It swallows me up!
In photos I loved the color but the fabric was very wrinkly? And a strange cross between a linen and a type of sheen? Button would hardly button for me but arms were incredibly long.

Loving the pink blazer trend for spring, but I wish I'd gone with one of the other brands on here. This one was kind of thick, easily wrinkled fabric and the fit was only OK. It looked a bit baggy worn open, which I how I wanted to wear it. Better buttoned, but still just not the best tailoring. Loved the color though and it was a fun Easter outfit.
Swimming in this. Too big to even consider wearing

links_reviews_title: Maybe the world's most ill-fitting jacket?
links_reviews_text: The panels and arms are poorly positioned & the lining is crap. Looks lumpy and unstructured. You'll be unable to raise your arms or move in general. Avoid and seek better brands!
Runs small. Weird cut. The fabric feels cheap. Do not recommend.

links_reviews_title: I don’t wear a lot of color but this jacket made me rethink that!
links_reviews_text: The pick is super bubble gum, but I loved it. Wore it with a b&w striped crew neck shirt and jeans with heels. Cute for work and girls night out.

links_reviews_title: Awesome blazer - good structure and material.
links_reviews_text: Nice heavy weight (but canvas weight not like winter warm wool) blazer that can def work for spring/fall summer. Worn to an event I spoke at
Great jacket. Fit well

I need more color in my wardrobe so I wish I liked this more. I wore it to work and it was fine but there was something funny about the fit. One of the lapels didn't lay flat and the shoulder pads felt a bit too big.
Way too large- if you are super tall and thin might fit. I looked like a clown wearing it.

I loved this color and style and wanted it to work badly; however, as other reviewers noted, the fit is a bit odd. For me it was gaping in the front, to the point where the fit was so bad there was no way I could wear it to work.
I should have listened to other renters when they said this blazer has a weird fit, because it does. I did not wear, and will not rent again.
Looks a little dingy and worn out not a very structured fit
Sleeves are insanely wide and long. The collar is so floppy I looked like I was wearing a costume. Do not recommend
The color is fantastic, but the fit was just ok.

links_reviews_title: The fit is weird. I cannot even wear it.
links_reviews_text: The fit is weird. I cannot even wear it.

links_reviews_title: I wore it for work and every day wear.
links_reviews_text: It's a little wonky of a fit, it's bunchy in the front. Nonetheless it's a pretty color and a fun every day look to add to a wardrobe..

links_reviews_title: I did not even wear this. Just returned it. The material and cut was not for me.
links_reviews_text: I didn’t wear this. Did not like it

links_reviews_title: Just the whole concept of RTR is brilliant! IN LOVE WITH IT!
links_reviews_text: The fit was great. Length and it gave me womanly shape I never get with other blazers HAHA. But I couldn’t close it though. Overall, very happy with quality and the bag that it came with ❤️❤️ I really felt the weight of my expensive taste coming true to life. I am the kind of person who buys something, wears it once and never again. RTR is just perfect for me. Thanks for existing
I lived the look of the blazer, but I could not fit into it to judge how I looked. I wear a 12/14 and could not wear an XL.

links_reviews_title: I ended up not wearing this jacket. I selected this jacket to wear for a Breast cancer awareness ev
links_reviews_text: The fit was a little snug around my arms. You can't tell by the picture but this jacket has shoulder pads.

Yes yes yes this blazer is perfect. It's also really insulated should you want to forego a jacket. I loved it!!! Would absolutely rent again. True to size but oversized is the look. More on @thanksitsrtr

links_reviews_title: Snappy, stylish, and great for work and everyday
links_reviews_text: I am obsessed with this piece. Kept it nearly a month, probably a personal record for me and RTR. Heavier weight- perfect for cooler weather, inside and out. Polished look with slacks and jeans. Looking forward to renting again

This blazer is the perfect amount of dressy and casual. I wore it to an interview but also just around campus to class on days I wanted to look a little nicer. The fit was great and I love the pattern. So many people loved it, too! I even had a woman come up and ask where it was from. Can't recommend this enough!!

I loved this coat. It's really nice, looks and feels expensive. Fit well, has useful pockets in the front. Looks great open too! I think it runs a little big in the shoulders. Was able to wear it OVER a leather jacket at one point. Will rent again!
excellent fall jacket

I'm so excited for fall weather! This pattern is a great piece to dress up or down. I wore it with black pants & heels to work. One of the buttons was cracked in transit but no one could tell. It's a bit on the thicker side so wouldn't be great for warm weather. Fits true to size. Arms were too long on me but I just rolled them up. Overall, I recommend!
It was so comfy and polished at the same time. The fit was perfect for me!

links_reviews_title: Loved it so much - I bought it!
links_reviews_text: This is a fab combo of blazer and coat. I LOVE the way it looks. the print, and the colors. I have lymphedema in one arm, but luckily, the arms were tailored without being too tight - I was able to layer for the cold NY weather. I really can't say how much I enjoy wearing this - it can be dressed up or down and I couldn't stop thinking about it after I returned it...so I bought it. I never would try something like this without RTR, so cheers to the Unlimited Subscription.
Fabulous oversized blazer/jacket. I would recommend sizing down as well. I wore this open so it wasn't a big deal and didn't look to big. However when I buttoned it I looked like I was swimming in it
Love the cut, color, and fit of this jacket. When you enter a room, this jacket is a show-stopper. I really want to buy it!

links_reviews_title: was to large , could have went down one size
links_reviews_text: to large fitting thru the middle

links_reviews_title: Nice compliment to dress down or up. Paired with nice berry tote
links_reviews_text: Received compliments

This works as both a jacket and blazer. It's thick and warm but slim enough to fit under a bigger coat. It's so flattering and professional but cute, too. Ended up wearing it to work as well as to an event on Saturday night
I didn't wear it. Fit was big

links_reviews_title: Warm and fashionable coat, very versatile
links_reviews_text: Perfect sizing, warm enough to keep me warm during New York autumn.

links_reviews_title: Loved it but it was too big!
links_reviews_text: This jacket is beautiful but runs a bit boxy
Cute jacket. I got tons of compliments. Great fall wardrobe piece!
Fit great in the waist (slightly big but I have this problem with 99% of bottoms) and the hips. I like the design and how simply yet elegant the skirt is.

Super skinny jeans. The 10" rise in this brand is a little too high for me (other brands it fits as a nice high rise). 28" inseam was a little long, but I like my jeans to hit right around my ankles (I'm 5'3"). I wouldn't rent these again but I think they'd be great on a slightly taller person or someone with a longer torso.
Wash is perfect, length is perfect but found that the fit at the top was not. Wish it was tighter but instead just a lot of excess material. Had to pull them up a lot.
Love these! High wasted and they seem to be staying put! I just may have to buy these!
I bought these! Loved the dark color. Great for dressier jean. Nice length for petite fit

links_reviews_title: Tight through leg but loose in waist
links_reviews_text: This is about just fit : I was really looking forward to try this as I wanted to "try before buy," and I heard a lot of good things about Mott & Bow. It was definitely really tight/fitted through the leg, which is ok, but def ran tight. But then had way too much room in the waist. I know with high rise that can be tricky to manage by body type, plus I lean hourglass, but it felt pretty off in comparison to other high rise. I'm guessing their fit model runs pretty ruler shaped.
comfortable and flattering
Might buy these in the future! Great dark wash and good fit .
Fit well
Fit great at first but stretched out shortly after wearing them.

These were great jeans. At first I though I might buy them, but as I wore them over several days their stretchyness started to bug me. The deep dark blue color was perfect for work and a night out and the stretch didn't stretch out, it just hugged everything really well. I just felt a little like I was in a scuba suit. Overall, a very nice pair of jeans--especially for shorter girls!
Perfect amount of stretch and they are a little cropped for me, so I can wear cute booties with them.
These fit great and felt high quality.
Wore these to ease out of maternity jeans. Fit was true to size. They are stretchy but there is still structure. Length was perfect on me (I'm 5'5''). Im going to buy these.

links_reviews_title: Great high waisted skinny jean option
links_reviews_text: Cute skinny jeans. I would have worn them more but they were a little tight on my new post-baby body.
Nice fit with just the right amount of stretch.
I agree with the other reviewers- legs were waaaay too tight and waist baggy. My boyfriend had to help peel them off my legs.

links_reviews_title: Could not wear due to length.
links_reviews_text: too long for my 5'2 height but nice dark jeans

links_reviews_title: I loved these so much I didn't want to send them back!
links_reviews_text: They make you look and feel good!
They were really nice just a little too snug
Great jeans - basically perfect
Comfortable enough to be perfect for everyday-wear but the fit and color are also nice for going out in

Good pants, they looked great on and the waistband was postpartum friendly. The dye seemed to bleed off into my hands and any light fabric that I wore with it or sat on, so I returned without buying (which I strongly considered).

links_reviews_title: Waist runs large, legs are very slim. Good materials and dye finish.
links_reviews_text: I have a large waist and muscular legs. I agree with the other reviewers that that waist is unusually large (even for me) and the legs are unusually tight. Te overall construction and de finish is good, but the cut is for a very specific body type: large waist, and very slim legs.
Very forgiving on my belly area. Super comfortable and stretchy.

links_reviews_title: Tight and odd fit in the leg.
links_reviews_text: Very tight in the leg -- Did not wear.
Love these so much! Fit like a glove! I bought them!

Overall, I liked these jeans. They were a little long on me, but I am short and usually wear petite. Can RTR add some petite clothing?? I wish I had sized down by one for a better fit. They were a little loose after wearing for a couple of hours, but that's just because I needed them to be smaller. I liked the dark wash and wore these 3x while I had them! I would rent again.
It was so small couldn't even get pass my thighs.
great fit!
Mid rise jeans that is very stretchy. Great quality and cut. It ran a bit large so it got a bit loose after an hour of wear, I would recommend getting a size down.
A little too long in the inseam. Not much give in the material.
Didn't have much stretch and ended up pulling in random places. Fine for a few days, but glad I didn't actually buy them.

links_reviews_title: I wore these to work a couple times and they were super comfy!
links_reviews_text: They have a nice stretch to them, nice wash, and really comfortable.
Runs a little small. Nice dark wash. Didn't wear because they were high enough to be uncomfortable

I normally wear a 29 but that was gone so I went up to 30 . It fit but was large in the waist and I think the 29 would have fit better. There is stretch in the jeans . Nice quality pair to wear with booties.

links_reviews_title: Perfect length for gals with short legs
links_reviews_text: I really liked these jeans. They were a little big in the waist, but fit fine in my thighs and hips. The best part was the length - finally, a pair of jeans for my short legs!
Definitely more cropped than anticipated, also took me a few minutes to actually figure out how it was tied. But liked the outcome. Wore with grey high leggings.
This top is baggy and loose, while being cropped a little too short for my liking. Overall blah

Perfect warm weather top. It's low low cute from the wrap and loose and baggy at the opening-- I can't imagine how you'd ever wear this without showing what you're wearing underneath, so as long as you're prepared for that, it's great. Can throw it on over a bathing suit for a pool party situation or over a bralette or tank. It wasn't very cropped on me at 5'3". I wore it with high waisted shorts and there was no midriff, hit me like 2" below belly button.
I loved this top. The only thing to note is it is a LOT shorter/more of a crop top than the model picture suggests. However, it is cute, flattering, and flirty. I got so many compliments!!
I'm 5'4 and 135 lbs. Glad I ordered the Medium because it was not too skimpy. I didn't end up wearing it because I wasn't brave enough to show my midriff!
Crops pretty high but very wide. You can adjust with the tie. The sleeves & cut of the top is cute.
Cute and versatile top, perfect with a pair of high waisted jeans. Will definitely rent again.

It runs a tad large and is cropped, but looks great with high waisted skinny jeans. I had to use fashion tape to keep the opening in the front from showing all of the goods, otherwise it is super easy to wear.
Lightweight. A little prone to wrinkles. Cropped so it's perfect with high waisted bottoms.
More cropped than expected but went cute with my super high waisted supernova jeans. Only annoying part is the crossover comes undone often but adorable anyway
There was no way I could wear this top. It is very cropped. Nothing like the photo of the model, more like 1/3 if the size.

The top was very cute and the style was loose. I️ did find the length pretty short but wore with mid-rise black fitted pants. Had to wear a bodysuit or camisole underneath as the neckline would have exposed all the goods.

Obviously this is a crop top, but it was very short (a good 3+ inches above my high waisted jeans). I have a longer torso, so maybe this wasn't right for my body type. In theory it's a cute top, it just didn't work for my body.

links_reviews_title: Nice cropped top for the weekend!
links_reviews_text: If you are between sizes, size down! The medium was a little large for me. Worked well with high waisted pants.

Something is really quite off with the fit. I am 5'5, 125 lbs, slim/athletic shaped. Perhaps the side I ordered was too big but it fit like an enormous box while also being WAY too short. If you are similar size to me definitely try an XS and be prepared for a short cropped top! Much shorter than it appeared on the model

I'm big chested so I thought a large would be perfect but if you move the wrong way your bra will 100% be showing. Wish there was an extra button to cover up the cleavage with. Not even sure if the medium would be any better coverage wise.

links_reviews_title: Very flattering. I am usually a sizeM and could have done M but L was loser and more comfortable!

links_reviews_text: This felt more like a bathing suit cover up than a top. Chest was gaping and torso was entirely too short. Not appropriate

love this top! item I've kept the longest yet - had it for ten days and wore it three or four times. so comfy, easy, and versatile. I wore with highwaisted jeans to a concert but also over a bathing suit with pull on shorts. perfect for summer!

It is a cute shirt, because i LOVE all Rails shirts. I got the small, and it was very stretched out. Material is light and thin. It's pretty cropped, too cropped for even the most high waisted jeans, but I am 5'9' with a very long torso. It would be cute if it fit right, but it was short and boxy on me.
It was really cute, but I think I'm a little too old for my midriff to show.
Cute shirt but is pretty short even with a super high waisted pant.
This is super super cute, but just be warned it's super cropped, even with high waisted jeans.
This shirt stopped above my belly button which is not how it looked in the photo! Not sure what happened with it!

links_reviews_title: Wore this for a casual day in Brooklyn with friends
links_reviews_text: Very comfy and cute but a little too cropped

links_reviews_title: So big for my smaller(ish) bust)
links_reviews_text: The button placement for the wrap wasn't adjustable, so it was very loose. I should have gotten a size smaller but having a smaller bust this impossible to wear.
It flatters my hourglass figure.

links_reviews_title: Was perfect for the country concert I wore it to!
links_reviews_text: This is a CROP top, it looks longer on the model than it actually is. Definitely made it difficult to find the right pants, but still really cute!

links_reviews_title: Really cute but prob not best for girls with bigger chests
links_reviews_text: Not sure how I didn't get a pic in this but I really did love it! I was on a cruise and didn't have a safety pin to keep the top closed so I improvised and had to wrap it around twice bc it was a little loose and a little to revealing up top!
Love it
This top is a little shorter than it looks in the stock photo so perfect for high waisted bottoms. The fabric is really soft.
This piece didn't fit me well. It was difficult to put on and I didn't like it.
Super cute and comfy. Even kept it longer to wear for superbowl party. Will also rent again once it gets closer to Summer.
Like the other reviews said this shirt is super cropped! Unlike the stock photos I would have had to wear jeans above my bellybutton to reach this top
Very low cut. I have big boobs, so I had to wear a cami underneath. I liked the style, but it wasn't as stand out as some other rentals. I got lots of compliments.
Very high crop top- that is not ideal for anyone with larger than an a cup bra. Didn't fit well and would ride up all night long

links_reviews_title: This was so cropped it is unwearable
links_reviews_text: too small!

This top looks great on the model but fits a little loose in person. The fabric kept moving around and I noticed that my bra was showing several times when I wore it which made me really uncomfortable. I would not rent or wear this again.
Had to put a safety pin to keep my boobs from falling out, and it overall was a little boxy.
Very low cut and short. Required a tank underneath but was still cute.

Fit great. Snug through the chest and loose everywhere else. I am usually a 10/12 and I ordered the L/ XL. The L fit great, so I never even tried on the XL. There is a slip under which makes the dress slightly heavier, but not see through. I am 5'10" and length fell right above knee. Super cute and casual. Loved for my beach vacation!
Tons of compliments. Soft, breezy cotton. Lined so it's not see through. Adjustable straps. Loved it!
It was perfect for walking around on vacation, was surprised at the length, wasn't too short! Light and airy, fits tru to size. Cute with a. Jean jacket.
Super easy to wear. Can be dressed up or down. Runs a bit big so size down.
Great for the summer and kept me cool
I was very happy with this- a simple, cute sundress. Easy to dress down or up a little with accessories. Even with the loose-fit design, this seemed to run large. Very comfortable and light!

This a perfect casual dress for a vacation. I didn't have anywhere to where it so only wore a few hours one day but loved it! It's slightly oversized but I think runs tts. The straps are adjustable which is a plus. The thread has a little metallic blue in it but it's very subtle and pretty!

links_reviews_title: Runs really large...but so cute. Hate that it didn't work
links_reviews_text: Runs really large...but so cute. Hate that it didn't work
Very easy to wear. Adjustable straps were a big bonus. I added a jean jacket for cooler evening on vacation. It was perfect.
I wore this to get married at the local courthouse! I wanted something flowy, fun and summery and this was the perfect dress. I would love to buy this!

The dress is simple and casual, great for slipping on over a bathing suit while at the beach or the pool. It can also be dressed up with some nice sandals. It's light-weight, perfect for a warm climate. Wore this out to the pool as a cover-up, as well as into town for a quick lunch trip.

Love, love, loved this dress. Can be worn either to beach/pool or dressed up for a casual party. I wore this while on vacation in palm springs. If I were to rent again. I would go a size down although the larger size worked fine. Was just a little large in the bust and I'm 5'8" and 36C.
perfect length, and great for hot days
Loved this flowy dress for vacation and hot weather. It runs a bit big / oversized though.
This dress is so comfortable. Perfect for everyday wear or summer casual night with wedges. It was perfect for my 1 1/2 month post baby pouch. I felt so comfortable and confidant.

links_reviews_title: So so comfortable, loved wearing this around!
links_reviews_text: The material is super soft I wore a small and it was not too big could have worn an xs as well.

links_reviews_title: Super cute beach dress - too casual for any other ocassion!
links_reviews_text: Super cute beach dress - too casual for any other ocassion!
Well-made casual dress with a relaxed, flattering fit.
This dress is very comfortable and good quality. It does run a little big so I wish I had gotten a small.
Loved this cute, comfortable summer dress. It was slightly big, but it was so comfortable and cute for my birthday. Wore it to work and then dressed it up for dinner!
I ended up actually wearing this as a pool cover up in Florida as I forgot one and it was perfect! Comes lined but not too thick.
Great, easy, flowy dress. Perfect for summer days!
Wore this to the boyfriends birthday party and a bachelorette party. The dress basically floats so it let's you taste all the beers and not worry for a second if you look too bloated.

links_reviews_title: Super soft fabric, pretty stripes with delicate metallic blue thread for a subtle extra touch.
links_reviews_text: Love the adjustable straps and flattering length. Long enough without feeling frumpy. Perfect summer coverup or beachy dress.
Great dress!
This is a super cute dress but felt a little long for me. Perfect for a day at the pool/beach.
This is a great summer dress! It can be dressed up or down!

links_reviews_title: Wore for Memorial Day cookout and karaoke at night (with a jacket).
links_reviews_text: Can be dressed up and down. Very comfortable, soft fabric but still looked cute. Total win!
The dress I received looked like it had been put in a washing machine and lost all of its color. Aside from it not being the right color, it certainly fits like a nightgown.

This dress is so pretty! I have no idea what the other reviewers are talking about when they say it looks like a nightgown! It's not tight but just fitted enough to be comfy but give you some shape. Lightweight, soft material. I wore it to work and got tons of compliments! Would keep longer but it's not easy to nurse/pump in....which I figured from the pics....but had to try it anyway!

This dress was so lightweight - perfect for a hot, humid day. It was loose but I didn't find it unflattering. The quality was actually better than I had expected. I decided that, on me at least, it looked better without cinching the drawstring at the waist or tying the neckline in a bow.
I love this dress! It was perfect to wear on a crazy hot day in the city. So lightweight and I love the pastel tie dye !!

links_reviews_title: Really felt like I was wearing a grandma nightgown
links_reviews_text: Loved the concept- but really made me feel dowdy - the material and ribbons were exactly like a night dress and there wasn't much shape to it....
I wore this dress on my cruise to the Bahamas. It is the perfect cover up for a bathing suit or just lounging in around the ship. I loved the color of this dress. It is very Wendy from Peter Pan.
Adorable and super fun! Such a comfy daily option.

So I was so excited when I saw this dress was available to rent, because I saw lindsilanestyle in it and I needed this dress. It was everything and more. The softest material ever and still looks so good. The tie dye is there but not screaming in your face. I received so many compliments on it. My mom loved it so much she rented it as well because it's that cute!
Comfortable and fit true to size
Very cute and received a lot of compliments. The material is very soft. It did remind me a little of a nightgown when I first saw it, but very cute on!

Was so excited to get this dress, the colors are beautiful but it looked like I stole my grandmothers night gown. Very matronly looking. Tried adding a white leather jacket and still ended up returning

links_reviews_title: looks like a nightgown, didnt end up wearing
links_reviews_text: looks like a nightgown, didnt end up wearing

I was very excited to try this piece but when I tried it on I thought it looked frumpy, and messy. Maybe it work for a night gown or even a beach cover up at best but it is certainly not suitable for everyday.

Wanted to love this! The faded tie-dye is so cute and length is perfect but it just looked too much like a nightgown. Think a belt could help tone down the nightgown vibe. Has a looser fit, beautiful fabric!
my husband actually loved this but I didn't feel great in it - felt a little awkward. But I did get lots of compliments.

You would think it would be kind of plain but I loved it. It's actually so detailed with the expert tailoring I can expect from this brand. One of the few times I think it looks cuter on me than the model. Wore w olive green tights, it did ride up sometimes when I also had my coat on. Lots of compliments- easy to wear all day. 38 was perfect size for me, looked slim but not tight and no gaping for my larger chest. Would rent Again esp when I can go without tights.
Maybe my favorite rental ever (excuse the horrible picture) - I loved the length of the dress and the detail. It was definitely a subtle showstopper. Will rent again!
Oversized fit. I wore with brown tights and brown knee high boots. Very very easy to wear.

Wore it to the space center with grey tights and tennies, and to a charity breakfast with bare legs and flats. The sleeves look cute down or rolled up and are nice and long. I was worried about the length and the slit showing too much leg, but it was perfect. Mixed reviews from others: My hubby said I looked like I had my nightshirt on. My daughter said I looked like an "old time detective " because of the color/pattern, and BFF said totally on trend. I loved it!

This had been in my hearts for a while as a potential basic dress for work, but as someone who usually wears a lot of bright colors and patterns, I wasn't super pumped about it. However, I ended up really liking it. It was crisp and flattering for a day at work, and super comfy. I would buy this if it wasn't so expensive!
Wore to work with black slip-ons, was thinking about wearing white sneakers, that would have been cute too. High quality with cute pleat detail on chest area
I wore this 3 times while I had it which I never do! Wore it to a bridal luncheon, birthday party and work. I would've bought it if I could justify how expensive it is :)
Great dress!! Comfortable, lots of room. Nice fabric. Will rent again for sure!
Comfortable fit, Roomy but stylish. Received many compliments for this beautiful dress.
I liked this for a casual work outfit

links_reviews_title: Everything looks good on me obviously
links_reviews_text: This dress is intimidating but I promise you it gives you comfort and confidence like nothing you ever felt. Wore with flat brown leather knee boots. It fits perfect everywhere perfect for cooler weather. Quality fabric and detail. Stand out in a very discreet way. Ready to wear and perfect in every way. Arrived new with tags, I'm impressed and now I'm addicted!

links_reviews_title: I absolutely loved this dress and I would definitely rent it again.

links_reviews_text: Lovely, tiny houndsooth print that is hard to see in pics. Such a fun and comfortable dress. Highly recommended
This is one of the best things I've rented. It's very comfortable and stylish. I wore it for work, date night, and church. I received a lot of complements.

links_reviews_title: Nice quality and fun style, just do large that I didn't end up wearing it.
links_reviews_text: I ordered the larger of my potential sizes and it was way too big, didn't end up wearing it.
Dress is roomy and cute but the sleeves were way too long, perhaps a smaller size would have worked better
cute
I love this damn dress. It somehow feels tailored even= though it's completely oversized. The suiting material is crisp and refined the pleating is awesome. goddamn i wish i could keep it.
A bit boxy but great with tights and heels. Very comfortable
Runs a bit large. Unique cut.

I had people stop me in the airport and ask where I got the dress! Its a shirt dress, runs loose but I purposely wore it looks - makes the dress look very sophisticated. The pin tuck details in the front and the material itself are so so eye catching in a very understated way. The sleeves are huge, so I prefer rolling them up. I wore them with dark brown (tall) ankle boots.

links_reviews_title: I would buy this. Pretty slight sheen because of great quality. Very comfortable and doesn’t wrinkle
links_reviews_text: I wore this to an out of state work site visit. The shirt dress fabric is great quality. It does not wrinkle easily. It’s roomy, but doesn’t look boxy and fit is flattering around upper body.
I brought on a trip. Really cute and easy with boots
Dress arrived with tags still in it and I so wanted this to work. It was just TOO shapeless. And i like a dress that's not too structured. Maybe the next size down would have been better.
Many compliments and very comfortable.
The sleeves were a nice twist on a basic black coat. Think i might size down the next time but overall liked it!

links_reviews_title: Great bell sleeves and good for temps 38+
links_reviews_text: I loved this jacket so much I almost bought it. The length is perfect and the bell sleeves made me feel so dressed up! I wore all over Paris in December and it was between 35-50 degrees every day. I did get a little cold below 38 FYI so if you rent check the weather!! Will rent again. Don't mind the cheesin pic... I had 2.5 seconds to run into the frame when no one was in front of the Eiffel Tower and had to throw my hair up.
Over a red dress was the perfect cost. The sleeves were fun. The cut excellent and the fabric warm without being too heavy
Overall I liked this coat. My problem is that while it fit me fairly nicely in the shoulders, it was oversized in the body. I think it looked better open and not closed
Love this jacket! Wanted to keep it. Much lighter than expected, but kept me plenty warm. The sleeves were also a nice touch. Very stylish. Also, can't go wrong with pockets.

Such a beautiful coat! Definitely flattering and feminine, and can be worn with nice outfits/dresses or everyday wear. It's not insanely warm, but wore a sweater beneath it and a scarf (aka, my outfit in the picture) and withstood 30-ish degree temperatures fine.
Pretty coat and the Bella sleeves are fun. It came with a hike near the locker but it was only noticeable to me. It's not a heavy coat all all more fashionable then for weather.

I love this coat. It has a beautiful shape. It's lighter material than I expected, so it's not super warm (which is fine for Texas winters) and it hangs really nicely. The texture is almost like fine cowhide. It does have pockets, which I didn't notice at first. I've worn it to date night and to work, and I'm dreading sending it back.
Really enjoyed this rental, goes with everything, and the flared sleeve made it super unique and stylish. Sad to give it back!
This coat made my work outfit feel complete. It fit true to size, and not too tight. I wore a loose graphic tee under it and it didn't bulk under the coat sleeves. Very sophisticated.
Fun sleeves flattering fit. Loved this coat
Loved this coat so much I rented it the tan color. Very soft material. Nicely designed
Love the sleeves and got compliments on them. The jacket is lined but not very warm at all.

The sleeves are a really nice touch that make the jacket look sophisticated but can get rolled up or become awkward because they're so big (ex. holding onto above subway pole in NYC). It was lighter than I thought, paired with a hat, gloves, and scarf it was reasonable in NYC cold but made me wish the V wasn't so deep. Probably better in 40deg weather.

links_reviews_title: Great coat! Received tons of compliments!
links_reviews_text: Light weight coat and very flattering
Loved the bell sleeves and cut of the coat. Would have kept it longer but weather is getting colder and it's not quite warm enough.
I rented it to wear outdoors on top of other clothes. It looks great, but I froze. Not intended for anew England winters weather!
Elegant and versatile. Others said it was big however it is great for layering over sweaters. Would rent again in a heartbeat.
Unfortunately, I didn't get a photo of myself in it. I LOVED this coat! It's as if Stevie Nicks was premiering a coat during NY Fashion Week. It's classy, bold, and just a touch witchy.
Fit was great, sleeves added to the style. Didn't wear it, looked over worn

links_reviews_title: slightly witchy arms, just in time for Halloween
links_reviews_text: This beautiful, Fall-weight coat fits perfectly and is made of soft stretchy material. The sleeves are long and dramatic. I do feel a bit as if I should be attend a Quidditch match in this coat.
Was too big on the hips makes you look fat

links_reviews_title: Beautiful classic cut and style . The 42 was a little big even on my broad shoulders
links_reviews_text: heavier weight than I thought - limited to wearing between fall and winter
looked better on the model, just not for me
Fit perfectly and was very classy.
While it was pretty, it felt too big and too small at the same time. The arms were tight, but the sleeves were long. Very classic looking.
this is a test
It was fine. Cool sleeves but forgettable
Love this- wore it a bunch of times. The sleeves are a little long but you get used to it.
Good for spring or fall. Stand out coat. Fit perfectly. True to size.

links_reviews_title: Great for cold spring weather - dressy or work.
links_reviews_text: Got it to wear put with a cocktail dress but then ended up wearing it to work the next week! Style is great and it is a prefect traditional Coat - warm but not too warm.

links_reviews_title: Perfect light winter coat for everyday--bell sleeves are amazing touch & add fun touch to every look
links_reviews_text: This coat is beautiful, delicate, playful, and gorgeously soft. Bell sleeves are awesome; quality is unmatched; hangs beautifully. Did not find to be oversized, as many reviews said. Think it fits exactly as intended. So luxurious. Get it!

Love this coat and the bell sleeve. It looks lovely. If you are looking for a warm coat for truly cold temps, this is not the one for you. I've gotten quite a few compliments this winter, but I would advise you to keep looking if you need something for severe temps.
Coat fit well and detail of the bell sleeves makes it interesting. However, it's more of a thin felted fleece then it is a wool coat, which I expected.
Cute jacket! But didn't love it. Wore it for work - perhaps didn't have it paired with the right thing.

links_reviews_title: So much fun. Like a hyphy Stevie Nicks in the office casting hexes on my exes.
links_reviews_text: TBH, would definitely buy. DL also carries in camel.
Beautiful sleek silhouette, gorgeous sleeves. I work to NYC for a series of events and it was perfect. Comfortable and uber chic.

links_reviews_title: I didn't wear it but, it was cute when I tried it on.
links_reviews_text: Fit was good, cute.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous details set this apart from other black coats - great dressy or makes jeans look amazing!
links_reviews_text: Great jacket, not too heavy but adds a good layer of warmth. The sleeve detail is gorgeous and really makes this coat, but I have such short arms it did not work for me - Too long.
Nice fit

Pros: comfortable; big pockets; stylish; can be worn sooo many ways! Cons: slightly big. I enjoy a loose fit, but may size down when I rent again (and I WILL be renting these again!) At 5’3” I can wear them with flats but just barely... if you are any shorter, then plan on wearing heels or cuffing Takeaway: one of my favorite pairs of work pants ever!

links_reviews_title: Cute but bigger than I expected
links_reviews_text: The pants were very stylish but they are definitely wide leg when I was expecting more of a tapered look. They were also long on me so I cuffed them once. Overall cute but possibly size down and better for tall people? (5'9" and above possibly)

They're not without their faults, but I really loved these pants - I felt so stylish at work, but they were also incredibly comfortable. It's definitely true that they run large and probably have way too much fabric around the crotch, but I was so comfy that I didn't mind. There is some wrinkling, but I didn't think it was too bad.
I normally am a size 6 so was pleasantly surprised that the size 4 fit. I think they would look better on someone taller than 5'5" and has long legs. I felt kind of dumpy in them.
These pants would have been so cute and comfortable. I followed the sizing instructions in the app and reviews but they were huge. Too bad

Comfortable. Trendy. Loved wearing these. I think a size 4 would have got better than the 6 I stick with but that didn't stop me from wearing these. Wanted to buy but they are a bit out of my price range. Will rent again.
Wrinkles very easily but still loved them with the wrinkles. Will rent again

links_reviews_title: I was blown away by the easy and friendly process to rent clothes

links_reviews_text: Runs big, I'm reordering in a smaller size. Just a fun, casual, easy to wear look. Wore them playing tourist in Houston.

I have a super curvy booty, and I loved these pants! I felt so chic in them, and found so many beautiful tops to tuck into them. Hit me right at my ankle and were the perfect transition pants into fall. They're still a little spendy, even with the discount, otherwise I'd totally buy them. I always go up a size in pants from my dress size, and these were slightly slacked after a few hours wear.
These could have been super cute just need to order a size smaller. They run very big!
So cute and comfy!
Super comfy! Cuffed the bottom and they were great for a casual summer look
these fit great , super high waist, really comfortable. i'm 5'10 and they hit right at my ankle
