Like other reviewers stated, size up one whole size. I am a solid size 6 and the size 8 worked great! This is a beautiful, classy dress and I received a bunch of compliments! It really highlights the shoulders.
The only con for me is the color was muted for my color skin tone.

links_reviews_title: Tight on the ribs. not flattering on straight/athletic build.
links_reviews_text: Ended up not wearing this based on the tightness around the ribs and generally unflattering fit. I'm an athletic build with wide shoulders/chest/ribs and am relatively small chested. Overall proportions just didn't work for me. That said, it was well constructed and a neat take on a work staple. Would probably work better on a more hourglass body type. It sized up for chestier straight/athletic builds.
Fit was great and found the dress to be flattering on my figure.
I have rented this dress several times and it shows off all the results from shoulder and arm workouts. Just the right length for work if you are on the taller side.
Loved this dress. Wore it twice. Got so many compliments! Fit perfect and the neck detail is amazing.

This dress was so chic and I got so many compliments on it! The neck was a little tight (like some other reviewers mention) but I found it just forced me to have good posture all day. I didn't have a problem with tightness in the bodice but I'm more petite on top. 2 fit perfectly. Was very tempted to buy and Can't wait to rent again!

I loved the fit and design of this dress. The dress hit me below the knee, which was appropriate when visiting a more formal office environment. While I also loved the high-neck and sleeveless cut, I didn't love those with a suit jacket... which was necessary in 20-degree weather. I am trying to figure out another way to style this dress so that it works through the winter as I liked everything else about it.

links_reviews_title: sexy and work appropriate. felt very chic!
links_reviews_text: form fitting. even at 5 ft, the length was very flattering.
Fit tts. Requires racerback bra (or acceptance of cardigan to cover bra straps).
Great dress for work and after work events. I got complements all day and felt like a badass lawyer all day long. Relatively comfortable and modest while still being amazing
Loved everything about it. Fit like a glove and was extremely comfortable. Will definitely rent again.
A little snug for my taste. The material does not have too much give. The pattern of the material is very complimentary.

links_reviews_title: super fit and form in a classy pattern.
links_reviews_text: the neck is a little tight but it works. wore it with a black belt to accentuate the waist and that was great.
Pretty dress but runs small. Also the dress was torn on the left seam, did not wear.

links_reviews_title: The dress fit like a glove. Lovely accent of my figure
links_reviews_text: Found the fit to be perfect. The style is quite nice. Wore it with boots and pumps, works great. Light weight fabric and very breathable.
Love this dress. Very form fitting but in a good way. Wish I had sizes up to have a little more room but even snug, dress was comfortable and looked great.

links_reviews_title: Great dress as long as you are okay with this neckline
links_reviews_text: This is a nice dress - a pretty pattern and good length for me (5'7") - but you have to be okay with the distinctive neckline. I didn't want to stand out as much as I felt the dress did, so I didn't wear it. (That's more a comment on me than the dress, however.) I chose an 8 vs. 6 and am glad I did - the dress is a fitted sheath.
Pretty form fitting but flattering.

links_reviews_title: My 77 yr old mom said it was stunning, and though a little sexy was great for a big work meeting
links_reviews_text: Fit like a glove and extremely flattering - 5'8", 143 pounds - I wore it with a two inch wide belt and a blazer. Took the blazer off when outside the meeting room for a more relaxed and gorgeous look

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for hard to transition to time of year: summer to fall. Professional, yet feminine!
links_reviews_text: The dress fits like perfectly if you have an hourglass shape. Tons of compliments and fabric is lightweight enough for summer weather, but has a fall vibe.

I loved this dress. The fabric is soft and comfortable and the top is unique. The print is perfect for a fall work look. I wore it with black sandals and no jacket and then again with pumps and a leather jacket.
a bit tight in the neck but very flattering

Rented this for a special Valentine's date night. Wanted to take things up a notch but not look like I was trying too hard. It was perfect! I'm a 6 or 8 in a top. Went for a 6 bc I knew it would look a mess if it was too roomy. It fit like a glove. The slit in the sleeves is a fun detail and also means you can eat dinner without your sleeves dragging in your plate. Would also be fantastic styled with a black skirt for a more elegant occasion.
Great top with interesting detail. It was perfect to elevate the jeans I was wearing into something appropriate for a party.

Wore this out in Vegas. I was nervous about how this top would fit (especially my chest, 34F) so I ordered a larger size (12 vs 10). But it worked out ok. I have broader shoulders so that was fine but it was a little large in the waist area. Thankfully, the silk tie helped hide and tailor my waist-line. The material was also good quality and heavier like a proper blazer. Happy overall.

links_reviews_title: Felt like a super women uniform
links_reviews_text: Recieved tons of compliments. Incredible quality and fit!

links_reviews_title: Great for a work night out -
links_reviews_text: A little short (I have a long torso ) and with high jeans

I rented as a backup item in case the dress I chose didn't work out. The top is a feminine version of a tuxedo jacket with a draping neckline and sleeves that drape open at forearm/elbow area that allow them to hang elegantly. Unfortunately, it's designed for someone with more of slim, hourglass shape at the waist and hip, as the material has no stretch. If you're wide-hipped, would not recommend.

links_reviews_title: Lots of compliments! Out to a concert and date night
links_reviews_text: Wish I got a 4 or maybe a 2, was a little large on the waist and sholders for my body type but I dont know why I ordered a 6 in the first place so that was my bad. Love it though! Holding onto it for a bit longer instead of exchanging right away.

links_reviews_title: Size up if in between sizes!
links_reviews_text: Loved this skirt!! It's a bit tight so if you don't like anything tight on your waist size up! Got lots of compliments!

This skirt fit well and is super cute. I liked the thicker material and the print. Only wish it had pockets. Unfortunately I did not realize just how sparkly it is! I rented this for work and thinking the brocade was more of a cream. My office is more on the casual side and this felt a bit too much for everyday so I didn't end up wearing it. Would definitely consider renting for a dinner out or work holiday party.
Fit nice, flattering and got tons of compliments! Great for office holiday party and holidays in general!
Loved this for a December day! Looks like tinsel and is adorable to wear for a Christmas party! Size 4 fit comfortably on me as a high waisted skirt.
A larger size was suggested and it was too big. Order in your true size.
Gorgeous skirt, high waisted - very flattering! More gold/sparkly than in pictures. Definitely a bold choice during the work day, but was perfect for my holiday party!

links_reviews_title: Great rental. Pictures do not do this justice.
links_reviews_text: Great skirt for festive occasion. Perfect for the upcoming holidays. If I had to choose one complaint it would be that the material is a bit stiff. For reference: I am 5'4" tall, 129 pounds, 27 inch waist and 37 inch hips. I generally wear either a four or a six. The six fit perfect.
Lovely fabric with a good fit. It's shiny in real life but not crazy shiny. Goes well with a black top if you want to tone it down.
This skirt could be worn any time of the year and in just one wear I had 6 strangers give me compliments. Great skirt!
This skirt was shiny and a different texture than I expected, but it was comfortable when I ended up going on a work event that night.

links_reviews_title: Felt like I was wearing upholstery
links_reviews_text: Through no fault of its own I did not care for this skirt. I felt like a giant sofa. This did not flatter me at all. Tried my best to style it. Did so so. I needed a plainer sweater. It was fun to try something I wouldn't normally wear, which is what rtr is all about, but this will go back on Monday with no regrets. I've seen other reviews mention runs small. I don't think so. I'm a true size 8 and that's what this was. While there's no give, the size is accurate. I could comfortably move and exhale. I think this style would look best on someone with a different body type than mine. We did have a fun evening out to dinner though!

links_reviews_title: I NEED this skirt! (You do too!)
links_reviews_text: I loved this skirt (and I'm picky about skirts). I wore to work and felt like it worked well, though this could easily be a special occasion piece with the heavy brocade fabric. I didn't feel overdressed wearing it more casually though. I would rent again, or might even buy someday! See all of my rentals and how I wore them on my YouTube channel (Pointe Boutique).

links_reviews_title: Be ready to get a bunch of compliments
links_reviews_text: Absolutely loved this skirt! i got so many compliments. it's the perfect skirt for work or for an event. i would definitely rent it again.

The skirt is so pretty in person with very nice details! It holds a nice shape and the fabric is somewhat stiff. I could've sized down to a 0 but the 2 fit fine. The seams on the bottom have a really nice ruffle-like detail.

The fit is for someone with an hourglass figure. The hips were generously sized but the waist was too tight for me to zip all the way. Solved by wearing the shirt untucked. The fabric is a very sparkly brocade, so went low-key on the accessories. A fun piece.
Perfect A-line shape and the fabric was thick and exquisite. Tons of compliments on this one!
Nice shape. Cool pattern.

Though this skirt runs a bit small in the waist, it fit perfectly everywhere else and I'm truly in love with it. Planning the hit the gym just one extra day per week so I can buy this bad boy. It's much shinier in person than you'd expect. I paired it with a black, ALC sweater and a pair of black nylons.

links_reviews_title: Cute, but not perfect for a bod with a belly
links_reviews_text: I loved the skirt, made me feel super confident. However, the skirt itself was a little on the itchy side, and it didn't quite fit my body shape.
Intricate pattern. Skirt made from a shimmery, high quality material. Nice, forgiving fit. I'm 5'10 and the length was perfect for work.

links_reviews_title: Super cute!! Not too much sparkle for normal day at the office!
links_reviews_text: Could add a big necklace to spruce up for a nice occasion. I will be renting this again if available for holiday parties

links_reviews_title: Nice fit, shinier than you think
links_reviews_text: Nice fitting A line skirt. Well made, slight flounce detail at bottom. The pictures online don't pick up how metallic it is but with black sweater and tights it looked right for the office. Comfortable and a flattering, work appropriate length.
Paired this with all black tights shoes and a tight long sleeve shirt and LOVED the look. Perfect for work. Apologies for not getting a head on shot- this was all we took!
A little tight on the top but very cute

I'm usually a 4 if it's a high waisted skirt and 6 was pushing it especially after eating and drinking! Refer to my measurements though. Wore to a NYE party and received so many compliments. Figure flattering and good length. I have short torso and this was sitting right below my rib cage. Beautiful fit just tighter than I expected. I would still go with a 6 if I rented again.

This skirt was absolutely perfect for the holidays. I wore it to a couple different holiday parties and received tons of compliments! It's shinier than the picture with shades of gold and silver. It fit TTS and flared out slightly making it very flattering. For reference, I'm 5'9" and the skirt started at my natural waist and hit at mid-thigh level. I paired this with a black turtleneck, tights, and booties. I could have paired this with a red or white top as well - it's super versatile. Overall, I loved it and will certainly rent again!

The skirt is very pretty. I received lots of compliments. But it is a bit tight and the material does not stretch. A bigger size would feel more comfortable. The skirt is so beautiful that I may want to buy it.

This skirt is perfect for any occasion, I've worn it with heels to a cocktail party and with cowboy boots to a western event! I wear a 6 and this fit perfectly. The way it photographs is just gorgeous. The details are actually bronze with silver lining but it photographs a striking gold

links_reviews_title: This skirt's multi-faceted. I wore it to my Alumni Advisory Board & out to the bars that same night
links_reviews_text: Sparkly, beautiful skirt that completes any look!

I hadn't scrolled through enough of the photos of this skirt to realize it was this shiny gold/silver brocade. I paired it for work with a black turtleneck, tights, and ankle boots. Compliments all day long! I see that other reviewers think this was sized small but I didn't think so. It fit perfectly. It is a little on the shorter side and something about the cut makes it ride up a bit when you sit- you have to be careful. But it's a stunner- I'll be renting it again!

links_reviews_title: My company was hosting an event in Vegas. The skirt was the perfect hybrid of Vegas and Professional
links_reviews_text: The skirt runs SMALL - like 2 sizes smaller than you would expect. It is super shiny and just stunning - everyone loved it. Because of it how small it runs - I didn't sit down the whole night. I would pair it with gold jewelry, not silver - but both colors really pop.
Didn't wear it because it was too shiny for work.

perfect length and almost perfect fit. since i usually have problems with my large booty fitting in skirts, i went a size up. it was just a touch too big, but still looked bomb. i felt like a very put together mod queen in this outfit.
This does run tight in the hips and has no stretch so definitely size up. It's so high waisted that it will just be a little longer. Super fun and pretty skirt
Love this skirt and I wore it several ways. Dressed up and down. Versatile and flattering!
Fits a little large at the waist but snug at the hips for an hourglass figure. Overall fits ok. I Still I really enjoyed wearing the skirt, it was nice to add a bit of shine and glam to my workday
fits like a glove, it's a little short for my fellow tall ladies. still worth wearing to work! perfect for an evening event though
This skirt is so pretty! I loved how the thread was super shiny and sparkly. It made a great option for work. The skirt runs sooooo small though. I'm usually a 6 and probably could have used a 10.

links_reviews_title: I paired with a Diane Von Furstenberg bell sleeve top from RTR and it was a really fabulous look!
links_reviews_text: The skirt has no give so order a size or 2 up! It will ride up if you sit all day at work. It it is so gorgeous and exactly how it's pictured! I got a lot of compliments at the office wearing this skirt and my friends on I IG and FB loved it too!
Wore to work. Shimmery but appropriate! Would rent again.

links_reviews_title: Cut large and not super flattering
links_reviews_text: Definitely go down 1-2 sizes from your normal size. I'm a 6/8, rented a small and ended up with a lot of extra fabric at the waist. Because it was a little baggy I didn't find it to be flattering on me. Might overwhelm on a smaller frame.
I coincidentally wore this the same day as my office Halloween party and could definitely pass for a witch in this dress. Or a funeral attendee

I am usually a small in a top and a 4 on the bottom and this dress was big in the waist. I thought the dress just hung on me and didn't give me any shape so I didn't wear it. Maybe if you are more busty this dress might fit differently. Also it's a long midi, I am 5'8.
Really cute and comfortable, but definitely runs large. Would have been a lot more flattering had I sized down to an XSR.

This dress looks amazing in the photo above, however when I put it on I felt like I was a new-age teacher in an episode of Little House on the Prairie. I do believe that this would be an amazing fit on someone else, and it is really great quality, but just was not a "fit" for me. The fit was great from the waist down, but where the waist hit on me didn't quite hit in the right spot.

links_reviews_title: Nothing special but still got compliments.
links_reviews_text: Nice material, fits a little big, I thought it was too baggy but people loved it.
Like this dress, but nothing super special about it. Fit better than the average work dress. So 4 stars! Good for women with big chests.

This is a lovely wellcut dress in good silky fabric with nice buttons. Figure flattering and forgiving of extra hip baggage. Serious enough for a funeral but alsook for work; but not stuffy or fussy looking. Perfect if you want to look serious but unobtrusive.
I wore this dress to a family gathering. It was super comfortable has pockets which is always a plus. Runs pretty large so be mindful of that when ordering.

links_reviews_title: Really cute. Fits great but I'm more athletic and broad shouldered than your average medium.

links_reviews_text: A great base for fun accessories (I broke out my hot pink velvet bow flats), and an easy fit that was comfortable at work all day. Appreciated the pockets!

links_reviews_title: Pretty dress, runs small and seams itchy
links_reviews_text: The dress was a little tight on the bust and waist, but definitely still looked nice. The buttons are closely spaced so gaping want an issue. For some reason the seams felt itchy.

links_reviews_title: Beautifully made dress in fun color
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress. It fit perfectly, and the color is great. The only problem is the hem wouldn't stay up. I alerted RTR.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful color, so so fit. Maybe best for pears?
links_reviews_text: This color is gorgeous and I received new w tags. The top and waist fit me well, but. Needed a size smaller in the hips. I'm 36-38 DDD, and the dress covered me well. I might try a size lower if I ever rent again. Nice weight material, no stretch.

I wore this for an event as work and loved it. Got a ton of compliments. The color is really pretty in person. I love the neck line and the flare at the hips. I'm 5'6" and it hit me just below the knees. Normally a size 14 and sized up to a 16. Happy that I did. I liked the look and feel of a little room.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for an hour glass shape
links_reviews_text: This dress is a lovely blue. It has an adorable shape for the top, but the bottom is just so big! I'm a true 14 and this dress fit great on top, but seemed like a 16 on the bottom. I still wore it, but would have loved it more if it fit just a little better. The fabric is a great weight if you live in colder climates.

Great dress, very elegant. Wore to work and got a ton of compliments. I sized up as it's a British brand (wore a 6 whereas in US brands I typically wear a 4). There was some extra material around my hips, but fit everywhere else was great. Would rent again. Cute details on the shoulders.

The fit was true to size, but I had extra room in the bottom half. Top fit perfectly. The quality of the fabric and stitching detail made it luxurious. If I owned it, I'd take the length up to the knee, but didn't mind the slightly longer length. Definitely would rent again.
nothing memorable, but a solid dress

links_reviews_title: Didn't wear it, only tried it on. Good quality garment, beautiful fabric.
links_reviews_text: Very comfortable.

links_reviews_title: This dress is very tailored with a beautiful stitching detail along the neckline.
links_reviews_text: Unfortunately it was not really my style with the sleeves and neckline when I tried it on. The arms felt a little difficult to move in. I didn't feel comfortable. It was a little stiff and fit me funny across the back/shoulder and under the sleeves. it was loose and tight in the wrong places.
Great color. Good length for work and also looks nice for evening out after work. I like the 3/4 sleeves too. Wore is several times - once with tall boots.
Love the dress but too small.

I could tell this is a gorgeous dress, it just didn't fit me right anywhere. It was puffy in all the wrong places. Maybe if I had sized down it would have worked better. But I'm struggling with yoyo-ing on 5 lbs right now, so the size I order is always dicey.

links_reviews_title: Great for hourglass and pear shaped ladies
links_reviews_text: Fit beautifully! ! As a pear shape, this dress fit (and disguised) my, ahem, assets well. Multiple compliments. Highly recommend.

links_reviews_title: Chic event dress for the office!
links_reviews_text: The fit is true to size, and the color is more catching in person. Slight gathering that causes puffing at the top of the sleeve is a detail to make the sleeve interesting enough; v-neckline is modest enough for the office yet also accents the collarbone and chest. A gathered waist makes this dress figure-friendly. I will definitely order again!

links_reviews_title: Stunning color. Runs way large. Proportions around the arm are weird.
links_reviews_text: Order one size down
Great
I was swimming in the dress. I would be willing to try it in a smaller size because the color was quite lovely.

links_reviews_title: Runs small and color is more turquoise
links_reviews_text: On the model, the blue looks subdued and elegant. In person, the color is much brighter and more turquoise. It also runs small, esp on the hips. Returning without wearing. A pity, because the fabric seems to be nice and thick, and the lining good quality.
Quality of this dress was wonderful! It's clearly well made and looks that way.

links_reviews_title: Fit my 5 month bump perfectly. Wore it to a brunch with family and dressed down to work.
links_reviews_text: Loved the fit, hugging but not tight.
It was so comfortable to wear and looked great, can dress it up or dress it down
na
Iiked-did not love. Fun for weekend day, too body con for work.
Cute and comfortable. Fit like a glove. Color tones down once you accessorize it
You will not be disappointed! Beyond comfortable and so chic. The material is also the perfect thickness. Highly recommend
Planned to wear over the weekend. Material is very thin and shows everything. I did like the idea of the dress. Will probably try for something similar that is more substantial.
The dress is very cute on the picture but it is like too big and it's a medium. The size I usually wear. I have not worn it yet and just tried it on.
This dress is super warm and comfortable. I enjoyed wearing it to work and then out to dinner with my husband.

links_reviews_title: Great dress, but is a plus size brand
links_reviews_text: Super comfortable, great material, just didn't realize it's a brand that sizes on a plus size scale.

The dress was a hit! I received so many compliments. Material felt good against my skin, the fit of the skirt portion was perfect. The sweater like top was a little too big. Overall I enjoyed the piece.
Loved this dress for work! Got so many compliments, def would pair it with a turtle neck for the winter.

The fit is a little on the loose side in the chest, but I think it's due to the heavy-ish fabric. It's not problematic though. Overall, I like the dress. Great for work, a night out, or a weekend party.
Fun dress with a great flow! Can be dressed up or down

Loved this dress for a client meeting. The top was a little big, maybe the straps were stretched or fit someone with a longer torso. Had to try a few different bras to find one that didn't show, in the front, under the arms, and back — but once I solved that, smooth sailing. Smoothing shapewear helped with the clinginess, but the fabric is luscious and I felt great all day long.

links_reviews_title: CUTE - boobs and flat tummy needed
links_reviews_text: Mostly TTS. But the dress/material is quality and heavy. Not heavy in a warm way but heavy enough that unless you have boobs to hold this baby up, the dress seems to pull down and lose the cinched waist look. The elastic waist helps keep it cinched but I could have used a natural waist belt to keep it up and true to form. Period bloat? Big lunch? Drink a gallon of water a day? Then be prepared for a bit of stomach pooch as this material shows all. Pattern, quality and design are top notch - highly recommend for slightly taller and bustier women. I'm 5,5, 32B, 125 lbs

links_reviews_title: Classy, beautiful material, fun; I LOVED it!
links_reviews_text: It's hard to find a dress that shows off your figure without showing the whole package. This was so classy and cute, but still draped around all the right areas! Love it, wish I could buy it!

links_reviews_title: Pair with a cropped sweater and some boots for a fall look!
links_reviews_text: This was super cute. Ran large particularly on the top (long straps) and wish it had pockets but paired with a sweater boots and fanny pack and you're solid.

links_reviews_title: Preppy summer dress with a bit of an odd fit
links_reviews_text: The dress was a beautiful pattern and a nice fabric with a good weight to it. As others have noted, the torso is oddly long, making the proportions on this dress a bit hard to work with. I paired it over a white shirt to make it more work appropriate (it dips in the back) and removed the shirt post work. Overall, would rent again. If you don't mind it being more form fitting then you can take a size down, I would take XL next time (I typically get 16 in Tanya Taylor and they're a bit loose).
Fits a bit large

Very soft and stretchy fabric but runs a bit big. Received so many compliments for my work meeting. Would've given 5 stars but the straps were huge and I needed to tie the dress straps with a hair tie in order stay up. Would size down next time.
Great little dress to cheer up an ordinary Monday. Super comfortable lightweight knit material. Super tempted to buy!

Extremely flattering, loved the material, so comfortable to wear. My only regret was not renting a size small. The medium was slightly too big on top and the soft fabric slightly stretches. Never wrinkled though! For reference I'm a 34 D bust.

links_reviews_title: Wore with a black blazer. Looked fantastic.

links_reviews_text: Great for a weekend event. Casual chic. The body and straps were a little long for shorter frame . Got lots of compliments

Very classy dress. Quality of the sweater was very nice. I am 5'4" and found the Med size large. The shoulder straps were extremely long and kept falling off my shoulders. I ended wearing a light weight white chambray jacket tied so that kept it in place. Other than that, I found the dress very pretty. Hit right below the knee/midi style
The dress was a bit big for me on top because I'm not very busty but fit perfect everywhere else
I have no waist and it was just terrible

links_reviews_title: lovely dress easy fit and comfortable
links_reviews_text: great fit
I loved this dress! I will definitely get again but size down next time!
Loved the dress and it was super flattering. The top straps were pretty loose.
Loved this dress. Looked great and very comfortable for a hot and hectic first day of school! I still looked great at dismissal!
The straps were a little long, making the plunge a little more than I usually prefer. But this was a great dress to wear with a cardigan and transition perfectly from work to post-work drinks.

links_reviews_title: Such a pretty dress, but definitely size down!
links_reviews_text: This is a beautifully made dress, and perfect for fall bc it's a little thicker than it may appear in photos. That said, it runs large, so definitely size down!

I received so many compliments on this. I paired with a wide wrap belt and a black blazer. Was both clean and fun. I read reviews that the bust was a bit big, and it was, but I think that the belt helped.
Complimentary fit!
Was comfortable and flattering what more can a girl ask for
Fit perfectly and was a great material
Too big all over. Fabric was nice and light.

links_reviews_title: Nice dress for church and work
links_reviews_text: Dress ran a little large. I rented a 1X and an XL probably would have fit better. Love the colors and style

links_reviews_title: Stripes are great but need a longer torso!
links_reviews_text: Love love the color and idea but despite the XS size, my short waisted self couldn't carry this off because the top was too long.
I've worn these pants on a few different occasions, in different cities and every time I wear them I get asked where they're from...the fit and style are amazing! They look and feel expensive.
Just didn't do anything for my Butt. Back to RTR
a little too warm for socal, but super trendy

I will definitely rent these again. The fabric is nothing short of amazing--no wrinkles, form fitting without being binding or emphasizing trouble spots, fun stripe down the side, and an ankle flare. I received so many compliments.
Loved these pants. Wore them dressed up, dressed down, to work and when friends came over. Definitely roomy. Herringbone blue with bright red stripe went with so many basics - great piece

The pants are high waisted and the waist fits true to size. The thighs and hips ran a bit large. Would have like them to be a bit more fitted and they came off as being more casual than what I'd prefer. The quality is very good.

These are great pants, very flattering and the perfect length for me. I ordered up based on reviews and glad I did. The 4 probably would have been too tight. I typically wear a 4 in VB and most other brands.
Loved there, but need to order a size up. Fabric is thick. Better for Fall.
Fit perfect and who doesn't love POCKETS!

links_reviews_title: Do yourself a favor, rent these pants!
links_reviews_text: I got so many compliments with these pants. They are so comfortable, flattering, and trendy! You can tell that they are well-made with high quality materials. In addition to the traditional zipper, button, hook on the waistline, the inside also has some elastic to allow for extra movement. Size fits true, maybe a pinch large, but not much. The material is warm. I LOVE these pants!

OBSESSED with these pants! They are SUPER high waisted and comfortable. These are meant to be cropped, but on me (4'11) they were perfect. For more work week looks follow @renttherunway_teacher on Instagram!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful print and fabric but not the right fit for me :(
links_reviews_text: I loved how these looked and kept them for quite a while as I kept thinking I'd come across the right top that would make them look better. They kind of bunched up in the front and made it look like I had a little pooch. In the end I never wore them. In fact, the new tag is still attached.

I'm usually a size 26 and when reading reviews, it says they run large but RTR suggested a 2 so I went with it. Wish I ordered a 0! 2 fits okay to wear for a day but are big in waist and crotch area. If I rent again, I'll go with a 0

The pants were a bit loose, but not loose enough that I would say size up...just tuck a blouse or thin sweater into them. Pattern isn't bright, but adds a nice touch, texture-wise. Length hit at my ankle, and I'm 5'4. If they were a bit tighter, I would purchase.

links_reviews_title: Great suit. I recieved lots of compliments
links_reviews_text: Great heavy fabric, style and fit. I liked it so much that I purchased it at Nordstrom for cheaper.

links_reviews_title: A little big in the waist
links_reviews_text: Love these pants, just wish the waist was a little more snug. Fits well everywhere else. Fabric is a lovely texture.
High rise waist just didn't fit me well, - it was too loose in the crotch until I rolled over the waistband. Hid that under my shirt, so not a big deal. Loved the print and texture of the material!
Great quality and comfy. Runs a little large in my opinion. I'm usually a solid 4 in pants, these are a bit loose but nothing too drastic. 2 might have been a little snug, but room in the 4.
Loved these pants and the snake print! Fun and comfortable.

These pants are beautiful. They are a nice, thick fabric and the snake print makes a fun neutral. The waist has no stretch, so that could be a problem for some. Also, there are front pleats, which can be bad for a tummy.

links_reviews_title: Loved the favric, so comfy- a bit baggy, should have gotten size down

links_reviews_text: High quality awesome piece but runs big, I'm normally a 4, need the 2.
These fit me so strangely I couldn't wear them. If I had a completely flat lower belly they might have fit fine. Nice, thick fabric. I was sad to send them back unworn.
Got so many compliments! Fit was awesome
A very nice top.. wasn't anything crazy special, but fun to wear one time. Fit true to size and comfortable.
Fit perfectly but straps fall off. Top is tight so nothing is revealed. Very cute.
Loved this shirt so much!! Wore it for tailgating college football and it was adorable, highly recommend!

links_reviews_title: Wore this to a football game and it was super cute!
links_reviews_text: The fit was very true to size and I paired it with high waisted jeans.
I absolutely loved this top and got tons of compliments on it. Highly suggest renting it for a vacation or brunch/going out.

links_reviews_title: Wore to saints game with print skirt. Fun look for The Who dats!!
links_reviews_text: When it came in I didn't think it was going to fit (looked very small) but was surprisingly stretchy and had great coverage. Would rent again!

Cute top for summer. It's tight in the front, so holds you in, but stretchy in the back so there is a bit of give. Beware, it seemed a lot more cropped than it looked in the picture, so probably works best with high waisted jeans.

links_reviews_title: Perfect fun top for winery hopping
links_reviews_text: This top was comfortable, goes with every piece of my wardrobe, and it incredibly flattering. I normally have trouble with tops like this because I have a big rib cage but it has elastic smocking in the back and fit like a glove.
Loved everything about this top, you can dress it up or down. Highly recommend. I'm a 33 bust, I normally wear 6 or medium it fit perfectly.
I wore this for an outside July 4th day party. Didn't need a bra which was great! The straps are a little long and sometimes fell but it wasn't a big deal bc the rest was supported. Loved it!
Runs a size small. Fitted on waste on torso. I liked how it got me and it lifts your boobs if they are a tad bigger. Tons of compliments.
Fits like a glove and never had to worry about the straps slipping or "falling out". Received sooo many compliments and would definitely rent again!
Wore this to a tailgate with a turtle neck under and it was very cute. Love the ruffles!

links_reviews_title: Cute but runs way too small
links_reviews_text: There was no way I was zipping this over my chest. Definitely runs extremely small, unfortunate because would be super cute
Fits comfortably and has elastic type material on the back that can stretch to fit if its a bit tight - highly recommend!

this looked more like a bikini top than a crop top on me. my chest just fit into the top, BUT the straps were slipping a bit. if the straps were a bit shorter it wldve been perfect. i wore it under white overalls and it looked super cute. i am not confident enough to wear this as a stand alone because it was the size of a sports bra on me. if my chest was smaller it wldn't be so tiny, but just be aware that it is a very very small top.
Was nervous that it would looked "stretched" across the chest but it didn't at all. Great with high-rise pants or shorts.

This was such a cute top for vacation. It is pretty cropped (above my belly button) and true to size. I'm usually between a small and medium in tops. I should have gotten a medium, but it was out of stock so I tried the small. I was able to wear it but went without a bra so it wasn't too tight.

In the words of David Rose: "I'm obsessed with this!" This jacket is so fabulous. When I saw it on the hanger I thought it was going to look like a garbage bag on but I was way wrong. Beautiful color, great cut, perfectly oversized. I love it and I wish it was cheaper so I could buy it.
Personally the 4 was a little tight around the back and shoulders. I'd recommend sizing up for a more comfortable fit and chic oversized look.
Fun blazer for work

links_reviews_title: Felt like Diane Keaton in Baby Boom
links_reviews_text: Comfortable all day
Loved this blazer! Great pop of color. Comfortable and lightweight material. Definitely an oversized, boyfriend fit which I love
Adds a polished and powerful edge to simple outfits.
Super cute oversized blazer works great for cold offices.
I ordered a size down from my usual 4 (2 was the only size available). The jacket still looks oversized although it was a bit tight in the shoulders. Generally a great piece for a bit of fun at work.
Dang I had a hard time letting this go back - its so beautiful and people loved it! Would love to try it again in more colors if it becomes available.

links_reviews_title: Wore to work & out -- imagined the material to be thicker, felt kind of cheap
links_reviews_text: Which is a bummer because I've been waiting for this jacket to be available for this event! Won't be renting again -- looked and felt cheaper than it is

This jacket is an head-turner. The color is vibrant, and the oversize is sooo chic. I'm short (5'1) and oversize can be tricky but I was determined to make this work. I've worn it twice so far: once with black jeans and a leopard-print turtle neck, and as photographed with a black turtleneck crop top and a pair of jean shorts. I loved it. I'll probably keep it around for a bit. Highly recommend!
Loved this blazer! Great, oversized fit. Super comfy and the color is such a powerhouse! Effortless chic!!! No cons on this one!!

links_reviews_title: Oversized, soft blazer in a great color
links_reviews_text: Soft material, oversized fit, beautiful red. I loved it and would definitely rent again.

links_reviews_title: Wore this for valentine's day and got tons of compliments.
links_reviews_text: The color is a deep red that goes well with my blue-ish skin undertone. Nice fit and a great way to dress up a casual outfit.
I loved this red blazer so much. It's extremely well made, has an oversized boyfriend fit (that I love!) and the color is so good. So badly want to keep it forever.

I was so excited for this blazer, but as you can see it was extremely large! I thought i looked like a ticket taker at the theater. I would for sure size down 1 or 2 sizes if i wanted to try it again.

links_reviews_title: Great fabric and bright color! Lots of compliments about this trendy oversized jacket.
links_reviews_text: It was definitely oversized but that's the look I wanted. I think I would've done one size smaller if it were available when I rented it. The color is VERY bright and the material is really high quality. It was perfect for Create & Cultivates Miami Vision Summit. Maybe a little hot in 75 degrees

links_reviews_title: Great red for a holiday lunch
links_reviews_text: Really beautiful and comfortable blazer. It's definitely oversized, and I was sent a size down, so it looked TTS. Next time I'd try my normal size for a boxier, more casual look. 4 stars bc the buttons were weird so I felt like I had to keep it open.

This blazer is great - thick, quality material and super vibrant color. It runs large for an oversized fit but that's the way it's supposed to be and it looks very chic. Got lots of compliments wearing this blazer with jeans and boots. Will rent again.

links_reviews_title: I should have bought this I wore this 1x per week to work - I LOVED it!
links_reviews_text: oversized BF fit but loved it

links_reviews_title: I LOVED this oversized blazer. So many compliments.
links_reviews_text: This blazer is perfect for a more casual work day or everyday look in the fall/winter. I paired it with a tucker in white t-shirt, black ponte pants, and booties. The blazer is definitely oversized, but that's the look. I have long arms and so appreciated the arm length on this.

links_reviews_title: A little to costume-y for work
links_reviews_text: I was really looking forward to wearing this jacket to work with a white tee and skinny jeans for a 80's power suit moment. However, the jacket is so big, it really seems more costume than work. Additionally, the sleeves have fairly large slits with no buttons, which make achieving the photographed "scrunched" look almost impossible. Overall, close, but no cigar.
I've worn this jacket three times and still don't want to return it. The fit is really nice and it looks great with jeans and dress pants.

It was a great color and the material was very sturdy. The only issue was that I rented it as spring blazer but it is a bit too thick to wear in spring. The size is big and boxy so recommend wearing with skinny jeans and fitting tops.

links_reviews_title: I'm in love with this jacket. It dresses up my favorite tee
links_reviews_text: fits perfectly but sometimes I will wear one size up based on the look

links_reviews_title: Rented for work, don't usually wear red but I wanted to switch it up!
links_reviews_text: I originally intended to wear this with heels and jeans for casual Friday but ended up wearing it on a Monday with black slacks, nice blazer with good outer pockets but nothing terribly special about this piece.
Very nice fit for workwear. I loved the quality of fabric and cut.
just very large.
I was surprised that this blazer was a stiff, almost corduroy fabric - I was under the impression it was silk
Perfect with high waisted mom jeans and heels.
Definitely on trend right now with the boxy, power suit shape. Not too heavy, so perfect for cool Spring weather mornings and warmer afternoons.

links_reviews_title: Definitely wait for your size to be available
links_reviews_text: I normally wear a 6 in jackets and picked a 4 since it was a boxy fit and don't do it. The 6 would have been probably a bit boxy, but thats the look. The 4th button doesn't actually have a button, which bugged me a bit, but loved the color and would have worn if I got the 6.

links_reviews_title: Too oversized to look polished for work. Would need to size down 2 sizes.
links_reviews_text: Way too big.
I wore this several times throughout the month, most notably to an art show, and I got tons of compliments! It made me feel so, so chic and confident. Fit like a glove!
Love the style and color. It is meant to be a bit oversized, and looks great dressed up or down. Many compliments on the color!
very oversized and doesn't have much shape, very boxy and over sized even when i sized down.

links_reviews_title: Versatile piece, can wear to work, party or casual. Size 10 was fine on a 10-12 body.
links_reviews_text: Good fabric

links_reviews_title: Great bold piece for the office.
links_reviews_text: Loved the oversized boyfriend fit of this blazer. I wore it to work but it would definitely work for cocktails or dinner too.

links_reviews_title: I wore the blazer to work
links_reviews_text: The jacket was very large, which I think is intentional. I rented it with the intention of wearing it as a blazer, but every time I put it on it looked more like an overcoat. It wasn't warm enough for me to wear it as a coat this time of year, but I would have if it hadn't been so cold.
For leather pants, these were super comfortable and movable. Only issue was the waistline was super low

Amazing... kept these for awhile for a few different occasions! Unique. So fun, versatile, AND comfortable! I am usually an 8 but that wasn't available to rent for my event so I went with the 6 (38). The material is so stretchy it worked but I would have preferred my usual 8. Overall I would say it runs true to size.

links_reviews_title: Great leather pants for a concert
links_reviews_text: Really enjoyed these pants for a concert. They were thin enough to be comfortable and thick enough to not feel like discount vegan leather. The tie details are very cute.

links_reviews_title: Edgy pants to dress up or down
links_reviews_text: Got a ton of compliments people loved the lacing detail.

I enjoyed these pants so much!! They were extremely soft and very comfortable to wear. The pants had a little stretch - next time I would rent one size smaller. These pants are why I love rent the runway so much - I would never have tried something like these pants prior to this service. I wore these pants 3-4 times and was sad to send them back!

links_reviews_title: I wore these to a basketball game. Extremely comfortable! Got lots of compliments.
links_reviews_text: They're stretchier than I expected which was a pleasant surprise!

links_reviews_title: Super fun pant, leather with a twist!
links_reviews_text: These pants fit great. I'm normally between a 2 and 4, but wound up sizing down for this rental. The two was definitely tighter (as pictured on me!) but it was fine. I would rent again in the size 4 to have a different, looser look. I'm 5'7.5" so these looked a lot more cropped on me than I think they did in the photo as well. I got tons of compliments on my outfit nevertheless

links_reviews_title: WOW. These pants are incredible. They are stretchy so I would size down but true to size!
links_reviews_text: I don't even know where to begin. At first, I was nervous because...leather pants. But I pulled these on and felt like a QUEEN. I will say, if you have a booty, they are low rise so they may fall down a little on you - but I wasn't pulling them up as much as I thought I would be! I would never buy these pants but I took a risk for something a little out of my comfort zone and girl - we are here for IT!

I loved these! I felt like a bad ass that should carry around a guitar to smash on things. One member traveling punk girl band! Wore to work and to night club. Super fun! Flattering! I sized up as reviews indicated and fit was perfect.
It fit perfectly I thought .

I F'ing LOVED THESE PANTS. They are a total lewk. The faux leather feels like real lambskin, but they do not make you sweat your life force out. They are a bit of a lower rise - for you high rise lovers beware. They did stretch a bit after a few wears but I gave no fuqs and busted out some fashionable ass belts. Styled a variety of ways because I kept them so long. Photo is of favorite office outfit for a meeting in LA. Also styled with a printed black cashmere sweater, massive crystal belt buckle and red suede booties for a warmer Chicago office lewk.
Best pants ever, Rent them. I think I'm buying mine since I've had them for over a month
Loved these, they do stretch out so I'd size down.

links_reviews_title: Loved these pants, great fit, hugged curves, had a little give in material.
links_reviews_text: Loved, material was great, not too hot and fit in all the right places. You can loosen the front ties for a more relaxed fit or tighten for skinnier look.
Loved these pants. They're super soft and are not intended to be super slim fit. If you want a tighter fit, size down because they did stretch throughout the night.

Definitely wish I had sizes down and not listened to other reviews to size up. These were so gorgeous but I can't wear them because they're falling off, I normally wear a 6/8 and for some reason got a 10. I'll try these again.

These lace up pants are fire! They were comfortable but really sexy. The only down side is they sit super low and stretched out a little. I don't think I could have sized down anymore though. Overall really liked them. Follow more of my looks on Instagram @an.unlimited.life

links_reviews_title: Great fit stretchy and comfy. Love them!
links_reviews_text: I'm curvy with hips and booty and they fit great! A bit lower on the waist than I thought but overall very happy

One of my favorite items from RTR. I wore this for my birthday with a mesh leopard top and loved the way it looked. The pants fit perfect in the legs (although I do have thicker thighs), but the waist was pretty big so I had to wear a belt. I usually get overheated quite easily and these pants didn't make me that hot at all. They also are so comfortable I feel like you could lounge in these. Can't wait to rent again.

I loved these, they got lots of compliments, but they would have been more flattering if I'd gone a size down. I recently lost weight and wasn't sure if I was more of a 4 or 6 and went with the 6 equivalent...should've gone w the 4, and then I think they would have been perfect.

links_reviews_title: got these for some cute instagram photos, they did not disappoint
links_reviews_text: went up a size and it was a little loose around the waste, but nothing a belt didn't fix!! these ARE low waisted, so keep in mind when you're ordering that they will sit in the middle of your hips and not anywhere higher. very comfy and flexible, really recommend for that extra edge.

The pants are a lot thinner than I thought. Most faux leather pants I've worn are still pretty thick or the material makes me feel so hot. These were extremely comfortable and stretchy. I tend not to rent pants because the sizing is never right for my butt and are typically too small but these fit well and I still had some room around the waist. I probably could have sized down and these would have been skin tight but the looser look made it more appropriate to wear casually. Dressed up for a night out with a loose top and booties and also wore down with an overside sweater and some platform sneakers. Great rent for when you want to try something different!
Looks and feels like super soft real leather. Very bad ass. Hits just below mid calf. Stretches considerably after just a couple of hours. But the lacing is phenomenal.
Wore them out and even dressed them professionally for work. Super fun pants with the lace up detail. They sit low but I added a belt to make it fun. Loved these pants!
Thought it was high waisted, but it's mid-low waist. Cropped above the ankle too, but very cute and comfortable for everyday wear that's still elevated.

links_reviews_title: Took these off too fast to get a photo
links_reviews_text: Had high hopes for these but was disappointed! The fabric was thinner and shinier than expected, and they were tight with no stretch. Very unflattering
Sooo cropped and so low rise--i never even wore these

links_reviews_title: I received TONS of compliments on these super cute pants! I may just buy them!
links_reviews_text: I could have ordered a 38 for a tighter fit in the waist, but a belt did the trick for the waist gap.
Larger fit and the crop pant is nice for a great bootie.
Obsessed with these and would be them if they weren't so expensive. I dressed these up and down. I wore them multiple times and would rent again! They're super comfortable and not too hot.

links_reviews_title: A little too big to make work
links_reviews_text: I was so excited to rent these pants, but I found that the waist was 2-3 inches too big and the lower raise wasn't great for me. The inseam fit my 5' height perfectly, but I just couldn't make the waist work.
Way too tight! I'm a true 4 and this would fit closer to a true 2 or zero if the person was looking for a baggy fit. They are so soft so I was disappointed
Great fit. Felt like real leather. So many compliments.
I wore these pants to a Marilyn Manson concert with the Proenza Schouler lightning bolt sweater and it was perfect! I will definitely rent these again and again and again!!!

links_reviews_title: These lace-up leather pants are unforgettable - because, clearly!
links_reviews_text: The fit in the legs was perfect, but the waist was large for me. They also had a tendency to ride up the leg as you walk & wear them. That being said, I felt so sexy and sleek wearing them!
These are very luxe and buttery but they run a bit small. Size up if you are questioning it and make sure you realize they are moderately low-waisted.
Loved the look of the pants. They were not made for women with larger butt her frame but with a belt it worked out well.

links_reviews_title: The waist runs true to size but at least for me, the legs were incredibly wide.
links_reviews_text: Did not end up wearing these because the leg with was just way way too mis-sized. Waist runs true to size. Maybe if you're a smaller size, these will fit better in the leg cut.
Really cool, not too much but still outstanding. Wore it with Rick Owens T shirt for work and with more dramatic but simple Tibi tops for night out
A little bit low rise but I wore these with an oversized top and they looked awesome.
The color is great and the fit around the chest is good but, the sleeves won't stay up.
I rented this for a bday trip to Paris and loved it so much. It's cute and comfortable and very chic.
I rented for a weekend trip and got so many compliments! Top is super flattering and comfortable. Definitely will be renting again!

links_reviews_title: Show stopper but not super practical - great for photo shoot !
links_reviews_text: Loved this top idea because of color and cut but truth is sleeves kept falling off and the scrubby part would come wayyyy to close together and I was constantly pulling it down
So flattering and cute! Constantly got compliments. Made me feel sexy without being too revealing.
Cute print and the fabric makes this flattering and comfortable!

Loved the color and structure of this top! The neckline is very flattering. The sleeves fell down easily but it's nothing some fashion tape couldn't fix. Was able to wear both to the office with a pair of trousers and dressed down for the weekend!

links_reviews_title: Great fall colors, cute and unique top!!
links_reviews_text: Rented this for my daughters senior fall pictures, it was adorable on her and perfect with fall color. Runs a little small and is short, but works well with high waisted jeans. You will definitely need help zipping in and out.
Thought about buying this one! Such a cute top and very comfortable.
Got so many compliments! Fit was so great for an hourglass or pear shape! I have a small chest and it accentuated it nicely. Great material and color! Definitely would rent again!
Loved wearing this top! Was very comfortable and fit true to size. Shoulders fell down a couple times but not too much and to be expected with this style top.
Would rent again
Wore this to dinner in Charleston. Fitted on the top but allows for plenty of eating and drinking with the peplum. super comfortable
Cannot wear a regular bra with it but the gathering is supportive enough to go braless even for a moderately large bust.
This top is so cute and flirty! Perfect for a fall brunch. Easy to wear, mostly. I'm short arm/torso, so it slouched a little off the shoulders, but not awful. I'd rent again and maybe try the 4.

links_reviews_title: Super cute for a daily top!
links_reviews_text: I love this top. The only thing I noticed is that the shoulders fell off of me, big time, but it could be due to the fact that I am in between sizes right now and could have gone with a 6 instead. This is a great top for daily wear! I would size down if you have slim shoulders though!

links_reviews_title: I wore this out to a bar and got a ton of compliments. Great Fall rustic red
links_reviews_text: The shirt zips up in the back which makes the torso of the shirt fitted. Only con was the shoulders kept falling down, which is probably because I'm 5'2 and dont have long arms. Overall I really liked this shirt and would definitely rent again.

Super cute shirt and the neckline is great, but I found that it runs really small in the arms/pits. I'm not going to be able to take it with me on my trip, but I'll rent again and size up. Also, the material it really lightweight, so not necessarily for cold weather.
Love this shirt, great for large bust and curves. Felt very pretty!
Super cute and very comfortable.

links_reviews_title: So flattering and sophisticated!!! Absolutely loved this dress!
links_reviews_text: This dress fit perfectly and was slimming and flattering. I wore to work with black boots and it looked very chic. The fabric is stretchy and comfortable and the fit was true to size. I'm 5'10 and normally wear a size small 2/4.

I was drawn to this dress by the low, scooped back - subtly and classically sexy. TTS but long - not ideal for petites but I wore it anyway. Highly recommend if you're 5'7" or taller! The fabric is of moderate thickness & shows figure flaws so shape-wear might be required. The tag on this particular dress was sewn to the back in such a way that it couldn't be hidden. Hopefully it's isolated to this particular dress.
The dress has a beautiful open back, fit and flare style and long - but not too long - figure. It is warm but not overwhelming. Can fit various events when dressed up/down. Loved it!
Love RTR, but this dress just wasn't a good fit.
This dress is just so simply perfect and comfortable. Slimming, elegant, easy to dress up and down.
It was not flattering at all- long sleeves and long length made me look frumpy
Would definitely rent again, very appropriate for work while also being extremely comfortable.

I love the scoop back on this dress and how it hugs but doesn't squeeze the waist. It can be worn casually (instead of my usual jeans) or dressed up. Love it! I'm usually a size 6. I wore this in a small.

links_reviews_title: Nice for this time of year
links_reviews_text: It's pilling and fading, looks aged :( otherwise it's great fit, and cut!

Loved loved this dress. You can wear it to work, or out for a casual date. It has beautiful flow to it and the scoop back adds a bit of sex appeal without being over the top. I was very tempted to purchase
Super flattering! Casual or dressy!
I've rented this style in the brown color and loved it. Medium thickness in the knit. Fit is wonderful. Will probably rent again.

links_reviews_title: Can wear a bra with it
links_reviews_text: The back is low and sexy, but I found a standard bra was concealed just fine with it.

links_reviews_title: Very classic Ralph Lauren inspired dress
links_reviews_text: This dress fit like a dream, although if curvy like I am size up. Typically between an 8-10 went with the XLR and it fit perfectly. Need some shapewear as it's a little bodycon but not overly so. Love the neckline and was perfect with fun jewelry for a party!

links_reviews_title: Love this dress. It can dress up or down!
links_reviews_text: I wore a size medium but I wish I would have gotten the small. I'm a size 8 and hourglass - I could have used a small but it still works. Very comfortable.

Fabric is too heavy for the design of the dress (elastic waistband can't hold it up) and it's also too synthetic and cheap to be something I would want to wear to an event - but it's also too long and heavy for everyday, so this dress, while pretty, doesn't quite work for me for any purpose.

links_reviews_title: Comfortable, fancy with a bit of flare
links_reviews_text: Super comfortable dress but also felt dressed up, not too fancy, not too casual, perfect in between for a night out at a fancy restaurant with friends. Loved the ruffles on it and how they add a little pop. I'm 5'4" and it was almost too long for me in flats, so if you are shorter you might need heels.
This dress is so forgiving and terribly comfortable. It's fun and elegant. I adore it!
The dress runs large. I belted it to give it some definition. It's a great dress for summer, and has pockets.

links_reviews_title: Unusual print loved the comfort of this dress
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress and got a ton of compliments, super comfortable too with pockets can dress up and down wish I could have kept this one

links_reviews_title: I wore this twice--once to lunch with friends and for my MILs 80th birthday party.
links_reviews_text: Comfortable, awesome pattern. It felt great on! I paired it teal heels.

This dress is really flattering and unique. My one issue wit it is that it's very long. I'm 5'4" and the small was almost a gown length, not at all like the calf length on the model. The fabric is pretty heavy so I wouldn't recommend for a super hot day in the sun. But it is unlined, and it has pockets!
High quality fabric, the elastic waist can ride up a bit
Cute and whimsical. Super comfy and easy to wear!
This dress was a lot longer than I expected. The material was a lot thicker than I had expected as well.

I needed a dress to wear to my friend's Celebration of Life Service. I did not want to wear all black. She was fun and so I opted to wear a striped geometric type print. The dress is well made. It did not have lining and did not need one. I was delighted to find pockets! The ruffles were sweet. The length made it more elegant. I looked classy, chic, yet was very comfortable and I wore it out to an upscale steakhouse with my husband on a date.

links_reviews_title: I loved this dress. I wore it for a work conference, and it was great.
links_reviews_text: I thought it was cute, fun, and fit perfectly. The only flaw that I found was that it seemed a bit bulky around the waist, so I wore it with a belt at the waist. I would highly recommend this dress for work, a date, or a fun spring/summer evening out.
Amazing dress! Dress up or dress down...comfy, awesome material, fits perfectly! Love this dress! Travels well
I was fine for work, not particularly flattering. It was still cold so I threw a sweater on over it and I could pop the collar out which was cute.

links_reviews_title: This dress is the perfect length + stands out. Perfect for an event, vacation, or just because!
links_reviews_text: Fit: Great! Pros: flowy and easy to wear Cons: a little long if you're on the shorter side
I wore and reviewed this dress already but I loved it so much that I rented it immediately again. It's so fun and comfortable and can be dressed up or down and I got so many compliments on it!
Too many ruffles? Nope, those are swirls in the design! Loved this dress. Comfy and chic for a daytime work session

links_reviews_title: Completely unplanned #dressedtomatch moment at the San Francisco Museum of Modern Art.
links_reviews_text: Beautiful, heavyweight fabric gives a wonderful drape and swing to the skirt. I'd advise sizing down however, as the weight of the dress pulls quite a lot on the elastic waistline. This dress is more formal than I'd imagined given the photos on RTR, but I still wore it out for a "casual day in the city."
Flattering. Fun details. I put a black 3/4 sleeve tee under it.

links_reviews_title: Comfortable yet striking work wear. Wore with a little shirt waisted black cardigan for warmth

links_reviews_text: This was really comfortable. I wore it to work, put a cardigan over it and paired it with brown boots and a brown belt. The neck material flipped out oddly, but nothing that could be tamed by the cardigan.
Loved this dress! Lined and thick well made fabric. I don't usually wear a Medium (from RtR), but I listened to reviews and glad I did and sized down. This was a keeper for me!

Even though I rented an extra small, this was so big on me - it hit the floor. Adorable and super fashion forward, but not quite for me - at 5'4" large scale prints tend to overwhelm me a bit.. For taller ladies, it's super cute.

This dress is one of the most high quality material and construction of any RTR dress I have rented. It was a perfect length on my tall frame with interesting details and POCKETS! This dress seamlessly goes from day to night with the simple addition of a jacket or small accessory. It is flattering on curvy shapes and even nicely hid my mom pouch!
This is cute but pretty loose around the arms and waist, I still wore it thought but wished it fit me better
Comfortable, easy, needs a belt.
There is just a ton of fabric to this dress. There is nice detail and it is comfortable but it just wasn't that interesting. It might be cuter with a belt or less fabric. I wore but didn't love.
Love this dress! So comfortable, and I got so many compliments!!

This dress is very easy to wear: the fabric hangs well, there are pockets, and the elastic waist makes it very comfortable. It does run large. It came down to my ankles and was a little loose all over. The original dress I rented was unavailable so RTR overnighted this to me last minute. With more time, I would have gotten a belt to cinch the waist - I think that would have taken the dress from good to great. But, even without the belt, I got a bunch of compliments and it was easy to dance in.
Way too much material. Huge

Wanted to love this with the cool pattern but honestly it's heavy for a maxi that looks like it should be light and the length hits me a little below mid-calf which seems a little awkward. I may still wear but will have to find a way not to feel like I'm in a moo-moo.
Fun, comfortable, and unique

links_reviews_title: Rented for every day but more of a formal dress
links_reviews_text: Heavy material and very long if you're short. Loved it but too dressy for work and didn't have an event to wear.

links_reviews_title: this dress is amazing, top quality. it's voluminous and floor length if you're 5'3 with 3" heels.
links_reviews_text: very comfortable. with POCKETS! great detail, unique, etc. ideal on someone over 5'7 and very lean. i wore with black gladiator stilettos and a side ponytail to show the neck detail.
Fits well. Could probably have fit someone smaller or larger than me. Stretchy material. Alot of compliments and I liked the dress, but it didn't feel "special".

The pictures on this one are quite misleading. It is floor length, and actually even longer than that. I wore heels and it still dragged on the XS. That being said, it's comfortable and very pretty. The material is thick and sits nicely.

links_reviews_title: I cannot get this dress to work on me.
links_reviews_text: I have now rented this dress in two sizes (large and medium) and both times sent it back unworn. The dress is a heavy drape and beautifully constructed but the fit just does not work on me. Reviews are correct - size down- it runs large.
This was huge! The M was down to the floor (5'4) so I couldn't wear it. Disappointed as I loved the print and silhouette.
Cut and weight if fabric was a bit too much.

I liked that it was cozy sweatshirt material, but dressy with the ruffles and cute floral pattern.. It was a fun way to look cute while being cozy. The ruffles needed steaming- but that was quick and easy. I wore it with some high -waisted yoga pants, since it's cropped.
Very soft and cozy but cute enough to pull off at work.
Loved this ruffled sweatshirt. Perfect amount of warm. Great colors
It is cropped and best paired with something high-waisted, but fits true to size and is so pretty! Loved the print and the ruffle.
Selves fit more like 3/4 sleeve
Comfortable fabric. Thicker than average sweatshirt. A little boxy/cropped, but cute

Loved this sweatshirt! Super comfortable and really cute and stylish. It is cropped, but fine with my highwaisted jeans. I would not suggest this for anyone with a large bust because of where the ruffle hits. It runs true to size, but does not stretch, so its a little hard to get your head through the top.

links_reviews_title: So cute but so small for a large
links_reviews_text: This was very cropped on me and the arms were very short. Would rent again for casual wear but in two sizes up. It's was almost like the large was a big small. Definitely size up!
This was so short I couldn't wear it. I liked the print and the ruffles dressed it up some. I just wish it was a few inches longer.
This is such a fun, cute sweater that is great for the spring days when it's still chilly, but you want to wear brighter colors. I got so many compliments on the ruffle details and print!
Felt like it had shrunk. I should have sized up. Best with high waisted jeans. Wouldn't rent again.

I got a larger size than normal because cropped sweaters don't look the best on my long torso. So glad I did because it's still a little too cropped for my liking, wore a cami under it to make it work better for me.

links_reviews_title: Look like you're wearing a cute top--feel like you're in a sweatshirt!
links_reviews_text: Cute top, got lots of compliments. The fabric was a lightweight sweatshirt material but the ruffle made it unique. Liked the print. Was a little bit cropped so I liked it best with high waisted jeans.
The floral pattern worked for a winter shirt. The ruffle is cute and the shirt is roomy. It is a little boxy, which is fine for a casual shirt, but also a little short, so plan plants accordingly.
Loved it with the olive green Joe jeans I rented.
Nice fit. Wasn't the softest material but still liked wearing it

Loved this sweatshirt. Was the perfect sweatshirt material, not too think & not too light. The added material around the sweatshirt made it a little tight in a jacket but was manageable. It is a crop, so suggest sizing up if you don't want it to be full crop top!
Cute sweater, but I didn't love the ruffle. I felt like a looked like a little girl with the floral and ruffle combo. Fun to rent, but wouldn't buy.
I wanted to love this too but I felt it just missed. I guess I didn't like the length (cropped). I did wear it though to my daughter basketball game.
the material is WAY thicker than the photo. this would not look good on ANYONE. never wore it.
I wore this to and from Arizona on the plane. It's super comfy and still looks stylish.

The top fit great, I didn't realize it was more of a sweatshirt material, but made it really comfortable to wear but gave it a more casual look. Definitely wear with high waited pants as it seems a bit cropped.
Great "fancy" sweatshirt.
Fits small and short. Would work best with highrise jeans. Still super cute though!
Was a little tight under the arms, but is very short. More of a crop style. I paired with highwaisted jeans and it barely covered. Not my favorite look but worked for a relaxed night with a friend.
Sleeves were short on my long arms!! But super cute. Would order a size up, it fit like a crop top on me as well.

links_reviews_title: I wore this with leggings for a hike.
links_reviews_text: just a bit more cropped than one was expecting, so a bit boxy.

I was very surprised to see this top is out of sweatshirt type fabric. It was perfect for this fall weather. I wore it for a casual day at work. I felt appropriate because of the style and print. I would recommend this top. It seemed true to size.
The riffle wasn't a good look on my bust and frame.

Very cute and comfortable sweater and fit me true to size. I'm petite with a larger chest and felt like where the ruffle hit was a bit awkward and made me look wider / made my chest stick out more. For this reason, don't think I'd rent again, but it was otherwise very cute!

I have long arms so the arms are never long enough and this sweatshirt is no exception!! Such a sweet sweatshirt - soft and comfortable and very eye catching. Loved wearing this tho - soooooo comfortable too yet pretty enough for me to get away with wearing it at work!
Some stretch and skinny through the arms

Nice quality, but nothing out of this world. It is on the thinner side, so nice for a warm office. I sized down following the reviews that it ran large, but I found it to be a little small/more true to size. The shoulders and upper arms were snug but I was still able to wear all day.
Almost kept this one forever it's so so good. I wore it multiple ways (with jeans and tee and also dressed up for work with black pants). Will absolutely be renting again in the future!
This blazer was the perfect fit - for a classic work blazer, this worked great!
Big boxy 90's looks no liner just the shell.
Fit well. The sleeves were long. Had shoulder pads. Classy fit. Great for work

This blazer is not quite as dressy as I expected--love it, and still very professional, but a bit more relaxed than I expected. Still was awesome and received tons of compliments--and easy to dress up or down! Its def long on torso tho--so if you are shorter, may want to size down.
Fits so well and such great material! I've rented this twice now and it's one of my fave pieces!
Very light jacket - not warm at all. Incredibly stylish and expensive feeling. True to size- I am between a 4 and a 6 and could've worn either
I got it with the pants, for a work trip. Was not bad, but a bit large. I didn't love but it was ok for the day. Not sure sizing down would help

links_reviews_title: Really flattering cut, runs a little big, lovely color and pattern!

links_reviews_text: I liked the oversize look of the blazer, though it ran a little large, even for the oversized fit. This is ironic since the pants are so small. I don't know why this jacket is so expensive; it's not lined and really isn't anything that special.
I really liked the feel of this dress. It is pretty thick so I think it works best for fall or winter.
This was simple and didn't stand out but it fit really well with the adjustable belt, great for work
Runs very large! The fabric is thick and gorgeous. If you're busty you'll need a cami underneath. Super cute and I received a lot of compliments.

links_reviews_title: Chic for work and every day!
links_reviews_text: Loved this piece! It's heavy, warm, and looks expensive. The only reason I took off a star was because something went wrong in either the making, or something is up with the stitching that on the bottom right of the dress, it pulls up slightly when you stand up looking like the dress is caught on something. Not super noticeable but it's noticeable enough and I was constantly conscious of it while wearing.

links_reviews_title: Fashion forward twist on classic business attire
links_reviews_text: I loved the fit of this dress. It's forgiving and at the same time slimming. It was really cold so I wore a sweater and leggings beneath it which gave it a cool jacket vibe. Not sure I would wear it again, definitely a good piece to rent instead of own.

I rented this for work and actually wore it twice in one week. Because it's fall, I wore a turtleneck underneath. The chest area is big, so I think you have to wear a shirt under. I loved this the material was heavy but moveable. Highly recommend for work!
Interesting variation for work attire - heavier than expected fabric and a turtleneck made this perfect for a damp fall day.

It wasn't tight across the shoulders and even though it looks like a wrap dress, there are buttons that restrict how tight you can make the belt. I sit between size 2-4 normally but this dress I had to size down to a 0. Heavy material but is easy to travel with - doesn't crease when packed. A few people mentioned the low cut but I didn't have that problem. Would rent again!

links_reviews_title: New take on the tuxedo dress
links_reviews_text: The dress was super comfortable, but it was large at the top and the bottom. While the buttons help to some degree, I would have liked one more at the top and at the bottom. I used safety pins and that worked. I also wore a bandeau just in case. Definitely size down for this one.
Loved this warm trench dress. Thick material with a classic pattern. I loved dressing it down and throwing a turtleneck under to bring out the fall fashion!

Very comfortable and well made. Buttons inside stops the wrap dress from gaping open down the thigh. There is some gaping at the cleavage so I used a pin which was easily hidden inside the folds of fabric, which is thick and high quality. The dress is quite heavy and warm. Hits the leg mid calf.
The fabric of this dress is absolutely luxurious. It would pair well with a black or a white turtleneck underneath in the fall season but looked really great with just itself
I liked this dress but should have sized down by one size. It was also made of heavy material so I wouldn't suggest to wear in the summer. I styled it with a black turtleneck and black ankle booties.

links_reviews_title: Very classy and very well made
links_reviews_text: Absolutely loved this. It is made very well and fits amazing. Definitely feels like a designer piece. Highly recommend!
The material is thick so it's good for the winter season. I would rent again
Ordered size down - normally wear 4 in dresses. Heavy fabric but super chic fit. So many compliments at my work event!

Super flattering silhouette. Worked well for a work dress as well as evening events, I got loads of compliments on it! The front is a tad gaping, as other ladies noted in their reviews, and since it was winter I wore it with a tight black turtleneck underneath and it worked really well. Will rent again!
Fun different look. Men's wear inspired. Runs a little small.
As a more petite person, I felt like I got a little lost in this dress. It's well made, but I think it would be better for someone taller (maybe 5'6" or taller).
I'm 5'4 and the dress came up a little above my ankles. Looks silly without a shirt underneath since the neckline is pretty low
The only downside is the very bad gapping when seated. I ended up wearing volleyball shorts underneath just in case. Otherwise, so classy and very easy to wear! Loved it.

Very well made. I wore it with a turtleneck, if you want to wear it as shown be aware that there is no closing above the waist so you will have to pin it. This also causes the front to open when you sit down, not the greatest look. Too bad they didn't include a simple hook and eye.

I found that this dress was impossible to wear without a shirt underneath, so I paired it with a crisp white blouse. That made all the difference. Otherwise, it felt more like a coat than a dress. Overall the fit is large, and the fabric is heavy. Looked professional in the end, and I was glad I could make it work. But beware, the top gapes open as there are only 3 buttons keeping it together.

Got a ton of compliments. Well constructed. I should have ironed it before going out, though. The material is super heavy and holds wrinkles...I was too lazy to iron so it didn't look quite as crisp as it does here in the photos on RTR.
Great work wear.
Lovely design. Nice weight to the material. Good for fall or spring. Might be heavy for summer. The slit does go a little high, but manageable as long as you position properly when sitting.

links_reviews_title: Not for large chested short women
links_reviews_text: I got this unlimited for work, I loved the material and the cut, however, it was way to low cut in the front. If this had another button at the top, it would have been perfect. Had to send it back without wearing it which sucked.

links_reviews_title: This was so easy to wear! Business lunch, dinner and a party!
links_reviews_text: It fit perfectly - I was complimented at every function. I wore a black cami which was good since the collar gaped when I sat down. Great with black booties. I'd rent it again.
super flattering and fits really well.
Pros: Thick material for fall/winter Cons: Top and wrap part does tend to open a bit through the day. Had to wear a black top and tights underneath the dress.
