links_reviews_title: A little long and big, but cute
links_reviews_text: This dress is chic and cool. Perfect for fall! It does run a little big, though.
This design in made for taller women. I'm 5.4 and this dress did not sit well on my waist and was too long
Great but just needed pins to close around the breasts

Fit is kind of large. Not sure how you could wear this without a shirt underneath. It's really low cut. Slit on leg is kind of high but not terrible. Nice work dress but I wasn't wow'd. Beautiful material and quality made though.
A little baggy size down

I liked this dress but everyone else Loved it. I got so many random compliments and did really enjoy wearing it. I wore it with a white top underneath. The slit can be a bit thigh-some when sitting down
Love this coat. Fits tts. Goes with dresses and jeans. Perfect for winter.

Great quality, lines, and color. Modern. It has belt loops but no belt came with it. Other reviews said it's shapeless. So maybe no one got the belt. Retail pics show it with a matching belt. I still liked it with the belt missing. The wool is warm even though it's thin and not lined, but the open design at top and bottom means it's not gonna keep you warm in the dead of winter. I wore with a thin/short puffer under and it was good for a windy day in the 40s. I sized down and was glad I did, but belt loops were high.

links_reviews_title: Planned to wear an an outdoor event in Chicago winter!
links_reviews_text: I generally order a medium, maybe large coat to fit over sweaters, etc. I ordered a medium and found the coat so big it swallowed. The coat had no structure and the material was itchy. I was planning on wearing it outside in Chicago winter, and found the material too thin to insulate warmth. Beautiful color though, and I love the way it looked on the model. Just order small and plan to wear more as a jacket!
It wasn't bad but I didn't love the flap near the collar.
Color is gorgeous. Fit is just ok: needs a belt to give a little shape

This coat is COOL. There are so many ways to wear it. Tie the scarf. Button it in different ways. It's wool, so it keeps you warm -- but also wool, so it's light enough to enjoy through the spring. Tempted to buy.

Love this coat and the color! The coat is very oversized so I would suggest to size down to get a more flattering fit. I would get this again but in a smaller size. Note, based on other reviews seems like the coat has a belt although mine was sent without one.
Runs very large, perfect for layering without feeling bulky. Downside is that it only have 1 button for closure. Loved it for everything else though
loved the coat, wore it regularly! but disappointed there was no belt for the belt loops...
Beautiful coat, but way too big for me to wear.
Fun, chunky, modern. Would definitely rent again. Wore this on a 40° day and definitely needed to layer up! There's no lining.

links_reviews_title: A bit itchy and definitely oversized.
links_reviews_text: It was a bit itchy since it's unlined. Because it's oversized, the cold wind would blow up the sleeves. I had to physically hold them closed to keep warm while walking through the city. Sitting indoors, I'd get pretty toasty.

links_reviews_title: beautiful color and very warm. go a size smaller.
links_reviews_text: beautiful color and very warm. go a size smaller.
At 5 months pregnant - the XS was oversized and unflattering. Pity, I loved the color.

As others have mentioned, this coat is huge, but it's supposed to be. I liked that it fit beautifully over chunky sweaters, and how modern it looked. The hunter green color is pretty stunning as well. The only issue is that it is unlined (for that price point, it should be lined).
Definitely needs a belt. Not included.
Way too big, and the belt was missing so I couldn't even adjust it to look cuter. It was super warm though.

I had really high hopes for this but wound up sending it back unworn. The unlined, felt-y fabric clung to my clothes like Velcro, and it was too long and too shapeless. Color was beautiful, and it would be great on someone very tall.

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress up or dress down piece
links_reviews_text: This coat is amazing, I wish I could keep it! It's the perfect weight, unlined with a soft, almost felt feel. I'm 5'10 and the length is perfect just as shown in picture. Runs slightly large as with most Vince pieces.
The large had a slightly slouchy look that I really liked. Fun sweater for casual look.

links_reviews_title: I wore this sweater at least 4 times, it's perfect!
links_reviews_text: Nice and warm, thick...just right!

I liked this sweater- nice quality and fun colors and pattern. It was semi cropped- I wore with slightly higher waisted pants and it was fine. Not recommended if you want to wear with regular or lower rise pants.
It's part cashmere which makes it so soft and the pattern is awesome.
Not "super soft" like other reviewers said... its probably been dry cleaned a few to many times. Cute, stylish, simple yet elevated.
So comfortable and soft. Wanted to wear it everyday.
Fits really well, comfortable, looks nice

links_reviews_title: One of favorite rentals to date!
links_reviews_text: Amazing sweater! Very unique color block print and vibrant colors. It's also incredibly soft. It's not a fitted sweater, but it doesn't look boxy either. Even though it is a wool blend, there was no itchiness to the material. Highly recommend!
Loved the slip and cropped fit. Great fit and colors.
The cut is forgiving - what I expected for a sweater. The colors are fun, appropriate for fall. Not so much a wow piece, but a comfortable, fun, everyday sweater.

This sweater is so cute! I love the unique abstract pattern, and the colors are beautiful. It doesn't feel over the top, but does feel special. This was a little bit on the cropped side on my long torso, so I wore it with high-waist jeans and leggings. This isn't as soft as I expected, because it isn't 100% cashmere as the description states - it's 90% wool and 10% cashmere. Still warm and cozy! But not super soft like I expected. I still recommend this, though. It's lovely and warm.
Like the colors and the pattern. Was soft, not itchy. True to size
Fun, vibrant sweater without being over the top.

This sweater is incredibly soft and comfortable. It can easily be dressed up or down. It's long enough to be tucked in, but fitted enough to look great untucked. I got so many compliments while wearing it.

links_reviews_title: Loved it, really cute and casual but fun
links_reviews_text: Easy to wear, great for work and not too hot as a layer or alone
I loved the print and the fit. It was warm enough to wear on a cool day, not itchy at all. The only major difference is the pink that is pictured is actually a camel color, and not pink at all.
Wore to work with skinny jeans. I will rent again!
Pretty good sweater. Material is not high quality but colors and pattern are nice

links_reviews_title: Lots of color and playfulness to casualwear.
links_reviews_text: It was true to size, fun, playful and colorful, while also keeping the chill away. Not too hot or too cold for a early spring day.
Loved this for a cozy weekend, it ran a little big but that was nice for comfort and length
Cozy and cute, liked the colors and different pattern. Nothing special though, not sure I’d rent again but I did enjoy wearing it.
This sweater is soft without being itchy. Great for a casual Friday at work or for the weekend.
This is a good everyday sweater. Not itchy at all. It looks like it has pink patches but they're actually tan. But NBD.
Wore it with jeans. Tons of compliments!!

I wasn't sure how I'd like this sweater, but ended up loving it. I wore it a couple of times with jeans and then joggers for a super casual work environment. It's very soft and the fit and cut were really flattering. It wasn't too short, which I appreciate at work. My favorite part, though, were the colors. They were an unusual combination that really worked well together and made it altogether a great piece!
This sweater is really well-made - I wore it at least 5 times!
I liked the pattern and colors, but the length was a bit short in the front. Overall fit was good and it is true to size, but just not a flattering shape.

links_reviews_title: Nice subtle patterns and combo of colors. Worn a couple of times.
links_reviews_text: The material is not itchy and the perfect thickness. It wasn't heavy.
Perfect for me. Loved it all in length, bust , sleeves. Would have kept for awhile if I didn't need more professional clothes this week than usual!
True to size

I rented this knowing there was snow in the forecast. Unfortunately, a Small was not available so I got the Medium. It fit well enough, but wasn't super flattering due to it being a bit large for me. Still, I enjoyed wearing this a couple of times. It's super cozy.
mine was gently worn
Nice weight = soft to wear for wool
Colors are not true. The yolk and sleeve are not a pale pink, but rather an ugly brown. I thought that it would be like the photo, so this sweater did not work for me. I sent it right back.
Perfect fit, great for fall
Size was accurate and fit well on my 5'2" frame, but colors were not as vibrant as they look in the photo and it's only a mid weight sweater

links_reviews_title: Great sweater for mixing up my everyday workwear
links_reviews_text: The sweater was roomy and comfortable, perfect for wearing with a pencil skirt or cropped wide leg pants.

links_reviews_title: awesome day to day sweater, unique blocking
links_reviews_text: go for it!

links_reviews_title: Fun dress. Wear tank underneath as buttons gape with larger chest
links_reviews_text: I'm a teacher and wore this to school for Valentine's Day. However, the heart design is not her prominent in person so you could wear anytime of year! Sitting down one the chest buttons gaped a tad (I have a larger chest) so I was sure to wear a tank underneath. Comfy nice high quality fabric.

Such a cute fall dress! I belted it and wore with ankle boots to make it more seasonal. My waist is a size 6 but my chest usually needs a size 10; I ordered the 10 and it fit perfectly. Will probably rent again.

Cute dress, if in between sizes, I'd go up a size. I'm wearing an 8. Note it buttons all of the way down, so when sitting there was some gaping between buttons across hip and legs. A little awkward for professional meetings.
Cute dress, good fit, easy to wear. Perfect for date night.
Cute but size up so that when you sit, the buttons don't open up to show your belly. So uncomfortable to have to continually be readjusting. Wish I'd gotten the larger size
Very cute, very feminine, over all good fit but if you are short the waist of the dress sits slightly lower than my natural waist.

Loved everything about this dress. The material is lightweight and flowy, making it a perfect long sleeved summer dress for work. Print is subtly heart shaped, enough so that it's versatile. I'm between a 2 and 4, and the 2 fit perfectly, so perhaps size down if you're in between sizes. I had no gapping issues with the buttons but I could see it being an issue with larger bust sizes.
Very flattering - retro cut. Would size up just so the buttons don't have a chance to gape at all. Perfect for work, weekends and anything in between.

links_reviews_title: A little puffy in the shoulders
links_reviews_text: This dress was ok. It was a little puffy in the shoulders and there was a lot of sleeve fabric. But it was fine.

links_reviews_title: Cute and fun dress but lays a little funny
links_reviews_text: Fun color and pattern. Received many compliments but pulls a little funny through the waist
Easy to dress up or down. The fit was great!

I loved this dress! I ended up wearing it to the rodeo with boots but it also looked great with heels and flats which dressed it up and down. It was thin material and a comfortable fit. The only issue I had was it kept coming unbuttoned in the chest which is generally not an issue for me. I recommend!

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for Valentine's Day at school!
links_reviews_text: I'm a 2nd grade teacher and rented this dress for Valentine's Day. It was super cute, comfortable, and I received a lot of compliments!
The heart print on this dress is perfect for Christmas and Valentine’s day. The fabric is soft and silky. Very comfortable and I received many compliments.

links_reviews_title: Such a cute dress but not the best for ladies with C cups and larger
links_reviews_text: I really wish I could have worn this dress. It fit perfectly everywhere else beside my boobs. I have 36Ds and that made gaps between the buttons. I would stay away or size up if you have a larger bust. Otherwise, great material, great length for either work or a night out.

It's beautiful in person, the photo can't quite capture it. I have an hourglass shape and normally fit a 6 or 8. I had room at the bust and hip with the 8, but the waist was fitted, so I probably could not have sized down. I liked the romantic flowy look and my husband liked it as well. Be sure to turn your torso forward in photos because the sleeves may appear very wide otherwise, skewing your silhouette.

Loved this dress. The color is great, you. Can definitely dress it up with a pair of heels. I wore it with stockings underneath and it hits my knee (I'm 5'6"). The only con is that the buttons sometimes come undone but, that didn't bother me. Will Rent again!

This dress is adorable and mostly flattering. That is, except where it gapped at the chest and belly. I wish the buttons went only halfway down the dress and had solid skirt bc the gapping at the belly area made it unwearable. I do have wider hips/butt than waist - sizing up might do the trick.
Feels good. Looks sweet on. Very cute. Want it back for Valentine's Day.
This dress fits great and is versatile - great for car shopping or add some heels and wear it to grab sushi . It's fun and flirty and makes you look put together without any effort!
At first the fit seemed weird but if you roll up the sleeves looks a lot better. It's very comfortable and cute with red lipstick.
If you have any doubt get a size larger than your normal size or the buttons will gap in an unflattering way.
This is an easy dress that RTR carries in a couple of different fabrics. It's great for work and fits very true to the Rebecca Taylor 4.
Adore this dress! Only flaw is that it gapped when I sat down, which was not great to discover in a meeting. Perfection when standing or perhaps with fashion tape.

I'm usually a size 6/8 but took the 10 in this to make sure the buttons covered my chest adequately. No problem there but any time I sat down, the buttons gaped in the skirt - both near the waist and the upper thigh. Fashion tape and safety pins helped a bit, but there's really just not a wide enough band of fabric behind the buttons to prevent skin from showing. A really unfortunate design flaw in an otherwise fantastic dress!
Loved this dress, although I needed to wear a cami under it because it was a little low cut for work.
The fit is strange- tight in the chest but loose in the back and shoulders. The print is cute and fun for work but wouldn't rent again
I rented a size 8. I'm a 6-8 and this did not fit! It was right on the waist and the bust. Was not flattering at all.

I loved the cut and design of this dress! The 3d hearts across the fabric we're darling and it fit really nicely with a flirty, twirly skirt. Super feminine but sleek enough to not feel too young in frills, really hits the perfect balance.

links_reviews_title: This was for a work seminar.
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress. Had to walk to the location. Was able to wear with sneakers then flip into pumps when I got there. Loads of compliments.
Great for work to a night out
Unfortunately too tight across the bust and the buttons pulled at the waist but very cute print and silhouette!
Fit well, was a little short in the arms for my frame but that was fine with me. Super cute and got tons of compliments
Cute dress, but one button in mid section were coming apart.

This was such a fun party dress. If done right, could also be a good work dress. Great movement and flow. Fabric was comfortable and so nice against my skin. Didn't wrinkle easily either, which I loved. Fit was perfect and true to size. The only downside was that the two buttons underneath my breasts kept getting undone. It was so annoying, and embarrassing! For that reason, I did not wear it to work. Otherwise, it would have been perfect if paired with a loose boyfriend blazer.
This dress is really beautifully cut and made. I loved wearing it with black tights and black boots. I would definitely rent it again.

I'm a pear shape so the top was very loose and billowy but looked great. The heats are a little subtle, which I liked. Used fashion tape to reduce gaping at the chest and hip height. Comfortable and cute dress.
The dress is beautiful, very flattering, just the right length. My biggest issue is that it is super staticky!!! Perhaps better to rent in the summer when coats aren't necessary.
Gorgeous fit! Wore it with flats to work and got so many compliments.
I've rented these earrings twice and would buy them if I could. They're lightweight, very pretty, and a little edgy.
These were just cute! Lightweight and easy to wear.
Lightweight earrings look great with any modern outfit.
Fit well but the arms are restricted. Not the most comfortable dress because of that but still a great dress. I'd recommend renting it!

links_reviews_title: I rented these to go with the Parker beaded dress for an anniversary dinner.
links_reviews_text: Really fun earrings and not too heavy!

These earrings are so cute! I like that the triangle pieces are not connected, so they move while you walk. These are so lightweight, they didn't bother or pull on my ears at all, which is hard to find with dangly earrings!
These earrings are really cute, but they were bigger than I thought they were from the RTR pics. They worked well with the dress and bracelet though, so all was well!
I wore these with an emerald green dress for a Mardi Gras themed Christmas party. They are very lightweight and a nice size to be noticeable without taking over the entire look. I loved them!

links_reviews_title: Great earrings! Not heavy at all! Looked great with my dress!
links_reviews_text: Beautiful gold earrings. Light weight. Perfect for any occasion.
Loved these earrings! They are very lightweight and easy to wear all night. I received many compliments on these!

I wanted to keep these earrings soo bad!! They were really lightweight, didn't bother me or irritate me (or my ears) at all. I wore them with the Jay Godfrey Back Out Dress and thought they complimented the lines/geometric style really well!

links_reviews_title: Earrings are pretty - edgy and lightweight
links_reviews_text: Earrings are pretty - edgy and lightweight - but they didn't really stand out and blended with my skin and hair color. Would've been better if my hair was up.

links_reviews_title: Watching The Lion King on Broadway
links_reviews_text: Sorry for the blurry picture. Earrings were large, but surprisingly lightweight. I enjoyed wearing them.
Perfect accessory for the dress. Classic.

links_reviews_title: Great accessories for a GREAT dress!
links_reviews_text: Beautiful earrings, well made. Not too heavy. Were the perfect addition for a very glam dress! Garnered a lot of compliments and felt great.
Very lightweight and comfortable.

links_reviews_title: LOVED these earrings! Wished I could keep them!
links_reviews_text: They were more lightweight than I expected and very pretty in person! I got a ton of compliments on them!
They were a lot bigger than I expected them to be, but they were very pretty and very light so they would have been comfortable, but because of their size they didnt work with my outfit for the night

links_reviews_title: These earrings were the highlight of my outfit.
links_reviews_text: I loved, loved these earrings!!! So lightweight, did not irritate my ears and a fantastic size.
Easy to use, not too heavy, perfect length, had no issues

links_reviews_title: These earrings are the perfect addition to your dress!
links_reviews_text: I really love these earrings! They are super shiny and add that extra glitz to your formal dress. I love that they are super light, so it doesn't hurt your ears at all. I'd definitely rent these again!

links_reviews_title: Made a statement without being over the top!
links_reviews_text: Simple but beautiful earring. Went well with the dress I also rented from RTR. Because of the earrings, I found it unnecessary to wear a necklace. The only other piece of jewelry I wore was a ring.

links_reviews_title: Wore this to my birthday dinner
links_reviews_text: Cute, a bit heavy but decent size
AV max tetra gold chain earrings were a hit. Perfect drop length and size. Would wear again and look into the label's other products. Worn here with the jay Godfrey line jumpsuit.
They were a great compliment to the geometric pattern of the Milly dress (shown in the picture). Really lightweight so I wore them all night with no problem!
I LOVED these earrings. They weren't too heavy and looked great. I received a lot of compliments.
Loved these earrings-- light weight too! I wanted to purchase these after I wore them!! They can probably go with anything :)
These earrings are incredibly light weight and look very elegant. I wish they were a little sturdier, but I was still very happy with them.
These were impossibly light weight which was exactly what I wanted. No headaches. Great geometric design that is the same in front and back. Highly recommend!

links_reviews_title: Easy, unique, great fit. What more could you ask for ?
links_reviews_text: This dress was a perfect fit for a full evening gala with cocktail reception, dinner and entertainment. It hugged all the right places without being too snug, and made me feel like a million bucks! The earrings and clutch pulled it all together.

links_reviews_title: Not what I rented but looked great!
links_reviews_text: Kudos to the staff at RTR for picking out something that worked out so well. The earrings I originally rented weren't in stock so they sent these. Super light weight which made them easy to wear all night!
Not too heavy, stayed on my ears all night. Exactly what I was going for. Occasionally the pyramids would flip open when dancing.
Was an awesome fit for the geometric plunging lbd I was to a black tie optional wedding. Sexy accents mirrored the v neck and other cuts of the dress without being overbearing. LOVED THEM

These earrings are lightweight and fantastic. An edgy and versatile design to give your look a little extra pizazz. I rented these to pair with an orange & pink Herve Leger dress which was too big but wound up using them with a hot pink sun dress and gold bangle for a wedding ceremony in Miami.

links_reviews_title: The earrings were the icing on the top of the cake
links_reviews_text: These were great! They weren't heavy at all and looked awesome with the dress that I rented as well. For a dance they were a little " swingy" but I mean that's what to expect from dangly earrings. Great and cheep accessory!
I wore these for New Years Eve. They reminded me of the 70s disco era. I loved them. I especially liked how lrge they were, while still being VERY light weight. I would buy them or rent them again.
These earrings were the first accessory that I have rented. They were bigger than what I expected but atleast they were light weight!

links_reviews_title: Great earrings for a formal event or just as an everyday statement wear!
links_reviews_text: Loved how the triangle part was larger, it made the right kind of statement. I would definitely rent these again!
The party had a futuristic theme, so these earrings helped me achieve the overall look I as going for.
Nice earrings! Looked great with the Shoshanna Make It Rain dress. Bigger than expected though.
A very beautifully made top, however it was very roomy! I wore it for work tucked in, but it would probably work better with skinny jeans and heels to balance it out!

links_reviews_title: I love this top but it runs large
links_reviews_text: I felt feminine wearing this top- loved it! I normally wear between large and xlarge in tops, this XL was quite roomy.
On the looser side; not sure if it's just the style. If I rent again, would probably try a small. Was a bit long, but again, not sure if that's the style or if it's because I'm short.

links_reviews_title: Great color for a wine party!
links_reviews_text: Very comfortable and loose fitting! Loved the pleats on this one!
Wore it to Thanksgiving with leather leggings and then to work with black pants and a blazer. Great quality and drape!
This pleated maroon top was fun to wear, though I didn't get the best photo of it. It was flowy but a little wide and boxy, so I wore it belted for most of the day.
Loved this top, it was so flattering and comfy! It did run a little big though, so it had an extra flowy vibe
Fit well. Caveat is I am 21/22 weeks pregnant. But since my upper body has not changed much, this top still fit well.
Worked great from the office out to dinner and drinks. Cute! The under layer stays with you while the top flares out. Will rent again!
Loved this top. Swishy and comfortable to wear for work. Wore it twice once with a blazer and dark skinny pant trouser and next with a cardigan and jeans. Loved it
True to size and I will be renting again!

links_reviews_title: Rented for family Thanksgiving, wore a different top.
links_reviews_text: It was a little snug in the chest, but not in a way that made it unwearable. Just shortened the front a little more than I prefer. It ended up hitting at like that in between spot that isn't great if you've got the "I had kids pooch." Was still going to wear it, hubby just liked a top I had recently bought better with the pants I had from RTR. I am a 38 C, so not tiny but not huge, and it still shortened the front several inches. Much better suited for flat/small chested women if you still want belly coverage. If you aren't worried about that then no big deal.

links_reviews_title: Fun, flowy blouse! I wore it to work a few times to mix up my wardrobe a bit.
links_reviews_text: Nice color, flowy & fun.

Cute color, fun neckline with swinging. Pleated material. However the Underlayment/tank was constructed oddly and made a weird effect under the pleats. Almost like it was made inside out. But it was connected so I couldn't take it off or reverse it under the top.
This is a pretty top and the perfect color for fall. It's a high low hem and it was a tad shorter in the front than I like.

This top runs small in the bust. The lining runs small, but the top layer that shows runs true to size. It was a little uncomfortable because it was tight over my bust, but looked great. Size up if you are big in the bust
This is very tunic/tent-like. I loved the style, but I needed to cinch it with a belt so I didn't look like a triangle.

links_reviews_title: Fits well length wise - tight on armpits don't lift your arms up
links_reviews_text: Was perfect for work! Length looked great (I'm 5'3 32C)- only complaint was it was right when I lifted my arms up. Other than that, great.
This shirt is so cute. It's great for business casual.

links_reviews_title: Love this easy to wear top!
links_reviews_text: Great color, drapes well, super easy to wear and love the pop of color! Looks fab under a gray cardigan or a black jacket.

links_reviews_title: True to size and great fall color!
links_reviews_text: Great color and fit like a normal loose/flowy top.

A zillion compliments over the color and unique neckline. Long enough to tuck in but looks good loose too. Hangs well wrinkles come out on a hanger overnight. I need to buy this simply because it looks good with so many colors in my jacket collection.
Easy blouse for every day wear. The blouse is lined and well made. The color is more rose in person. The top is a bit short but fits well with high waisted bottoms.
Felt polished for a zoom call even though I was wearing sweats and slippers.
The color was a brick red with brown tones, really gorgeous. The neck was tight and not amazing, but great quality material and lined.
Fit TTS - kinda boring but work appropriate. Not super flattering.

I rented this for work in a business casual office, but it was a bit more playful than I expected so I ended up wearing it out to dinner & drinks! Collar is very stretchy so it doesn't feel like it's choking you, and he sleeves were a perfect length for me. Fits very true to size but is so flattering if you want to hide your tummy (like I usually do) but still look chic.

links_reviews_title: Stylish, fun top! Got so many compliments on it! Wore it with black pants for a night out.
links_reviews_text: Flowy top, very flattering with skinny pants!
super cute

links_reviews_title: Liked this top, wish it was longer.
links_reviews_text: The fabric was silky and comfy, loved the color, but it rode the line of too short for me. Overall I would recommend, but just know it may be too short for long torsos.

Great fit and I wore it several times under blazer, sweater and jacket. It was functional as a layering piece and the elastic high neck and cuffs were the perfect touch. Versatile behind the scenes or totally solo.
Awesome for under a suit jacket! Lots of compliments!

links_reviews_title: Loved the color and the fit. Very comfortable
Got a lot of compliments at work.
links_reviews_text: Great color. Very on trend.
Comfortable, great with jeans.
Really pretty color. Too narrow in the shoulders. Didn't wear
Nice alternative for those who like wearing a turtleneck. Very comfortable. I've kept it all month. Paired it with Rag and Bones cargo jeans. Lots of compliments!

links_reviews_title: really nice quality and gorgeous color.
links_reviews_text: loved it, would rent again. Very flattering tucked in or untucked.
Wore this top with jeans. Would have kept except did not like how the top hung on my shoulders.
Really liked this top. Flowy and forgiving, but still good for work. I will say, in this pic it looks like a rusty orange. In person, it has a rosy hue. Beautiful, but less orange.
Stretchy high neck blouse-beautiful color. Runs true to size. Great for work but wasn't that exciting.

links_reviews_title: This is a cute top for work with slacks or jeans/booties!
links_reviews_text: Fits true to size

I wasn't sure about this shirt at first, but after a French tuck and wearing it around for the day, I fell in love! I got lots of compliments on how chic I looked. The material felt great and it was very comfortable.

I rented this because I loved the fall orange color in the picture. I already knew the cut was going to be hit or miss. Unfortunately, it was all a miss. I didn't care for the non-breathable fabric. The turtle neck elastic felt restrictive, yet the body had no shape. All in all, I felt like I was wearing a mauve smock , not orange smock.

This jacket is really nice. It has both a leather hood and jacket. I assumed the hood was cotton. It was too casual to wear with my work clothes, so I got less wear than I thought I would. Cropped Bomber jackets are tricky for my petit curvy hourglass figure. The only way I could get it to work was to match my shirt with the jacket. I wore it out to the outdoor pool on Saturday to watch my son's practice.

links_reviews_title: Leather coat perfection - I didn't want to send it back!
links_reviews_text: I kept this coat for a month and didn't want to send it back; I probably wore it every day I had it. It's blue with a black hood and a gorgeous blue silk lining. The hood was practical in the wind and rain and gave a sporty vibe the rest of the time. Honestly I don't think the pictures do this piece justice. The leather is so soft and amazing. I wish I could have kept it and I will definitely rent again! Fit was TTS. I'm a M shirt and got this in a L so I'd have room for layering.
I rented this to wear in London in the fall. It was perfect. I was able to wear it with jeans and a dress. The fit was true to size. Would buy if it wasn't so pricey. May rent again.

links_reviews_title: Cool jacket for a comedy show!
links_reviews_text: I adore this jacket! I seriously want to keep it. The bomber style looks so chic yet casual so I didn't feel overdressed for a dive bar or a comedy show, but I still felt nicely put together. The sleeves are a bit long on me, but I'm only five feet tall, so they probably should be too long! They were easy to push up a bit. Jacket was perfect over a cami for a cool 60 degree California summer evening, but I probably wouldn't wear it in actual cold weather. It is line though, so that's a plus. I love it, my husband loves it. When he saw it he goes uh where's my cool leather jacket!

links_reviews_title: Fabulous transitional piece for dressing a casual look up or a more formal look down.
links_reviews_text: True-to-size fit, fabulous black embellishments on a navy leather body. Haven't sent it back yet and probably won't until it gets too hot to wear :)

links_reviews_title: This jacket will give an everyday outfit some extra star power.
links_reviews_text: The jacket has a very casual look that is ramped up by the really nice leather....think leather hoodie meets bomber jacket. The cut of the jacket is a little boxy for me, but that might be solved by going down a size. Looks great with jeans and sneakers.
Beautiful and comfortable!! Versatile and stylish jacket thy pairs with almost anything!
This jacket is so great- sporty and cool but high quality. I love the colors- almost navy mixed with black. Fit is true to size, slightly cropped

links_reviews_title: I loved the fit and it was so comfortable!
links_reviews_text: If you don't like short jackets this is not for you. I had fun wearing it.
I liked this jacket, especially with some aviator shades.

This jacket was EVERYTHING! Held onto it for 3 months and wore it to so many different places. The leather is like butter. The color combo is unexpected and the navy absolutely beautiful. Could wear with practically anything! Great fit.
Great fit, cool details, lots of compliments

This is the perfect addition for a workday that started out at 6 degrees below! Threw it over the sweater dress and it was warm! Definitely could be used as a coat if the temperature was warmer. Very lightweight. Color was more blue/black than true black.

links_reviews_title: Very versatile for different occasions. Wore out for drinks and to take my kids to the park.
links_reviews_text: Not the greatest for warmth if you're in a super cold climate. Perfect for looking fashionable in cool weather if you won't be outside too long. I live in SF and it would be ideal for layering there. I used it visiting Dallas and it was in the 40°s which was borderline. SUPER cute and lots of compliments out and about at the museum and movies!
It was OK

links_reviews_title: I will wear this every day!
links_reviews_text: The leather is so soft and such a nice neutral blue that will go with anything like your favorite blue jeans. Does run a little small. I'm usually an XL, but sized grudgingly up to the 2xl and glad I did.
I love this leather bomber. I wore it as my every day casual jacket option in Los Angeles for a wedding weekend. It's so versatile comfortable warm and super stylish. I am considering purchasing it.

Absolutely loved this jacket. The blue color/black hood combo is so unique and allows you to wear it with more outfits. I am normally a small or medium and went with a small for a more fitted look. Would have bought it to keep forever if it were just a little less expensive!
looked cool

links_reviews_title: A great mix of classy and cool.
links_reviews_text: Loved this and wore it over and over and over :)

Perfect casual leather jacket for every day wear. Runs a little small so will return for a size up. I typically wear a small or medium in jackets and definitely need a medium for this one. I'll definitely consider buying if the medium fits.
Fits well.

links_reviews_title: I wanted to love this piece.
links_reviews_text: It literally was too small. I'd say it'd fit a 14/16 not a 22. I was super sad because it was cute but unfortunately it didn't work out.
I felt chic and cool in this jacket. Runs a tiny bit short and small so don't expect to wear a thick layer underneath. Jacket feels and looks great.

Worked with many different outfits! Over knit dress, or with jeans, it's dressy yet casual. A great transitional layer for fall or spring season. Loved the hood! Silky fabric on the inside is a nice touch!
Really nice soft high quality leather. Kind of casual since it's a hoodie. Didn't get compliments or comments on the jacket when I wore it but it felt good to wear!
Easy to wear with dressy and casual. Cropped at the waist but not tight so can layer.

links_reviews_title: fun to wear with jeans or any trousers
links_reviews_text: great jacket- dark navy color with black trim . a little short but very soft leather- looked brand new.
Really liked this jacket. It fit nice, was in good condition. Overall a good pick for a casual leather jacket.

links_reviews_title: It is a cute jacket with a hood -- which was why I rented it for a short trip to London.
links_reviews_text: Wore it once or twice and was a nice basic.
This jacket is soft and fit very well. I will definitely get it again this winter, it was too hot to wear now. Love the cut & sporty fit. It is dark navy blue w/ black accents

I'm normally a medium or 8/10 in jackets, but I ordered this in a large due to the reviews indicating that it runs very small. That was a mistake. I would say that this jacket slightly large, so I would not recommend sizing up unless you have broad shoulders and a large bust. The quality and style are fantastic so I will be reordering this in my normal size M.

I didn't get to wear this much because I rented in June but it was perfect for a cool night wandering around Paris. I wish the pockets were better for hands but it was nice to have the snaps. I will def rent again in the fall.
Unique and fun. Great for weather on shoulder of summer. Would go with size up next time for less fitted/more slouchy feel.
Just loved this jacket! Wish I could afford to own it. Wore it many times

links_reviews_title: Would buy this if I could afford it
links_reviews_text: Which is why RTR subscription is so great

Pros: soft and buttery high-quality leather, fully lined in nice, silky material, unusual dark blue and black color combination, great fit, soft fabric cuffs can be folded to best sleeve length fit. Cons: pockets are a little small. I kept this one a couple months which brought me through end of spring/early summer weather where a jacket like this is perfect and am really thinking about buying it...
So cute and perfect for early spring in Chicago. Instant cool factor
This is blue, not black. But hood is black. Very oddly shiny.

links_reviews_title: A bit masculine but so cool
links_reviews_text: I love the hood and pockets- this was definitely hard to send back because of how practical it was. However, it definitely wasn't flattering my body and I felt like it was making my outfits less feminine.

This is a really nice top that drapes well. Fabric is heavy and does not wrinkle the moment you sit down, which is a pro. It is a bit short in the front (I'm 5'8" with broad shoulders) so plan on pants with waistband at your natural waist, or an under-layer. I would rent again.
Beautiful top. Can dress up or down, and goes with everything
Very comfortable top for work. Step up from your standard black top.
Cute shirt and fit well size wise. However with a bigger chest the wrap part of the shirt laid weird and it didn't look right at all. Wore once just to get a wear out of it.
Perfect for work.
Great top! Very flattering.
Well made top that looked great with slacks or a skirt. Cut is beautiful.
Fits true to size, very versatile piece. Like the subtle draping and three-quarter sleeves. Overall, seemed like a good quality staple blouse I could wear with a lot!

links_reviews_title: Very nice top. Chic and good for work. It fit me perfectly on my 5'2, 123lb frame.
links_reviews_text: This would be a bit short for anyone with a longer torso/taller.
Love this top for work or date night or dressy brunch. Fits perfectly. Very flexible and would look great with high end jeans, skirts or slacks.
Didn't wear. Boxy, sleeves are too big. Made me look completely shapeless.

links_reviews_title: This is a great top, very flattering cut.
links_reviews_text: It can show your midrift when you lift up your arms, may want to wear with a tank under.
I specifically ordered this to wear to work with dress pants. Good for every day wear. Kinda short in the front.

links_reviews_title: Really love this top for work!
links_reviews_text: Love this top for work, roomy in the shoulders. I am in between m/l and went with the large. It is a little cropped and can flap open if you're not careful, but the slit doesn't go all the way up so it's not revealing. May purchase for work such a versatile piece!

This vest is beautiful! I rented for brunch on the weekend and loved it. If I rented again I'd probably go up a size and rent the small instead the arm holes were a bit tight on me. Otherwise such a pretty piece, super soft and warm.
Adds a little extra to your everyday outfit!

I really liked the short back and the sharp diagonal down to the front. The collar is quite big but that works without being over the top for our casual office. I like the chunky yarn. My only complaint is that the back and shoulders felt very tight, and I should have sized up to medium. I'm in between but usually can get away with small.
I loved this piece. I matched this with jeans and a fitted tee, and also matched it with a skirt for work. I felt like so polished and pulled together. I would definitely get this again!

Rented this for an upcoming vacation/ski trip in Vail. I did not expect to love this as much. The knit is cozy and sturdy. The faux fur is a fun element and elevated the look. I got so many compliments on it. Definitely considering purchasing.
This made a boring outfit very fun !!! It's cute, shorter in the back and longer in the front !

Got lots of compliments for this vest! Especially how soft the faux fur is. It was actually pretty warm too!!! One star off because of comfort: the material used (especially on the lower portion of the back) was itchy. It was piercing through my clothes. If you do not mind the itchiness, you're good to go. If you mind it, wearing extra layer underneath your clothes (undershirts, etc) may help. Otherwise, very stylish!

Cute and maternity friendly if you're knocked up. I like that the back was a racer back, but that did mean it rode up further in the back around your waist. It made it have a little more shape than if was long all over
Such a fun layering piece with faux fur accents and a lovely and flattering drape to it. Paired with a turtleneck and it was amazing! Definitely renting again for the holidays.

links_reviews_title: I wore this for a girls brunch and got a TON of compliments :) very comfy, versatile. So pretty!!
links_reviews_text: Perfect fit lots of room to move.

This was my first piece/ rental from RTR & I'm seriously so obsessed with it! I wish I was able to purchase. I received so many compliments from my co-workers as well as random people @ the grocery store! 10/10 recommend the cardigan. Will definitely re-rent next fall/ winter!

links_reviews_title: having the perfect sweater for my snowy vacation
links_reviews_text: fits great; a little heavier through the shoulders, however, a beautiful key addition to my wardrobe

This is a beautiful sweater. I wore a tight, black sweater and skinny black pants underneath so as not to detract from the sweater. Be aware that it is very long (mid-thigh on me) in the front and super short in the back (mid-back). It will not cover anything back there! It was also a little tight in back when I first put it on (if you have a substantial chest or broad shoulders you might want to size up) but I didn't really notice it being tight during the day. I don't feel the need to keep this any longer than one wear. It's an obvious sweater. Might rent again one day. Might not. There are so many other things to try!

links_reviews_title: Easy to wear and warm vest!
links_reviews_text: Loved this vest - would buy for my closet! Easy to wear and, actually, kept me very warm! Has pockets that came in handy and the back of the vest falls right above the belt/waist (so it doesn't look overly baggy).
Loved this! The sweater vest fit great, was comfy, and added a bit of flair to an otherwise boring outfit. I received a few compliments? about my Game of Thrones sweater.
Wore this out on the weekend as a cozy addition! Also wore to work to add something to a basic top, pants and boots outfit. Super cozy and a fun addition to almost any outfit
Cute vest, simple to style. Add to almost any outfit. Loved the back!

links_reviews_title: Just love it. Prob will buy it!
links_reviews_text: Try to fit

When It came I wasn't excited Bc the back is really cropped short, which I didn't realize from the pics. Then I started to wear it and really loved it. Soft neck and great pockets. Upper back part is a little stiff but not bad. Picture doesn't do it justice.
Great fit!

The fit is maybe a touch smaller than what a true XL should be based on other designers with similar styles that I've tried, but it's hardly noticeable since it is a baggier style. It's extremely comfortable, though the one I received is starting to pill in areas so that might be something to keep in mind if you're a perfectionist on things like that. I really didn't mind as I was planning on wearing this just as a casual thing over a flare-day outfit and it is perfect for that! It would also be super cute with a day dress or a homecoming/cocktail style dress! It's comfortable enough to wear with a tank top or short sleeved shirt on hotter days without feeling like you're going to die from heat while still also adding warmth for cooler, spring type days. I would definitely rent this item again and wish I could buy it myself!

links_reviews_title: Best way to glam up the suburban transplant wardrobe of black leggings, tight black shirt & boots!
links_reviews_text: Beautiful color and faux fur. Unfortunately the back is too long for me but not bad.
Cool vest, but odd fit in the back- it ran very short, but super long in the front. Overall I liked it for one night, but wouldn't rent again.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful detail. Photos don't give it justice
links_reviews_text: Loved this piece. Would definitely rent again but more in the dead of winter as the color and leather backing were a bit warm. I also have a wide ribcage so would most likely go up a size from a M to a L.

links_reviews_title: Cute look to jazz up and outfit
links_reviews_text: This piece was really cute and much warmer and thicker than I anticipated. In SoCal this sufficed as a jacket on a winter day. It was a little small for me, especially in the arms, if I hadn’t had long sleeves underneath it would have been unwearable. I also found the leather back really stiff and a little uncomfortable. But the front was cozy and has pockets! And the fur trim made it look more posh. \

Loved the High-Lo cut of this vest. Very flattering! This was the perfect way to dress up maternity basics. Excellent material quality. Only con is it runs small. Im normally a size small but even the medium was a bit tight in the upper back. If you have broad shoulders or back, size up.
Super flattering with a high back and great fur collar. Heavy fabric- so best for the cold months.

links_reviews_title: I want to keep this vest SO BAD
links_reviews_text: This vest is amazing and luxurious!! I rented it for a weekend in NYC and never want to take it off. Wore with both white and black long sleeve shirts. Looks great with fitted jeans and booties. I got so many compliments!
Adds an interesting touch, pockets are nice
I could wear this everyday! I wish I owned this - waiting for the price to be reduced so I can buy. So comfy and warm and luxurious!

The sweater part is beautifully made. I have broader shoulders and found the racer back (a stiff, suede-like piece) to fit small. The fur collar is a bit bigger than I expected, so makes a bit of a statement, but the best pairs well with jeans so can be dressed casually.

Oh, the collar. The beautiful blue fur colored collar. And the way it hangs. And how flattering it is. I could go on but you should just rent it and put in and find out for yourself. You won't be disappointed. I wore it to work, to dinner, to brunch, to a holiday party. Loved, loved, loved. Almost shed a tear when I packed it in the return bag.
I wore this vest more times than I can count. Seriously contemplated keeping it. Looks great over jeans, leggings, leather skinnies, etc. It is FABULOUS!

This is my second time renting this and I loved it as much this time as the first time around. Really unique, cozy, flattering piece that I wore out and about, as well as to work. Got lots of compliments. Also very warm!

links_reviews_title: so luxe and different. Got compliments every where i went. Rent it!!
links_reviews_text: The collar on this makes this everything.
Didn't wear awkward due to very small armholes. Probably better for smaller busted and shorter women.

links_reviews_title: Warm and fashionable when working on a film set behind the scenes.
links_reviews_text: This was a decent rental. I wore it working on a film set where the temperature was set low and it was chilly. The back rides up and is shorter than it should be, particularly for someone who is tall like me -- I am 5'8" and the short back hit my ribs, not my waist. I felt a tad awkward about the back.
Heavy on the neck

links_reviews_title: The fur collar and the leather t back.
links_reviews_text: Warm and Cute. It's shorter in the back and I might have liked it to be same length all the way around to cover my derriere but it was great.

LOVE this shirt! Only problem is it runs large. I'm usually 2-4 and ordered a 4, I wore it once, and returned but will definitely rent again either as a 0 or 2.. Note: cuffs a very long. If you're petite especially. This is definitely a fashion top, and should be not worn for work or when you need some type of practicality.
I just could not figure out how to wear this blouse!! Very odd. Just did not work for me b

links_reviews_title: Avante Garde shirt, but you need to size down.
links_reviews_text: So I usually order a 0 or 2 in Monse. I definitely think a 0 would have fit me better because the 2 was ginormous. The cut of the shit is very cool but if the fit is too big, you won't get the cool shoulder crease.

The color of the sweater is very pretty in real life, it's an oversize fit so it works well with leggings or skinny jeans and taller boots, but I bet it would be cute with sneakers too. Overall a very good sweater,
All I want to wear on the weekend. Perfect amount of oversized for petites
Man I wish I could keep this one. It's so soft and cozy. Such nice quality material, hangs really well, oversized but still flattering, beautiful garnet red color. Love love love
Obsessed with the color and feel of this sweater. This kept me plenty warm on my vacation to Iceland. Very soft material.
Purchased size up to wear with tights and leggings. love the oversized look and it's very warm and comfy
Classic soft Vince sweater. Not sexy in any way but perfect for a day you want something cozy and warm. Flecks of blue and true-red on wine-red base.

links_reviews_title: This is the most wonderful thing I have ever worn. So soft. Such a beautiful color. Hangs perfectly.
links_reviews_text: Perfect in every way.

This oversized sweater in a rich maroon was just enough color and bulk to ward off winter doom and gloom. Felt cozy and loved the slight variation in the yarn that added interest to the weave. I wore it with black jeans and over the knee black suede boots, as well as with just regular jeans for lounging.

I love the color of this sweater. A beautiful mahogany red. Definitely more on the warm red palette and not a bluish burgundy. The back has two slits on the hem which add cleverness to the style. It's also very soft, which I appreciate as I loathe itchy sweaters. Perfect length arms and not too long. Structurally, I loved it. It came smelling of the previous renter's perfume, which initially made me nervous about the cleanliness of this rental. But then I discovered I really liked the scent, so now I'm trying to find out what it is. I prefer to see the positive in situations.

links_reviews_title: For a walk in the park, catching up with a friend, and a car ride...
links_reviews_text: Gorgeous color. Perfect fit. Astoundingly luxurious double ply cashmere.

I loved this sweater and debated whether or not I should send it back. I wore it a few times for holiday gatherings and even once to work. It was cute with leggings and jeans. I love the deep red color. It even had flecks of blue. It was a perfect length to cover my backside. The material was a great thickness and soft! Would definitely rent again.

links_reviews_title: Great quality oversized sweater. Easy to throw on in a rush.
links_reviews_text: Fit as expected and great quality.

links_reviews_title: Seriously wore this ALL THE TIME. Cosy and cute.
links_reviews_text: Runs large but very easy piece to throw on a tidy up a pair of jeans/leggings.

links_reviews_title: fun for cozy weekend in the woods
links_reviews_text: Really thick and warm, so if you're wearing inside, make sure to have layers underneath to take off.

The perfect cozy-chic sweater. Beautiful color and an unbelievably soft knit. I ended up returning earlier than anticipated because the weather wasn't cooperating with my knitwear dreams, but will definitely rent again once winter is officially here.

links_reviews_title: I could wear this sweater everyday! It's so comfortable and looks great!
links_reviews_text: Very loose fitting, oversized but without looking sloppy

Loved this!! Will rent again. Very lovely, flattering and somewhat unique (because of color and neck). Wore to work with jeans and boots and to a nice dinner with slacks and flats. A little loose so could wear in high 50s/low 60s weather

I love this sweater - it is so soft! It is also the perfect combination of comfortable and stylish. There is enough structure that you get a nice shape, which is necessary with this kind of oversize style. It runs true-to-size or large. I rented a Large, but probably could have gone with a Medium. Totally tempted to keep this one!
Such a cozy sweater! The material is a beautiful color and very soft. Nice details as well. A great sweater for every day wear, definitely runs large but has an intentionally oversized look.

Really love this as an everyday sweater. Super soft and looks really cute with leggings. Great for 50/60 degree weather day, keeps you warm without overheating you. I wish I could keep it, but I will definitely be renting again!

links_reviews_title: Worn for everyday-- work and weekend. Cute with distressed jeans and bootie for date night!
links_reviews_text: Super soft, and easy to wear sweater
Good oversized sweater. Soft and comfortable!
nice color
I love the color of this sweater, it has hints of blue yarn in it, which looks great with denim.
This is the perfect late fall / winter sweater. It's warm, soft, and very comfortable. It is over-sized, so anticipate it fitting like the model in the picture.
Very comfortable, oversized sweater. I wouldn't say it's the most flattering, but very warm.
I LOVE this sweater. A small wasn't available so I rented a medium. So glad I did as the fit was slouchy and cool. I wore this multiple times.
A little big but super cozy
Fits large, so cozy! Not itchy at all! Great color.
Wore this 3 or 4 times and loved it. Long enough to wear over tights and doesn't look too bulky with jeans. Would rent again.
Loved this sweater!

Overall fit was relaxed and comfortable but I found this sweater to be TOO HOT and slightly itchy. If you're sensitive to itchy sweaters I would recommend passing on this one. Wore it to the office for casual Friday. 30ish degrees outside and cool office environment. I was burning hot all day indoors and couldn't wait to get this sweater off by the end of the day! And I tend to run cold too. I will not be renting again.
I rented this sweater a size larger than normal so that I could wear it with leggings. I love it! It's soft and so pretty. It's a nice weight and looks every bit as good on as it does in the photos.

This sweater feels so luxurious to wear. The fabric is so soft, I never want to send it back! I don't find the fit particularly flattering or unflattering but the color is beautiful and I have received multiple compliments from strangers. Rent!! You won't regret.
This is the best sweater. Warm, soft as a kitten's tummy...lol! I swore I wasn't going to buy anything but this baby is not going anywhere! Purchased it!
I love the oversized look of this sweater and the material is extremely soft and comfortable! Definitely my favorite sweater
I love the ruffle and the top as a whole it was just too much material for me as I am 4'11 so I tucked it in a wore it as a crop as shown in the pic :)

links_reviews_title: Great fit and true to size!
links_reviews_text: Great fit and fun to wear. Lightweight too which was great for the Florida heat. I'm actually going to purchase it because I love it so much.

links_reviews_title: Adorable back, sinched waist, and statement sleeves.
links_reviews_text: Fit was perfect at the waist for an xs/0. Statement sleeves, the beautiful back and tie, and the drop neckline were all great pros. Cons: if you have a large chest, it might not fit so comfortably. I'm a 32D and I was squeezed in at the chest. Otherwise the fun sleeves are so much fun!
Perfect for day to night !
Fresh, comfortable, true to size I am size 6 and wore size small
Frumpy, didn't do anything for me. Wasn't flattering. I rented for my daughters birthday party but didn't end up wearing it. Was a bummer.
Love this top! Great summer staple

links_reviews_title: A fun blouse to dress up an otherwise standard outfit
links_reviews_text: Blouse fit better than expected and draped nicely. It was a great blouse to wear for casual Friday at work as the scoop in the back is still above the bra strap line

Loved all the ruffles! Could have probably sized down even though I'm busty. But the back is so cute. I wasn't sure how to use the tie...so I did it wrong. But still got lots of compliments! Almost bought this one...still might.

Loved this top! I’m normally really self conscious about my arms but the ruffles on the shoulders made me comfortable. This top can be dressed up or down. I wore it with jeans to dinner! So cute and I got so many compliments

links_reviews_title: Just missed the mark for work.
links_reviews_text: I liked this top a lot more online then on me. Ruffles are very dramatic, fabric was a bit seethrough, waist detail made me appear larger. Stylist notes say best for a-c cup and I would agree as my D looked a bit snug but didnt feel it.

I liked the look of this top online more than I did in person. In the photo, the ruffle is more understated whereas in person, it was a bit unmanageable. It kept blowing into my face! Other than that, I absolutely would recommend this top.

I love this blouse by Trina Turk! Running true to size with some stretch, I recommend wearing your true size for your primary size and going up for the back-up. This style is straight throughout the midsection. It works best for A - C cups sizes. You are able to wear a standard bra with this blouse.
true to size

I wore this wine tasting with my hubby. The ruffles are big and I was not sure I could pull the look off. But I ended up wearing it and thought it was cute. I was able to wear a normal nude colored bra with the straps lengthened a bit. Cute top for a day date!

links_reviews_title: Cute, comfy top with a little bit of pizazz
links_reviews_text: Liked this top, easy to wear and comfortable. The ruffles are fun and playful but they look a bit like wings in the back that to me were a little much so I paired with a cardigan to tame it down.
Love the ruffles -- this is so flattering! I could have sized down to a S for a more fitted look, but it was still cute. Looked great with skinny jeans.
Flattering fit and nice material.
Very Cute and Summery
Ordered this as a summer work shirt, the ruffles are very big and shirt somewhat bulky. Didn't end up wearing
Fitting in bust and then flare
I love all the ruffles on this top. It's very feminine and a great basic white blouse.
I bought this shirt for work, but the fabric was too thin and frilly. Might be better for a casual weekend outfit
#classy

links_reviews_title: It was pretty but see through.
links_reviews_text: I didn't end up wearing it because it was see-through and I didn't have anything that looked right underneath. I thought the style was very pretty but the ruffles popped up more than in the picture and made me feel like I was wearing shoulder pads.

links_reviews_title: Loved this shirt! May end up purchasing it
links_reviews_text: Fit great. True to size

links_reviews_title: Got it to wear for fun.
links_reviews_text: Looked better on the hanger. I like ruffles, but this top made my shoulders look extra broad. When your husband says "that's not the top for you, what else did you get", you know not to wear it! LOL Someone with smaller bust or maybe a size 8 or below with slender shoulders would rock this top ( I am a size 10-12). I paired it with a navy blue slightly flared pant (similiar to the photo on the website) and some navy and white espadrilles.
It was a little more ruffly than I expected
Really fun and really works well with a pair of shorts or jeans to take things up a notch!

This shirt runs large, then add the uncontrolled ruffle and it feels even bigger. Ironing helps tame the ruffle. I loved the detail and the model's photos, but she shirt fell short for me in every day life.

links_reviews_title: This is a fantastic blouse for work.
links_reviews_text: I received a lot of compliments on this blouse. It's perfect for summer and very stylish for work.
Liked this top. Not love, but ok

links_reviews_title: fun day at a birthday gathering
links_reviews_text: fits slightly large in the chest -- for someone with a larger breast size but body tape made it work
This is a cute top that was great with skinny jeans and and heels- the ruffles are sweet/fun, but the slightly open back is a little sexy!
the fabric wrinkles easily, but it's a nice top.
Not at allllll great for large busted women, the side panels stick out like wings. Would have been super cute on someone with a smaller bust though

links_reviews_title: Cool cut but not the right style for me.
links_reviews_text: I loved this on the model but for me there was too ouch 'floof '. When I walked, the back ruffles would bounce up and down.
It wasn't a good fit for my athletic build.
Accentuated all the wrong parts for me; did not wear because of the awkward fit. Made my already short torso look shorter

links_reviews_title: Cute but not the best for long torso.
links_reviews_text: Cute but not the best for long torso.

You can see through the arm holes on the side so you'll have to wear something cute under it. It's a fun color and cut though but definitely just a one time rental for me. Mine arrived with the sleeves wrinkled and rolling up at the ends so looked kind of sloppy.

links_reviews_title: Cute boxy shape. Perfect for high-waisted jeans.
links_reviews_text: You can size down if you don't want it too boxy.

I got this in the smallest size possible (which was like 2 sizes down from normal) and that seemed to work for this fun oversized shirt. Wore w a black sports bra bc the arm holes are big. It's cotton which I didn't expect I thought it would be silkier so def casual but I liked it!
Not for petites nor those with narrow shoulders.

links_reviews_title: Run a bit big and big arm opening
links_reviews_text: Fits loose. Arrived with tag on. Has a huge underarm opening so you must wear undergarment. Good for busty women
I didn't wear this top because it was very large on me though it was a size small.

links_reviews_title: Color bled, more pink than white
links_reviews_text: This shirt was listed as red/white color combo but the red has bled significantly and turned the white to pink. The fit is slightly cropped and boxy - I think you could size down and still keep the same boxy fit expression. The hem and sleeves are casually rumpled and tend to fold into themselves. Overall, a very relaxed and casual style.

links_reviews_title: If you want to look like a box.. This is your shirt.
links_reviews_text: Very boxy. The arm holes are crazy big.

Such a nice top I should have listened to reviews. You can see all of creation underllll the arms. Need to wear a cami. Frankly doesn't make sense to do so though. I thought because I have bigger bust you wouldn't see but no you can. Could not wear it

links_reviews_title: Cute - but beware large arm holes!
links_reviews_text: This is a cute top to change things up a bit. It definitely runs big, so order a size down, but it looks nice and polished. You will need to wear something under it, though - if you look closely at the picture, you'll notice the armholes go down to about mid torso!

links_reviews_title: Very trendy piece I would have never bought! But that's why RTR is ah-mazing.
links_reviews_text: Adorable fit! You will need to wear a bralette or bandeau underneath as the arm holes are quite large.

links_reviews_title: Cute top, wear a tank under it
links_reviews_text: the fit is a bit oversized, but looks cute with jeans and shorts

links_reviews_title: cute summer top wide side openings
links_reviews_text: This top runs large. I sized down and it was good. the opening on the sides for your arm are very low, you can see your bra and your torso below your bra. It would not be a good choice if you want to raise your arms. I thought it was fine for going to dinner and walking around.

links_reviews_title: Comfy, unique alternative to standard tee
links_reviews_text: This top is great for everyday wear and can be dressed up or down. I brought it on vacation and was able to wear it several ways and it changed up my look so I didn't have to stick with my standard black and white tees. It is purposely oversized, slightly cropped, and the arm holes are big, but nice and breezy for summer and looks cute paired with a lacy bralette!
great for the 4th of july holiday

links_reviews_title: Rented for a Where's Waldo Party
links_reviews_text: perfect for the theme without being cheesy. just an overall cute shirt!

links_reviews_title: Fun summer tee with retro feel
links_reviews_text: As others have said, the armholes are very deep so wear something underneath you don't mind people seeing. The sleeves do stick out a bit at the shoulder, as shown in the model photos. Fabric is like a perfectly worn in, thick cotton t-shirt which is what gave me the retro vibe.
Very comfy and cute. Arms are very open so wear a cute bralette that can be seen

The shirt is boxy and slightly cropped, which was the exact silhouette I was looking for. I recommend pairing with high rise pants or denim due to the cropped cut of the shirt. There were two potential cons, however. First, it was slightly too wide, so if you're not a fan of oversized tops or are petite, it might not be the best option. Second, the sleeves were very open, and so I had to layer with a tank top to wear to work - otherwise you could have seen my entire bra/ side boob when lifting my arms.
This felt really too big. Maybe a smaller size would have been better but it is a cropped shirt.

links_reviews_title: Very cute but open on sides
links_reviews_text: This top fit well, looked cute on, and had a certain vintage feel that brought me back to my early college years :) it goes well with almost any pair of jeans, but I have to warn that it's completely open under the arms/sides. if your arms aren't straight down at your sides at all times, it is very easy to see your bra/chest and stomach through the arm holes. This wasn't really the look I was going for and I was self conscious while wearing it. I wore a bandeau under it, and my stomach could still be seen whenever I moved my arms.

The shirt is cropped and boxy (I'm 5'7" and narrow on top). I liked that the sleeves flare out which adds volume to my shoulders. The arm holes are low, which I liked because it made the shirt feel more lightweight than it is, but at certain angles your bra might be visible. Overall, would rent again as a more interesting everyday tee.
So big and returned right away.

Pros: The fabric is very soft and it wears very comfortably. I received this with the sales tag still on, and the colors already looked washed-out and cozy in the way you WANT your tee to feel. That said, I'm an hourglass shape, so sometimes boxy cuts work and sometimes...they just don't. This one unfortunately doesn't: the pattern + the cut is extremely unflattering unless a light jacket is layered on top. Also beware: the arm holes are VERY wide...I would only wear this over a bra that you're VERY comfortable showing to the world!

I don’t know how I failed to take a picture of this as I wore it so many times! This is a great better-than-basic t-shirt, really cool and goes with a lot of stuff. The material is cotton jersey like any tee, but it’s a substantial weight so it holds its shape nicely (doesn’t wrinkle or roll). The fit is definitely wide and loose, and it looks great with shorts and skinny jeans. I went with the 1 instead of the 0 because I wanted that boxy oversized look and I didn’t want it to be too cropped. It was not very cropped, and I probably could have sized down but I liked the fit. The arm holes are very large (probably due to the cut and not to the larger size) so the sides of your bra will show on the sides unless you keep your arms down. Really pretty dark red color, leaning a bit more toward a cool red not an orangey red. Wore it with jeans in NYC on a spring day and on vacation in Florida twice.

links_reviews_title: I like this but the small is huge had to mail right back
links_reviews_text: will rent the xtra small
Perfect for work into night with nice black pants. So comfortable but looks tailored and put together.
Comfortable, slimming, with soft, lighter weight fabric that didn't wrinkle. Runs a bit long. I'm 5'6" and it falls below my knees.
Love this one - definitely figure hugging (need spanx) but otherwise great length - just below the knee. Very flattering.
I like the length on this one
The fabric was thick but I was still able to move around. The sleeves were a perfect length, hit just above the elbows. The dress was very form flattering. Wore this to a daytime brunch.
love it!
I'm 6' and it falls below the knee which is so amazing. Love the structure of the dress - great for work.

I rented this for a winter wedding, and it was a really lovely, comfortable and flattering piece, but definitely not quite right for a formal wedding. It felt a little heavy and dark for that occasion.

I had this one hearted for a while and debated renting it because the color looked a little bright for my liking. But it's actually a forest green and navy, very pretty! The fit is perfect, great length for work!

links_reviews_title: Sharp and professional but very long!
links_reviews_text: This dress was much longer than pictured and unfortunately just an awkward length...hit me between knee and mid-calf (and I'm really tall!). I'm a true hourglass and found this to be large in the hips so would be great for pear shapes. May re-rent in a smaller size, as it is a nice dress for work.
I wore this one for a day in the office. Easy to pair with teal wedge shoes. Very comfortable, flattering sleeve but a little roomy

I didn't end up wearing this because it wasn't super flattering around my tummy area and the neckline was so low cut. It looked cute with a button down underneath, but I just didn't love it so didn't wear it. It was nice quality though.

links_reviews_title: Cute little dress! Styled with Grey Ant sunglasses and a J. Crew coat.
links_reviews_text: Can't wait to wear this to brunch or something, may wear a long sleeve too under it to avoid too much cleavage. It's really comfortable.

links_reviews_title: Tough to pull off in winter / Short
links_reviews_text: Layering the right colors was hard, it was a bit short for me but I wore on a Friday so it was a fun change of the normal variety for my work rentals.
I really enjoyed this dress. There are so many variations in styling, and it's beautifully made.

links_reviews_title: The greatest dress I've ever worn
links_reviews_text: Everything about this dress was perfect. The gold hardware is great, fit was flattering, and color is pretty. Plus it had pockets! I highly recommend this dress and will definitely be renting again!

links_reviews_title: Thick fabric with pretty button details
links_reviews_text: Runs a little big but it's pretty for work.

The dress fit perfectly! It is a little low cut and can be worn with a long sleeve shirt underneath if needed. It hugged the right places and fit great! Follow me on Instagram @saidbymelissa to see all my RTR outfits!

I got compliments on this dress all day. I wore it with a collared shirt underneath to make it a bit more professional. Without a shirt underneath, it would have been way too revealing to wear to court (which might just be the case for larger chested women). It's classic and cute- highly recommend! I can wear a 4 or 6 but opted for the 6, which fit perfectly other than the shoulders of the dress being slightly too broad/long and it therefore being too low cut.

Super cute! Wore out for a date with heels and on vacation in New Orleans with Sneakers. I did wear a tank underneath it both times because my bust size is 34DDD and I wasn't comfortable. I highly recommend!
Loved the femininity of the color and masculine cut of the dress
Very easy to put on and looked cute with flats or heels. Loved the buttons and how it was truly double breasted. Great fit, material and color. Loved it.
Loved the retro style and stretchy fabric. Too low cut and I am not that big up top.

links_reviews_title: This dress is super cute. It runs a little small but loved it
links_reviews_text: I had to leave the last button open so it wouldn't be too tight

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for a summer work conference
links_reviews_text: Loved this blazer dress! A fav
Sorry ladies I killed it. Don't bother renting this dress bc my look was untoppable BLAXIDERMY style for the art exhibit. Great color. Comfort. Pockets.
A touch too low cut for work
I had to safety pin the bust, overall super cute

links_reviews_title: TAKE ME OUT TO THE BALLGAME
links_reviews_text: Absolutely loved this double breasted dress. Got so many compliments! Great shade of pink (might not work with someone who is pale though). A little right in the hips - if you're wide hipped - definitely size up. Wore to an Awards Ceremony at Fenway Stadium - paired with white sneaks.

links_reviews_title: Cute, but requires a cami or jacket for work
links_reviews_text: So unique and adorable -- picks up stains easily. :)

links_reviews_title: Really cute for a work event - had an 80's work vibe
links_reviews_text: It was way too big unfortunately. When I walked it road up and when I sat down at my desk the top was so big on me the shoulders didn't even touch my body. I should have gotten the size 6. Also more of an outfit for someone with a straighter body and not curvy - since the outfit is on the "boxier" side

Obsessed with this tuxedo dress. I wore it for an event I was hosting and paired it with a cute pair of sneakers. I wish i would’ve ordered one size down only because it was big up-top, I’m not buddy so sometimes dresses are tough. The color was awesome. I didn’t take enough pics in it lol! So i will definitely rent again :)

Loved this dress! I originally rented it for work, but ended up wearing it just for fun. It is so sophisticated and the details are gorgeous - the gold buttons (note: it zips in the back) and structured cut look so high-end. It did run a little large though, so consider sizing down if you want a tighter fit. For more of my RTR looks, check out my Instagram @hannahkahn.
Fit is a little loose for my normal size but still worked. Fabric is a little heavier, very nicely made. Wore well all day and tons of compliments at work.

I loved this dress so much, I was sad to have to return it. Received compliments all night. My fiancé wants to buy it for me because he said it was such a great dress and fit on me. Will definitely rent again .
Wore it for a graduation ceremony reception. Was very professional but fun and fit very well! I loved it.
I really liked it but I had to be careful as the button kept on opening up when distracted. Overall really nice.

LOVE this dress! I was worried it would look a little too '80s but rented anyway to force myself out of my comfort zone - so glad I did! It's very well fitting and looks fantastic for work. I got SO many compliments! Fantastic rental.
I love this dress so much. I got so many compliments. Fits well. Great material. You can actually use the pockets. Light weight. It's perfect.

links_reviews_title: Very cute, wish it wasn't so large
links_reviews_text: The top of the dress ran large and the rest of it was boxy. I should have ordered a size down. I would reorder it in a smaller size.

links_reviews_title: I was not able to wear it.
links_reviews_text: Fits only on the back but too big, unflattering low cut in the front.
Nicely fit
The dress was a bit big in the chest so the second time I wore a white tee underneath.

I got tons of compliments. Walking down the street with heels, Fendi sunglasses and some gold jewelry made me feel like I was owning the look. If you have no bust and are not curvy size down. Also the first time I wore it I didn't look carefully in the mirror and I was probably showing too much cleavage for what I think is good for the office so put a tank underneath.
The material feels roch amd heavy but super cute on. Love the button details but didnt fit my chest area (too loose) so returned. Color is beautiful and the item is well made.
I love the dress style but Shows a lot of cleavage with no give in the hips

links_reviews_title: the dress was so nice and comfy to wear. I will rent again!
links_reviews_text: if you have a large bust, you will have room to wear a bralette under if you wish as the neckline is a little low.
Fit true to size, sturdy material, didn't wrinkle.
Was large in the bust, nothing a safety pin couldn't fix
Great material. Great color for spring. So well made. I think I could have sized down to a 2 on this. It was loose (but that may be the look) and the top gaped open. You will need something under it.
Wore this dress to work and it was super cute. I probably wouldn't order it again though.
From reading the reviews saying it ran big, I ordered the 10 and it's perfect. I love all the lace. Might keep this one.
Definitely size down, but this dress is ADORABLE. So comfortable and easily styled.

links_reviews_title: Pretty dress, high quality and style
