links_reviews_text: Wore this to a fancy dinner and again for thanksgiving! High quality and cute ruffles- love the style. It was loose and flowy so good for if you're planning to eat a lot.
I loved this dress. It's very well made and felt super fashionable. Yes, it's essentially a large baby doll dress, but in a chic, goth way.
Another hit. Great construction and details.

Beautiful dress! A little short at front for taller girls, so I needed up wearing bike shorts underneath so I didn't have to be worried about the wind blowing it up. Runs a little large, but is super comfortable and actually fairly flattering for not being fitted.

Love Ulla Johnson! Was so excited to see RTR carrying some of her stuff (more please!!) so comfortable and easy to wear. Get with flat fun sandals or wedges. Ladies stopped me on the street all day to compliment the dress and ask who the designer was. Love!
Put this on an immediately felt relaxed. This dress runs a little big but is so perfect for hot summers in nyc!
I loved the "baby doll" vibes from this dress. It was so easy and breezy. The neckline doesn't choke you, and it isn't too short. I highly recommend renting this.
Liked this dress a lot for work. However, I would definitely size down. Can be a bit overwhelming on a short frame
Loved this dress. Initially only rented as I gravitate towards this designer and was pleasantly surprised at how much I loved it. Comfortable and I received compliments each time worn.

Got this dress to wear to a friend's birthday party in wine country. Arrived looking very worn, lace crumpled and needing a steam. I expected it to be very tent like based on the pictures and reviews, and it certainly was. For bustier gals not super flattering. Stuck out like a giant triangle. I am pregnant in my second trimester and it made me look even bigger than I am.
I ordered in winter which was my bad but this will be in my heavy rotation come Spring/Summer

links_reviews_title: Whimsical dress with classic Ulla Johnson silhouette
links_reviews_text: This dress is super cute with a lot of charm! Pretty shapeless but flattering nonetheless. The eyelet ruffle details are quite unique. Fit is a little on the large side but still works.
Runs on the big size but really comfortable and a good length for work.

I really wanted to love this as I'm obsessed with Ulla Johnson. This was a miss. I'm 5'8", 142lbs and it was a tent. Beautiful fabric, color but the fit was just meh. If I sized down still unflattering. I think taller gals would be cute as it'd be shorter and flirty.

links_reviews_title: Love this dress! Super comfy and cute, can dress up or down. Would definitely rent again!
links_reviews_text: There is a lot of fabric at top and it is a loose fit, I loved the comfort and style, but wouldn't recommend it for someone with a big chest. It's a little more casual with flats and easily dressed up with fancier footwear and accessories. Love it!

links_reviews_title: This dress is so comfortable, and fun. Broad shoulders may do best. Size down.
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress with kitten heels, and it was perfect. It is a definite baby doll style but comes off with more sophistication if properly styled. The dark floral cotton has beautiful detailing on the neck, and sleeves. It's a dress that requires attitude.

I am really starting to love this designer! This one doesn't disappoint....wore it to work with strappy sandals and a casual event with Vans and loved it both ways. Super feminine, cute and comfortable.
It's really roomie and the fabric is nothing special. I didn't end up wearing it.
I received tons of compliments on this dress at work the other day. Note that it runes very large. I definitely could have sized down!
I would go two sizes down in this. I normally wear a 2 but I figured the 4 would be an cute oversized and was sadly mistaken. It's very cute but HUGE

links_reviews_title: Comfortable, chic and for all seasons!
links_reviews_text: While I did feel this was oversized, it still looked great to wear to work and out afterwards. The neck I wish stood up more to be more of a "mock neck" but I probably could've ironed it down. It looks heavy in images but is great for late summer and could work all through winter with layers. The pockets are great and the length is so flattering!

links_reviews_title: VERY little house on the prairie
links_reviews_text: I was hoping this would be chic but really I looked so silly in this! Ran a bit small too in my opinion
This dress was not as flattering or special as I expected. It was a fine dress to wear to work
I felt like a doll in this dress. The fit was adorable and I loved the high neck. Great for a hot day where you don't necessarily want tight clothes for the commute.

This dress is very cute but runs a little large. When I first tried it I thought it was too big but I embraced it and soon fell in love. I got compliments every time I wore it - I regret not wearing it sooner! The fabric is more cotton than I expected which is great for everyday and summer heat.

I got a ton of compliments on this dress! It's a little short for someone my height (shorter in the front, longer in the back), but it wasn't inappropriate. Beware: it's a wide dress and flies up in the wind! Walking around NYC on a windy day made for an interesting adventure.
Cute pattern and cut. I wore it with a belt because otherwise it seemed too large

links_reviews_title: Peasant trend, but make it fashion
links_reviews_text: In love with this dress! It has the frilly details of a peasant dress but the dark pattern, black trim and exaggerated sleeves make it feel more chic. I found it to fit oversized with an A-line shape. Asymmetric hem (slightly longer in back than front). Pockets!
Loose and not form fitting, cute summer dress
Holds my necessities and nothing more! Pictured with a continental-size wallet peeking out for scale. Durable, scratch-resistant leather.
This is a normal hoodie. It works great but I realized I'd rather rent a more interesting pattern or a sweater than a hoodie :)
This is not a heavy fleece sweatshirt-type of hoodie. This is terry cloth, quite lightweight and great for spring. For me, it's not as long as I expected ordering a medium. Still a great casual look.

I love this hoodie! It soft and comfortable. The hearts are adorable. I could have worn a small but medium was the only size available. The arms a big long on me. I'd love to buy it but I can't justify $112 on a hoodie.

Color was pretty. It did arrive with appears to be a grease stain on the front right near the pocket, but it wasn't super obvious. I loved the heart accents. Received lots of compliments. Biggest complaint was the neck line. For some reason it kept creeping up and felt chocking. I'm not sure if it's because the hood is too heavy, but it was annoying having a adjust it every five minutes. I would have possibly bought this hoodie if it stayed put. I will not rent again, but it was fun to try.
Thin sweatshirt material so not as warm as I had hoped- but great hoodie for warmer weather. Wore all the time. Super comfy and soft. Loved it.

I found this hoodie to be comfortable and the perfect weight for spring or fall, but not quite heavy enough for winter. I did find it to run small, I ordered an XL, and am normally a L and an L would have fit tight. If you like your sweatshirts to fit looser I would size up on this one. The one I received the color was faded and it appeared over worn that's the only reason I took one star away.
Love the color, and it was perfect to wear to run errands. The hearts gave it a pop of personality.
It fits just like pictured. It's roomy, but not bulky. It is long enough for long torsos too!
Sooo cozy and perfect for errands with jeans or leggings. Love this one so much.
Awesome casual piece. I ordered the XL so it would fit loose, and it works great!
Love this - super soft. Nice weight and color. Only downside is the weight of the hood which does tend to choke a little with activity. Perfect for a lazy day.
Just ok. Looked kind of cheap and the fit was just ok.
Fit small and not cozy. Didn't wear. Color was cute, but I didn't like it overall.
Great soft sweatshirt.
Loved the hearts on the shoulder - cool color
Great for everyday with jeans or leggings.
Great cute and comfy sweatshirt for casual wear.
I really enjoyed wearing this around the house, though ultimately decided I'm too old to wear a pink sweatshirt with hearts on it out of the house :)
Cute sweatshirt that's a little more "fashion"/interesting than your standard hoodie. Very soft and cozy.
Perfect everyday sweatshirt with leggings or jeans

links_reviews_title: Loved it, put a ring on it
links_reviews_text: Received new! Loved it! Had to buy!
Comfortable, may run a tad bit smaller than other Monrow items. Maybe size up if you are looking for comfort

links_reviews_title: Such a cute and comfy hoodie!
links_reviews_text: This hoodie is so soft and comfortable. I received a ton of compliments on it and love the small heart detail on the front. I wore this to work with jeans and sneakers and also wore it casually on a walk over the weekend. It's the perfect sweatshirt to wear on a chilly day. Love it!

Loved this dress! Really cute pattern and subtle colors. Adorable interesting cute and ruffles at the bottom. A little bit fancy, it was good for work and looked nice under a suit jacket. But too fancy for a really casual afternoon. I liked it a lot and almost bought it!

Fine dress. Nothing overly special. I wore with black tights and booties. And I had to wear a cami underneath with kinda messed with the smooth lines my spanx was trying to create. I'm between a 14-16 and sized up to a 18 based on reviews. Definitely needed (otherwise the arms may have been way too tight)

I get so many compliments when I wear this. It is a bit tight in the arms for me and I can't wear any sort of bra that has padding with it. But I love it so much! It flows and can be work perfectly by itself or with a jacket. You can wear this to work, on a date, or just a casual day walking around the city.

This dress is so lovely and photographs really well. I kept getting compliments on it and I felt so fantastic in it. I dressed it down with a jean jacket and cowgirl boots, but this dress would be great for any semi formal event. It's a real WOW dress. I sized up because the top buttons were too snug in my size, but it didn't matter because it's a flowy, wrap dress and looked great in both sizes.
I have broad shoulders so the closure at bust was a bit of a challenge.

I rented this for a rehearsal dinner for a wedding I was in -- got sooo many compliments and loved the fit. My usual size 10 fit nicely, but I opted for the 12 so I had more fabric to cover up the chest since I was going to be in a church/with families. Really would love to wear this again! Very nice length.
I got endless compliments on this one! Only drawback is I would recommend for those who are larger up top to prepare to wear a bralette. I had to safety pin it up top and I'm small chested.

So this is true to size, I think (I ordered a 2), but while it technically fit in most places it really didn't work for my 32A chest. I just didn't fill out the bust, although many reviews talked about that area being tight. You can see the puckering at the bust in my photo. It just wasn't flattering, although I liked the print and the fun ruffly skirt. I would consider sizing down, maybe, but I'm not sure that would resolve the problem at the chest.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful quality dress, had to pin front shut
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress to a cocktail party, I love the fit- it is very flattering especially for a curvy woman. I do have a large bust & I still didn’t fill out the top- I had to safety pin it shut otherwise my bra was showing. Overall great dress, quality material.

Actually loved the fit of this dress and didn't mind the slightly puffy sleeve. I did have to pin it higher than the hook/eye clasp because i don't have a large chest but it worked fine. Looked really cute with sneakers!
Great dress with a fun print. Bust area was a bit tight so had to wear a cami for work so it was appropriate. Otherwise, a great length and would definitely rent again!
It's a little small in bust. I'm 5'8 125 but my chest is a 32d. Little tight
It was a little tight across my chest, 36C, And arms there right but i would have managed. Might order in future

I loved this dress. The fit was great. The cut of the bust is a little low but a cute lace bralette or camisole and it's an easy fix. The pattern was still classy but with a twist. Pair with a simple shoe and cute clutch!
This was a lively dress with lots of movement. I am busty and the top didn't close, but the skirt fit perfectly. Really cute for work!

This dress was such a winner. I have a hard time picturing who it wouldn't flatter! The only complaint I had is that the sleeves are a little tight, but not too bad. Also the V does cut deep if you aren't comfortable with a lot of cleavage. But I put on a little black tank and it was perfect. I got lots of compliments, even by strangers. 100% a win.

links_reviews_title: Obsessed with this dress! Works for a dressier date night or casual day time look with sneakers!
links_reviews_text: Perfect fit and length, can be buttoned up to show less cleavage, not suffocating and could move my arms around. The ties were long enough to wrap around multiple times. Slit doesn't come up too high.

Similar to what everyone else said, the wrap is very small in the busy so I had to wear a black camisole underneath to avoid pinching the clip and creating an awkward "hole" on the bust. Love the print and the flowiness of the dress. Would consider renting again or similar dresses from same designer.
Fun and fierced dress. Wore a black tanktop underneath and did not hook the front clasp.

I was able to use this dress for work with flats and then dress it up with accessories and heels for an after work event. I loved the way it fit. The downfall is how low the cut is at the chest; i had to use a safety pin to conceal my cleavage. Otherwise I loved it! I got quite a few compliments.

I rented this dress for work. I absolutely loved it but I did have to wear a black cami underneath to make it appropriate for the office. I didn't wear the cami underneath in the pic for reference. I think it could be a super cute brunch outfit without the cami!

I LOVE this dress and got so many compliments but the front only closes with a little hook attached to a string loop and it is super uncomfortable. I'm not busty at all (B cup) and felt like I was going to bust out all day!! BUT for a rental, it was definitely worth it. I would wear this to a wedding or party, but I couldn't bear to wear it more than once.
Slightly tight on the arms and a little low cut so you would need to wear something under if you are planning to wear to work.
There is a small gap at the bust where it seems the hook has become loose.
It fit like a glove and I felt amazing! Received countless compliments all night long (and clearly it was a long night by my expression) only wish I had taken more pics in it!
I love the fabric, the way it fits and flows! If you're petite this is a great dress option!
Beautiful dress, flattering and trendy, so many compliments today at work. Definitely needed a cami under it, very low cut otherwise.
Fun pattern and cut- I loved the flow of the dress, and it pairs well with black tights and booties. However the top is off and shows a wild amount of cleavage so I had to wear a tank underneath.

links_reviews_title: The print is flirty and fun!
links_reviews_text: I would rent again! I wore this dress twice! Once for work and during the weekend - with a t-shirt on top. PROS My arms were comfortable. The dress was not hard to wrap. The length was perfect! I felt confident with my bust - yes, you do have to wear a camisole but it does not take away from the dress. CONS -None-

links_reviews_title: Love the dress. Fabric isn't giving.
links_reviews_text: I will be reordering in a size up

This is such a pretty dress! I loved it andI received a ton of compliments, however you do need to use a safety pin for the top or your bra shows. Other then that it was perfect and I would absolutely rent it again.
Great fit! Fantastic dress!
Loved this dress! Didn't get to wear it but wish I did. I may rent again. Perfect fit

links_reviews_title: Runs true to size... not small as indicated by other reviewers
links_reviews_text: The dress is really pretty - i'll start by saying that. Not the highest quality garment in the world, but trendy and pretty and well made enough to rent for a bit. I read all the reviews and opted to go down a size based on those reviews, and that was a wretched decision. I am a 10 on top (36A) and 12 on bottom and the size 8 that I got would barely even hook (I wasn't even wearing a bra). The bottom half of the dress was curiously fine, so it would accommodate for TTS larger hips/butt in my opinion. If I were to rent this again I would go for a size 12, a size up from what I normally rent.

links_reviews_title: Body fit amazing but it doesn't work for girls with a big chest!
links_reviews_text: I read the other reviews regarding the bust fit but really was hoping I wouldn't have that issue... well I totally did. When I tried to use the hook& eye, it gaped and looked terrible. Without it, It is a super sexy deep V which I would have worn if it wasn't rented for a family party. I really did not like how it looked with a black cami under it so it was a no go for me. Otherwise, it fit amazing so if you aren't chesty, RENT IT!!!!
I couldn't wear this dress because teh wrap kept slipping and the dress would droop. If you have any chest you need a tank underneath (though I find most wrap dresses I need a tank underneath).

links_reviews_title: A little too formal for work.
links_reviews_text: This dress fit me really well after sizing up to a 10. It definitely had a 40s vibe and was super fun to wear around my house. Unfortunately it was a little too much 'look' for my office and I had no where else to wear it!

links_reviews_title: Pretty dress but didn't end up being appropriate for work.
links_reviews_text: It's low cut, and the little hook to help it stay closed is oddly placed. It didn't help at all! A snap button may have been better. It wasn't appropriate for work for those reasons. I didn't have a tank or bandeau that looked good with the fabric either. It's a great color and print though!

I am usually a size 4 or 6 with a D cup. This 4R did not even come close to fitting across the chest area. I'd probably need to size up to an 8 to make this work! Sadly, RTR did not have the 8 available.
Is really small in the shoulders and bust
Loved this sweater! Great for work or casual. Warm and cozy.
Love! Casual fun and fits perfect!

This was the perfect little sweater for a fall day! I wore a light turtle neck underneath so that it would not be scratchy on my neck. Wore it with jeans and a slip on sneaker but could totally be dressed up for work.

links_reviews_title: Has an oversized look so it felt large; opens all the way
links_reviews_text: I didn't end up wearing it because it was too heavy and unfitted for an unseasonably warm September. I would have been better off in an XS. If you're unsure about size, I recommend sizing down. It opens all the way in the front so I'd recommend wearing a cami underneath or using something to keep it closed, otherwise you might worry about being exposed.
Received a number of compliments on this top. Worn on airplane and during ski vacation. Really pretty and warm. Recommend!

links_reviews_title: Stylish and warm, a great winter topper.
links_reviews_text: This was great worn over a long-sleeve black dress and patterned tights. It kept me warm all day and I felt a little edgy in my very corporate environment. I really wanted it to have pockets, but it does not. Alas.
Cute fit- but you need to wear a turtleneck under it otherwise it's too scratchy an
Super warm vest! Nice details on the edge. Great for work or weekend

links_reviews_title: Fun, edgy and still work appropriate
links_reviews_text: I loved the leather trim. It is a bulky knit, but still not overly hot. You can wear black long sleeves underneath or just as pictured on the model. It dresses up and down so easily. You definitely need a black camisole underneath to avoid an accidental belly peek.

links_reviews_title: Loved this on a friend, but not a great fit for petite
links_reviews_text: I loved this when a friend wore it for Friendsgiving but I was swimming in the small. May try to rent an extra small and see if the proportions are better

This is a great wool sweater vest for everyday use for work or weekend. The faux leather trim adds a luxurious feel. The wool was itchy so I needed to wear a layer underneath unlike what is shown on the model.
This was a chunkier knit than expected but the piping and overall style and fit made this a keeper. Paired with leggings and motorcycle boots for a casual look.
Comfy sweater - wore with biker leather jacket looked great
Very warm. Lots of compliments. Looked great with dress pants and jeans.

Cute and unique shape. Loved the cowl neck. The wool looks great in anticipation of cooler weather. It was itchy and my skin became sensitive the first time I wore it, but the subsequent times I wore it there were no issues.
Comfy and easy to dress up or down.

Damn, I wish I could afford this poncho/vest/sweater thing. Throw it on over a fitted tee and a pair of skinny pants, add boots and a hot drink and head to work feeling comfortable and looking autumn glamorous. I may keep it another month. The wool is just a little itchy so I wore it with a turtle neck once and with a soft scarf. I absolutely love this.

links_reviews_title: Love It So Much I'm Buying It!!! Warm comfy layer for cooler days of fall and winter.
links_reviews_text: Perfect in every way!
Seems like it'd be cute with black pants.
Ran bigger than I expects so I never wore it
Loved this jacket, basically lived in it while sheltering in place. So cozy and a little over sized, but that's ok when you're eating your weight in ice cream!
Really digging this Sandy Liang fleece. Yes it's oversized but that's the idea. The patchwork design is so unique. I get tons of compliments every time I wear it. Will be tough to give this one back!

links_reviews_title: Super cute love the style, makes a boring outfit more fun
links_reviews_text: The sleeves are pretty big but I like the oversized look!

links_reviews_title: I wore this constantly during the quarantine!
links_reviews_text: So sad I had to give it back! Amazing jacket. Very warm and comfortable, and lots of great pockets. Good way to stay stylish when you want to be as comfortable as possible.

links_reviews_title: Really warm and fun to wear.

links_reviews_text: The moment I put it on (straight out of the hanging bag), I started receiving compliments on it. It's definitely oversized as it's shown on the model, but super cool & works for everyday in NYC or travel. Really obsessed with it!
Cool patchwork style. Enjoyed wearing it. The closures were a little tough to work but I really liked the style overall.

Great jacket. The site recommended that I go down a size from my usual and I'm so glad I did. Will definitely rent again when the weather warms up- this isn't going to make it through an NYC winter on its own but could be cutely layered under another topper.

links_reviews_title: I loved this, it was so comfortable and cute.
links_reviews_text: This jacket is so comfortable and cozy. The pockets are pretty great and fit a lot. Great fabric and look!
even the XL had long sleeves - I'm 5'1 so it was cool but it wasn't the best fit

Love Sandy Liang's designs but they definitely run big in my experience. I am petite and was swimming in the XS... the sleeves especially are super long and not easy to roll up. Buttons were also very hard to fasten and unfasten though that could be because it was brand new. Great fleece with a cool and quirky design though, and would probably be more flattering on a larger and taller person.
While I usually wear an 8, the 6R fit perfectly! The pockets were of course a great feature and excellent fabric that has an elegant flow.

Very well made, beautiful dress. The lining and the fabric are great. Fall heavy and well. I have a pretty small waist and it fit great but if your body type is different, might be a tough fit on the waist/rib cage. Also, DDs barely squeezed in there so if you're bustier, consider sizing up.

links_reviews_title: Super cute - good for all seasons!
links_reviews_text: This dress is amazing! It's a bit large, but definitely still works. It would be great in all seasons, I'd like to re-rent it in the summer to wear without the sweater! It dressed up really well with my mustard sweater - I love how the collar is high enough to still show under it.
Nice, well made, good fit. A bit lose all the way around, but still a beautiful dress. Added a sweater because it was chilly.
The tailoring of this dress (waist, neckline) is just beautiful. Great flow. Loved it.

Wore this to work and got a ton of compliments. The torso area is a bit more fitted so I'd recommend sizing up if you are larger in that area. Otherwise it's so flows and fun & has pockets! Styled it with a low pony and black bow. Cute feminine vibes - would rent again!

I wore this dress for work. It is a perfect piece for work because the "V" neckline is not too low and the length hits about mid calf. The print isn't too overwhelmingly or busy. It would look cute in the fall with a black leather jacket and black tights and booties.

links_reviews_title: So hard to send this back...
links_reviews_text: I had an older gentleman I did not know or speak with further come up to me at the event to quietly tell me I was best dressed there. And I felt fabulously put together and comfortable. I would rent this again!

links_reviews_title: Nice dress for work or daytime wear
links_reviews_text: This dress is so comfortable, and has a very flattering fit. The skirt is full and float without being overly flouncy. I paired with a grey blazer to make it more appropriate for January weather and got many compliments.

Wore this to work with a black turtleneck. The fabric that the dress is made out of is a really luxurious, thick material that felt almost too nice to wear to work. Could have sized down, so I'd say this dress runs slightly large.

links_reviews_title: This dress is incredibly comfortable and classy!!
links_reviews_text: I love the neck line of this dress, sexy but not too revealing. The fit at the waist was perfect. Love the long flowy material.

Awesome dress! The fit was awesome and it was so comfortable! I work at a school, so I dressed it down with a denim jacket and black scarf. I'm 5'2" and the dress ended about 3 inches above my ankles. The pockets were a huge plus too! I will definitely rent again for other occasions!
This one wasn't great for me; I thought it was too loose in the waist and so not very flattering. And it was frayed at the chest. Material was nice though.
Fabric on dress is really comfortable. The skirt is full but isn't overwhelming when wearing. Would rent again. Felt like a lady
Just too big for me to wear even with a jacket.
Absolutely beautiful dress, material and the lay of the dress were gorgeous. But, just under the bust- above the stomach, it was very tight. I will order again in a larger size or drop 5 pounds :)
Fits life a glove. Has pockets too!
Loved them so much I bought them! Super comf and length worked surprisingly well. Only thing is that they run a bit a large. I got a 28 and should have done a 27, too big on my waist.
easy to style but a bit baggy at the waist. great for running errands but not one of my madewell faves

I love the material of these pants. It's formfitting but also comfortable. The material does stretch a bit as the day goes on. So, in the future I would rent a smaller size. But I did get so many compliments on these pants.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a casual Friday at work! `
links_reviews_text: They fit very well and true to size, and are high waisted which I love. They're also super stretchy and hit my ankle in the perfect place so I can wear with boots in the winter or slides / loafers in the summer!
I love these pants! I'm typically a size 24 petite in madewell, but these fit good enough to wear a couple times to work and we're a decent length on me
Super happy with the fit plans look of these pants! Love em.

Rode these biking through central park and a whole day of playing tour guide. They were the RTR recommended size (normally a size 8) but i couldve sized down (normally a 29 in madewell). Added a belt so i wouldn't have to keep adjusting
Extremely #comfortable and #flattering. I received endless compliments all day on these wide legged pants. I am 5'4 and didn't need heels for them to lay nicely. So cute
Loved these pants but they did stretch out in one wear. Could probably have sized down.
Super flattering wide leg silhouette! Love these pants
The Emmet pants from Madewell are a long time favorite. The length is great on me despite being 6 foot! I love the pattern and they're totally comfortable.
I'm a size 4 and the 27 was way too big on the waist. Could have gone either 25 or 26 but still cute overall and very sturdy/well made.

links_reviews_title: Great fabric, soft. Nice print. Stretched out by end of day.
links_reviews_text: Fit well in the morning and were too big by end of day. I'd size down.

links_reviews_title: Loved how they fit and a style that I would be unsure if I wanted to buy, glad I got to rent them.
links_reviews_text: Wore these to work with a black sweater and loved how they fit. I am on the shorter side so I could have done with a short size, but these still looked super cute.

I enjoyed these pants but they definitely run big, I am a true 30 and needed to size down at least 1 size. I still wore them and they were cute with white sneakers for an unexpectedly nice winter day in Chicago. I think these could be paired with a blouse and booties for a more work appropriate look in addition to just casual outfits.
Comfortable and flattering, an interesting option for everyday. Slightly wrinkly because it's kind of a thin denim and slightly wide leg.

Wore this during a work trip and was comfortable sitting all day in these -- INCLUDING a 5 hour flight! They are super chic and fit great; they run a little large but I found it to be a good thing as I was more comfortable and able to tuck in a shirt. I am a 27-28 and got the 27. Will rent again!
I worn these pants for work to be different for business casual look. Great with booties, nice wide bottoms.
I feel like I could wear these all seasons, all occasions. Adorable. Thinking about purchasing for keeps!

I was obsessed with the length and width of the pants. And the pattern was so chic. I got so many compliments, even from strangers at Glossier, so you know it was on trend. They were loose in the bum pretty quickly, and they did stretch. If you are more pear-shaped, I recommend sizing down if you can. Definitely going to rent these again, or maybe buy them who knows.

links_reviews_title: It was one of the direst pieces I've rented from RTR. Super comfortable and fits SO well!
links_reviews_text: Pros: True to size Comfortable for every day or a date Can be paired with basics Con: Cuts at the ankle oddly for the winder but can see how it works for the Summer Spring No Front pockets
I own these Madewell pants in a few other colors and prints so I knew they'd be great. They run a little big, I'm usually 27 in Madewell but the 26 fit.
Stiff fabric yet comfortable. Like stiff indigo. Good for casual affair. Lured with high top black chucks and black turtle. I enjoyed them. Super casual.

I loved the style and shape these pants offer. The only issue I had was that they were HUGE! I was able to belt them up, however, I should've sized down 2 sizes. I wear madewell pants all the time so was just a bit surprised.
I would size down at least one size if not two! Very nice material with stretch so don't be afraid to size down!
Wore this to work a few times. High waisted. The fit was great, and it makes for a good staple. I'm between a 4 and a 6 and the 27R fit perfectly.
I sized up because my regulat size was not available and they were too big but would have been cute otherwise.
Easy to dress up or down. Casual fabric, but dressier cut and fit. Will rent again!
Classic Madewell fit. Size down from your regular size!

Didn't think I'd love these as much as I do! So flattering on, I sized up (post part in body is unpredictable!) but they're so comfortable and flattering. Wore with a loafer and tee- got compliments all day!
Too big, needed to get the 27 (which I knew) but the 27 wasnt available. Was still able to wear them though and they were super cute!

links_reviews_title: These were so cute but just a tad snug on me.
links_reviews_text: I am a 14 and usually wear a 32 jean, in these I think I needed a 33, 34.
A classic, chic work dress. Fit perfectly!

Loved this work outfit. I wore it earlier in the door with a black blazer and black tights for work and brought a cardigan (pictured) and took off the tights for back at the office (I got hot). Anyway, loved both combos!
Wore this to work and a work recruiting event. Great winter dress. Matching blazer was atrocious so I wore it with a black jacket.

I am always always an XS and I was surprised this was so tight Couldn't even close back I am 5'6 110 pounds Was surprised by other reviews Also short but that didn't bother me as I was gonna wear with leggings I will re rent in a small Looks great with green long sleeve top underneath Zipper is a bit stiff too
Loved this look for work! Rented with the matching jacket and it gave me clueless vibes in a professional sorta way
Fit well and cute for work but item was a little warn and the lining kept slipping out the bottom.
Rented for work. It was boxy with no stretch and ran small through the hips and short in length. The medium I'm sure would have for but not been work appropriate.
I received compliments literally all day long. Perfect to wear to the office and then transition into my evening fall house party. Love!

links_reviews_title: Not a flattering fit or style
Not work appropriate for anyone thats not very thin
links_reviews_text: Very cute design, nice material. Fit too tightly to be appropriate to wear to work
Loved the color and idea of this dress, it was just too short and I wasn't able to wear it unfortunately.

It's entirely possible that I gained weight, but I usually don't have a problem wearing a size Small in any brand. For some reason the dress was too tight across the back and was very difficult to zip up. I ended up returning it without wearing. The quality is good though.
I loved this dress!

links_reviews_title: It's cute, wish it had sleeves
links_reviews_text: Really liked this dress. I know there is a blazer that matches it but I wish the dress had 3/4 sleeves. I think next time I will pair it with a black long sleeve shirt underneath.
Looks like a schoolgirl uniform. Cute for some, but silly on a 50 year old IMO
Cute dress I wore it with tights boots and cardigan
This was such a fun dress for the holiday party season as I wore it multiple times! I paired it with a black turtleneck and black leggings with black boots. Endless compliments and so comfy!

I wore a size small and it fit perfectly. Wore with black tights and black pointed sock booties. The material is perfect for winter but the colors are edgy and different. This was the perfect holiday party dress- I will probably also wear this to work.
I wore this to work with a black turtleneck, tights and knee high boots. It was just okay, but was comfortable at least and mixed up my wardrobe a bit!

links_reviews_title: I looked sexy as hell in this dress and wore it for my birthday. Compliments all around.
links_reviews_text: Very comfortable and professional in a sexy way. Highly recommend.

links_reviews_title: Runs a big large, otherwise, a very cute dress for work.
links_reviews_text: I loved the fabric of the dress - very high quality. I've seen people pair a dress like this with a long sleeved black shirt underneath that I think would look really cute. Also, would recommend sizing down. I'm usually a Medium with this brand and I probably could've sized down.

Loved this dress, the fit was good on my size 14 (sometimes 16) bod. The skirt was on the shorter side but I'm happy with my legs. Paired it with a red blazer and red rothys. Professional looking with cute fall colorful plaid.
Would have given this 5 stars but it was right across the chest, those with large busts may experience that. Otherwise, I loved it. Wore it with a suit for a client pitch and felt awesome.

links_reviews_title: Runs small but cute for one time
links_reviews_text: I got this because it looked flowy and breathable. I normally wear an XL and this was extremely tight in the back showing unwanted rolls and the ruffle in the front made my boobs feel bigger than necessary. All in all, it was nice to wear once or twice because I got so many compliments on the color and pattern but I'd never buy or wear again. It made me feel too I comfortable.
Would definitely rent again. Just squeezed into a zero though the arms were pretty tight. Next time will rent a two. Definitely draws attention in a dreary winter weather.
The colors were very fall appropriate. The style was comfortable to wear to a family gathering. I would absolutely rent this again!

Super cute has great colors and a flouncy ruffle in front that doesn't stick up and annoy. It has deep side vents that are great on hips. I normally wear a 10 but got a 12 for more of a tunic style. The only complaint is the neck button is fabric and so is the loop it goes into. It has no slide to it and the fabric friction kept the loop from sliding over the button I had to wear un buttoned even my husband could not get it. Because of that the neck was bigger and looser then it should have been
One of my favorite shirts! Wore with blue pants one day and gold pants the next. Received tons of compliments. Will rent again.
A lovely top to wear to work. Fit was good.
Beautiful. Comfortable. Had worried the front ruffles would make me look full, but it's flattering.
Snug across chest (38C) but wearable. Nice blouse
Loved this top, and felt like it was a good option with jeans or nicer pants for work. It was fun to incorporate something so bright and with a bold print into my work attire.

links_reviews_title: Pretty fabric and style. Bummed it was too small.
links_reviews_text: I'll reorder in an 8. Love the shirt but painfully small.
Cute with jeans but would go well with leggings. Tail on shirt is good for covering the rear end if necessary.

I love the pop of yellow in this shirt. All of the colors are great for fall. The shirt fit a little odd for me....the shoulders were tight though I have narrower shoulders. The length was more like a tunic in the back and covered my butt. The sleeve length was great. The cuffs/wrists are very small, but I appreciated this since I have small wrists. Typically shirts don't actually close around my wrist, but this one fit great and gave a good shape to the sleeve.

This dress was so cute! It was a little tight up top for my chest but it was still comfortable. Fun dress perfect for work **I forgot to take a picture out but I promise I didn't wear two different colored heels.

I wore this dress to church today and will wear it again to a dinner party Saturday. It's a different style for me as I am curvy and worried this might poof too much. It is fine. I love the design and the colors are light pink,cream, black and navy. It is a little short. It also is not lined. I don't understand how something so expensive is not lined. What separates it from fast fashion is the material and design. But, I enjoyed this dress. I wear a size 8 most places and sized up.

links_reviews_title: Just an adorable, unique dress! Great for Apple Bodyshape
links_reviews_text: I'm an Apple bodyshape so my belly was nicely concealed with this dress. Loved the horse pattern and received quite a few compliments. I wore spanx under to make it smooth. So unique! The fabric is wrinkle resistant so I would recommend for travel too.

links_reviews_title: Wish I could have kept this one!
links_reviews_text: This dress was so fun. I loved the pattern and got tons of compliments. I wore it to work and to a holiday party. It's short for sure, would have not been cute on me without leggings/tights. It was so great, though.

The print on this dress is LOVELY - the colors (black, white, cream, pale pink) work wonderfully together. The fit is also nicer than I expected. It was definitely a little bit snug for me in the waist, but I'm a little thick in the waist so that often happens. I'd definitely recommend it. The only thing is the material is a little bit thin, so it's either a spring/summer dress (although the colors aren't very summery) or you'll want to put it over tights/boots.

links_reviews_title: Looks way cuter in person than pics
links_reviews_text: This dress felt beautiful. It drapes over the shoulders with a high neck giving it an almost cape-like feel on top. Unfortunately the sleeves combined with the loose hips made me look big in photos no matter how I stood! That being said, the dress was fun. It was lightweight & I could easily see wearing it again in the spring with cute heels. I wore it to work, a panel, & a cocktail event back to back - not a wrinkle at the end! I'm a TTS 2 and this fit well. There was even room in bust & hips.

It was a little tight around my chest but I am a bit bustier. I think the 8 would have been perfect for my chest size. But overall I had no complaints. The dress was really cool and felt very high quality.
The perfect quirky dress. Super flattering - I was worried the seams near the bust would cut me in weird spots, but it did the opposite. I will absolutely rent again!

I wasn't sure about this dress at first, but I ended up liking it and thought the print was unique and fun. The fit, although true to size, was a little strange. Like in some of the other reviews, I agree that there was extra fabric in the chest area that seemed kind of awkward. Additionally, the waist was pretty tight and wasn't the comfiest after a day of work and an evening out. However, I thought this was a fun dress and would consider renting again for the right occasion!
This dress is so cute! The pattern is super cool and the cut is very flattering. I did have some zipper problems though. I think it could have been made a little better, but you can't beat the look!

This is the perfect make-you-feel runway special. I'm on a weight-loss journey and this dress highlights the goods and hides the bads. I will pair it with black tights and black booties for my event next month.
I wore this around town in New Orleans to brunch, cemetery tours, jazz bars... it was airy, effortless and chic. Made me feel cute and the husband loved it!

links_reviews_title: Love the horses but not the shape of dress
links_reviews_text: I have a relatively big ribcage so this dress was too tight just in that area. Fit elsewhere. Loved the print and uniqueness.
I loved this dress! It was cute and comfortable. My only complaint is it was a bit small in the bust for me. The seam hit too high on me. Other than that I can't say enough good things! Rent it!

links_reviews_title: I like this dress. Very artsy.
links_reviews_text: Fits very well and doesn't make me look busty.

links_reviews_title: Wow! Got a lot of second looks:)
links_reviews_text: Beautiful fit and a great length for me at 5 foot 6. Accentuated my narrow waist and flared out to accommodate my wider hips. Compliments all day! At first the pattern seems abstract but then you realize it's horses. Favorite rental so far!
I wore it to a Broadway play and it was a perfect outfit! Very comfortable with enough room to sit and breath while still looking elegant and dramatic.

links_reviews_title: The FUNNEST but tight around the waist
links_reviews_text: So many compliments, so little time. I loved this dress. I wanted to keep it! But it was so tight at my natural waist that I had to unzip it when sitting. It fit so perfectly everywhere else though, that I don't think I would've sized up. I'm a true size 6, and I wish it would've been a keeper.
Wore this during a presentation to give myself a little more fun and flair as a confidence boost. The dress was beautiful and I received many compliments throughout the day.
A coworker who never speaks to me (literally didn't even know he knew my name) stopped at my desk to say he liked this dress. Also it was comfy etc. 10/10
Great fit!
Great work dress for something a bit more fun. Loads of compliments on the pattern and fit really well.

links_reviews_title: Amazing pattern and so many compliments
links_reviews_text: I rented this for work and also wore it for Easter. So many compliments on this one. The cut is unique and so is the fabric. Fit very true to size. Was kind of tight in the shoulders so no raiding my arms too much but it wasn't uncomfortable at all.
Cute print, flowy sleeves complement the fitted waist, overall unique fit

This dress was so much fun to wear and perfect for this Alice in Wonderland themed tea party. The fit was perfect, not at all restricting, the fabric light and the high neck was not at all uncomfortable.
Love! Such a fun print that wasn't nearly as loud in person. Great day to night, wore to museums in the day with my kids, to a business dinner, then out to drinks with friends!

The print is beautiful and the waist fits just right. The hem hits right above my knees, which is quite a surprise. I am taking off one star because the collar does not look that flattering on my short neck.

This dress is different and I love the horse details. It was tight on my stomach, but large on my bust. As someone with a large bust, this isn't usually the case. It's short, but perfect length if you're under 5' 4" I'd say. It was cute, but I wasn't completely in love. The zipper sticks a bit and you'll probably need a friend to help zip it all the way up!

The fit was a little odd for this Kate Spade. I am usually a 6 in A line dresses, but often a 4 in Kate Spade. The waist was so high (hits just below the bust like an empire waist) and fitted-- combined with the high neckline and gathered fabric, it made me look awkwardly large in the bust. But I think sizing up would have been too big in the waist. Print was fun, but I wouldn't rent again.
It was just as I imagined! Whimsical, great fit, just a true Kate Spade piece. Definitely worth purchasing
Ugh I love this dress. It moves so well on you, I wanted to twirl all over in it. Looks great both dressed up or down. One of my favorite RTR pieces yet.

This dress is so flattering! I love it. I feel like it accentuates all of the parts of my body I like and hides the ones I'm not psyched about at the moment (like my postpartum belly and upper arms). Plus, who doesn't love an MC Esher-esque horse print? If I wasn't trying to cut down on clothes in my closet I would definitely buy this!
Great fit! Top was loose in bust but fitted in top waist giving a very slimming appearance and larger bust for us flat chested ladies. Would totally rent again!
This dress was super fun. It was tight around my rib cage. I wore it with a jean jacket because I thought it made me look a little big.

I rented this dress because I loved the print (#horsegirl) but the shape was not for me. If you're between sizes, choose the bigger size -- I'm usually either a 10 or 12 and couldn't quite get the zipper up on the 10.

This is a very flattering and comfortable to wear dress. I felt at ease and did not feel the need to constantly adjust anything, which is always a plus. My only issue with the dress was that if you have a large chest it does pull the neck down further than I would have liked..... but overall, a great RTR find!
This is one of my most complimented rentals ever. I wore it to brunch and again to work. Perfect with black tights and boots or flats. EASY and perfect outfit. I wish I could keep it forever!

links_reviews_title: Many compliments. Such a classy dress.
links_reviews_text: Easy to wear with tights. Comfortable and flows fit. Very feminine!! Wore it once to Breakfast with Santa event and then to a show on Broadway.

You can just tell this dress is quality material cause it feels like wearing butter. It was light and fun and I loved it! I was worried the top would be tight on my 32DDDs but it fit like a glove. Loved being a horse girl would definitely do it again
Comfortable, probably could have sized down, but this dress made me feel like I was wearing a salon cape.
This looked like a bad vintage shop find on me. Loose up top, very tight on the hips and long. Couldn't figure out how to style without looking like I was ready for a 70s party.
So much fun! Fits true to size but is a bit long so I did a front tuck. The pattern is great and the contrasting white really makes the shirt pop!
I love the flowy oversized fit of this shirt! Beautiful patterns and neck tie details. Just know that it's incredibly long so it's best if you are tucking it into some wide leg pants or a skirt.

links_reviews_title: Awesomeee! Would have worn it more if I could.
links_reviews_text: I thought this would be baggy but static cling, man. It looked really good and didn't end up being baggy at all. Works great with practically many single color (earth color, black or white) bottoms. I highly recommend!
My coworker said I looked like a fancy pirate, which I obviously took as a compliment. Huge sleeves, loud print, very fun.
A bit off on sizing in the shoulder and too thin / clingy for my liking. Looks super chic and the print is lovely, but ended up not wearing.
Gorgeous top. Loose and flowy so it's gonna run big. It's a big long too. Loved it overall and will probably try to rent it again in the future!
Great fit, very "blousy" with lots of fabric.

Loved the look but had to wear it tucked in because the bottom half didn't have any flare below the waist. If you have hips be prepared to wear this with bottoms that you can tuck in the shirt. Otherwise, it felt nice, was comfy, and had fun bohemian-styled sleeves.

Love this too. The pattern, the fabric, the pop of alternating color around the tie neck... all amazing. Fits great, works just as well under a baller as in its own. I wore to work but you could do a night out with it too.

links_reviews_title: True to size but very long.
links_reviews_text: I ended up tucking into my jeans but it was still a very weird length. Very unique style and still got a lot of compliments!
Comically huge... and at the same time it narrows out at the hips, so I couldn't even have worn it as an oversized shirt dress with leggings or anything. Such a strangely cut garment.

links_reviews_title: If you have a chest this isn't for you
links_reviews_text: Had this dress while I was at 32-34 weeks pregnant. Tummy fit fine, bottom was loose. Dress was pretty. However, the chest is extremely tight. So I didn't push it and just left it open and put a tank top under

links_reviews_title: So easy to wear && crazy comfy!
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress so much! It def has a lot of fabric though and runs big- I'm normally a 4 in dresses & based on reviews went with a 2 but I could have easily gone down one more size and it would have still been oversized... I ran errands and mommed it up in this dress easily multiple days! I will say the hubs was not a fan bc it was so oversized so it's def not a date day option.
Love this dress! The length was perfect and I loved how lightweight it is. Got a ton of compliments
I love this dress for the laid back/casual look. Not super fitting so feel your body can get lost underneath but none the less very cute with sandals for a laid back day party look.

This dress is cute for a casual look. The only drawback is that the bust was a little snug and rugged at the buttons. I am a size 34D but would not have gone up a size - it was fine just a tad snug. Otherwise nice cute, flowy fit!
Love this dress. Comfy, easy to wear, doesn't wrinkle, pockets. Oversized for sure but supposed to be. Love it
Wore this dress to a spring music fest in Charleston. Breezy and comfy all day long.

links_reviews_title: Great everyday around the house dress
links_reviews_text: Great dress! Very loose fitting except around the chest. I am a B cup and almost couldn't button it across the chest. It was great for around the house and running errands
Cute, summer/fall dress. A little tight in the bust, and loose skirt but still really loved it and would rent again.
This dress would be lovely on a future mom, but it will make you look pregnant regardless.
Tight in the bust if you are any larger than a Dl
This runs too wide. Might be good for beach but doesn't give you a nice shape
Wore this a few times during the beginning of my 3rd trimester. It is flowy so maybe not the most flattering option but it was cute and comfortable. Got lots of compliments on it too.
Loose fitting nice cotton
This looked like a great summer dress for everyday - show a little skin, but can get sweaty or feel bloated and not ruin the vibe. I would love to buy if it was $100.
Runs small in the bust

links_reviews_title: Made me feel like a Victorian doll! Chest is tight
links_reviews_text: Super flattering, flowy fit. HAS POCKETS!!! Good for spinning. Chest is tight so I had to ditch the bra but it was fine.

I was a little nervous that this dress would only look good on someone very slim but I loved it so much I thought I'd give it a try anyway! I am a curvy woman and not slim but was pleasantly surprised by how much I loved this. It's sooo comfortable and has pockets!!! Super soft fabric. I would wear every day. I gave it a 4 star because the top section was way too small compared to the rest of the dress. Even for the size 3R, I couldn't button a single button. on the top portion. I had to wear open with a tank underneath.

This dress is very much tent-like and farm girl chic, but that's my style, I guess. Not sure what to say about the sizing. I'm like a 10-12 and nursing a baby, so I tend to size up in most things to accommodate still-shifting pregnancy weight; this strained in the bust area but I feel like I would be swimming in a larger size. This was great for running errands and going to the playground with my kids - a very casual style. Will rent again.
Fits well, very loose if that is the style you're going for.

Loved this red polka dot dress. I am 5"7 and it was perfect length but almost too short. I think if you are taller it would be tough to pull this off unless narrower! Very comfortable and can easily dress up and down.
so perfect and gorgeous!

This photographs red but it's actually a strawberry pink with beige-ish dots. Very pretty and very flattering. It was a little short in the back but that was only a problem if bending over. The top sometimes shifted and exposed my bra but I got the hang of it after a while. Not the most comfortable but definitely worth wearing at least once. I recommend!

Had to pin the front to stop it revealing too much. Stayed tied closed all day and evening. More of an empire waist than true waist - maybe half way between the two. Floaty fabric so did blow open in a breeze. Is silk with polyester lining. Very comfortable. Sucker for red polka dots! Almost tempted to buy it but dry clean only.

links_reviews_title: Wore it for a daytime event with sneakers and evening with platform heels
links_reviews_text: It was fine for an event where I needed to wear red and white. Gapes at the front when you sit down. Does the trick but forgettable
True to size. Fabric is really nice quality. Highly recommend

links_reviews_title: O B S E S S E D
links_reviews_text: This dress is perfect! Especially if you're a tall slimmer gal, it's not too short and the wrap makes it easily adjustable! Perfect color for date night or even dressed down daytime look! Too in love, will rent again!

links_reviews_title: so cute! amazing color and material
links_reviews_text: beautiful. I had to tie it a few times to get it right because I don't have enough boobs to fill the top, but I got it to work. Loved it

Got so many compliments on this dress at the office! It's actually a bit pinkier in person than in photos which makes it look redder. But the wrap style is super flattering and allows you to customize your fit.

Loved this little summer dress! Wore it on my trip to New Orleans. The material was silky and the wrap fit was flattering. It was a little lower cut so it was a bit sexier than expected. I would definitely recommend!

Loved the fit, color, material. 100% silk, very well made dress. I will not be returning this dress for a while, I love it so much! The only thing I wish it had was a little closure at the chest area.

Delightfully soft, light fabric with a flattering tie-waist. It hit at a perfect mid-thigh point. The fluttery cap sleeves were a bit exaggerated for my taste, but if flouncy shoulders is your thing, this dress will be a winner for you!

links_reviews_title: pretty print but not very flattering
links_reviews_text: pretty print but not very flattering
Wore with white sneakers. Flattering and cute but would be too short with heels!

links_reviews_title: Too big and long in chest.
links_reviews_text: I didn't get to wear this as it was too long and big in the chest. The color is more pink than red. I like the idea of it. But it did arrive with a few stains on it too.
This dress is super cute, comfortable and can be dressed up or down for different occasions. I wore it with a denim jacket to a brunch and it was perfect.
Loved this dress and got lots of compliments. Thought it ran a little small if you are busty.

links_reviews_title: Love the color and the material!
links_reviews_text: The dress fit and hung well. It is a bit low cut so make sure you have a bra that works well with it! Great for day to day though. I loved it!
Cute dress but not a good fit for anyone that's busty. I may try a size up some other time. Ended up not bringing or wearing it.
Wore this with a jean jacket for a post-wedding brunch. Super cute and flattering with the tie. It is a true wrap dress so just be careful if it's windy. Overall, I loved it! Would rent again!
Think I kept this dress all summer, loved the light fabric and tie front. Would rent again
A true wrap dress although I couldn't find any button or tie on the inside to keep it in place. VERY busty and could not wear this appropriately.

links_reviews_title: Love this dress! Fit well and got lots of compliments
links_reviews_text: It ran a little big which was fine but be careful with wind ! Had a few scares
I have a large bust so needed a cami underneath this. Cut wasn't flattering because it was too big everywhere else
Dress was perfect length for me- just above knees.

I fell in love with this dress at first glance. It’s very cute and was perfect for an outdoor summer BBQ/party.. The dress is great quality, lined so there is no worry about sheerness in the sun. It fits true to size but the big however is the top is pretty revealing. There is no snap or hook and eye to keep the top secure, especially when sitting. I resorted to stick tape which would worked well but after a little more thought I opted to wear a cami underneath and that made the dress more comfy for me. Overall I loved the dress and would rent again

Loved this dress!! It's so flattering and comfortable at the same time. Good length and a little low cut but not over the top. I wore it like 5 times before returning and would have definitely bought it if it wasn't so expensive
Fit perfectly. I'm usually a size 8

links_reviews_title: Absolutely love this dress! A lot of more flattering than model photo.
links_reviews_text: Silk material, colour and cut are super flattering. Will definitely rent again.

links_reviews_title: Cute print & the right amount of cleavage! Very flattering and a great summer dress
links_reviews_text: Great for day to night!

links_reviews_title: This dress was PERFECT for a summer day
links_reviews_text: Fit well, super comfortable.
Super comfy and cute - perfect for work or daytime. Careful if it's windy!

links_reviews_title: High quality jeans good for everyday and night out wear
links_reviews_text: I found these to run a bit small. I did like the higher rise and the distressed ankle. The darker rinse was great for work and a night out. The denim itself is a superior quality - very soft. Does not stretch out.

links_reviews_title: These jeans fit well and get plenty of compliments!
links_reviews_text: I love these jeans!! This is the first time I've worn Midheaven Denim and they're definitely heavenly! Pros: - Slim, fitted yet some give - Comfortable - Love the shade of denim. Dark enough to dress up and also casual, too. - True to size - High waisted on me, but can't tell under shirts. Cons: - None really except they do stretch a little, so they get loose around my knees, butt (my butt is super small though, to be fair haha) and the top of the waist. #ohitislove
Perfect for everyday with flats, but I also wore them for a date night with heels. Loved the fit - they are a perfect mid-rise and have the right amount of stretch.

I love these jeans! The material is not very stretchy, which is perfect for me. I typically wear this size, and they fit perfectly. I don't love the unfinished ankles, but I don't care about this in the winter when I'm wearing boots.
Not stretchy but very form fitting. They were perfect length and I'm 5'3
I usually wear between a 2 and 4, and these were just a tad tight on me - not uncomfortable to wear, but they required the 'squat and pull up' to get them on. Gorgeous color!
These jeans are amazing. Didn't want to send them back. Wore numerous times and never stretched out or sagged. Considering buying them!
Nice fit and very flattering
Loved the wash, length was perfect, but could have sized up for the waist.

Many of the reviews talked about how stretchy and roomy these jeans are, and RTR said my recommended size was 30R. I am usually a 31 and I should have gone with that. These were so small I'm not even sure the 31 would have worked. Quality and color are nice if the fit matches your body type.

links_reviews_title: Nice jean however it does run small. Maybe not a whole size, but they were pretty snug.

links_reviews_text: I like these jeans a lot. They are very good quality and did not stretch out when I was in work.
Great fitting jeans and very flattering. Good stretch!
Great fit, gorgeous blue color and material. Lovely brand I've never tried before

links_reviews_title: Great pair of jeans that hold their shape
links_reviews_text: They were a bit snug in the waist but I was still able to wear them. It has just the right amount of stretch but they never lost their shape. If they weren't so expensive, I would buy them!

this material had some stretch so kept its shape. wish they made the st augustine cut and color denim in this material. I loved the length on the st augustine and these fell short basically hitting my ankles at 5'8" like every other brand so why spend the money when I could just get the same from zara basically.

Love these jeans! At 5'4" found them to be the perfect length. Great for curves- fit very well in the waist while still having enough stretch to go over the booty and athletic thighs. Have worn them several times!
Perfect jeans with just a little bit of stretch. Very flattering.
This are SUPER flattering, especially in the waist. I wished the bottoms were a little tighter and shorter, but a couple of rolls did the trick at the hemline for the look I wanted.

links_reviews_title: Amazing jeans. Great fit but I am in between sizes and sized up.
links_reviews_text: Loved the way these jeans felt and fit. Perfect length - I am 5'7". Will rent again.
These jeans were very comfortable, did not stretch out and were a great length. I wore multiple time during the month rental.

links_reviews_title: Ran a little small so returned without wearing
links_reviews_text: Very little stretch / give. Nice color though.

links_reviews_title: Cute jeans but a bit short
links_reviews_text: Fit great in the waist but a bit too short--I probably needed a 28 long
They stretched out a bit after a wear, but were still a great mid-rise jean!

links_reviews_title: Loved them so much I bought them
links_reviews_text: Super cute. Run small so order a size up. Great color. Very slimming and flattering.

These were soft and comfortable and a nice staple piece. However, I would have like the style more if they were shorter on me. I feel like you lose the raw hem effect when the leg of the Jean hits the foot, which was the case for me with these.
Best pair of jeans I've ever put on. Wish I could afford them! I have a 30 inch waist and 42 inch hips and the fit like a glove. NEVER happens!! Curvy girls, go for it!

I would never ever spend this much for a lot of jeans, but I've been renting them for two months and may not be able to send them back! These are incredible jeans. They have stretch but don't stretch out. My butt looks amazing in them. They are seriously the best jeans I've ever worn. Is this why rich people look better than the rest of us?!! Now I get it!

These were super comfortable and easy to wear. A lot of stretch, and in hindsight I should have sized down. These cane new with tags so I did have a little issue with dark dye transfer onto other fabrics.
So soft, only complaint is not buttons or closures
This coat is so soft and glamorous. Wore to a fancy affair.

links_reviews_title: This fur kept me soooo warm on New Years! Wish I could’ve kept it!
links_reviews_text: Fits perfect.

links_reviews_title: This fluffy beast is the softest jacket I've ever worn.
links_reviews_text: Fluffier than expected but did not disappoint. Everyone wanted to feel it! It was large but not too heavy. The pockets were a great size and the color was fantastic.
This coat kept me warm and looking absolutely fantastic. It's a great way to dress up an outfit from day to evening.

links_reviews_title: This jacket is beautiful! It feels good, it looks good! It’s impressive. Very comfortable. I’d own.
links_reviews_text: The fit is very true to size, it’s comfortable! Warm! It’s rich in color.
Super warm and cozy. The only issue is the way the coat closes. one to two more clips will have be useful.

links_reviews_title: Warm navy faux fur. Loved wearing this.
links_reviews_text: I received this coat new with tags. It was so warm and beautiful. It fit great and I will rent this again this season.

links_reviews_title: I wore this jacket for everyday use.
links_reviews_text: Superwarm and cosy. I received several compliments from people I did not know. It runs large, which is fine because that is the style.

links_reviews_title: Wore this a few different times, really dressed up and made every outfit fun! Great winter piece
links_reviews_text: Fit is great-true to size but a tiny bit over sized as the style shows. Very comfortable and very warm!

links_reviews_title: The softest fur I've ever felt
links_reviews_text: This is the snuggliest, softest fur ever! I'm tempted to keep this one but I want to rent a few other colors first :)

I got this for an evening out but now I keep thinking of excuses to keep it! It's wonderfully silky and cozy warm. My favorite item so far. The medium fits me well, a little big but I think it's intentionally cut generously.
Beautiful color and keeps you warm but be warned that it sheds everywhere.
This coat is adorable over all my fabulous Valentino Red dresses! Great for work events or nights out. beautiful color!
It was awesome but i only got to wear briefly

I wore this dress to a work dinner at 22 weeks pregnant. The fit was loose but not baggy. I was able to move around comfortably. It can be easily layered with a long cardigan or worn alone. I received several compliments at work. I am definitely considering buying this dress.

links_reviews_title: Smooth draped sheath I wish I could buy
links_reviews_text: I loved this bright red dress. The fabric is thin but buttery and smooth. It draped so nicely and I thought the cut was classy. The extra fabric along the neckline didn't bother me. Work-appropriate length for my height (5'7). Will definitely rent again.

links_reviews_title: Classic, crisp, timeless and comfortable at the same time!
links_reviews_text: Perfect for work but very versatile. Can be dressed up or down. Classic Theory piece- well made, timeless, clean style! Loved it!

links_reviews_title: Simple elegance. Easy to wear. Fresh clean style. "Always the best dressed woman in the room"
links_reviews_text: Great fabric and fit. Comfy. Could dance in this. Dress up or down. Perfect cocktail and gallery. If you like simple modest elegant this is for you.
Perfect for work. Very sophisticated.
Wore this for work - lots of compliments. Great color that matched my shoes perfectly.
This was fine for work and comfortable but I didn't love the neck and it is shapeless although I don't think it made me look fat. So just ok.

links_reviews_title: Mad men realness but runs big
links_reviews_text: Comfy and easy to wear but runs big!

links_reviews_title: Excellent for an evening work event
links_reviews_text: Although it was unlined, I found that this fell very nicely and was comfortable! The neckline was elegant and the length was perfect. Doesn't wrinkle easily, either. Only thing was that I dabbed up a smudge with pure water and it left a water stain.
Was a bit too heavy for a warm day, but classy and unique

links_reviews_title: It was perfect for a photoshoot!
links_reviews_text: Nice, loose fit. Elegant.
I received a lot of compliments but the style wasn't for me. It was very lose but the color was very vibrant

links_reviews_title: So many compliments and I felt great.
links_reviews_text: This dress is pretty near perfect. Great length. I love the way it hangs. The red color is gorgeous. I may buy this one.

Really liked this dress overall. It was comfortable but you have to be careful of the lines your bra/panties will make. The fabric hugs every line (not static) like an old Hollywood wedding dress. With spanx it was perfect

Love this dress. Fabric is lovely; color is amazing! It looks better on than in the photo. It has great movement. I got compliments in the office. It is loose but it works as a work dress, if it were tighter, it would be good for evening but a bit too sexy for work. I will rent it again to wear.
A few things to consider: + not lined + fabric is lighter which affects the drape + more of a shift dress; not super fitted + neckline can be bothersome--is fairly high In general, very pretty.

I liked this dress and enjoyed wearing it. Only 4/5 stars tho because the pics make the front neckline look like it pops more than it does. I liked the idea of a high straight neckline. Not a complaint, just something to note.
This was the first RTR item I got to wear and I LOVED it. I wore it to work but it would be great for something a little more formal or date night!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress with fabulous cowl neck.
links_reviews_text: The dress was too long for me, since I'm petite, so I wore it with a belt, which worked great. I wish RtR carried petite tho.

links_reviews_title: Great dress to spice up the work week!
links_reviews_text: I really liked this dress, although I thought it was a little big. Not sure I'd go down a whole size though. I got SO MANY compliments on this - especially on the color. Expect some "Lady in Red" references. I did have to keep pulling the shoulders forward a bit so that the neck draped appropriately, otherwise it pulled back against my neck and you couldn't see the detail. It's a pretty long dress and came down to my knees. The dress is in great shape.

links_reviews_title: Fit weird, almost like I was wearing it backwards
links_reviews_text: Fit weird, almost like I was wearing it backwards

The color of this dress is fantastic. I got lots of compliments on the color and quite a few on the dress itself. It looked very nice on but because it is so loose fitting, it does not look flattering at all angles (although I think if you're looking for a maternity dress, it is pretty great). It is also not really lined so be careful with choosing your under garments as their shape may show through (it's not transparent, just thin).

This dress isn't as thick as I expected, but I liked the cowl neck a lot. I think the fit of the sleeves (very small shoulder cap) made my upper arms look chubby, but that's a problem area for me. The color is absolute perfection.

links_reviews_title: tons of compliments. i'm a restaurant manager and it was perfect for this role.
links_reviews_text: comfy, loose, but flattering.

Wore to work conference. Fit well. Conservative but fun. Wore a skinny black belt to give it more shape and it made it feel dressier. Only drawback was this bright red color when my skin hasn't seen the sun in two months was not flattering - that said the color was a lovely bold red so I would rent again in summer when I have a tan.

This was a cute dress with an interesting neckline. It ran a little big, but not in and an attractive way. The color is striking. Perfect for the holiday time of year. Very comfortable and easy to get in and get out of.

links_reviews_title: Great easy to wear work or dinner dress. Gorgeous red. Forgiving waistline.
links_reviews_text: Nice loose fit but with structure at the bottom. The slight taper doesn't make it look to balloon-like. Beautiful red color. Wore to my office. Lots of compliments. Would also be good for a holiday dinner.
Loved the length and the neckline
I am between a 6 and an 8 so I went with an eight, however this dress runs large and it was a little loose.

links_reviews_title: beautiful, expensive looking, lots of compliments
links_reviews_text: It doesn't have much of a waist shape so I wore a tan belt, but you don't have to depending on your body shape/desired look.

The gorgeous color of this dress did not outweigh the struggles I had with the neckline of this dress. Also, the cut did nothing for my shape - it was just too loose. Little sad because I was hoping this dress would work!

I chose this dress as I felt it would be a piece that could easily transition from day to night on a business trip. It really is a beautiful color and I thought the neckline gave it a more classy touch than a traditional sheath. In the end, the fit was quite boxy on me and I did not feel that the quality was consistent with other Theory pieces I own.
Striking red color. Worked well in the office because of its conservative design. Long enough for taller ladies. Fabric felt high quality.
This dress has a great color the fit is very loose which was good for the summer office vibe. It wasn't extremely faltering per se but definitely professional.

links_reviews_title: Didn't wear it as it was too loose.
links_reviews_text: I typically wear a size 10 and the size large just hung on me like a potato sack. It is a straight cut but was comfortable. I may try it again in a medium. If you're trying to show of curves, this ain't the dress for you!
It was baggy in my hips and tight in my chest, so the cowls neck sat funny. I felt very frumpy in the dress and returned it without wearing it

Fit is unusually large for Theory in my experience. I wore the dress to work and received many compliments on the unique neckline and color. Very comfortable, but because it was too big I felt awkward in it and could not wear it for the company photo shoot without using a bunch of clips and pins. Great length for taller ladies. Hit just above the knee. Nice quality fabric, but thin -which is a plus for girls living in the South!

Wore this dress for work at 27 weeks pregnant. Dress fit great and had room to spare in the stomach. A great dress for work that was a little more fashionable, but still conservative in an office environment.
The color, the neck line, the tailoring...stunning! I only wish it was lined.
I was surprised at the material of this dress. It was very thin and felt cheap. Didn't wear, and was super bummed!!

links_reviews_title: Nice pattern but low quality construction and runs small
links_reviews_text: The pattern is very lovely in person. Dominant colors are blue and orange, but there's green and some while and black so you can coordinate easily. The skirt was not a true a-line or pencil but sort of a dumpy hybrid. You can feel the seams against your skin as there is no lining. Just not flattering or amazing, but okay to wear to an everyday event before returning.
So great for work and comfy
This skirt is gorgeous. The material is high end and has some give to it. I usually wear a size 12 and lately have not found skirts to be flattering, but this was generous on me in the L.
Very comfortable skirt with fun bright colors and print. I was able to pull it up and wear it high waisted. Might purchase it!

links_reviews_title: Size down for high waisted look!!
links_reviews_text: I got the idea from another reviewer to size down for a high waisted look and loved it! Great for vacation or summer!! I would do this look of feeling bloated because it shows everything - otherwise, loved it!

I absolutely loved this skirt, far more than I thought that I would. It has a vintage feel about, bell shape, flows nicely and is really flattering. The colors and details are really beautiful and the quality is superb!
I loved this skirt.
I received so many compliments on this skirt - it's gorgeous and I highly recommend renting it!

Wore this in israel where modesty is a must Great colors vibrant perfect for vacation summer whenever! Silky smooth Runs true to size. Was a little high waisted on me Got compliments from strangers Light weight breathable fabric good for hot desert temps as I had. Zipper side I am 5'6 came a little below knee

This skirt is a winner. The print is so fun and the colors are so vibrant. The cut and style also gives it movement as you walk. Received many compliments, and I wore this both at work and at a vineyard for fun. It's incredibly versatile.

Based on the reviews, I thought I was going to love this skirt but it was just ok. It was a smidge clingy, so while the XS fit, I wish I had sized up. I didn't love the fabric, either. With that said, I got tons of compliments.

Absolutely loved this skirt! I am a neutral and classics type of girl but ventured out and tried this bright orange skirt and man did I get compliments! I really enjoyed it and it was so breezy and nice for work. Would rent again
Beautiful fabric

links_reviews_title: Wrinkle free, heavy fabric, great saturated colors
links_reviews_text: Love the fit and colors, could easily go with white top
Loved the slimming fit and soft, stretchy fabric of this skirt. The bold color/print was fun to wear with a basic top.
Waist measures 30 inches for size medium, and fabric is a bit stretchy. Good weight to fabric so it hangs nicely and swings a bit. Fun to wear and compliments!

links_reviews_title: Loved this skirt! Can wear with just about anything and dressed up or down. Fun Colors!
