links_reviews_text: Fits true to size. Can be worn dressed up with heels, business casual with wedges and casual with sandals or sneakers. Looks great with blouse, shirt, tank top or t-shirt. Loved the vibrant colors. Perfect for my weekend get away because it does not wrinkle and is so versatile.

links_reviews_title: Pretty print! Not high waisted tho
links_reviews_text: Wore this with a blouse for work and with this crop for the weekend. It's not really high waisted, so I sized down to make that work and really liked it.

Comfortable, well cut skirt. Bold colors and I had a hard time figuring out a top to wear with it. Seems that most reviewers are pairing it with white, but I didn't have a white shirt that looked good with it. Glad I wore it/rented it, but not something I would want to own.
So colorful and fun! Great flare at bottom. Fits well on baby bumps!

I loved this bright and fun skirt! I originally ordered the medium and it was too tight, but the large was just a little too big. Still so fun to wear. It has some weight to it and doesn't wrinkle. Loved this for spring and summer- and think the colors would roll nicely into fall
I rented this for some family dinners while on vacation. I received a lot of compliments on this skirt and it was super comfortable.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful skirt! I got so many compliments on it!
links_reviews_text: Everything about this skirt was amazing. It was true to size and I got so many compliments on it. I wore it twice, once casual (pictured) and another time with a dressier top and heels. Very versatile!
I let my husband pick and rental and this is what he chose. I loved the length and the slight flare at the hem. Colors were on point too. Will rent again.
Wore this to a birthday lunch and also work! The size small just fit me perfectly. Loved this skirt, got so many compliments! Also wore it with a black shirt and it looked nice.

I wore this for Easter and I LOVED THIS SO MUCH! For some reason, skirts do not flatter me-I have been determined to find one that I liked-this was it! The colors were gorgeous and it fit in all the right places :)

I rented this skirt for a vacation and absolutely LOVED this skirt! The bright orange color and patterns may be slightly overwhelming for everyday wear, but definitely does its job when it comes to vacations :)
Wore it 3 places ---Everywhere I went, women were telling me how much they loved it!!!
Lightweight with a bit of stretch--this Tory Burch skirt is versatile. Loved the tropical print. A little tight around the hips.

links_reviews_title: Wasn't the right fabric for me. Showed everything
links_reviews_text: Wasn't the right fabric for me. Showed everything

links_reviews_title: A flattering punch of colour for winter
links_reviews_text: Skirt fit well. Received plenty of compliments. I love the colour and pattern. A great way to brighten up an otherwise dreary winter work wardrobe. Would rent again.
Fit great and I got lots of compliments
I loved the color. I wasn't able to wear it because it was big in the waist. I maybe could have size down.
The fit will be unflattering if you're on the larger end of hips and thighs. Definitely not meant for curvy women.
Great Tory pattern w beautiful colors! Fit was flattering. Wore to work, brunch and out to dinner. Would def rent again and considering purchasing.

links_reviews_title: Very pretty colors and fits true to size

links_reviews_text: This skirt is lovely. Fit is perfect and the fabric is heavy so it has a nice drop. Feels very luxurious. I couldn't wear because the hem was undone in a very noticeable place.

links_reviews_title: Great skirt for a warm day
links_reviews_text: Great color. Easy to wear. Lots of compliments. Figure flattering.

links_reviews_title: Great color, great material, great fit!
links_reviews_text: Absolutely loved this skirt! It was perfect for a summer dinner with a white tank, denim jacket and wedges. The material is flattering: smooth and the perfect weight. Will absolutely rent again - hoping to transition to to fall with a cream turtleneck and brown boots.
Didn't wear because the fabric is so thin. You could see the white shirt I had tucked in through it.

links_reviews_title: THE DRESS! Wore this to the church portion of the wedding.
links_reviews_text: Great fit! Very low cut, so I used fashion tape to ensure chest area stayed in place.
The dress does not cover your chest. I paired with a lacy bralette over my real bra and snakeskin boots. The bottom has a fun ruffle that moves nicely when you walk. So many compliments all day long.

I was a little hesitant about this one because it gave me a "little house on the prairie" vibe but it was at my house and very comfortable so I went with it...and got more compliments from strangers than anything else I've ever worn. People LOVED this dress. Paired it with knee high brown boots and wore a nude bralette- you definitely need something under it. Completely true to size.

links_reviews_title: Wore this to a NYE Brunch
links_reviews_text: It was comfortable but low cut and runs small for a big chest :(

Very well made dress and I received a ton of compliments at the winter wedding I wore it to. It is quite low so I had to safety pin it and then use fashion tape to keep everything in. Overall I would rent again but just know that you may need to put something under or tape yourself in.

This definitely runs small! I wore the XL and needed a tank. Very little house in the prairie, but i made it work with some riding boots and a hilarious necklace for a holiday work party. Pretty holiday plaid!
Loved the pattern and tie around the waist. The top is extremely low cut and loose - I had to wear a tank underneath.
Top ran very small, I have a larger bust but usually fit in a 14 perfect and couldn't get this around me

links_reviews_title: Low key Western or holiday look, needs a full slip underneath
links_reviews_text: As other reviewers have noted, this wrap dress gaps hugely in the front -- no way this would cover what needs to be covered if you have a larger bust. My solution was to wear a very plain black full slip underneath, so I had no worries about the wrap top sliding around. Styled with studded ankle cowgirl boots.
I read the reviews & sized up & it was still way too small in the busy. It is cute but the sizing is weird. If you are small busted, it would work well than if you are busty.
Long enough in arms and overall length for my 5'11" frame. Light fabric, but comfortable. Requires a cami or tank under it for me (36DD). Wore it to work and a casual family party.

links_reviews_title: it didn't fit so i couldn't wear it.
links_reviews_text: very narrow cross chest. Very pretty dress just order a size up!

I really wanted to love this dress. It was super soft, comfortable, and looked great with boots. However, this dress (like many wrap dresses) just doesn't work for large breasted women. I wore a cami underneath and made it work, but I didn't love it as much as I would have if it fit properly.

links_reviews_title: So much potential, but not a perfect fit.
links_reviews_text: I got a ton of compliments on this dress, but was disappointed with how low the top was. I assumed that like most wrap dresses, I could just tie it tighter to get more top coverage. Wrong assumption. I am very small chested, and I still couldn't manage to get the dress to give me the coverage I wanted. I had to wear a cami underneath, which takes the look down a notch. I really did love the dress otherwise. I wanted it to be perfect because it is an amazing style and fabric.

I LOVE this dress, but the wrap leaves a lot of exposed chest. I would say cleavage, but I don't have any- so it was basically just my sternum with some side boob. I'm going to attempt to wear it with a turtleneck or cami. We'll see!

links_reviews_title: Reminded me of my childhood nightgown
links_reviews_text: It was very warm and comfortable, but it reminded me of my childhood flannel nightgowns--warm, comfy, shapeless. Probably won't rent again.
I was excited to wear this dress; however, it runs very small. I ended up wearing it over a shirt and jeans as a duster.
I liked the cut and style a lot, but the combination of my ample chest, the maxi length, and the Christmassy colors evoked too much Mrs. Claus for me. Didn't wear, but a really cute dress.

I got the large, but it was nowhere near close enough to covering my chest (36DD). Even the bralette underneath looked bad because such a large portion of it was showing. Loved the winter prairie style and the fact that it arrived NWT but it's going right back.

links_reviews_title: I LOVED this top! Perfect for a warm summer day.
links_reviews_text: Not too revealing, and the button didn't open easily at all (thank God). I wore this with a few different bottoms, and it always seemed to go well with anything I chose. Very soft material, and a flattering neutral color.
Love it!! I'm between 2-4 and had to go with size 6 to be comfortable

Classy, elegant, fun. I managed to stuff a button down and sweater into these pants for work, but they are much more slimming with a fitted cami or other top. Thinking about buying these. So versatile!

These pants are perfection! They are sassy and flattering and unique. I wore them for a speaking engagement and felt great. I usually wear a 4 and the 6 fit perfectly so there's that, but I really wish I owned these pants. I got compliments all day. Love them!
I want to buy these so bad! I love these pants. Easy, breezy, and beautiful! Sized up to size 4 and couldn't be happier!
Wore these pants for Christmas mass and they were wonderful! They were a little tough to zip (there is no clasp) but very comfortable.
Amazing best pants ever!!!!!!
I was told I looked like I should be drinking rosé in the South of France. I loved these and will definitely rent again.
These pants are super flattering but I wish I'd sized up. Despite the snug fit they were super comfortable and I'll totally rent again in a size up.
Very high and tight waist. I am usually a 4 and got the 6 and it was snug. Wore these a couple times and they were different and fun. They did seem to wrinkle easily.

I wore these culottes for my sisters rehearsal dinner and I LOVED them! They were unique but classic at the same time. I got a compliment from my timelessly stylish grandma which is high praise imo :)
True to size, cute work alternative. They were very voluminous in the legs ... and a bit tight in the rear (had to wear spanx to avoid a visible wedgie!)

links_reviews_title: Everything you could want in a culotte
links_reviews_text: I normally wear a 2, and these were size 4 and fit me perfectly. They are nice material - very flowy. Great pockets and the pleating in the front and the waistline construction are top quality. I paired with a Naked Wardobe sleeveless bodysuit (panty lines were an issue with these pants) and a denim jacket. Perfect for work to date night!

I'm 5'0" and often finding wide legged pants or culottes is not the easiest but these were so fun! Yes they are longer on me but with my shoes they looked great! Will rent again for sure, got so many compliments too!
These are different and beautiful but run a size small, especially if you have wider ribs! I made them work because they're so amazing, but it was a bit hard to breathe. Order up!
Made my waist look small and were so comfortable!

Very interesting pants that happened to fit just right. Fitted in the waist and then maximum flare. Would have worn with a crop top, but ended up wearing this to church so opted for a longer shirt instead. Very comfortable!
Amazing! I wish I could buy these so comfortable and cute, love them!

Another perfect rental. I got SO many compliments on these pants and I probably would never buy anything like them but I'm so glad I went out on a limb to rent them. Flattering high waist, great color, functional pockets. What's not to love?

links_reviews_title: LOVE. But the waist was big
links_reviews_text: Should have ordered a 4, but only the 6 was available. Made it work by pinning it. I love these pants! Wish I could buy them.
I loved this pants! So cute; from the color, to the style and fit. Would rent again.

links_reviews_title: not my typical style but fun for a day!
links_reviews_text: These were completely the opposite of my typical style but I tried them out just for fun and got so many compliments! Not ideal for using the restroom as the pants have so much fabric and it's a challenge to not let them hit the floor!
These pants are a show stopper. Beautifully made, comfortable, eye catching, trendy. So many compliments from all ages.
Don't size up unless you are really hippy. The have a slight stretch to hold your waist which is good. I needed to go down to the 6, my usual size.

links_reviews_title: Obsessed. Love these pants for a unique look!
links_reviews_text: I wore these to three different events I loved them so much. Great fit on natural waist.

If the rise was just an inch shorter, it would have been TTS but since the clasp closed around my rib cage and not my torso, it felt a bit snug. If your waist is smaller than/same size as your ribcage- order one size up
They are very comfy and true to size! The only negative comment I have is that they get pretty wrinkled if you sit for a long time.

Super cool pants. Usually I don't feel like I could ever wear pants like this cause of my height but I felt very comfortable and fashion forward in them. They definitely run small. I'm between a size 2-4 and had to size up with the 4 based on reviews. Only downside is they do wrinkle a bit.
These pants are so feminine, very flattering, and extremely comfortable. They are the first item I've rented that I truly want to purchase.

It's so rare I find trousers that fit my waist firmly and still have room for my hips! These culottes were perfect for NYFW, easy and comfortable but as cute with boots and a black top as they'd be with a silky tank in the summer. Great year round pick!
Great color! Nice fit...it is cut to have a VERY HIGH WAIST so take that in mind especially if you do not like high waist clothes in general.

Waist was a tad tight for me from a usual size 6 (but nothing some shapewear couldn't fix! :)) Wore these pants a few times and got multiple compliments all day long. Great roomy pockets and thick material make these pants perfect!

links_reviews_title: Cute but too small around waist for me.
links_reviews_text: I'm have kind of a straight/boyish/athletic build and the waist as too tight. I usually wear a 0-2.
Wore these to work, got lots of compliments on them. I love the fact that they're unconventional and a gorgeous blush color.

links_reviews_title: Love these blush beauties Will rent again.
links_reviews_text: These fit extremely true to size, like right around the waist. I like the way they flow when you walk. They look great with white booties. And they actually work with a graphic tee.

links_reviews_title: Loved it - looked and felt great
links_reviews_text: Love dit!

links_reviews_title: nice piece can be worn a number of ways
links_reviews_text: so many compliments, great color and length. could be casual or dressy which is very nice. the waist is quite high and personally i was not comfortable tucking in my shirt so it went with less in my closet.
They are very cute and fun to wear. Lots of compliments!

links_reviews_title: i wore these to a work event.
links_reviews_text: i loved these pants...BUT the zipper was always a struggle to zip up. not because of the fit, but because of the actual zipper and the seam of the waist. i just don't think that it was a quality zipper. these were my second pair to rent - the first pair were damaged as well - and so i sent them back. The one time i did wear them, it was for a short period of time so that i wouldn't have to ever have to use the bathroom - but i will say that i got a ton of compliments.
Received lots of compliments for these culottes. Very nice quality material. The high waist and wide waistband did make it feel a little tighter but I think a size up would have been too big.

Very substantial fabric with elegant drape. Sadly, the waist was very high and uncomfortably tight. Didn't wear. My waist is a bit large in comparison to my other measurements so the fit may not be an issue for others.
Comfortable, pull-on work pant that is awesome. Doesn't wrinkle, great fit, matches a lot.

Rented these pants for work. I have a hard time finding comfortable pants due to a long torso + wide hips so I'm always looking for stretch. I rented the 44 per RTRs suggestion. These are like yoga pant amount of stretch. I'm typically a US 8/M in bottoms and probably could have done the 42. I was pulling them up all day and had quite a bit of gapping around the waist so they weren't as flattering as they look in the model. Otherwise comfortable and the color is pretty.

Super soft and comfy material but has a lot of stretch so size down. Can be worn with multiple tops but paired here with another RTR find - Trina Turk, Floral True Blouse. Rise hits mid-waist and falls at the ankle.

These seriously look like pants my grandmother bought in Montgomery Ward in the early 80s. No lie. I think it is the color/hue most of all, it is lighter than on the website. Now, if I was good at styling stuff I might have been able to pull it off, but as it was I walked around work feeling very un-confident. It didn't help that a 65 y.o. coworker mentioned how much she like them... Lastly, the waist ran big on me. YMMV. Perhaps if I was much younger and good at styling things, and had sized down. To be fair, they were comfy.

links_reviews_title: Stylish Italian dream pants ! Luxury fabric and construction at it best !
links_reviews_text: Perfect fit - stunning and slimming. Love the front seam detail and the way it follows the curves without looking like leggings ! These pants are amazing - May just buy them!

The fit through the hips and thighs was great without being skin tight but if I were to purchase I'd have to take them in in the waist. I intentionally sized up bc I intended these for work, but might try a size down for wearing out.
These pants weren't flattering on me at ALL. The waist gaped and I was tugging them up all day. I expected the fabric to hold its shape but it stretched out as the day went on.
I rented this for work but didn't wear them despite the fit being very nice. The bottom flared out a bit more than I'd like and they were shorter than expected. Not practical for winter.

These pants were very chic looking and for the most part comfy. They have a pull on waist but still manage to look like dressy work pants. They also don't really wrinkle . But they were huge on me, like falling down huge and were long on my petite frame. I ended up pulling them up all day! I ordered my normal size but I could have gone two sizes down!
Amazing pants, great stretch, super comfortable, very flattering
I love this designer! I got the most compliments wearing these pants. Very comfortable and looked good on. I will rent this again.
The length and fabric/feel of these pants was fantastic. They were a bit big in the waist, but the fit in the leg/thigh more than made up for the extra waist-space. Would definitely rent again!

links_reviews_title: Great fabric but could have used belt loops
links_reviews_text: Fit is TTS. Like all Chiara Boni, there are no zippers/buttons--they just pull up and the material is built to stretch but hold the skin. Turns out that works better for me with her dresses than pants, probably because my hips are a lot wider than my waist. Because of that these slid down slowly while I walked and I definitely had to pull them back up after a few blocks or I'd have been mooning the street. I still give a high rating though because they were extremely flattering and very comfortable.

I love this brand normally, but these pants were odd! I am a classic hourglass shape, and most of her stuff fits me awesome. These creased in all the wrong areas on my hips. You may want to size up or try them on at an RTR store. They do have some stretch, but not enough / in the right spots. The fabric is great though!

Liked these pants and though they'd be perfect for a work event. I did have a lot of standing and walking around and felt like I constantly had to pull these up. I though they fit perfect but maybe just needed to size down.
Vibrant blue pants, odd little folding thing at the waist for the pockets. They fit nicely, but I would have liked them a little longer.

Cuffs were a little wide & the pants were very stretchy which was a pleasant surprise! They hit a little short on my leg and they were too big in the waist so I didn't end up wearing them. Loved the color & wish they had fit.
Great fit, pockets are a little weird but worth the rental.

links_reviews_title: So many compliments on these pants
links_reviews_text: These are more leggings than pants but that being said they are perfect for work because they look very professional but are comfortable to sit in. True to size....wish these came in other colors

links_reviews_title: The fit of the pant was good, although a bit long for my petite frame.
links_reviews_text: The quality of the pant was nice.
Comfort and sophisticated- love the color and cut

links_reviews_title: The style is wonderful but the texture and fit weren't what I expected.
links_reviews_text: These pants are pull-on. There is no lining. It is best described as leggings that have been made to look like dress pants. I wore spanx under them but the pants kept slipping off me. I was picking up my pants all day. Maybe I should have ordered a size smaller?
Super stretchy material - and pull-on, which wasn't clear to me from the description. They're like leggings, but synthetic, so not good for summer.

links_reviews_title: These pants are awesome. Professional but with a flair.
links_reviews_text: Love the material- color, perfect amount of stretch but also still a great weight. I will definitely be renting again!

links_reviews_title: Cute pants, too big in the waist.
links_reviews_text: Just like the title suggests. Could not keep my pants up.
Stretchy waistband, wrinkle-free fabric, hits at the ankles. I wish there were more colors.

The color of these pants was very bright blue. Not a sophisticated color, so I found it hard to match tone-wise with much in my closet. Stretch fabric is dense enough to feel better than leggings, but at the end of the day these were pull-on pants. Comfy tho!

I am a size 4, but I ordered these in 6 (42) and they were a good fit. These are pull up pants (no zippers or buttons), so they fit more like a legging. The material similar to scuba material. I'll rent these again.
Very comfortable and stretchy, but sturdy fabric. Waist band was not tight, so no muffin top. I would rent these again and could wear them everyday for work. Perfect fit.
they were huge in the waist and there are no belt loops, so I couldn't wear them.

I love this designer for dresses. I was so excited about these pants. I sized up and they were still too small. They made me look fat and the pockets were weird. Too bad because the color and fabric is lovely, just poorly fitting for a big booty
The seam on the front of the pants (as opposed to on the side), made them really awkward looking.
I love these pants. Very slimming, great color, fit perfectly!
Went great with the J Crew Floral smocked top. Super comfortable & fit well.

links_reviews_title: Most comfortable pants I've ever worn
links_reviews_text: These pants were amazing and now I want a pair in every color. Flattering, professional and yet more comfortable than some leggings I own. Got lots of complements on the color and people curious about the material. Just be aware that they can start to stretch around the waistline after several hours, but that wasn't really an issue for me.
I'm not familiar with this brand or their sizing. I ordered what was suggested and they were much too small

I rented my typical size with this brand, a 40. They run a little tight in the thighs and hips, and the waist is a little loose, but I'm curvy. I wish the rise was a little higher, because they slid down a bit when bending over, so I kept having to pull them up. These pants are perfect for those days that you wish you could wear yoga leggings to the office, and can easily transition to a more casual look after work.

links_reviews_title: I got these pants to take on a European vacation to add a pop of color to my outfit
links_reviews_text: New to RTR, so I wasn't sure what to expect of an item with no reviews. Material is gorgeous feeling. I usually wear a 2 or 4 in pants and the 40 fit very fitted. But based on their style, I think it's perfect. The model showed this being a crop pant, but at 5 ft 3in, these are even long normally for me. Not so much I couldn't wear it but definitely long and may use dress tape to pull them up when I wear it. Blue isn't as vibrant as I hoped, but still overall love them.

This jacket is definitely a statement piece. It brings together your whole entire outfit. Perfect for winter. So many compliments. Only thing to keep it mind it is cropped so you have to wear high rise jeans.

links_reviews_title: A fun coat to dress up or down!!
links_reviews_text: A baggy but fun trendy coat to wear to work or out with friends. Very comfortable and loose fit - size down.
Good for fall. To light for winter.
Really cropped & warm so cute!
I wanted houndstooth for winter. Mission accomplished
Loved this. I ordered the 2 (medium) and prob could've been fine in the 1. It runs big but I liked the looked. Perfect for winter. Kept me super warm

links_reviews_title: I LOVE THIS JACKET!!!! Such a good statement piece. Wearing it with all black always!!
links_reviews_text: Only pros: looks cool, chic
Love the fun shape, easy to push up sleeves, and the zipper! I only wish it had additional pockets besides the breast pockets. It works well with sweaters, dresses, skinny jeans -- really anything!

links_reviews_title: Fits weird and hard to wear
links_reviews_text: The proportions of this jacket are so strange, very hard to move while wearing this and does not look great on. Don't recommend.

links_reviews_title: Super stylish for work when paired with a flaired skirt and some heels.
links_reviews_text: The jacket is a bit oversized, but not in an overpowering way. The fabric droops and drapes nicely in the back.

links_reviews_title: Very fun for night out. Pair with black pants and top for a sophisticated look with little effort!
links_reviews_text: Great fit, zipper works well, surprisingly warm. Love it!
I absolutely love this jacket, I have it for over a month now and keep wearing it over and over and over. Such a fun statement piece!
Got SO many compliments from girls and guys!!! Awesome cool trendy jacket (not that warm tho FYI)
The style where the sleeve is part of the body is not my look. That's it. Too wide and no definition, some cropped shapes work for me and some don't. This didn't. Sent back without wearing.
Love this piece. Worn w full black and looks so sassy

This jacket was much thinner and much more oversized than I expected. The body is very wide and didn't hit my waist in a flattering way. I would attempt to size down if I thought it would be warm enough for winter.
Wish Kate Spade's dresses were longer! Decided this was too short for work.
Very comfortable and flattering! A fun and flirty dress perfect for a daytime occasion. had many compliments and wish that I could keep this one!

links_reviews_title: First day of work dress definitely made a statement
links_reviews_text: Super comfortable but super chic
I love this dress! It fits true to size and has gorgeous sleeves! I got so many compliments.

The dress can show some cleavage if you want. I wouldn't wear it to work due to the low cut. But it doesn't fit the same on others so it may be a good option for office to evening if you aren't as busty. I loved the dress and wore it at least four times in a short span. I will rent again

links_reviews_title: I wore this In Vegas to Vanderpump's cocktail garden- it was perfect!
links_reviews_text: Light weight, soft, comfortable, and very flattering!
Loved this dress, lots of compliments, good quality and good fit.
I really liked the print on this dress. The silhouette is ver feminine and lovely. However, I think it runs a bit large. Will try again with a size 0.
I liked the dress, but didn't love it because it made me look big. But that's on me. The sleeves were a bit too puffy for my taste.

links_reviews_title: Great riff on animal print trend
links_reviews_text: This is such a fun print on a classic work silhouette. It has a loose fitting cut so it is comfortable and cute
This dress is a showstopper! Everywhere I went people were gushing over it. Fit was perfect, and it was super comfortable. Will rent this one again, for sure.
I wore this dress for a rehearsal dinner. It was comfortable and the colors were so fun! Got lots of compliments all night. Would definitely rent again!

In love with this dress! The material is so light, perfect for hot summer days. Forgiving fit and super fun colors/pattern. Regular bra friendly, no Spanx needed! I am wearing a half slip as the fabric could be a little sheer in bright sunlight. The sleeves and ties on the front make it current, without being overwhelming. Usually a 4 in dresses but the last Kate Spade I had tried ran a little small so I went with a 6 in this one. It is comfortably roomy without swallowing me up, perfect. Tons of compliments!!

links_reviews_title: Love this dress. Fits very well.
links_reviews_text: Great color and comfortable fit.

I love this dress so much. I got it thinking I'd wear it to work and then send back and now I can't return it I am so in love with the colors for summer and the fit on me is perfect. I have to keep to wear again!

This dress is really cute if you don't mind pulling off a bold look. The pink is even brighter than I thought it would be but that was fine with me. I'm usually between a size 4 and 6 and rented the 6, but wish I would have rented the 4. The 6 is just a little loose
Love love love!
This dress is very flattering and hugs all the right spots. Love the bright pink color and pattern!

I loved this dress! It is so feminine and comfortable. I wore it out to dinner and to a work event and got tons of compliments! My sister saw me in it and she knew immediately that it had to be a Kate Spade dress! Super cute and fun.

I loved the bright pink color and fit of this dress. Wasn't sure though if it is appropriate for work though. Didn't earn 5 stars bc of the tie at top. I'm on the fence, on one hand it's nice that it's adjustable but on the other hand not sure I ever got it tight enough for work where it didn't look like it was pulling.

Kate Spade is my favorite designer and this dress fit my proportions like it was custom made. Love the color and style; is flattering to my complexion and body shape. It's both sexy and sweet while totally work appropriate for my office. Fabric is lightweight and does not wrinkle. It’s the PERFECT dress for me!
I really liked this dress for work and easily could have worn it for a date night as well. The material is light but not cheap and doesn't cling to any unforgiving areas.

Another fun print by Kate Spade! Cute, flirty and stylish this is a lovely Spring dress I wore to work. Can be a little short on the length side but I was able to make it work. Very flattering!! Material is lightweight and comfortable. Two ties in front but don't show much cleavage. Great rental!
This dress was amazing! Super light and breathable. Absolutely loved the color/pattern and was perfect for a super hot summer, Texas wedding!!

I wore this to a Catholic confirmation service in California. The ties in the front, puffed sleeves, and bright pattern made it fun and interesting while still modest. It was maybe one inch shorter than I would have preferred for the occasion, but otherwise perfect. The material is very light and unlined. The fit -and-flare style was flattering but comfortable for a large dinner after. Would highly recommend!

I'm usually between a size 2 and 4. I wore the size 4 and there was a bit of room in the waist but it still was flattering and it gave me a bit more length so I could easily wear to work. The puff sleeves are cute and not too much. I received quite a few compliments from men. It's not the best dress ever but it was a good work dress for the day.

links_reviews_title: Favorite dress I've rented so far!
links_reviews_text: I absolutely loved this dress. I am usually more of a size 10 but knew based on the material I should size up (my body shape prefers less structure haha). I felt instantly confident when I put it on and got so many compliments on it. Very comfortable too! Absolutely my favorite dress I've rented so far.
This dress is so happy, I love it. Was a little baggy in the arms.
Nice fit. Fits true to size - hitting mid thigh, I'm 5'6" and wore knee high boots.

This was a super simple outfit. Because the pattern is So Much, you don't need to dress it up with much, so if you're busy in the morning and stuff want to look nice for work, this dress is for you. You could size down if you wanted a tighter fit, but I wanted to not think about a tight dress on my body all day ¯\_(ツ)_/¯
It's bright, outside my comfort zone but I liked it
The dress is very pretty. It's light and airy. I wore it for a women's networking event and got a lot of compliments.
Love this comfy spring dress! The fit & length are perfect for work.

I wore this on stage at SXSW. It was light and comfortable in the Austin humidity, and then I wore it in Colorado with tights and booties. Compliments galore, lots of cleavage and flattering if you have a less than flat tummy. Fits true to size.
Fit is true to size! Comfortable and cute!
Really lightweight material; no lined- perfect for warm weather. Very short. I could not get away with wearing this without leggings.

I rented this in February in Chicago, but sadly it was too early to wear. It's a thin fabric and there's lots of static cling. It was a also little tight on my waist, which I wasn't expecting for the fit. Can't wait to rent again in the spring!
I rented this for work but ended up not wearing it because I felt it was too bright for me. Great for though and would prob rent again not for work
Stunning dress! Very flatting and beautiful material. Love the sleeve detailing, felt so feminine and whimsical. Really hard not to buy this one.
This dress is true to size. The fabric is light and beautiful in an eye catching hue. I dressed it down with black leggings and boots for a kids birthday party. I will probably rent again.

links_reviews_title: Thick material, nice fit! Size up
links_reviews_text: Nice hem-line cutouts, especially in the back. Does run a little short so size up if between sizes. Thick material. Very warm! Wore basically all weekend
Great fit and great color. This sweater is very warm and perfect for winter.
Loved this sweater!! Fit was perfect, not too loose but definitely cozy. Pretty warm. Great fall color!

Awesome color, cut and fit. Wore multiple times. Can dress up with nice jeans or down with leggings. Some people complained that the fabric was itchy but I didn't have a problem. Almost bought it, will rent again.
I loveeeee this sweater! Very warm and comfortable with a beautiful green color. Would order/purchase 1 million times over, but size down for a better fit

Apparently I'm a small in everything BUT sweaters...this was too fitted and too short for my taste. I liked the thickness and the small details, color was nice, but next time I would order a M or L for more of an oversized fit.
Cozy green sweater. Fit is TTS and a little boxy
Was really cute - paired with black jeans and dr. marten boots. there's a cute slit on the backside that was a fun detail.
Baggy fit, a very basic sweater. Not a showstopper or anything but a great neutral piece you could wear with leggings, jeans, or slacks.
I layered with a long sleeve button down underneath and it was so cute. Also cute with a thin turtleneck under! Great for any day, the color is gorg.
Runs a little small, I usually wear a small in sweaters but the medium fit well. Very comfortable, thick and cozy.

links_reviews_title: The sweater had a cute flap in the back. Otherwise, was pretty plain.
links_reviews_text: Thick sweater, yellow detail in the yarn that you can't see online. Difficult to tuck in so it was a challenge to find more than a few ways to style it.
Super comfy, not too baggy. Definitely a high quality sweater. Will rent again.
Being as tall as I am, I should have ordered a medium or large, because I like to wear my sweaters oversized.
Soft and comfy! Super warm. Great as an extra layer. Loved it!

Wore this with cropped skinny jeans in a light wash with nude pointed flats and nude bag. super cozy and easy to throw on. a little boxy so skinny jeans or even shorts with a heel or pointed toe really help. Overall good fit.

This was the perfect sweater for my beach camping weekend! I wore it every day! A little breeze though gets through because it's a mesh pattern, so a t-shirt underneath is ideal if you tend to chill. Loved the camo color as well. It's not the most flattering sweater, but I was going for comfort.

links_reviews_title: Wore this so many times - can't believe I didn't take a picture!
links_reviews_text: This is nothing too special I guess, but it’s kind of a perfect chunky-knit sweater. Whatever the stitch is, it’s tightly-knit but still thick. It has the look of an oversized sweater without actually being gigantic - I sized up to a Small and while it was plenty roomy, it’s fairly short and the sleeves are fitted and not overly long. Material is nice, and soft. A good rental for everyday wear - if you are renting things to spice up your wardrobe this is perhaps not the most exciting item, but if you’ve thrown out all of your own clothes and rely on RTR (guilty) it’s perfect.
fits a little loose, but is supposed to be oversized. very warm.

links_reviews_title: Loved this sweater, great for cozy winter days
links_reviews_text: Fit well, a bit short in the back

links_reviews_title: Nice sweater very comfortable and versatile
links_reviews_text: Nice fit
This sweater fit so cute! It hit about the same as my midrise jeans with a nice small slit in the back. Loved the style and color! Kept me warm in the snow.

This sweater was perfect for an every day look or elevated date night. I ended up getting as size S, but could have gone with an XS even though the style is intended to be a bit baggy. It's super soft & such a pretty shade of green - I would definitely rent it again!

I liked the cut of this thick, cozy sweater; the forward-side and fishtail vents break up what would otherwise be a very bulky sweater. It's true to size, but intended to be slightly oversize. It never made it out of the house when I rented it—I only wore it over PJs as longe wear—but would be cute as a casual piece.
Flecks of color in weave but mainly olive. Runs oversize. Not itchy.
Fit is boxy with a fairly high neck. There is a little vent in the back, but it's not revealing at all. I don't regularly wear color- however moss greens have become my new neutral!
Warm and cute

links_reviews_title: so comfortable and great for weekends!
links_reviews_text: no "con". it is very casual and looks great with jeans!

Loved this so much, that I didn't return it until the end of my month. I had to have worn it 10 times and got compliments each time! Sleeves were a bit long but I easily folded them up. Very comfortable!
The cut and slit on the back makes for a playful look.

links_reviews_title: It's was so comfy and the olive color was perfect
links_reviews_text: The only thing it does get a little lint. Which was annoying for an item that is so expensive. If that did not happen, I would have considered buying it, maybe I'll rent it again when I'm looking for oversized sweater especially for cold days.

I liked this sweater - the color of it is accurately reflected. The sweater was reallllly warm and was good for some bitterly cold days. I kept this for about a week and wore it to work, running errands on the weekend, and also out on a friday night. Very casual
I wasn't a fan of the sleeve as I tend to push up my sleeves often. This sweater did not permit that, and it somewhat inhibited my basic work.
Great for work. Not super heavy but not too light either- so basically I'm saying it's the mama bear of sweater weights in this Goldilocks tale.
Great color and the sleeves are so fun.

links_reviews_title: I love the sleeves and fit!
links_reviews_text: Not to small/cropped and also not oversized. I liked how this sweater was easy to wear on its own or layer with outerwear.
This sweater is great! The sleeves are a little too much for me, but it's warm, comfy, hangs well, and a beautiful color so I can just roll the sleeves up a bit

Warm and cozy basic sweater. I read the reviews and ordered a size medium as I like a more fitted look. I'm a size 12 36 D and the medium fit nicely so I would size down on this one. Has a 90s feel to it which I liked.

links_reviews_title: So soft and a true blue color.
links_reviews_text: It's a little big around the shoulders on me but I like the cable knit and the fun sleeves. I wore it with black jeans which just looked better than the lighter ones.

I'm busty and I was worried about the big-looking sleeves adding bulk. However, due to the way they fell, and the long 'cuffs', I think they worked out great. The knit is soft, flecked with small color bits, and the blue is beautiful. I am 5'3" and it was an okay length for me, hitting just between waist and abdomen.
Loved the color, cut and feel of this sweater. I would have kept it, but it runs a little big and the neck line looked too oversized on me. That didn't stop me from wearing it though!
This sweater feels inexpensive and it bagged out, which bothered me all day. It's otherwise a very pretty color.

links_reviews_title: great color, and sleeves are fun
links_reviews_text: perfect for everyday but a little too casual as the material looks a bit worn.
Almost bought this, but the sleeves were a few inches too short. Would rent again.

links_reviews_title: Super cute and easy to wear!
links_reviews_text: Loved it.
Perfect fit, cute style - great for work in a more casual office or just everyday
Really pretty color and cute detail with the "confetti". Lots of compliments. Fairly short/cropped but works with high waisted jeans for me. Bought this one.

links_reviews_title: This blue really pops and is a flattering color for all complexions.
links_reviews_text: Darling sweater. Runs a tad large.

links_reviews_title: Nice quality, super cute! Can dress up or down
links_reviews_text: a little loose in the waist may have needed one size smaller.
What a great sweater. Comfy and warm and the sleeves are fun, along with the specks of color through out. I got tons of compliments! Would rent again!
Loved the color and fit. True to size.
It was comfy
Loose fitting but that's the style. Sweater has different colors in the yarn. Some would say it looks like lint on the sweater but I think it looks awesome. Enjoyed and would rent again!

links_reviews_title: just a casual day:) no special event
links_reviews_text: fit was true to size. Loved the color.
It looked like it was not as high end as I had hoped
Great sweater! I wore it to work and on the weekends. Great color and goes with anything
It was a nice sweater for work. It's a beautiful color.
I wore a top underneath to keep me warm. Great color and fit.
Cozy and true to size.
Wore this sweater for everyday. Very comfy and nice fit. I recommend it.

I wore this sweater a couple of times before sending it back. The material is that that stretches out and you can't decide if you should have gotten a smaller size although it does show all in the back with jeans. Color is fun but probably wouldn't rent again.
Fits true to size and great for everyday wear, but wasn't quite as soft and cozy as I was hoping.
comfy fabric,felt a bit short though
Fit was perfect.
It looked adorable on but was a little short. The sleeves were cute and the color was fun.
Fit is very snug. Could not wear
This is a perfectly nice sweater. The color is great. The body of the sweater is a little loose -- it's comfy but you might want to size down.

links_reviews_title: Comfortable, great color. Got lots of compliments!
links_reviews_text: Loved this sweater and will definitely rent again. It's a great color and a flattering fit for something so comfy and warm.
I loved it so much, I bought it. It's comfortable and casual, but the sleeves make it feminine. I wore it three days in a row and decided that meant it was meant to be.
The sweater had sleeves that weren't flattering to my petite, curvy build. It felt silly on.The fabric seemed comfortable though
I can't even fathom how amazing this jacket was. It was way warmer than i thought and kept me warm on all the below freezing days. I definitely considered buying it!!
Oversized leopard print jacket is perfect for a cold night out - perfect piece for when you don't want to wear a puffy coat but it's freezing out
Loved this jacket. Great for a warmish (35 degree) winter day! I wore it many times while having it
Super into this coat for winter. Way more than I thought I would be. It was super snuggly and it I love how it added a statement to a plain outfit.

links_reviews_title: Fluffy, trendy, perfect to dress up or down
links_reviews_text: Love this coat. Looks good open or closed. Tons of compliments. Doesn't look super expensive though. Just trendy.

Generally not an animal print lover but this jacket is awesome. It's soft and thick like a teddy coat but zips up and has hardware like a moto jacket. Received so many compliments, even my husband liked it. Holding onto this one for a while. If in between sizes, size down. Worth the rent!
Fits tts. Statement making but not too crazy or loud.
such a cute coat! very warm and has so many nice details. however, it was fairly large so i would size down if possible!
Great piece to add to a fall outfit and so cozy. Received lots of compliments.
It's an oversize fit but that's the style of it - Loved!
This is a fun jacket. It's a bit bulky, but it didn't overwhelm me. I wanted to keep it longer, but it has warmed up quite a bit where I live, so I felt I was wasting a spot. I would rent again!

links_reviews_title: Fun take on a classic jacket!
links_reviews_text: I loved this jacket. I originally got it for a formal party to add a bit of something but I didn't end up wearing it to the event because I felt like it was not formal enough. It would be great for going out to the bars or on a date and I think it's a really fun and different jacket. It definitely runs large, but I think it makes it that much more fun to be a bit oversized. It's super cute with a pair of dark jeans and black boots!

links_reviews_title: Understand that this was mean to be an oversized fit - but the fur is just too thick and bulky.
links_reviews_text: Cute idea - but not a good fir
Oversized fit a little too big and was unflattering on me. Overall cute style but I couldn't get past the fabric (which felt more like carpet than faux fur).
Warm and comfortable! Would definitely rent again!

links_reviews_title: did not want to return it!
links_reviews_text: absolutely loved this jacket! definitely renting it again

LOVED this jacket. I wore it several times and really liked it. You feel like a total bad ass. Overall the fit was true to size and the proportions were nicely balanced to still achieve the over-sized fit. The zipper is a bit finicky and the quality of the "leather" details are semi-cheap, but they still work as accents. The coat really keeps you warm and the collar can easily wrapped around your neck for extra warmth. Considered buying it, but not really convinced it's a piece I absolutely need forever. Will rent again though!
Just wasn't my style after all, I was trying something different and it made me look bigger than I am.

I rented this jacket for when the weather started to drop in California (the low 50's - can you even imagine?) and am so glad that I did. This coat is so cozy and cute and I found myself wanting to wear it all day long, even when the coastal weather suddenly shifted to 80 degrees outside. It is very oversized in how it's designed, so a size L hit me just above the hip - and I'm 5'10" if that helps visualize anything. The arm length, on the other hand, does not reflect this oversized style and the sleeves hit me just behind the wrist. To be totally honest, I'll probably just buy this coat next time I rent it. I LOVE IT.
The jacket was warmer/thicker than expected. Loved the style.

links_reviews_title: So good but runs big, renting a Small now!
links_reviews_text: It was honestly just a full size (at least) big. I am broad through my chest and shoulders and this was very roomy. But this jacket was so cute! I'm going to rent it in a small.

links_reviews_title: Cute dress, but nothing special and not for the price
links_reviews_text: It was cute. But was showing signs of wear. The fabric didn't seem luxurious, but it was a nice work outfit. My husband said I looked like handmaidens tale.
I would 100% buy this dress. It is perfect. If it came in other colors I would buy them too.
I wore this for a ceremony and it was an attention-grabber! Fit was perfect and I felt amazing and confident. I would buy this in every color if I could!
Dress fit well, interesting yet conservative design. I received multiple compliments and could wear it from work to a dinner function. Comfortable.
Made me feel like a million bucks!
This dress is matronly. I ordered it a size up and it was way too big for me to wear to work - for this reason, I think it runs TTS.

9/10 love! Gorgeous color and great fit. Is not generous with curves so maybe size up if you have tummy. So classy and professional that it made me look a decade older, but in like a good, successful confident woman way. (I'm 27 and no one in my peer group dresses like that on a regular work day!)
Total strangers stopped me to compliment my dress. Great quality. Would totally buy it if I was immensely wealthy.

This dress is absolutely beautiful. It is intended to be tight and it was. That didn't work for me because I need to add my problem-area waist so I ultimately did not wear it. But I will surely rent it again if I lose weight. It is truly a stunning dress.
This power dress is perfect for a big work meeting. I would rent again next time I have an important presentation.

I liked this dress, but didn't end up wearing it. The construction of the top is such that it looks strange with a jacket on top, and the event I had planned on wearing it to required a blazer. But I would rent this again for an event where uncovered sleeves would be fine. The waist is flattering and it's definitely an appropriate length.
Great for work. I received several compliments.

links_reviews_title: Couldn’t wear it... way too big
links_reviews_text: Dress is huge, and swam on me. I usually wear an 8/M... this was too big to wear.
Beautiful fit
The dress felt great on and it would be great for work

This dress fit perfectly, without being tight at all. The length was a little long for me, but that is to be expected when you are 5'2". I felt very comfortable all day, the dress was nicely lined without being heavy.

I loved this dress. One of my fave from RTR. I did not want to return this one. Dress have a bit of stretch. Vibrant red and very conservative, yet gives off a sexy vibe. Would def be renting this one again.
Rented this for work - the dress is so comfortable and well cut, and it looks absolutely beautiful. I would have loved to keep it!

links_reviews_title: Quality, conservative dress you could wear anywhere
links_reviews_text: This dress is a gorgeous true red with thick quality fabric. The cut makes your waist look tiny. I wore this when I had to give a presentation to the public. I normally don't dress this conservatively, so I was glad to find this rental. I'm a true size 6 in dresses, but only the 8R was available. The fit was a bit loose, so I'd say that it's true to size. I definitely didn't need to wear shapewear with it. You're all covered up in this dress-no skin shows, so it should be appropriate for any houses of worship. For me, I felt a bit dumpy in it-the length was mid calf. With the sleeves and high neckline, the longer length seemed excessive. But, it was fine for my event and I felt good wearing it. I would only rent it again ( in a smaller size), if I needed something extra conservative to wear.

While the color is a bright red, the length and cut is very conservative. The dress is a midi length. I am a 2/4 typically and had some room in the 2, especially in the midsection. I would say it runs one size large.
Too long on my frame and the hips were too big.

links_reviews_title: Nice color and fit, but top was a little awkward
links_reviews_text: I am sometimes between an 4 and a 6, but I rented the 4 which fit perfectly for the most part. I loved the bright red color and the dress certainly felt lovely/expensive. However, whenever I reached up to touch my hair or fix an earring or something like that, it would leave a ridge in the top part of the dress that I would need to straighten out. Knowing myself, it would drive me crazy having to fix that all day long, so I ended up not wearing the dress.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous dress. I received a ton of compliments. My figure never looked better.
links_reviews_text: This dress is expensive and you will look expensive with it on. Even though my entire body was covered, it was a sexy little number.
You'll feel like Meghan Markle or Kate M wearing this chic, polished, vibrant dress. Compliments will rain down upon you as if you were an actual royal. The cut is figure-flattering for sure!
If it wasn't so expensive, I would buy this dress today. It's gorgeous, super comfortable, and very slimming. Highly recommend.

I've worn this dress everywhere - work, board meetings, Valentine's dinner out, etc. It is so versatile, comfortable, flattering, and elegant. Love it. The material is high quality, but on the thin side, so proper undergarments are needed.

links_reviews_title: Work Professional with a hint of glam
links_reviews_text: Fits true to size, fabric is thick (but prone to a bit of static). Gorgeous fit. Hit mid-calf on me (5'8). Really loved it and felt powerful in work meetings all day.
Beautiful fit. Elegant. Received many compliments.

This wool sweater was warm and soft without being too itchy. Has cool braided design that runs on both the front and back. Super comfortable - could dress up or down. Received multiple compliments. Would definitely rent again.

I got SO many compliments on this at work and really liked it! It was true to size and hit just at my hips. It is pretty thick but I didn't get overly hot in it at work. It was comfy and had a unique style that I loved. Would recommend!
Interesting warm sweater and not itchy. I wore it with black jeans and regular jeans. Not the most flattering, but warm and cozy.

Beautiful, high quality, comfortable sweater, with a unique look to it. The wool is soft, not scratchy. True to size, although I ordered one size up since that's all that was available, and I don't mind my sweaters a bit over-sized. It looked good one size up, and I'm sure it would have looked good in my usual size as well. This is a sweater I would love to own!
This sweater is simply amazing quality. It fits true to size but not a super tapered fit but I think it works for this sweater. You'll love this rental!
Wanted to wear this sweater everyday, loved it.
This was a great sweater to throw into the rotation, but it was just ok. Make sure you wear a dark bra underneath because where the diagonal braided part is, is kinda see through.

links_reviews_title: Loved this sweater. Comfortable and cute. Wore it several times.

links_reviews_text: I wore this sweater for work and vacation to Ireland in November. Warm, stylish comfy, not too think. Cool design with the braid. It was hard to give this one back. Would definitely rent it again.
Loose fit. Loved the color contrast. Wore with black jeans and was warm/got loads of compliments.
Loved the design & fit of this piece. Super versatile -- could be dressed up or down.
I like roomier sweaters so ordered a size up. Still short and boxy, not super flattering.

I ended up wearing this a few times and loved the look and overall design but by the last time I wore it, I noticed that the cross stitching in the front was coming loose - this sweater truly is pretty much held together by the cross stitching! I noticed that my bra would peak thru the stitches if I stretched or pulled the sweater and ended up having to tug the loose end of the string to tighten it up a bit. Overall great sweater but recommend maybe wearing a cami or dark bra underneath to blend in!
Love love love this sweater, got a lot of compliments. Will be keeping this for the next 2weeks. Not itchy at all. Nice and warm.
Super cozy sweater but started pilling, maybe rtr will comb it
Great fit true to size. If you're lookin for a baggy look, size up. Very comfy material. Wore with leggings and sneakers. One day I'll buy it :) would rent again in a heart beat when it gets colder.
Material was nice quality- it was thick, very warm, and had stretch to it. Nice color combo. It's a cropped fit so I wore with high waisted jeans.

links_reviews_title: Love this sweater! Size up if you don't like cropped style.
links_reviews_text: I'm usually between a S and M and went with the M so I would feel comfortable. Definitely the right choice. Great for a fall day.

Not my favorite look. This sweater was really cropped! It only looked decent with high waisted denim, and even then I didn't find it particularly flattering. The knit was fine, but sleeves were a bit long on my frame. Proportions just seemed off.

I loved this material however I thought the sweater ran a little small, so I didn't end up wearing it. Would recommend ordering two sizes up if you want an over sized fit which is what I would have preferred.

Great quality material and fit. Slightly cropped so wore with high waisted jeans. I wore an XS but am small chested so if you are busty keep in mind that this is not an oversized fit and you may have to size up.
Cute!
Definitely short, but maybe it has shrunk a bit from use? The fabric is very dense. Cute for a bonfire.

links_reviews_title: Top was too short for me.
links_reviews_text: I didn't even wear it.
Loved the look, just a slight discoloration on right shoulder but it was a nice sweater

I loved this sweater. I wore it several times. It's fitted but not obscene. Not itchy at all. I like the slightly cropped shape with high waisted pants. I would have bought this if it wasn't so expensive!
Super cute sweater. Cropped to the waist.
Its a bit cropped on the body, so be warned! belly will show with low rise pants. 100% wool and still comfortable (i usually cannot wear wool because of itch)
Tight fitting and short but great with highwaist jeans. nice quality

Loved the pattern and colors- so cute! The ties on my dress were adjustable but it was difficult to get it tied and make it stay. But once it was all adjusted it was so fun to wear and so easy and cute! Loved it!!!

Easy summer dress with a bit of swing to it. The dress that came for me had adjustable straps-- but I heard from others that theirs were tacked. The adjustable straps made it easy to make it shorter or longer depending on the event I was going to! Highly recommend

links_reviews_title: Easy for a variety of events!
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress a few times when I rented it. It is super cute and EASY. It is comfortable and although it's a bit baggy, the cut was still flattering. The bows make the dress! Loved it.
The ties did come a little loose so just had to stay aware and fix them a few times throughout the day. But great flair!

Fit perfectly - was a little tight under arms and you couldn't adjust the bows (well one I could because it was unsewn when I received it). It came veryyyyy wrinkled but I was able to iron it easily. Adored the bows. Adored the fit. So cute and probably received the most comments of my life in this!
Nice airy dress for summer! Wore this in Costa Rica 95 degree heat! 6 months pregnant and it was very forgiving :)
Easily wrinkles

Loved this dress! It was so cute and perfect for a party on the water. Mine came with the ties undone so I was able to adjust it, which was great because otherwise, it would have been to big in the shoulders. Will diffidently re-rent.
The dress was cute but semi see through and very wrinkly

links_reviews_title: This came and someone must have shrunk it because it looked like a top and cannot wear as a dress
links_reviews_text: Too short
Straps are not adjustable and runs small. I think this would work for someone who has a straight body type. I have some curves and it barely fit over my waist so the ruffles flared out.
It was too tight, just barely, for a 33-week bump. you cannot adjust the straps they are sewn tied like that. because you couldn't adjust the straps I couldn't make it just a bit longer to work.
A bit short but really cute and fits nicely
Fit well

links_reviews_title: cute but I felt like it maybe looked a little maternity-ish in it!
links_reviews_text: cute but felt like I looked pregnant in it! :)

no stretch, and was way too short. i couldn't wear. and the straps are not adjustable, even though they look like they are so i couldn't lengthen it at all. sadly i didn't end up wearing it to the graduation party that i had in mind when renting it.

links_reviews_title: Fun spring dress with a great pattern.
links_reviews_text: This dress was easy to wear and very flattering. Great color and pattern. Perfect for lunch date or casual night with a jean jacket. Would rent again.
Wouldn't bat an eye to wear this on vacation, but it's a tad short for every day wear.
It's a potato sack. I ordered a size up and it just didn't fit me right still.. It was also extremely short even with the sleeves adjusted.
Wore this to work with a white tee underneath, but would be equally lovely without it for the weekends. Very cute and the bows are adjustable.

links_reviews_title: It is VERY short. I'm 5'8" and it was a tunic. There is no way I could have worn it as a dress
links_reviews_text: The bows aren't adjustable so I couldn't make it longer! So cute though and it's a really nice stiff cotton material.
Comfortable. Can be dressed up or down. A staple for sure. I'd like to buy it
This sweater is soft but short in the sleeves and kept gaping open!
Just an average top, exactly as pictured, lower quality than I've come to expect from RTR, and it's nothing to write home about, but still a nice top. Soft, comfy, hung well.

links_reviews_title: Baggy and bunches up at the bottom
links_reviews_text: This fit was strange. The neckline was lovely but then all the extra material sort of falls out of the bottom of the shirt making it bunch up around the waist.
Nice all purpose everyday top. The drape style is flattering and the item is cut so that it provides plenty of coverage. I gave it 4 instead of 5 stars because it was ever so slightly itchy.
This was a comfy sweater that was great for nursing. The crossover opening was so convenient to feed my baby. It can be dressed up or down too!

I rented this for everyday. While it's comfortable and versatile, it does run smaller and I found the sleeves to be short even though I sized up. Definitely more pink in person like another reviewer stated.
Too short for my long torso.

links_reviews_title: super comfortable sweater. the wrap hangs nicely
links_reviews_text: it's a wrap so there's opportunity for a potential flash but it hangs so nicely, I wasn't concerned.

links_reviews_title: Cute sweater but needs a hook or tape in the middle.
links_reviews_text: Cute sweater, very cozy but was too big. Would highly recommend tape or safety pins though, as it had a tendency to pop open in the middle.

I thought this would be more oatmeal/ brown colored but it turned out to be almost pink-ish with a heathered brown look to it. Not necessarily bad, just not what I thought I was getting. I think Slate & Willow tends to run a little small so I opted for an XL instead of L and was happy that I did. I'm 5'6"/ 36DD and normally wear a size 12. The XL fit well -- probably a little too much material in the chest but it hung well and was the right length for me.

links_reviews_title: Strange material in the arms and odd shape at the bottom.
links_reviews_text: This was really uncomfortable and itchy in the arms. Feels like the arms are lined with an odd mesh. Also, the way the bottom sits (a bit too flouncy) was too unflattering to wear. One of the few things I am sending back without even wearing once.

I was happy with this sweater. The color is more pink in person and I was expecting it to be neutral, but I still liked it. I am usually a large, but I got the XL because usually these wrap style tops open op around my bust. This one didn't at all and I could have worn my usual size. I didn't need to wear a tank underneath. It's cute and cozy.

Beautiful beautiful beautiful piece. It fits me perfectly. The fabric is melange: the black and blue are interwoven to produce a rich effect. Love the green trim. It looks stunning with my dark blue jeans. Of course, picture does not capture it as well. It is also in great shape. No pilling or signs of wear.

links_reviews_title: Loved, just not the price to buy!
links_reviews_text: Rented the large and would say for sweaters im a medium, but this wasn't too big on me. It's not that itchy (only slightly) great for work or with jeans!

links_reviews_title: More cropped than I expected. Maybe if I had gone for a medium, it would have been a tad longer.
links_reviews_text: Size up for a looser look

links_reviews_title: Weekend away by the coast, it was the perfect cool day sweater to walk around in.
links_reviews_text: Lovely sweater. Casual. Colors are great together, navy & lime. Sweater is a little short for me, waist length, personal preference is to have it a little longer. But it looked great.
Cute cropped sweater! I wore it with a navy turtleneck underneath, cause it is a little itchy on it's own (very slightly!). Think it's cute!
Did not wear. I liked the sweater it was just to short for me
The sweater runs true to size. It is short so you will want to wear a high waisted skirt or pants.

5'3"; 152 lbs; pear-shape: This was light and comfortable. I liked the color very much, especially the light blue flecks and the green stripes. It was a bit short and rode up when I lifted my arms or sat down.

links_reviews_title: I wish i had had a larger size so I could have a more relaxed fit
links_reviews_text: It was cute
Great hemline, super flattering. Pretty little detailed stitching. Lovely piece
This is a great everyday sweater. It fits well and is warm and comfy. I wore it with the Tibi sweater skirt for Thanksgiving dinner and then a few more times with jeans.
fit was snug, comfortable

links_reviews_title: This item was much shorter than it appears in the picture.
links_reviews_text: The sweater fit everywhere except that it barely hit my waist.
Simple but great details. Green gives it a fun pop of color. Not itchy or bulky but definitely warm. Definitely will be renting again!
I loved this bag. It was a shame that I didn't actually get to use it though since I am in self quarantine

links_reviews_title: A little tight, longer than expected
links_reviews_text: Probably should have sized up for this. It was soft, but a little more of a sweatshirt than expected. Didn't know it would be so long.
Bit baggy but super comfy
This was so cool! Love tie dye, great thick material, convenient pockets. Would rent again and would buy!

Rented this item to lounge in over the holidays. Super soft and cozy. I'm normally a small but I rented a large because I wear my sweats bigger. The sleeves and top part fit more like a medium to me. It also runs pretty long. It was almost at my knees which was fine but didn't seem to run true for a women's large. Fought long and hard on buying this piece but decided to let him go. Might be back 👀
A little bit oversized which I like. Great color. Very soft.
Loved this tie dye hoodie! Great color on the tie dye.

links_reviews_title: LOVE the fabric and color in person but runs SO small
links_reviews_text: I normally wear a small and would prefer a large in this
Super soft and warm. Perfect for my vacation in Washington state!
I love these jeans! Most ankle jeans end up being too short on me, but these hit me just right. They do give a little after wearing them a few times, but overall they keep their shape pretty well.

links_reviews_title: Amazing quality, cute cut, not the right size for me.
links_reviews_text: I love these jeans. They are so incredibly comfy, the quality is awesome. The ONLY downside is that the sizing was a little off. I think if I'd gotten a size down it would have been perfect. (Sometimes it's hard to choose which size since some brands vary so much)
Great cut and style but too large on my frame.
High waist, a little odd lenght not as high as I thought but still fun. Ran small in size

I love these trendy jeans by Citizens of Humanity! Running true to size with no stretch, I recommend going up for your back-up size. This style is fitted throughout the midsection and at the hips, with comfortable room throughout the midsection. At 4’8”, the length hit floor length on me so I ended up folding the excess material to my preferred length. The straight leg give these jeans a more relaxed and casual vibe. Pair with your favorite tee and sneakers to complete your look!
I need these jeans! They are so comfy cute and flattering. I'm sure i'll rent again.

links_reviews_title: These jeans felt great and were very flattering.
links_reviews_text: They were comfortable, but had enough structure that made it feel like I was wearing jeans and not "jeggings." The ankle crop was a little longer than I expected, but I made it work. In the future, I'd like to go for a higher crop on the ankle so it's a little more flattering with the right shoes.
The style of these jeans are super cute and perfect for an everyday look, however I felt as though the material was very stiff which made wearing them a bit uncomfortable.
I found that they were fine in the morning but after wearing them at the office all day they stretched a lot. I think my butt was too small to fill them out!

I rarely wear anything other than dark denim skinny jeans so these were definitely out of my comfort zone when I first ordered them. Turns out I've been doing denim all wrong! These are amazing and so versatile, you can easily dress them up or down depending on if you wear heels or sneakers, blouse or tee. Loved them so much I ultimately bought them!

I had read multiple reviews stating that they ran big, just right, or small. Therefore I tried my normal size which is a 4 or a 27. I could get them up and buttoned but barely. They were not comfortable on my frame. I am 5'3" and a 125 pounds for reference. My body type has hips but not a lot. The length was great and trendy. Would try these again but I would size up.
Great fit. Very flattering. Slims the waist. Perfect length
These were ok jeans. Nice cut, but no stretch as most jeans have nowadays.

links_reviews_title: Thick jean material gave no stretch
links_reviews_text: I usually wear a 29, but ordered up just in case to a 30. I couldn't zip these jeans. Thick jean material, wasn't what I expected.
Too small in waist
LOVE LOVE LOVE - nothing bad to say; petite girl's best friend. Trendy and comfy! My favorite with platform sneakers
Their jeans fit me perfectly! True to size! I didn't particularly care for this style of this jean. I'm not a fan of the crop and they flared a little

These were very comfortable and TTS - the waist hit at a very comfortable spot. However, these jeans do have a lot of stretch to them, so they loosened up quite a bit. I usually wear jeans more than once before a wash, and these were very loose after the 2nd wear.
Fit perfectly. A tiny bit too high waisted (but I am very short waisted with little torso, so perhaps it's just me?) Cute cropped jeans that you could wear again and again.
I was excited to try a new style. Unfortunately, this was not the style for me. Too much of a flare just below the calf.
Jeans were a little tight in the waist and didn't feel comfortable. And they seem a bit short - not the style for me.

links_reviews_title: Easy high quality denim with cool girl look
links_reviews_text: Super flattering with an expensive authentic looking wash. These feel great and have a little stretch. I sized up but feel smaller!
Probably the most flattering jeans I've ever worn!
Wouldn't fit over my hips
I love these jeans! They're flattering and comfortable. The crop bootcut is adorable! I'm pear shaped and these jeans are the perfect cut for my body. This is the second time I've rented them!
Kind of makes your butt looked squished
need to order a size up
I like these a lot but definitely run large. I'd rent them again a size smaller.

I wanted to try the new kick crop style. I should've ordered down, but even then I wouldn't have liked the color and cut. They're just too late 90's for me. I'm not interested in repeating the decade. I also really don't like the ugly fashion trend: dad shoes, poorly cut items etc. these jeans fall in that category I think.
Too baggy through hips and waist despite 25 being my go-to for CoH forever. Blah cut.
Will definitely be buying them when price is reduced. Such a fun flair; wore several times before sadly sending back. Good length for petites.
High rise, tight through butt and legs, and love the crop because I have short legs so theyre just the right length on me.
I'm 5'5 and these hit in an awkward spot, definitely not a cropped length on my height! Very nice quality but don't have stretch. Wish they were more cropped length cause they are soo cute!

I have wider hips/big butt and a smaller waist, so trying to find a pair of jeans that fits and is flattering is a nightmare. These were perfect as soon as I zipped them up, and this kind of perfect fit so rarely happens!
I normally wear a 6 or 8, so I went with the 8. I could get them on but no way was I going to be able to button them!! Super high waist, definitely NOT for someone with hips, curves.
I'm in between sizes and I wasn't able to wear the 26 bc it was just a bit too big in the waist and thighs. However, I could tell if I got the smaller size, these would have looked great.

links_reviews_title: Wonderful dress that can be dressed up or down.
links_reviews_text: Wore this to a charity gala with a mink shawl. I felt so beautiful and most of all ------ COMFORTABLE! This is such a versatile dress that can be used for so many occasions. You can most definitely dress it up or down. It was very light and comfortable. I loved the pockets as well. It made me want to twirl like I was a little girl again. I highly recommend and want to purchase one to own!
Rented after seeing it on a coworker who also Rents the Runway. Soft and flowy, felt fancy and got lots of compliments.
Gorgeous dress that fit my 5"1 height. Really beautiful, chic and a dream to wear. Will definitely rent again.

links_reviews_title: So many comments and I felt fabulous in it!
links_reviews_text: A teeny bit tight under the armpit, but not enough to make me love it any less!

links_reviews_title: Best RTR choice EVER! I was a floaty, comfy goddess all night
links_reviews_text: This dress was a legend. As expected, there is a TON of fabric. The pleats laid beautifully and did not wrinkle when I sat down. I loved the hidden slit on the far left side of the skirt - you can't see it when standing but it was helpful to cool down when I sat in between dances. I didn't use the pockets to hold any items but they were fun for pictures and dancing. A normal bra nearly worked, but I went with strapless so I didn't have to worry about a strap peeking out. The hem (on the XXS) hit right at my ankle. I wore the dress with both 5" wedges and 2.5" strappy heels, and thought the height of the wedges helped offset and enhance the trapeze effect. Overall, I can't wait to rent this again!!

links_reviews_title: Really accentuates the size of a pregnant body!
links_reviews_text: I did not keep this rental but thought a review might be helpful for others. The neckline is beautifully smocked which is hard to see in the photos. It's a well-made quality dress, with a half lining in the bust area. The entire thing is pleated, so there is a lot of fabric, which is light and moves in a nice way as you walk. However, this dress made me feel huge. I rented for my baby shower while 8 months pregnant and decided it was just too tent-like to make me feel good. However, I probably would have liked it on my normal non-pregnant body, as I tend to like these modern boxy shapes. My pre-pregnancy weight is 145 and I'm 160 in this photo, so not that big, but yowza! Hard to tell!

This dress has a huge wow factor. It is beautiful and can be dressed up or worn with sandals. It’s dressy, but I wore it to work. It is so comfortable and even has deep pockets! There is a lining at the top part of the dress, so it feels substantial. I wore a half slip because I felt it might be too sheer in certain lights. The dress flows and moves beautifully, and I felt like a million bucks in it! I think it would be flattering on most body types because if the way is both form fitting at the top, but flows at the bottom.
A lot of fabric. Great pleats and overall movement but made me look wider. Pockets. Comfortable. TTS. I could wear with flats. Probably not petite friendly. Top half lined.

links_reviews_title: Didn't have my size but as it was flowing and roomy, I thought I'd try.
links_reviews_text: I did not fit the small so I didn't wear it.
I loved this dress so much I bought it. Just perfect - flattering, comfortable and fabulous. Absolutely lovely!

links_reviews_title: Loved it with a leather jacket and boots
links_reviews_text: A little snug under the arms.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful and forgiving will rent again
links_reviews_text: Float and forgiving beautiful dress you can play up or down I wore it for work and loved it

This is the perfect dress. It's effortless yet classic, chique and witchy in all the best ways. Get ready for tons of compliments while you wear what feels like a silky nightgown. I may purchase this one to have forever.

Wore this for a regular day to run errands. Fit: very triangle shaped (fitted at the top and very flowy on the bottom), excellent for a pear shape. Wore a belt to achieve an hourglass silhouette. Quality: heavy fabric, top half is lined, the smocking and pleats are well constructed but I struggled to get the zipper and hook-and-eye closure up in the back (the zipper wasn't sewn all the way up at the bottom). Overall, would rent again, but for spring/fall instead of summer.
Almost perfect! Super comfortable and easy to wear

links_reviews_title: It is a tent, but it's well-made and has a lovely flow.
links_reviews_text: If you're going for comfort, this dress will impress. Otherwise I found it a bit average/tent-like
