Its rare that you find a coat this beautiful that also keeps you warm! Pattern and color was so vibrant and unique. Button reached across the waist so the coat stayed shut against wind. Warm enough for 20 degree weather layered over a sweater.
This is the dreamiest coat I've ever worn. Wish I could buy it!!
Size guide suggested a 10, fit great...nice movement in the shoulders, not too tight! Loved the color.

links_reviews_title: One of my favorite rentals ever
links_reviews_text: I've just returned this coat after holding on to it for three months... it's the best statement coat. I was stopped dozens of times in various cities and airports. Many women asked the brand, and even men complimented the jacket. It's very warm and layers well. However, the deep neck means a scarf is necessary when it's super windy or chilly. I sized up 1-2 sizes so it could layer and be a bit baggy. The deep pockets in the front are horizontal, not sloped, so your stuff won't fall out.

I got this coat to bring some color into gloomy winter but it pretty much swallowed me. The shoulders are very boxy and sleeves were way too long. It may be designed to be more of a boyfriend style but it didn't do much for me. I wore it once and returned it.
Tons of compliments, fun pattern. Not terribly warm

This is definitely a statement coat. I could have sized down a size or maybe even two. I got a ton of compliments. I love using RTR for pieces like these that I wouldn't invest in long-term but love to try out.

Obsessed with this coat! I want to keep it all season long. I wore it to a trip to Montreal in late October and it kept me warm while looking fantastic. I highly recommend. It fit great! Had to cuff the sleeves but that looked great too. Got so many compliments on it as well. The color and the print are absolutely gorgeous. High quality beauty.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous. Wore once already and got so many compliments!!!
links_reviews_text: Love love love. Beautiful colors. Great quality. Everywhere I go in this coat, people have been complimenting me. I rented this for an everyday coat. Wore with jeans, a tee and some rag and bone sneakers. I ordered a size 6 but they sent me an 8. Would have preferred one size down cause I'm swimming in the 8 a bit. But I like it so much I don't want to return it just yet.
Shift shaped coat. True to size. Im 5'9 - 130lbs. Size 4 is great for sweaters underneath. Very comfortable.

My size (4) is never available in this piece so I just ordered and wore a 12 - it was huge but that's not the coat's fault. I imagine it probably runs true to size. It isn't super warm but that's not why you rent something that looks like this anyway so don't know why I'm mentioning it. I love the color and pattern - (my doorman said, "wow, just wow" when I wore it out last night. not sure how i feel about that actually but it was a compliment so I'm passing it on). I would note that the fabric feels cheaper than I would have expected - more like a stiff felt than a soft wool -- not a deal breaker though.

I planned to keep this coat for a week, but returned after one day as I was quickly disappointed to find it has no pockets. I don't really carry purses so pockets are pretty essential for me, especially with a coat. Beautiful color and print, got many compliments while walking around. Good for high 50s weather, it dropped to 48 degrees later in the evening and it was not warm enough.

links_reviews_title: the reason why I use RTR
links_reviews_text: The color of this coat is incredible in a good way. This is oversized--I am normally between sizes 6-8 but I ordered the size 6 (UK size 10), and it is a bit big. I dont mind it, although one size smaller might fit better. It is also longer than I expected. I'm 5ft5 and it goes down to my knees. I'm not sure how it'd handle real winter weather, but for California December evenings it is perfect.

First of all, the color on this gorgeous coat is phenomenal. The stock picture doesn't do it justice. It's also a nicely heavy coat (which is what I wanted) and could probably do well on a biting, windy day. I went for an 8 because I wanted to be able to layer it but the 8 is just way too big on me. But that's my fault. If I can get a better size, this is something I could keep all season long.

links_reviews_title: did not wear. I ordered the size US 10, it was too big. the 6 was too small
links_reviews_text: did not wear. I ordered the size US 10, it was too big. the 6 was too small
I realized when I received it that I ordered the wrong size. It was way too big for me, but, it was so beautiful I decided to wear it (multiple times) and I got compliments on it every time.
WAY TO BIG..I was swimming in a size 6 and I am usually a 6

links_reviews_title: These run large! Or- and I'm secretly hoping- I lost weight. But I didn't
links_reviews_text: Large waist Very very baggy I normally wear a 12 so U was surprised that these didn't fit

links_reviews_title: Super comfy jeans. Great fit. Have now worn them twice and thinking of buying!
links_reviews_text: Love the distressed look and relaxed fit. Great length too.

I loved this material - it was so soft and comfortable to wear. Like other reviewers said, these are definitely loose. I'm not sure if it's because I am so used to wearing skinny jeans, but they felt really baggy. I would go down a size when I rent them again.
These jeans are really soft and comfortable, but as others have said, they are super baggy through the thighs.

links_reviews_title: These jeans are great for comfy and on-trend everyday wear. If in between sizes, try sizing down!
links_reviews_text: Fits relaxed, normal to low-ish rise. I have average length legs and this hits just at the ankle - I like to roll up the hems an inch or two for an added casual effect.
I might just be too used to skinny jeans, but these felt awkwardly loose in the thighs
Cute, but not form fitting AT ALL. These are incredibly baggy pants! However, they are super soft and comfy.

I put these jeans into my Unlimited shipment in a whim and I'm so glad I did. They did run large but that is fine- it worked paired with a sweatshirt. I will definitely re-order these but probably in a smaller size. The distressing perfect, material is super soft, and overall these jeans are just so comfortable.

These are cute but ran too big so couldn't wear them to the bbq as planned. I did wear them around the house and within and hour were falling off, I would recommend a size down for relaxed and maybe even 2 for a tighter fit

Definitely like the colors and the peplum cut, but it definitely is really small! I usually wear an xs/small and the large is about the equivalent to an extra small to me. I would rent again because it is unique!

links_reviews_title: Fun colors to brighten up winter
links_reviews_text: This is a cute, warm, fun sweater, but it is short and the crop hits at the wrong place on a long torso. I still wore it though and loved how cheerful it was on a cold day.
Wore this Red Valentino Peplum Sweater for my Halloween date w/ the hubs. It ran short so I wore a tank top underneath.
Sleeves are almost intentionally shorter than average, but sweater is super cute! I got a lot of compliments - it was a lot of fun wearing it!
I'm long waisted, so the cropped peplum style was a little short but OK with high-waisted jeans.
Loved the color combo. Sweater was in great shape for being in rtr rotation for so long. Followed reviews and sized up so it wasn't too cropped and wore with high waisted jeans.

This sweater is definitely cropped. I have a long torso and wore high waisted jeans, but still had to make sure I didn't raise my arms much. I think a couple other reviewers had a good idea with ordering big and wearing it purposely baggy. Still loved the colors and the knit, very comfortable and well-made.
Layered with a thick t shirt because the knit is loose. Color was fun & matches well with a light wash jean

Not sure if my particular piece had shrunk or it really is just very small. It is extremely cropped. Even with high waisted pants it barely covered my stomach and I have a very short torso. It honestly looked like I was wearing a child's top. The color and fabric are beautiful, just wish the fit had been better.

links_reviews_title: LOVE THIS. Wish I could afford to buy it. So many compliments
links_reviews_text: Such a pretty combo of colors. Legit 20+ people DM'ed me asking where I got it after putting up a few pics. It's flattering bc of where it cuts in at the waist - I wore it with high waisted Levi's and it made the perfect outfit to walk around Laguna Beach in (in the winter months when it was chilly). Was sad to return it. Also- I'm usually a small in tops , maybe sometimes a medium. When I saw this in the flagship store I held it up and assumed it was a small. Fit perfectly and was surprised to see it was a large - just a note that the fit is off. I'm 5'8" but on the slender side - I can't see how someone with larger breasts or shoulders would feel comfy in it - which sucks because a large should NOT fit as a small because it excludes anyone larger from feeling like it's a good fit for them. It's like model sizing or something dumb. Regardless, I loved it.

links_reviews_title: Fun twist on a baggy sweater
links_reviews_text: I am trying RTR Unlimited for the first time and this was part of my first shipment. I ended up liking the sweater the more I wore it. It is kind of on the baggy side. Not sure if that is the style or if this particular sweater was a bit worn out. But since I ave a larger bust it worked out well and was super comfy to wear. I wore it once with white Capri pants and once with jeans to work and received tons of compliments. The peplum is fun and flirty and doesn't make you look like your pregnant like some peplums do. Overall I ended up really enjoying this sweater. It was something different to spice up winter wear.
This sweater was a little odd- cropped and boxy, but the placement of the waist made me look a kind of broad and flat. Wore it a short time and then changed into something more flattering.
Felt like I was right out of that 70 show! Got so many compliments on the sweater; if it was $200 I would have bought it.

I love the colors and feel of the fabric. Its cute, but the sleeves are short and stretch out a great deal as the hours pass. It's short so I wore it with high waisted jeans. Overall, good rental. I might rent it again.

links_reviews_title: Wasn't for an event. Just love fashion. My co-workers loved the color and outfit
links_reviews_text: I didn't have any cons, I guess because I wore it with a vintage Givenchy knitted skirt, the shortness others described wasn't an issue for me. Also, the last picture was just an attempt to try to get the shoes in.

Liked it, but runs short and I don't think it flattered my body type. I had to keep pulling it down. That being said I got a few compliments on it because they're not usual colors you see in a sweater. I wore a tank top under it.

Definitely fit a bit bulky, but overall loved this sweater! Length of sleeves were a little awkward so I just scrunched them up and all was well. The colors were so fun and I got a ton of compliments all day at work. Make sure your pants are more on the high waisted side!
Wore the large as an oversized sweater, so soft

links_reviews_title: Cute, but short and a little bulky.
links_reviews_text: I love the colors and the peplum detail on this sweater. It's very short, and tends to ride up during the day, so be sure to wear a high rise bottom. The yarn is a bit bulky, so it's not the most flattering silhouette. Overall cute, but probably won't rent again.
Soft, bright sweater. Just runs a little small and cropped. The cinched detail was too high on me.
Loved this sweater - so cute and colorful! I sized up like other reviews mentioned and a Small fit me well. I would buy this if I could!

I wore this to my fashion-forward work place and got stopped pretty much everywhere I went to have people ask who made my sweater. It's a drop shoulder, which is not my favorite on my body, but the elastic peplum waist really balances out the proportions. A lot of people complimented the color! It was very warm, but not too hot for me while I commuted. It's really the perfect Spring sweater for colder places!

links_reviews_title: No way a small would anyone
links_reviews_text: I'm 5'3 and 120. The large was perfect. There is no way a small would fit a baby doll. SIZE UP. Don't even question yourself. SIZE UP. Also, it's almost crop top like. I can't wear this to work.
Love everything about this sweater but it was showing a lot of wear. Fun colors and fun cropped fit. Runs very small. They sent me a m and I usually wear a xs.
I didn't wear this sweater. It would be so cute but it is a crop top. It doesn't look that cropped in the model photos. I am usually a medium and the large was still a bit small on me.

links_reviews_title: Very short, just barely covers the belly button.

links_reviews_text: Short, so I wore a tucked in undershirt. Got a lot of compliments. Great colors.
Almost a crop
Loved the shirt & color, but the sleeves are short!
Loved the colors and fabric but the crop made the fit a bit unflattering with my large bust.

links_reviews_title: I love the color pop here and the cinched waist.
links_reviews_text: You need to wear true high waisted pants to not show skin with this. I did that and if I lifted arms/shoulders too much my stomach would still show. I have a relaxed work atmosphere so it wasn't a huge deal. Still love this sweater, just wish the cinch was a bit lower.

I usually wear a medium, but this sweater is quite cropped and the sleeves are 3/4 length, so I ordered a size up- glad I did. This item is a fun, casual piece which gives you a pop of color in the midst of winter.
I feel like this might run a little small. The XL fit me just fine, but I have a long torso and this sweater is cut short. Still, looked cute with high-waisted jeans!

links_reviews_title: Cute but hit me in the wrong place!
links_reviews_text: This is cute, colors are different and a bit vintage feeling, it just hit me in a bad spot , if I had a flat tummy it would be no issue...but, I don't!
Pretty colors, a nice departure from the dark colors of winter. Best with high rise pants due to short torso.
Cute with high waisted jeans

Fit was true to size. The images on the model made me think the sweater would come down a little further but the part where it cinched was right in my midsection making it pretty short. Definitely a cropped sweater for sure

I wear this sweater frequently and always receive compliments. It is easy to dress up with cream pants for work or dress down with jeans for the weekend. I am petite so the cropped length works but I suppose it does run a bit on the short side. If you were over 5'3 in a size small your pants would have to be very high waisted for this to work.

links_reviews_title: Not for people with long torsos
links_reviews_text: Ruffle hit me right under my bust. Not very flattering on me

links_reviews_title: Happy colors from my favorite designer
links_reviews_text: Great fit, colors are beautiful and look perfect with jeans and sneakers. Laid back glam
Interesting twist to a classic white tee. Simple but trendy. Comfy too.
Definitely a large-fitting t-shirt. Did not find the fit to be very flattering. Only wore once.

links_reviews_title: So cute paid with high waisted shorts
links_reviews_text: I loved this top. I have an extra large chest but small waist, and sized down. It was perfect
Slouchier than I thought it would be.
Runs large all around. I had to tuck it in and wear a tank top/bandeau underneath.

links_reviews_title: Love it enough to buy it!
links_reviews_text: I couldn't live this top more! It cinches with ease for a dramatic effect or below the natural waist loose and low! It's soft too! Every day wear with leggings or jeans is ideal.

This thing was uncomfortable and not flattering. It is huge under the arms and you can see straight through into your bra, you have to wear a tank. I pulled the string to try and make the thing smaller and it got stuck and I could not get it done, it shows your stomach. The neckline was huge, I probably could have gone down two sizes on this one. It was also a dingy white.
Not at all like the picture. Super boxy.

links_reviews_title: Got lots of compliments. Perfect shirt to wear for meeting friends during the day on a weekend.
links_reviews_text: Oversized, but in a good way. Great for super skinny jeans.

links_reviews_title: Meh, it's okay if you've got the right bra and don't mind it showing...the arm holes are huge!
links_reviews_text: It was okay, wore it around the house and grocery shopping but it kept inching over on my shoulders towards the ruched side...and it kinda drove me nuts. I would size down but I'm long-waisted and think it would be too short. Personally I'm don't wear crop tops anymore but if I were in my 20's I would probably have ordered the smallest size and rocked it!
cozy and stylish. good for everyday wear
fit loose. good with tight high waisted pants
Cute idea but too big everywhere
Paired with grey leggings. Got lots of compliments.

links_reviews_title: The tailoring is really excellent; airy and silky fabric.
links_reviews_text: The photo definitely does not do this justice; it looks totally different in person. Flattering in cut, with the lower back and high front. Great with leggings. Nice pattern and fabric.
Loved this skirt, wore it from work to dinner (just changed the shoes to an over the knee boot for a dinner look). I would have bought it if it was in my budget. Def will rent again.

links_reviews_title: Felt like Cher from Clueless. So cute
links_reviews_text: Really cute and flattering skirt. A little short so wore with high boots for work. Tights would also make it less revealing. Comfortable skirt, not much stretch. The waist was a little big but fit nice in the hips. Paired nicely with a bodysuit. Would definitely rent again
I felt like such a boss babe wearing this set
Read other reviews and sized up- you should too! The skirt was very comfortable but VERY short.

Obsessed with this skirt. The colors really pop, and the cut is way cute. I wore it with tights because it's winter and would have also been way too short to be work appropriate otherwise. It was SO flattering though, made me feel like a model! The 4 probably fit more like a 2, so be aware of that.

links_reviews_title: Nice piece but not great for hourglass shapes or large bums. Could not wear without flashing.
links_reviews_text: I love anything with an elevated clueless vibe. Color and print is cute, material is nice. I rented a 6. I usually wear between a 4-6-8 or small or medium. Also wish this fit I couldn't get the skirt to zip properly and also give me enough booty cheek clearance. I might wait and size up to an 8 and see but it's a square skirt that's short at the back so if you have thick legs, curvy butt and a regular stomach - I would size up. I really wish it fit.
This skirt is so fun but when paired with the jacket it is a true showstopper. The skirt is a mini so be careful. But the front wrap detail helps with length illusion. My favorite outfit yet.
Loved this skirt! Very flattering with the design and cut. I actually wore this for my 10 year high school reunion and got so many compliments on it!

links_reviews_title: Short would be better with boots. Good for and well made! I'm 5'5 and 120
links_reviews_text: Good for work and day into night

links_reviews_title: Clueless vibes in the best way
links_reviews_text: I would probably never have picked this up in the store but I had so much fun wearing it! Wore twice and had so much fun both times dressing with yellow assents and got a ton of compliments.

links_reviews_title: Fab pattern, great flattering fit, and high quality material
links_reviews_text: The cut of this skirt was perfect for me; short enough to rock that cute retro 90s-Cher look, but also not obscenely mini. The fabric is a great weight and combined with the cut it was super flattering. I carry my weight in my belly and was worried that the fold-over might accentuate but it smoothed me out. I wore with a black tucked in sweater and got tons of compliments. Loved it!
Great skirt! Cute with a crop sweater, even better with the matching coat.

Perfect skirt, runs TTS. On the model the front flap/asymmetrical detail seems a lot longer than it does in person (reviewers photos are accurate). Other than this, it fits perfectly and I would love to buy it! However the one I rented had a little bit of fraying. May rent again to see if I can get a skirt that's in better condition.

links_reviews_title: Absolutely loved this skirt- gave some serious Clueless vibes!
links_reviews_text: The skirt itself is a bit short, but it fit well on me because I'm relatively short (still paired it with some tights though). Pairs perfectly with a black turtleneck!
Super cute! True to size but may be a little short on y'all girls! I'm 5'0 and it was about an inch above my knee. Fits well and doesn't stretch out. Would recommend!

This skirt paired so well with the matching overcoat for a nice homage to 90s fashion. I sized up one size and it fit very well. It's a little short for work, but you might be able to get away with it if you wear the overcoat, boots and opaque tights.

links_reviews_title: Fun, but structured. I loved it!
links_reviews_text: I wore this skirt with a fitted navy turtleneck sweater and the matching coat and received several complements. The bold pattern is sure to catch some attention and it fit perfectly so I was able to remove the coat and still look good !
Loved this skirt and very versatile! Made sexy schoolgirl with white tee and black booties then cute for work with black opaque tights and black long sleeved tee.

links_reviews_title: Super cute skirt but doesn't work if you have a booty.
links_reviews_text: In theory, I loved this skirt. But in practice, it was both too short for work (I am 5'8 and it barely grazed my bum) and ran a bit small. It didn't flat over my butt and puckered at the waist. The fabric is great and the style and color are so unique! I only wish it had worked for me. Grateful for Unlimited so I can just send it back and get something else!

links_reviews_title: Ended up not wearing but very cute
links_reviews_text: Got this for work and it was pretty short, so ended up not working for me. The waist is a bit tight as well.

Loved this skirt until a button fell off and I had to tuck in the wrap component into my waistband. This piece came NWT so the buttons weren't secure to begin with, hopefully quality control at RTR was able to fix bc it's such a cute skirt!

I absolutely love this skirt, I've worn it at least four times and I still don't know when I'm going to return it. I've gotten so many compliments on it every time I've worn it, and two of my friends who also rtr unlimited rented it after they saw me in it. It's very flattering
Cute high quality skirt! Loved the way it fit. Definitely a stand out piece the colors are very bright.

links_reviews_title: So many compliments! But a little small
links_reviews_text: Great skirt love the material and line... just a tad tight and short...might want to size up
Beautiful, but size up if you want to have the look in the photo! A zero fit, but it was a very tight mini and not as chic.

links_reviews_title: Size 0 but still kinda big on me.
links_reviews_text: Size 0 but still kinda big on me. The material is definitely nice, will fit someone who is size 2-4 better

links_reviews_title: A little too big and flowy for me
links_reviews_text: This was very comfortable at 29 weeks pregnant, but just too loose for me. Didn't feel like an XS. Fine for a super casual day or trip to the beach.

links_reviews_title: Well made, but just a bag
links_reviews_text: Liked the adjustable straps and loved that even though lightweight and airy it still has lining which keeps it from being see through! Just didn't do much for the figure. Ended up wearing over a bathing suit during a backyard BBQ get together.

This dress was a dream for my tropical vacation. So versatile - could be worn as a cover up, but also dressed up for a fancy dinner. The fabric is so light and comfortable but not sheer. Fit perfectly and hit above the ankle so I could wear flat sandals. I didn't need a bra with it either which was a bonus! Love the color and it packed well - the type of dress where wrinkles don't really show or matter. Would rent again in the summer or for another vaca!
This dress was so cute to wear on vacation! Plus it has pockets.
Wore this six months preggo and people couldn't even tell I was expecting. Loved the pockets! Highly reccommend
This dress looks very simple in the photo but the fabric is to die for. They got so many compliments even though it's not formfitting, but it's light and flowing and I can't seem to take it off!
Nothing special about this dress- more cottony than silky, so it reads very casual. Still, great, easy, comfy dress for hot summer days! Lined, so not see through.

I rented this for a beach vacation. I thought it'd be light and comfortable, which it is, but I didn't expect it to be nearly this flattering. I'm hanging onto it until the weather cools down and would rent again in the spring.
With it being 100 degrees out this summer this dress was perfect. The fabric was light which help keep it cool
Thin, very soft, great dress! The dress was perfectly flowy and came down to about 3 inches above my ankles.
I got this dress for summer in Lima, Peru and it was perfect. Incredibly comfy, photographs beautifully, and travels well. definitely recommend!

fitted through waist and then super flows. Rented twice for two different vacations and ended up buying it since I loved it so much! good as a pool or beach cover up or a regular dress for lunch or casual dinner

This dress came just in time for hot days. Loose and flowing, it fell just past my ankle. Ideal maxi-length, which is hard to come by! Waist is flattering, adjustable straps. Would totally buy if it weren't so pricey! I paired with a jean jacket in the evening; pretty for day and casual night out.

This dress is super comfy! I wore it for a lingerie shower that I helped host and I could move around easily! It was a little big and also a little see through. Don't go outside if it is sunny without a slip! I loved that it had pockets too!!!
Light, comfy, flattering and perfect for summer!

Great colors and very lightweight! The dress I received was a little worn-in. But the midi length was great for work. Runs large around the waist and top but I'm small chested. Straps are adjustable. Great that it has pockets!

Loved this maxi. The lightweight cotton fabric was great in the hot and humid weather and the style was easy and effortless. Perfect for any casual summer gathering or to run errands! I almost considered buying it.
I LOVED this dress! It is a very thin cotton! Wore several times and regretted not taking it on vaca but I did see a gal in Italy wearing it (and looking fab)!

This dress was great - it would be even better on someone with a longer torso. I had to adjust the straps all the way up to get the waist to hit right and it brought the neckline up a little too high. Other than that, I loved this dress. Great fabric and print!

Rented for vacation but decided to wear on casual Sunday and return before my trip. The dress is very comfortable and forgiving but a little more "mumu" than I was going for. Would possibly rent again!
So comfortable, light weight cotton dress. Left bottom unbuttoned to have a slit.
So cute and has adjustable straps. Perfect to thrown on over a swimsuit or wear to dinner at the beach.

Looked cute but I couldn't wear. Even on the longest length the straps were too short so the fit was just off. Returned without wearing. I may try a medium but the small seemed to fit otherwise. For reference, I'm 5'9", 145 lbs and I usually wear a 6.
Didn't wear bc I didn't think the cut was flattering
Could wear this all day. Very comfortable. Loved the elastic waist so you don't have to deal with a million buttons when taking on and off.
Plenty of room in top if you are big busted - the buttons do NOT open up as is often a problem in such designs. Comfortable, beautiful color, nice movement. Great for dinner out.
What a great dress! It has pockets, adjustable straps and enough support that I went without a bra! It was perfect and the material was lightweight and comfortable.
This is a simple pretty dress but more of a running errands pretty than a "wow" pretty.
Great fit, just didn't wear it , I don't know why. I saw some girl at the Picasso museum wearing it and I was like "meh" - and that's why.
Not my style but very pretty

Beautify, flowy dress - perfect for a beach vacation. I'm tall (5'10'') and generally wear a size 8 or 10 in dresses. The medium was roomy, but definitely not too big. It's a lot of fabric, but the fabric is so thin and light that it didn't feel overwhelming.

links_reviews_title: really comfortable (+pockets!!) and could dress up or down for any occasion
links_reviews_text: flow-y and flattering, wore this with heels to a wedding and with flats on a random Sunday. was comfortable and flattering

links_reviews_title: Adorable, but baggy in the chest
links_reviews_text: I love this dress--it's a beautiful (and unusual) color combo and summery and even has adjustable straps and pockets. My husband loved it. I was waiting to see if the price would go down to buy it. But in the end I didn't, because the chest is just too big. It made me self-conscious every time I put it on. I should add that the fabric is thin enough that I wore a strapless bra; otherwise you could see my nips through the fabric.

links_reviews_title: loose fit, so you could size down
links_reviews_text: I rented this for a transitional fall day. It looked great with a jacket in the morning and was perfect when the day time temperatures got into the 80s. The colors are bright. The material is very light weight. Super comfortable and easy to wear. The waist cuts in and gives the dress a nice shape. It's perfect for a hot day....I wish I'd gotten it earlier in the summer, though I may rent again for a destination wedding later this fall.
Cute everyday sundress. Paired it with a jean jacket and slides. I'm older and like to cover my arms.
Fit well, flow-y but not taking over my body, wanted to wear again and again and gots lots of compliments. Lightweight and beautiful colors.
Wore for a more casual wedding. Loved this dress! Fits great and loved the length
It was cute. Nothing amazing but cute everyday dress
I like this dress because it was just so easy in the summer. I wore it multiple times in the month I had it. It's more casual looking that I had originally thought from the photos.

This is a perfect everyday dress. Super cute to run errands, pool party, weekend brunch or vacation. Very light weight and breezy. Button detail all the way down. Fits true to size. Has pockets (always a plus)!
I love this dress for hot summer days. It's so soft and light. Great fit and flattering. It's a bit sheer, but I didn't mind. Love it.
So comfy, very cute and perfect for vacation. Fit true to size and was adorable on

I wore this dress twice and I just love it. The straps are adjustable, which is a nice feature. The material is thin and breezy for a warm summer day. The color and pattern are just beautiful. I sent it back, but I'm wishing I kept it!

I love this dress. It fits great and the adjustable straps and elastic in the back of the dress make it so that it will work with many different body types. The fabric is really thin which makes it great for hot weather.

links_reviews_title: Fabric seems to be worn, just okay
links_reviews_text: This dress was very long on me. The fabric seemed to be a bit worn and pilling. It was decidedly okay. I wouldn't rent it again.
Looks as expected. Fabric was a bit rough feeling
Couldn't wear it bc the cotton was too transparent.
Wore this during a visit to NYC in sweltering heat. It was as cool as one could hope and the colors were beautiful. Highly recommend.
Cute dress but nothing special. The pleats sit funny on your hips and made me feel huge so I didn't keep it. Had I been in a pinch,maybe I would have worn it cause it wasn't terrible.

links_reviews_title: Wore this dress as many times as I could. Super comfy.
links_reviews_text: I'm short and with big bust. No problems at all. Perfect fit.

links_reviews_title: My coworker called me "Pinky-Boo" when he saw me in this. :)
links_reviews_text: Great top. Flattering, comfortable. Made me feel extra good about myself wherever and whatever I was doing! Only con was when I got it the hanger had melted to the inside of the left shoulder and left a tiny hole where they had bonded.. also the hanger was a bit too long so it left the shoulders somewhat poofed out where I thought it should cling, but still loved it! Boyfriend also liked it and I got a few different compliments throughout the day!

links_reviews_title: Easily one of my favorite turtlenecks ever.
links_reviews_text: Such a fun piece, I loved the colorful strips. Fit perfectly and wasn't too tight and the material never stretched out. Please note though that the green and dark red is metallic and shimmery thread.

If you have a long torso please keep in mind that this sweater is very short. The colors and very vibrant. The fabric is a little itchy when you first put it in but you get used to it as the day goes on. There are no holes for your finger so the model picture is a little deceiving.

It fit a bit strange in the shoulders, but my shoulders are fairly narrow. If you have narrow shoulders consider sizing down I guess? It fit well everywhere else though. There's a bit of sparkle on one of the stripes- loved it!

Sweater for great, though it is short and not described as such on RTR. Wore to work with high waisted black wide leg pants, on the weekend with high waisted black denim, and to a show with black suede skirt- very versatile sweater!

This sweater is amazing! It looks like it would be itchy because of the fabric used but it is NOT! It's very comfortable and such a lovely mix of colors! The sweater is definitely cropped so if you're wearing it to work pair with a high waisted pant. A must rent!

This was a really striking and cozy top. I loved the colors and felt stylish without being too overdressed. The medium was a bit small for my large chest but I worry the large would have been too big.

It's super cute, but runs a little small. It was a bit snug in my chest, which meant it hit shorter than I would have liked. It made me feel like I was living in the 90s again. I couldn't really tuck it in, just quick forced it for a photo.

Loved the vibrant colors and although the fit was a little snug, I would have worn it EXCEPT for the fact that the sweater was hanging on the hangar and had huge hangar stretch marks on the sleeves making it look like an ill-fitting garment. Will be returning ASAP.

links_reviews_title: super comfortable. lots of compliments. a really unique piece that's casual and a pop of color.
links_reviews_text: fit true to size.

links_reviews_title: Had a lot of fun with this piece clearly
links_reviews_text: But what a great colorful sweater for spring!! Fit ran a little large but nothing a good tuck couldn't fix. More pics on @thanksitsrtr :)
Love this sweater. True to size and the material is nice.
Very nice material and added good shape to the body

I really liked this turtleneck worn for a bday dinner with my best friends. It was cute & cool the colors are amazing. It's a tiny bit scratchy, but not bad. My only complaint is the slightly odd fit. It's a small xs, and is a bit short. The thick yellow also hits at a very strange place accentuating the chest (or in my case, lack thereof). I'm glad to have rented it, but don't feel the need to own! Bonus: It photographs beautifully!

links_reviews_title: Adorable. Wear w high waisted pants
links_reviews_text: Love this vibrant sparkly knit by DVF. It feels fresh after a long cold winter. The fit is cropped so I paired it with high waisted jeans. Very cute. Husband liked. Stripes make your chest look bigger.

LOVED the colors and delicate glitter accent lines in green and red. I am short waisted and was able to wear this with a high waisted yellow wool skirt. I was sad I had to cover it with a jacket I wish I had gotten the cardigan too. The only reason I had to cover this up is because the yellow line screamed LOOK at my giant boobs so I had to tone it down. It was also kind of itchy after a couple of hours so I liver underneath is probably a good idea. I would rent this again with the cardigan.

This top is adorable. A lightweight sweater with a lot of stretch. There were sparkles in some of the strips so if that's not your thing I'd choose something else. It's also a little cropped but find with midrise pants! V cute!!

Short top( i use tank top under not to have skin showing even with medium rise pants), Nice knit, bright, stretchy, great a long or with matching cardigan by DVF, bright yellow & green usually not my colors, glad pink was closer to the face - but in this mix it worked, neck- turtleneck- was tight at start, but got softer & not noticeable in 15-30 min ( also its a new item- so probably will loosen up with time) Sleeves- longer then average.

links_reviews_title: super cute, does ride up a tiny bit though, you will be tugging on the bottom at times, but so cute!
links_reviews_text: like i said, rides up a bit bc of the material and legnth

Add some extra time to your work day because people will be stopping you all day long to give you compliments on this bright, shimmery turtleneck. I dressed it up with slacks one day, a skirt a different day and jeans for a weekend outing. It was a fun splash of color to brighten the midwest winter. Go for it!

links_reviews_title: Super cute but a little big
links_reviews_text: Really cute and fun but I wish it was more fitted. I'm usually size M but this was a little loose, might be stretched out from being worn. Also wish it didn't have the lurex in some of the stripes, it would be more sophisticated without it. Length is a bit awkward, wish it was either a little longer or shorter. But overall really cute sweater! Might need to buy it in a size smaller

links_reviews_title: Size up otherwise slightly cropped fit but very, very cute!
links_reviews_text: Obsessed with this cute sweater!

The sleeves and neck were really long, but the sweater itself was very short! Awkward when trying to tuck it into pants, which I already wear very high waisted. Maybe my chest was just too large for this garment! A larger size would have meant the arms were waaaay too long. Couldn't wear.
Love the colors, love the fit. I wish this top didn't have sparkle on some of the stripes (made it seem less mature to me).
I rented this top for everyday wear, and it was fine - as to be expected. I wore true to size, and I almost wish I'd ordered the XS.
adorable color, neck fits tight, fabric is tight in the right places, a little itchy on the sparkly part but worth it
This sweater is so light and stretchy making it perfect for a cool spring or summer night. It is so vibrant and I loved wearing it so much that I had to buy it!

I rented this sweater for a casual day at work and an outing over the weekend. I got so many compliments on it and really loved it! However, the actual length is very short, so future renters should pair with high-waisted shorts or jeans if they're uncomfortable with showing their midriff (like me).
Absolutely beautiful but itchy
Stylish

It really accentuated my chest and not sure in a good way. I liked it even though I would only be comfortable wearing it with high waisted pants. But after a few hours I found it to be itchy around the neck
Loved the colors of this. There are some sparkly fabric sections that feels a little itchy, but not bad. Definitely a crop top, but I paired it with high rise jeans. My husband loved it on me.

Totally loved this! Would rent it again! The torso is a bit short so u can't really wear it tucked in but really cute nonetheless. I thought the sleeves had holes for the thumb like the photo but that wasn't the case. Love love love it! Wore it for an interview and the interviewer also had on DVF so it was a hit

links_reviews_title: Loved this piece for switching up the standard winter work look
links_reviews_text: Fit is form fitting and flattering on curvier bodies -- note that it is cropped so style it with high waisted bottoms.
Hugs everywhere, so a t-shirt bra is a must. Was a little bit of a crop-top of me, but was able to tuck it into high jeans. I'm 5'6 with a full bust.
Unflattering I wish I could keep it it's so pretty

links_reviews_title: Didn't end up wearing this dress for many reasons, but would have fit the theme nicely: "On Safari".
links_reviews_text: I got this dress for a party with the theme of "On Safari." I didn't end up wearing this dress though. It comes with the slip, which is good because the dress itself is very see-through; it's a soft, very fine mesh construction. I didn't end of wearing this dress because it didn't seem as high quality as it appeared online. I felt like I was wearing a snake costume, not a high-fashion outfit. The thumb holes were unnecessary; you can see in my photo I'm not using them. The funnel neck should have had less fabric and been just one layer tight to the neck. The length of the dress just wasn't quite right for me; I think this would have been so much more striking if it was a knee-length dress.

I got so many compliments on this dress! Friends loved the sleeves too. I'm not used to wearing something so fitted and sexy, but because it was a rental I was a little more daring. Highly recommend this one for something fun. I'm usually a 2 and wore the small. Would've usually required an extra small but I'm glad I went up a size because it was still fitted.
I rented this for a bachelorette party, then an event, then I bought it. Love it love it love it.

links_reviews_title: What made this so unforgettable is how unforgettable the dress is.
links_reviews_text: I loved how it covered so much of my body but was still sexy. I wore it with black booties just like the RTR model did and got compliments all night long. I would wear it every chance I got if it wasn't so remarkable, because it's not the kind of dress you can really wear repeatedly.

links_reviews_title: Fit like a glove! Received so many compliments!
links_reviews_text: It was a little longer than I would have liked. I'm 5'5". But very cool look! A little hard to get on with the slip attached!

Rented this for Valentine's dinner with my husband. Wore with black wedge booties to keep it more casual. The length was perfect, mid calf, as its winter and chilly and i didn't need to wear tights. Loved the sleeves and the neck and the print because I didn't have to worry about jewelry. Not too clingy. Super comfortable. Definitely worth the rent.

I wore this on a double date to dinner in Venice. It's still cool enough out that the coverage of a long sleeve and long skirt made the dress feel weather appropriate. I wore a leather motto jacket and a pair of chunky ankle boots to finish the look! Super comfortable, and stylish!
I got so many compliments on this dress! It's very flattering and different than anything I usually wear. It was surprisingly comfortable as well
Gorgeous dress with a separate detachable lining. The fit is like a second skin and it's fully covered from neck to calf yet so sexy. I had to buy this one!
Loved the fit of this dress, so flattering and comfortable
Great fit and easy to move inn

links_reviews_title: One of my favorite work dresses so far!
links_reviews_text: So I rented this for work, however, I think I would definitely wear this on a new date because it is formfitting, very stretchy, and quite flattering. I really liked the length, and how comfortable it is! Would highly recommend and rent again!

Yes to this dress! It was comfortable, lightweight (not good for cold weather) and fit well/true to size. Sheer with a slip underneath. I paired with a black leather jacket. I didn't have any issues with this dress. Definitely recommend!
Loved this dress. Very figure flattering. Lots of compliments. Wore it for a night out with friends.

links_reviews_title: Wore it as a shirt, transitioned it into a long dress later- great piece!
links_reviews_text: Love this outfit; it's a great material for winter with cool sleeve details and a fabric type that makes rolling the dress up or down a cinch
Note the slip slips often and the dress can ride up while walking
On my previous review, I forgot to mention how cool this sleeves are!

Such a cool and comfortable dress. I got the XS which I found to not be too tight. The fabric is mesh and comfortable. Love the long length but figure hugging fit. I think it looks even better in person than the photo.

links_reviews_title: Everything you could ask for in a midi.
links_reviews_text: I LOVED this dress so much that I purchased it from the designer's site. It's definitely sheer but the lining hides everything well.

links_reviews_title: Super pretty but way too large
links_reviews_text: Such a gorgeous dress but literally falling off of me

If you want to feel good about yourself- rent this dress. Nothing like it and super cute when you cinch a black belt around the waist! Goes down to right above my ankles for a super sexy winter/colder weather dress

links_reviews_title: I received so many compliments on this dress! I felt chic and comfortable!
links_reviews_text: I am 5'10", 60 years young with a slim/athletic build and it hugged in all th right places! I put girls half my age to shame lol. Definitely recommend this rental'
Sexy, fitted, snakeskin... and still elegant. I loved it. WIll rent again!

links_reviews_title: I received so many compliments on this dress!
links_reviews_text: It fit like a glove. The thumb holes in the sleeves were a pleasant surprise.
Fit really well loved the arms and neck. Very comfortable.
Fits true to size, a little longer than midi length. Cute for a date night.
Love this sweatshirt rented it three times
I couldn't tell from the photos but this sweatshirt is sparkly and fun

I trusted the other reviews that this ran large. So, I took a chance being 25 wks pregnant on a small, and I'm so glad I did! Expect a comfy body fit. Cute sparkle on the outside but not itchy on the inside. LOVE.

links_reviews_title: Funky oversized warm sweater, definitely size down!!
links_reviews_text: This sweater is thick so I recommend getting when it's on the colder side. It's extremely oversized, I usually wear a small or medium, ordered the XS and it was still pretty big. I tucked under the bottom 4 or so inches to make it feel less baggy and more my style. Very different, fun to experiment with at work.

links_reviews_title: Fun and sparkly for everyday. Great way to spice up jeans and boots
links_reviews_text: Wore sevy Times

Wore this with leggings and boots every day for a week during a blizzard. Unique cold-weather statement piece, you can pair this with your schlubbiest outfit and make it look intentional. Really warm and sparkly with a wetsuit-like lining.

links_reviews_title: A lot of sparkle and a little highlight goes a long way.
links_reviews_text: Loved this sweater, complements all around. This oversized look does run large so I sized down from S to XS. I'm busty and usually wear a 4/6 or small. Paired it was a Marc Jacobs bag also on RTR.
Loved this sweater. It's a shiny silver which I didn't expect from the photos, but was pleasantly surprised. It runs large so I would size down for a fitted look.

This is an oversized sweater. I went up a size and embraced it! The sleeves are really long (maybe b/c I went up a size) but I just pushed them way up and liked the look. The top is very sparkly and a touch rough but the inside is nice and soft. I didn’t need anything under it. It’s a nice way to add some pizazz to a casual outfit. Be prepared for people to come up and rub you ☺️.

I first put this on and was like, uh no. I got a small and the arms are super oversized and long...but the more I wore it, the more it grew on me. I got a lot of compliments but also a lot of "what are you wearing?"s..I felt funky and unique in it, so I will definitely rent again.
Loves how sparkly and neon this was all at once. It was a little itchy and even with sizing down it was huge! Would rent again in an even smaller size
Baggy fit, lots of sparkle. I enjoyed wearing this unique and casual piece and tend to love Opening Ceremony sweaters overall.
Unique and very sparkly. I won't rent again but it was fun to wear and I received a few compliments.

I really love this sweater. It does have an oversized "boyfriend" fit so definitely size down. I love the shimmer silver mixed with neon accents. It feels appropriate for work but fun/edgy at the same time. I recommend wearing this with leather leggings and boots or more casually with black jeans and slides like I did. Lots of stretch and great for all body types!
I love this over-sized sweater! Gorgeous, metallic silver material. Lined with a smooth material, so it doesn't have that itchy sweater feel.
LOVE THIS SWEATER. It is not just grey. It is grey sparkle. Amazing. It is a stretchy almost neoprene like material.

I read my fair share of reviews and ended up sizing way down. I normally wear a size M/L and I rented a size XS. The XS fit like a normal sweater. The oversized look would have been nice, but the regular fit worked well too. It should also be noted that the silver material is very much metallic that does not show through on the photos.
You can't really tell in the images. It's very cute, but I wasn't expecting it and didn't end up wearing.
Runs really large, material of it wasn't what I was expecting. Fits super boxy.

links_reviews_title: Fun sweater that grew on me.
links_reviews_text: It was body and a bit big but it grew on me after I wore it for a little and I got a few compliments.

This thing was unreasonably baggy, even if it was intentionally cut that way. I could have made two sweaters with the fabric that makes up one. I also found the material itchy and something about the metallic thread details made it seem cheap to me. Not a hit.
Got so many compliments. It's not the softest material, but a fun sweater for every day.

links_reviews_title: Great casual sweater - fun for casual evenings out. Could work for some offices.
links_reviews_text: It runs slouchy but that is the style. I loved the metallic material and it was very warm (which I wanted). The neon lime piping with navy at collar and cuffs were another jolt that elevated the sweater. Wore it a lot with jeans and boots.
Has a sort of holiday feel to it because of all the shimmer. Kind of weird for everyday. I liked the material inside, though -- it was comfortable!

links_reviews_title: didn't end up wearing this piece
links_reviews_text: Super cute sweater-arms were a bit too big!

links_reviews_title: Silver sparkle and fluorescent yellow with navy blue- a subtle statement sweater
links_reviews_text: Super cute sweater. If you like the baggy look, you can stick to your usual size but I personally felt I could have gone a size down. Love the color combination!

Relaxed fit, great for errands, over jeans. Comfortable and looks put together. Wore it multiple times - to a casual brunch, running errands and to work on a casual Friday. Loved it and will rent again.

There's oversized and then there's this. It's huge and I really wanted to like it but as someone short with a chest and butt, this just made me look like a giant trashbag. It is warm and lined so it's not scratchy. Went back.

The silver part of this top is sparkly, scuba-like material. It's very eye-catching and makes the piece really fun to wear. Lots of people want to touch it, which is kind of funny. It runs REALLY big. Especially in the shoulder and arm areas. I sized down one size, and could have gone down another size easily. I wore it over navy leggings. Would rent again.
The grey fabric is sparkly and felt a little rough/synthetic and generally futuristic. Sleeves were way too big and just didn't love the overall fit and look.
The sweater was SO oversized. Also, pictures looks grey, but it was silver metallic. Quality seemed nice, but I returned as soon as I got it.
I ended up not wearing the sweater, it is deceptively heavy and not in a good way.

links_reviews_title: Such a fun piece! highly recommend.
links_reviews_text: This piece is a sweatshirt material (which surprised me at first). It runs oversized, but I loved the fit. It's a fun, quirky piece that's great for work or a night out. Got so many compliments and highly recommend! I wore with black pants and booties.
This sweater/sweatshirt was fun & festive. Comfortable casual wear, warm enough for no coat in cold December weather. I received loads of compliments.

This sweater is cute and it a nice sturdy shiny material but it is HUGE. I know it's supposed to be an oversized fit but the sleeves were way too long and the shoulder and chest area were too big for my frame. I was swimming in this sweater!
I did not wear the sweater because it had too much of a silvery sheen for my taste. Fit was fine.
Heavy, boxy. Nice fit but order a size down I had to return to reorder (wasting almost a week in transit to and from so beware)

links_reviews_title: Love the sparkle, too much sleeeves
links_reviews_text: I found this sweatshirt a little too large to wear. I wore it for a couple of hours, but the sleeves were super flowy and kept getting in my way. The colors were gorgeous and it was comfortable, just not practical for what I was doing.
I love an oversized sweater, but this was cartoonish. I'm usually an 8/medium and am 16 weeks pregnant, even the small was wayyyy too big.
Runs big. Best paired with right pants. Wore it with black jeans and booties. It was a hit.
This dress is amazing! I'm usually a 2 and sized up. Fit perfect. Thinking about purchasing

links_reviews_title: So easy so quick so cute!!!!
links_reviews_text: Super cute! I had to size up because I am very tall with long legs in the smaller size was too short on me! While I am usually a size 4 the 8 didn't feel too large but the length was much better
Got this as a brunch or dinner option while on a trip to Hawaii. The floral pattern and pastel colors really make this dress fun and flirty. I love this silhouette as well, very flattering!

Love this dress. I will say the bust are fit kinda weird and my bra kept coming out which was annoying. I guess you could wear without a bra but I personally wasn't comfortable with that. Still a very fun and girly dress perfect for a night at the beach!
My most favorite dress! I could wear this everyday. I don't have a very large chest so I was able to wear this without a bra! And still looked good!
I absolutely love this dress. Extremely flattering. Thin fabric comfy for warm weather. Great if you're a breastfeeding momma, but is low cut and somewhat short.

links_reviews_title: Soooo adorable, but too young for me.
links_reviews_text: Honestly, I don't know what I was thinking. The dress is adorable, but it's super short and it's too young for me. If it was all one color and a dark ground print, I could have pulled it off, but the pastel prints, just made it too sweet and young. Super cute for someone in their 20s or 30s...

links_reviews_title: I did not wear it, as it was too small.
links_reviews_text: The arms are a bit tight and its a super short dress, I am 5'8.
Size down. The color blend and mix media was uber cute. The jacket also was warm. I would rent again

From the moment I got out of my car in the parking garage I started receiving compliments. This was a show stopper. Nothing but compliments all day long and it felt great. Obviously a very high quality premium jacket, very unique. I Loved it but wished I’d gone for the small size for a more tailored fit as the medium felt a little too large and baggy for me but still, I just loved it. I’d consider renting again in a small and if I had the money, I’d totally buy this one. Absolutely stunning and One Of A Kind!

Rented this to wear to work and ended up loving it so much I wore it ALL the time! This houndstooth coat has brilliant berry colors and is effortlessly cool. Fabric is very comfortable and soft! Wish I could have kept this one forever. Loved this RTR. Would definitely rent again.
I wore this to work and to two parties and got tons of compliments. I really liked it but even in XS I felt it was too large.
I wish I could have kept this jacket. It was super warm yet stylish & I loved it so much
I probably wore this thing about 10 times over a period of one week… It is warm cozy classy comfy professional laid-back and everything! You will not be disappointed by renting this
Perfect belted coat works well with jeans. Beautiful jacket! Very tempted to purchase.
This jacket fits well as pictured. It's very warm and comfy, would recommend for the fall or winter season.

The xs was too big for me, even when I belted. I decided to wear it out anyway and still got a TON of compliments. Apparently the leather detail and fabric is so unique and beautiful that people don't notice fit. Really wish they made one size smaller because I would keep.

This jacket is so comfy and chic! Not the warmest, but I'm in Arizona where a light jacket is perfect! The colors are great, the belt makes it versatile, and it's so easy to dress up or down! Love love love

I was not sure about this at first...thought it could go a little dowdy, but once I switched up my shoes to something a bit more edgy - tall black leather boots - it was transformed. Got many compliments while wearing at work. Long sleeves and roomy, so it was very comfy. Be warned, it is a heavy coat!

The pattern, color and style of this jacket is wonderful! It reminded me of the smoking jacket Elle Woods wore her first day of law school in Legally Blonde. I'm considering order the XS to try it and then buy it!

As we speak i am wearing this for the first time and I wish I could buy it immediately!! It is sooo beautiful and looks so chic. My pic doesn't do it justice because I was in a rush and don't have a full length mirror... But truly I am obsessed and will be hanging onto this for a while! The small fit me perfectly and I am usually a 4/6, but yes it's roomy and that's how it's meant to fit. I should also mention that it's about 45 degrees here in New York and I'm wearing this without another outer layer, and it's quite warm!! I think any colder than this and you'd need another layer, but it works as a blazer for a cold office or an outer layer AND blazer on warmer days or for fall/spring. Loooovvveee!!!!

As others have said, this jacket offers a generous cut. I swam in a medium but still loved it. Compliments galore. If you have a smaller frame you may want to avoid, but if you're tall like me, go for it!
Oversized fit which I loved. Unique pattern! Loved wearing it!

links_reviews_title: This fabulous coat sparks of color and warmth!
links_reviews_text: Wearing for a special board meeting today. Love it!

links_reviews_title: I wore this coat for the entire weekend in Montauk. It was the perfect look for cold weather.
links_reviews_text: The fit was big but great to pair over a sweater. The colors were brilliant!
Love the fun pattern and colors! Wore this with a sweater underneath and it kept me warm on a crisp New York fall day. Wish it had a button but not a big deal.

I absolutely loved this jacket, but was not sent the belt... so I couldn't wear this. I also got this at the beginning of COVID isolation, so I plan to rent this again when I can show off this jacket into the world. It is not a jacket for winter and really best for Spring/Fall during the transitional seasons.
Fit and quality of the material and tailoring were nice.

links_reviews_title: Fun and cozy like a colorful bathrobe
links_reviews_text: I enjoyed wearing this jacket, however it is VERY large! I ordered XS and it was still very very roomy. But cute! And cozy!

The color blocks on this coat are a great deal more distinct in real life vs the photos. I wore this multiple times and have mixed feelings. It does run large- but has a nice drape and silhouette even with layers beneath. I feel like it has a more casual/rustic appearance in person however and the pink and green are very bright.
Wore many times, in a variety of contexts. High quality, lined, reads as very classy and expensive.
Love this fabric and the fit!

links_reviews_title: Unusual, warm jacket. Leather trim started to look worn.
links_reviews_text: This is a nice, unusual jacket. It is quite warm, so perfect for cold offices in the winter. Has lots of colors, including pink, dark green, olive green, red, blue, and black leather accents. I paired it with a pink/magenta scarf to brighten the jacket up a bit. I am a size 8-10 and wore this jacket in size Medium. It is cut to be bulky and with dropped shoulders. Definitely needs to belt to give it some shape. My only complaint is that the black leather trim is quite worn and the black color washed out (especially noticeable at the lapel).
HUGE. I looked like i was a kid trying on my mother's clothes. Def returning without wearing.

Rented this for a work trip to Chile. Initiallly I thought I'd wear it as a blazer to my meetings but it is heavier material. Better for outer wear. I wore it out to dinner multiple nights and got so many compliments. So cozy. Not my usual style but I loved it

Fit is awkward for this petite girl, but I love the color and versatility of this jacket/coat. Nice enough for the office and warm enough for a date on the patio. Paired with olive pants for more casual look, black leather for date night. Got lots of compliments!
Pros: cute design, comfortable Cons: longer length was unflattering, a bit worn, not as fun/eye-catching as expected
This is huge. Order a size down. Or two.
Love the pattern and the jacket was warm, but a little too bulky.
Loved all the colors in the jacket. I wore this to work and out to dinner. A very classy look, yet fun.

Love this jacket - it's very unique and has great patchwork colors for when you want to break out of the black peacoat season. Good transition from winter to spring. It runs a little oversized but cinches with the belt to give it some shape.

links_reviews_title: The pattern is pleasing to the eye.
links_reviews_text: Has an oversize fit.

links_reviews_title: Rented for work, wore out to dinner instead.
links_reviews_text: Nice and high quality but really big. I tend to like voluminous and oversized things- but this just seemed like a large bathrobe title top. I would have felt silly wearing to work wore instead out to dinner with friends - got many compliments!
I am obsessed with this coat. It's so chic, comfortable and looks good with everything. I was so sad to return it and will definitely rent again!

This is a beautiful and fun coat. It is well tailored and the mix of pattern and color is just right. I took this on a work trip along with a purple Milly Sweater that coordinated well. Great for transitional Fall and Spring weather

links_reviews_title: Loved this. It's very warm and thick, so best for cold weather.
links_reviews_text: Loved the color, and great pockets.
Very unique jacket. Would rent again. Size down though.
This was true to size, but the style is over-sized. A cinch belt at the waist gives it a more structured fit. I was complimented on the style and colors and it goes with everything!

Loved this jacket and wore it many times! The fabric was a bit different than I was expecting but I still found it was super versatile and went with everything! It was also a good weight and kept me warm but not overheated.
Fit is great - true to size, maybe slightly small. Great weight - not too light, but not heavy at all. Takes any outfit up a notch! Will definitely keep for a bit!

I rented this since it was easy to pack and added some layers while traveling in Ireland. It couldn't have been more perfect. The material feels high quality. It can look dress or casual -- just depends on what you pair it with. I wore it almost every day!

links_reviews_title: I want to keep this jacket
links_reviews_text: I've worn this every day since I received it and have gotten many compliments. I think I'm going to keep it another month. I really want to buy it! Great summer jacket that goes with everything
Cute & comfortable- I got a lot of compliments on it! I had planned to wear with a skirt but it's a little too long for the proportions

I loved this jacket and considered keeping it! Very versatile for day to day but also was super cute for a night out. Lightweight and perfect for spring weather - definitely wouldn't keep you too warm in the cold though. It ran true to size and the XS fit me well - I found if you have long arms the sleeves might be a tad short. Loved it overall!

links_reviews_title: Light but cute and comfy jacket.
links_reviews_text: Comfortable and great fit. Pockets are accessible. Material is nice and light but heavy enough for warmth on a cool day. Would def wear again.
Good quality. Clean lines. Goes with everything. Comfortable.
I still want to buy this - just didn't want to spend the money. It's the perfect light weight every day jacket!

links_reviews_title: Great jacket to throw on and upgrade any and all outfits.
links_reviews_text: Fit TTS
Perfect fit, not to snug, arms were the right length, very comfortable.
Perfect fit, would rent again
Super soft, easy to wear, not so heavy as a leather jacket and it goes with pretty much everything. I will for sure rent this again.
Loved the fit and fabric of this weather. It's a bit lighter than expected, but just perfect for fall.
Great fit and got lots of compliments
Overall I really liked the jacket, but the arms were a little short on me.
Can dress it up or down. Cute with a lacy tank and jeans for date night!
I loved this jacket. Runs true to size. You can dress it up or dress it down.

links_reviews_title: Club Monaco can do no wrong
links_reviews_text: This jacket is so well made and fits beautifully! I can't wait to rent it again in the fall. Even though it's knit, it's really well structured and goes with everything. The only thing I found a little annoying was that the buckles on the side kind of jingled when you walk but it's not so much that I wouldn't wear it 24/7!

links_reviews_title: Loved this jacket! Got a few compliments at work and at dinner with friends. A great piece.
links_reviews_text: Was the perfect jacket with some jeans and a blouse for work. It fit really well and I have a fairly athletic build for how small I am. Really liked it and wish I could buy if it weren't so expensive.
Fit true to size. Was easy to carry around and dressed up every look while being relatively light weight. Was a staple piece in the vacation wardrobe and loved it

This jacket is very flattering and I love the material. On the thicker side but nice to keep warm. The way it looks on is amazing. I'm highly considering purchasing the actual jacket that is how much I like it!
This is a great piece for work or everyday, the sleeves were a little long on me but it looked great with jeans and even a girly dress to add a little bit of edge.

links_reviews_title: Great jacket for spring European adventure
links_reviews_text: Works with jeans and dressier clothes. Runs a little wide.

links_reviews_title: Versatile, no wrinkle, good weight for the evenings.
links_reviews_text: Will travel with this one to wear on the plane and on cool evenings. Fun piece, lighter than the leather version and easier to pack!

links_reviews_title: I loved the pockets. fit, and little bit of extra on it.
links_reviews_text: This jacket was great! Paired with black jeans and heels for a show.
Wore this with a leather skirt to avoid being overkill on leather. Very cute with jeans as well. Awesome staple.
Paired this with a wrap dress. Looked amazing!

This jacket is perfect for just about everything. Fabric, fit, color you can dress up or down. I sized up because it's still cold here and I am wearing bulkier shirts underneath but still works with t-shirts.
Fabulous jacket. Runs small!! Medium fit like a small but I managed to make it work. Will rent again just a size up.
Loved this jacket for a night out!

This looked like it had so much potential based on other reviews and the photos I saw in RTR - but I was bummed to find out that the collar sagged quite a bit and ended up looking very strange around my neck. The fit through the body wasn't great either - overall I was disappointed and returned without wearing
A little itchy/warm, but loved this piece. The arms were a little long, but I also could've worn a smaller size. The neckline is so cute. Got lots of compliments.
This was chunkier than I was expecting, making it perfect for a freezing day in Jan! It's very cozy and the neck is nice and loose but adds a cute detail!

links_reviews_title: So comfy and warm for a spring day!
links_reviews_text: I LOVED the color of this piece and it was so comfortable to wear. it went really great with a jean mini skirt that was sitting in my closet waiting to be worn. The collar on the sweater was a bit weird, it fell down and didn't stay up as on the picture. I sent it back to soon could have worn again with another outfit.
I loved the details on this sweater but it was slightly itchy and the fit wasn't flattering on my body type. Still liked it enough that I l wore it twice - just dressed it down

Was expecting a cute turtleneck with scallop edge. Instead the neck was completely stretched out and floppy, looked as if it had been stretched over the hanger 100 times. Also the fit was weird- short body but long in the sleeves. Avoid.

Nothing too special about this sweater. The neck was cute but I found the length to be short making me look very boxy. The ruffle around the neck also kept rolling down. Had to wear a tee under this one because it was itchy! Overall just an OK top -not worth the rental.
True to size, great length for highwaisted pants. Fun to dress up or down. The higher neck and the ruffle adds a sweet detail. Good basic, neutral color. Wore multiple times before returning
This sweater quickly became a staple for me the past month. The perfect weight and easy to dress up or down depending on the occasion making it perfect for the holidays.
Such a cute and fun swear but runs a bit small so it was tight on me. Could've gone up a size
Nothing too special, but a great, everyday sweater.
A bit itchy but cute
Itchy material and tight in arms
So itchy and bulky
Loved the stitching details on this sweater - especially on the sleeves. But the collar had lost its shape by the time I received and was more like a turtleneck than expected. Also was pretty itchy.
Cute sweater - a good weight and mostly true to size. I got tons of compliments, but sadly, I found it super itchy and hard to wear all day, especially around the neck :(

links_reviews_title: Not a memorable item. Just nice
links_reviews_text: Nice sweater
I usually wear a size small but the xs was a perfect fit!!
Loved it and received several compliments. Was a little itchy for me to own but perfect for occasion.

I rented this for work and got some compliments on it. It doesn't fit that loosely in the waist as it does on the model. I kept this for about two weeks because it was so comfortable and went with everything!
The collar flopped down which made it look frumpy

This is a great seasonal style and is super versatile. It fit well on my petite, curvy frame. Main negatives were that it was pretty itchy (my skin is fairly sensitive) and the neck, which looks like it's supposed to stand up, was droopy and reminded me more of a circusy frill rather than a chic collar.
Cute sweater but wool is a little itchy/uncomfortable.
This sweater was very versatile. I could wear it with anything. I only gave 4 stars because the neck was very floppy as others have stated and it is also a litte itchy

I loved the collar on this sweater and the color was nice with my skin tone. I wish that it was a little bit longer. It kind of felt like it was washed and put into a dryer instead of hung to dry or dry cleaned.
Did not like at first, but gave it another chance. Loved it! Wore for afternoon watching college football, and then family brunch on Sunday
Fit well
Fits well. Stretched over the day. Itchy. Collar is very soggy. It will not stand up
Cozy sweater got many compliments
i liked the ruffled neckline and the knitted detail on sleeves. it was a little snug in the chest but not too bad.

The collar was slightly less structured than I would prefer, but despite this I still loved it enough to purchase it! The detailing in the sleeve was beautiful and it was so comfortable and cozy. I wore this piece multiple times during the rental period. So many compliments!

links_reviews_title: Nice easy sweater. Pretty soft so you don't have to wear anything underneath.
links_reviews_text: Only downside is it came with stains...
The little ruffly collar makes a plain fisherman's wool sweater really cute. Vet flatterring. Bittom line: iI bought it.

links_reviews_title: Great everyday staple with a little flair
links_reviews_text: Loved this sweater. Wore it bunch, only complaint is that it's a little itchy. Great cut though and fun collar detail got some complements
Loved the slightly shorter in front length. The ruffled mock neck adds personality without being too sweet.
Many winter sweaters with a turtleneck are super itchy, this was not! It was very comfortable and made this never-ending cold sweater weather more fun!
such a comfortable and cute sweater, added a little spark to an otherwise normal looking crew-neck
